Summary: The location was just across Disneyland and it was great.  If there was a shuttle it would even be better as it was quite a long walk.  Coming back to the hotel after a whole day in Disneyland can be very tiring.   Hotel was dated but the place was clean.  Beds comfy but I find it was a bit too high. We had some difficulty finding our room on the 1st floor but the cleaning staff were ever so helpful to direct me through their inventory room in the middle of the block to get to the other side of the building.  Which we only found out later that there was a proper walkway in the middle to get through to the other side of the building, facing Westin Hotel. Additional signs directing guests through this side of the building would be helpful.  The air conditioning / heater unit was
Room tip: Be prepared for a long walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Fast check in, nice staff, hotel exterior is inviting. Nice pools, one with salt water. 15 mintes walk from downtown Disney. Carpet smells a bit. Not enough parking when hotel is full. Price is good for this hotel. Breakfast ok
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great Motel, Great Location, Great Price!
Summary: Check this location out for your trip to Disneyland. Rooms are great, excellent location. Good breakfast and great staff. Almost hate to let anyone know about it, but family and friends to ensure I have a room in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Doug. This means a lot to our staff. We appreciate the time you took to write this review for our hotel. We are also glad that you enjoyed our location and rooms. Thank you again for staying with us. Take great care. Hope to see you all again soon.

Summary Heading: As good as a disneyland hotel
Summary: The all you can eat breakfast was great,  service  cleanliness was top knotch.  My kids loved the all day all you can ear breakfast cereal bar. My kids loved the heated and the cold pool and the two hot tubs. I've stayed at the Disneyland hotel before  and I'd stay here again over the Disneyland hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Josh. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and location. Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a great rest of the year.

Summary: Best Western Stoval's Inn is in very easy walking distance from the Disney Theme Parks. That, I suspect, is it's main draw.  It is a slightly tired chain motel. The room is comfortable but decidedly aging. The lighting is poor and the air con unit rattles terribly. Breakfast was 'interesting'. The scrambled eggs were clearly from powder. The breakfast potatoes were nondescript. I didn't try the ham but it did not look appetizing. The strong coffee was not.  However, the beds are comfortable. The area feels safe and the Best Western is vastly cheaper than many similar hotels. The staff are exceptionally helpful and work bloody hard.
Room tip: There are some balconies which have a great view of the Disney fireworks. Don't be afraid to go...
Manager Response: Hello Howard. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location. In regards to your experience with the breakfast and room amenities, we hope to make it up to you in the future. Take great care.

Summary: Best Location/Best Incredible complimentary Breakfast Buffet/Comfortable Clean Rooms and beds/Great staff/Awesomet Pool and hot tub!  Incredible Stay!  Recommend this as the Best Place to Stay near Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our staff and the view of Disneyland. We hope that you have a great rest of the year. We appreciate you taking the time to write this and we hope to see you again in the near future. Take care.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and good value
Summary: Right on the Disneyland shuttle line but also within walking distance, this is a good place to stay if you're visiting Disney.  Rooms were clean, Breakfast service was good and the team is knowledgeable, helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our staff and the view of Disneyland. We hope that you have a great rest of the year. We appreciate you taking the time to write this and we hope to see you again in the near future. Take care.

Summary: This was one of the worst stays ever.  Have stayed at many hotels in the Disneyland area and this one makes the list of ones to never stay at again.  Bed are horrible.  Squeaky mattress springs.  Partner moved and whole bed would move.  Top floor shakes and almost caused motion sickness.  Doors on rooms slam shut and can be felt by everyone several rooms away.  Management should try staying the night in their own hotel to see how bad it is.  Do not recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Chris. Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your most recent stay with us. We try our best to ensure that all guests have the best experience possible. We would love to make it up to you in the future. Take great care.

Summary: I am not a frequent Best Western guest but I would stay at this hotel for sure.  Small town feel but close to Disney.  Staff was amazing!   Super attentive and friendly.  Only issue was the fireworks at Disney after 9pm can startle you if you are not expecting them.  I would book this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our staff and the view of Disneyland. We hope that you have a great rest of the year. We appreciate you taking the time to write this and we hope to see you again in the near future. Take care.

Summary: The Disney hotels have outpriced themselves and we looked for different accommodations. This hotel is a good neighbor hotel of Disney. The breakfast was good, and we liked that the food was served rather than having guests get their own.  With that said, everyone is hitting the breakfast at the same time because everyone wants to get to the park when it opens. So, it's crowded.  The beds were comfortable.  The rooms were dark (we had 2 rooms for family).  The hotel is from the 1960's and htey have been updated multiple times, but you can see that they are heavily used. The location is close, but it would have been great to offer a shuttle. It's a long trek to go back if you want during the day. The price was high, but expected for the area. The staff at the front desk were
Manager Response: Hello there! We are sorry to hear about your most recent experience. We will be addressing it with the housekeeping team.  We would love to make it up to you in the future. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Take care.

Summary: Hotel is within a 2k steps of Disney and California Adventure. Older hotel in need of some renovation. Clean and staff nice. Free breakfast isn't worth it. $6.50 for a bottle of water was excessive...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and our hotel staff. We appreciate your feedback and we appreciate you taking the time to write this review. We will look into your concerns. We hope to see you again in the future. Take great care.

Summary: Easy walk to parks. Easy check in and check out. Great breakfast variety, and hot food changes a little each day. This is our go to Disney hotel over the last several years. Only concern this trip is there was a decent amount of homeless sleeping at the now closed Cocos restaurant that is next door to hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and the walk to the park. Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel and to our brand, it means a lot. Have a great rest of the year and we hope to see you again in the near future. Take great care.

Summary: Just a few minutes walk from downtown Disney, as well as the Disneyland and California adventure theme parks! The breakfast is perfect fuel for a full day at Disney, and if you need anything during your stay, the staff is incredibly helpful
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time out of your day to write this review of our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and service. Our staff appreciates your kind words as  well in regards to front desk and breakfast. Take great care!

Summary: Very good location .  Excellent breakfast , good selection , well organized .  Very good service by office staff .  Room was comfortable as well as the bed .  However could use updating  to make stay more appealing
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you came to spend the Christmas holiday with us. We appreciate your feedback in regards to our location, staff, and breakfast. We hope to see you again in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We stay here every year, and it is consistently great. Breakfast is amazing and has a variety each day, staff is always kind, Spa and Pools are a plus. The rooms are good for what you pay for, they can be noisy if you have a connecting inner door. The rooms are extremely clean, we saw the hotel deep cleaning while we were there and they tear the room apart to clean everything. All in all a great stay, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, Nichole. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed breakfast and staff. Our staff appreciates you. Thank you again for staying with us. Take great care.

Summary: Room carpets could have been cleaner, and room could have smelled better, but overall we enjoyed our stay. The breakfast that was included in our stay, was great. I just wish the hot food was made with a little more effort. Staff, thanks for helping us enjoy our Vacay!
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the near future. Take care and enjoy the rest of your year.

Summary: Very good stay at this Best Western Plus. Staff was very kind.  I think it's very close to Disneyland by way of downtown DL. Breakfast was good and plentiful. Didn't use the pool or spa. They have a on-site gift/snack shop, room was nice and bed was very comfortable. Only complaint I have was the noise from the nearby street was loud, not BW issue, I would recommend bringing earplugs if the street noise and constant emergency vehicles sirens bother you. Other then that, it was a very nice stay, I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Frank. Thank you for taking the time to write this review of our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed your most recent stay with us. Our staff appreciates you and we take great pride in taking care of our property. Thank you again for staying with us. Have a great rest of the year.

Summary: I experienced theft/burglary out of my locked hotel room. Staff did nothing to resolve problem. We have stayed here multiple times and experienced little issues but this one by far was the worst we had over $1200 stolen from my room while we were at Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice, clean hotel. For me, personally, it was a bit of a walk to the parks especially when walking back after a long day at Disney. My feet were not happy with me but I could see it being reasonable for many people. Great price and the Best Western Brand is always a solid choice
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the near future. Take care and enjoy the rest of your year.

Summary Heading: Disneyland and Best WesternPlus Stovall‚Äôs Inn is a match made in heaven
Summary: 3 reasons why we selected this hotel is Location, location and location. Walking anytime of the day or night was safe, convenient and fun. It‚Äôs like taking a walk in the park or hiking our favorite trails. The staff ensured a super clean, Covid free and beautiful environment. The relaxing jacuzzi, energize pool and amazing garden sculptures
Manager Response: Hello. Thank you for taking the time to write this review of our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed your most recent stay with us. Our staff appreciates you and we take great pride in taking care of our property. Thank you again for staying with us. Have a great rest of the year.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay when you‚Äôre at Disneyland.
Summary: Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn is my only choice for lodging when I come to Disneyland. The Breakfast are fresh, hot and toasty. The staff will help you in anything you need. Friendly. I recomend them
Manager Response: Hello John. Thank you for taking the time to write this review of our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed your most recent stay with us. Our staff appreciates you and we take great pride in taking care of our property. Thank you again for staying with us. Have a great rest of the year.

Summary: 50+ Ants on the food in our room.  My daughter got bedbug bits on multiple nights during our 5-night stay.  We didn‚Äôt realize they were bedbug bites until we returned home so we didn‚Äôt report it during our stay.
Manager Response: Hello. Thank you for staying with us. We are sorry to hear about your most recent experience. We take your review very seriously. The room has been looked at and no traces were found after professional inspection. If you would like further assistance please contact us directly and we hope to see you again in the near future. Have a great rest of your year.

Summary: DECENT PLACE TO STAY. CLEAN AND QUIET WITH A GOOD BREAKFAST. NOTHING EXCEPTIONAL FOR THE PRICE THOUGH. Shuttle was convenient but wish they had their own shuttle . Rooms were a bit cramped but all in all a decent place to stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: If you don‚Äôt have enough staff too clean the rooms you book, don‚Äôt book so many rooms, or lower your price, a lot. We stayed for 9 days, like we usually do every other year, they planned for the room to be cleaned ones during that time. We‚Äôve paid $273/night, for that kind of money you may expect some service. Even the coffee, tea and paper cups were not replaced, we had to get all that at the reception the whole 9 days, including fresh towels. This was probably our last stay there, BW should really look into that.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are sorry to hear about your most recent experience. We will be addressing it with the housekeeping team.  We would love to make it up to you in the future. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Take care.

Summary: We‚Äôve been staying there on and off for the past 20+ years now. And it‚Äôs been good every time, except this year, we know Covid created a lot of problems, for a lot of hotels and motels, and we understand that it‚Äôs mostly a financial issue, we get that. But when raising the prices like crazy, and you get only half the service you pay a lot of money for, is really unacceptable. We‚Äôve stayed there for 9 nights this year, in which they planned to clean the room only once, we had to go to the reception to get the coffee packets, towels, paper cubs and everything else. For $273 a night, you may expect some service, right. I know staff shortage is a problem, it‚Äôs a problem all over the world right now, but if there‚Äôs not enough staff available, make sure you don‚Äôt book more rooms that
Manager Response: Hello. We are very sorry to hear about your most recent stay with us. Our hotel treasures our return guests and we take to heart your review and experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review of our property. We would like to make it up to you in the near future. Have a great rest of the year.

Summary Heading: Horrible lighting no daily service but great breakfast
Summary: The lighting in the vanity/bathroom area was so bad you could not put your make up on properly, nor could you take it off sufficiently! Which is very important when you‚Äôre getting dressed up for Halloween lol but seriously, even on regular days the lighting was terrible. We asked for New lightbulbs for the area and were told there were done. There was also no service daily in the room you had to call if you needed anything. The best thing about the stay in this hotel what is the breakfast? There was plenty of breakfast foods to choose from, and it was very good l.  We had two groups and used two rooms at this hotel but we won‚Äôt be coming back because of the poor lighting
Manager Response: Hello there! We are sorry to hear about your most recent experience. We would love to make it up to you in the future. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Take care.

Summary: Clean room. On floor level. You can hear the neighboring guests if they‚Äôre noisy. Everything else was pretty good. I also like that the parking is secured by passcode. The breakfast was very nice too.
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the near future. I am glad to hear that you were happy with our breakfast and room. Take care and enjoy the rest of your year.

Summary: Would highly recommend this hotel to family and friends we had early check in as requested when we booked the room months in advance had a great hot breakfast the days we were there and excellent experienced staff to help with rental equipment
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please do take care and we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights our last trip! It was walking distance to Disneyland and we had a wonderful experience! We love it and we will be back! Great for the price defiantly worth it! See you soon!
Manager Response: Hi Mariah, We are glad to hear that you enjoy your stay with us, We hope to see in you in the future. Take care.

Summary Heading: Across from park view, far from entrance
Summary: Our original hotel canceled so we booked Stovalls as a second choice.  The hotel is kiddy corner to CA Adventure for a view.  The walk to Downtown Disney entrance was further than we expected.  We planned midday breaks and it added a lot of walking.  There are closer hotels across the street from main entrance.  Room was comfortable, pools and hot tubs were nice, free breakfast was decent but really crowded.  Breakfast times didn‚Äôt match the sign on the back door.  Parking cost and was difficult if coming back at night.  One night they didn‚Äôt have space and we had to park in a checkin spot.  We wouldn‚Äôt stay again only because of distance to park entrance.
Manager Response: Hi Carriel, Thank you for staying with us. We would love to make it up to you in the future regarding your most recent stay. We hope that you enjoyed our location and our great city. Have a great day.

Summary: Stayed here for a Disney trip. Short walk to Downtown Disney to get to the theme parks. The room was clean & of a decent size. Furniture & fixtures in good condition. Nice big vanity. Water temp, pressure & drainage were good in the shower. AC was relatively quiet. We usually turned it off at night. No bed bug issues. Our room had a connecting door & for at least one night there were some rather noisy children in there, but it didn't bother us when it came time to sleeping. The free breakfast is just meh, but okay for a quick bite before hitting the parks. Pancakes were tough & the eggs appeared to be powdered or some other kind of processed product. After the first day, we went for cold options of yogurt, granola, cereal, English muffins, pastry, fruit. The paper parking pass
Manager Response: Hello. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk to Disneyland from our property. Thank you for leaving this review for our staff. We will address some of your thoughts about breakfast with our staff and we hope to make it up to you in the future. We wish you a very happy rest of the year and a great holiday season. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: This hotel is a stones throw from Downtown Disney Drive..  A ten minute walk to Downtown Disney.. At night you can see the Disneyland  fireworks from outside your door.  The pools are very nice with lovely topiary landscaping.  Make your reservations early.  This gem fills up fast.
Manager Response: Hello Robert! Thank you for your review, it means a lot to our staff. We are so glad that you enjoyed the location and short walk from our hotel to Disneyland. Our topiary garden is a legacy of ours, we appreciate your kind words regarding that. Thank you again for staying with us. I hope you have a great rest of the year! Take care.

Summary: Absolutely overwhelmed by the quality of the room.  Close to Disneyland, with the reasonable price for the room, we were not expecting the quality of accommodations that we had.  Great breakfast and a restaurant right next door (Coco's) it is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. I am happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and that you enjoyed our location. Thank you again for staying with us. Have a great rest of your year and we hope to see you again soon! Take great care.

Summary: This was my first time staying at Stovall's in Anaheim. We normally stay closer to the parks on Harbor but I finally had the opportunity to try this motel and I'm so glad I did! The staff, without exception, were so friendly and helpful. I had to call several times before my stay and they were so pleasant to talk to. When I arrived I was able to get an early check-in, as the room was ready, and they were happy to do that for me. The room was very basic but all I needed with a fridge and microwave.  I LOVED the large pool area and topiaries. Also, it was great to have a basic hot breakfast included! The walk to the security area at the west side of Downtown Disney took me 11 minutes at an easy pace, and I really appreciated the walk. It was so much quieter and very pretty
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please do take care and we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Very clean room, well kept grounds and pool area. Beds were very comfortable. Staff was great & issues resolved. Price was a bit steep, with charging  $15 a day for parking. Walk to Disneyland parks was easy.
Manager Response: Hello there. Thank you for staying with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for taking the time to write this review, it means a lot to our staff. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our pool area and location. Take great care.

Summary: This hotel has everything that families visiting Disneyland could want. The well-equipped rooms are immaculate. There is a full breakfast included, which saves you the time and money of finding a restaurant each morning. There are a ton of hot and cold options to please anyone. You can fill up before you walk the 3 blocks to Downtown Disney, where you can access shops, restaurants, and of course the Disney Parks. This is as close as you can get to Disney without paying the exorbitant prices of the Disneyland Resort Hotel. If you need a break in the heat of the day, there are 2 adult pools and a cute "kiddie" pool in a spacious patio area. We had grandparents with us and the desk clerk helped us rent two scooters when we arrived. They were charged and waiting for us in the lobby
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad that you stayed with us here at the Stovall's Inn. Thank you for taking the time to write this review for our property. It means a lot to our staff. We hope to see you again in the future. Take great care!

Summary: Great hotel and value, especially with the location. Rooms are clean, and there is a continental breakfast. My only downside, is the lack of maid service daily (however I realize most hotels are not doing that currently.)
Manager Response: Hello there. Thank you for staying with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for taking the time to write this review, it means a lot to our staff. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and location. Take great care.

Summary: This hotel is outstanding in many ways. It is fairly close to Disney. It has excellent soundproofing and is refreshingly quiet. Lastly‚Äîit has an excellent hot breakfast every morning 7-9 am. The bed was comfortable. Slept well. Aside from turning in my own towels and throwing away my own trash, there was little to no interaction with the workers. Overall, this is a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our location and proximity to Disneyland. Breakfast is one of our main attractions and we thank you for the kind words. Taking out trash and towels can be done at anytime throughout your stay, our housekeepers will follow through with those requests. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My family has stayed here twice now when visiting Disneyland and will always stay here (at least with kids in tow).  The rooms are comfortable. Bathroom is what you'd expect (in a good way). Pools are great.  But the biggest draws are the distance to the park (under 30minutes walking with a 5 and 7 year old) and the full buffet breakfast.   You definitely get your money's worth staying here.
Manager Response: Hello there, Ryan. Thank you for taking the time to write this review of our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed our location and breakfast. We hope to see you again in the future. Take great care and thank you again for your kind words.

Summary: Staff was great, rooms were fine. The pool and spa areas are well taken care of, and on 8=94 degree days, really welcome - especially as the spas are kept 85 degrees - refreshing and relaxing. Walking to Disney means a 12 minute walk up Disneyland Drive - try to cut in via Grand Californian entrance if possible. Saves having to go west and walk around Paradise Pier Hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Mark. Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time to write this review. We hope to see you again in the future. We pride ourselves on our staff and we are grateful for your positive remark. Take great care.

Summary: I had a great stay at the best western. I thought the staff was very friendly and helpful. It was very quiet at night and during the day when I was trying to take a nap. The beds were comfortable. The breakfast was good and had some variety to it. Check in was easy and got my room right away. It was a little far for me to walk to Disneyland every day but if you like to walk about a mile it would be fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Minnie! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We would love to see you again in the future. Take great care.

Summary: 1st time in Anaheim. This hotel was in a great position to easily walk to Disney. Room was very good. All staff we interacted with were excellent. Will come back on any future trip for sure. Also will recommend to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Kevin! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We would love to see you again in the future. Take great care.

Summary: The location is great. The rooms were clean. Breakfast was good. It was nice to have a full breakfast before heading off to Disneyland. The staff were polite and helpful. A really great value. This is our new favorite place to stay for a quick trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, bjlcivil! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We would love to see you again in the future. Take great care.

Summary Heading: It's within walking distance to the park!
Summary: Checked in after park close. They have someone at the desk 24 hours and, thankfully, their little convenience store is also open 24 hours. They were a godsend. Parking can be a little tight. When the place is full it is FULL so be prepared to ge there early or right on time because parking is hard to come by late at night.  There's a Coco's on the corner and a Denny's down the street. Plenty of places to choose from.   I've stayed here multiple times and it never disappoints. It's a cheaper option. Only downside is the double bed rooms are not queens so it can feel a little crowded.
Manager Response: Dear Emgudino, Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  If I can be of assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me at 714-778-1880 e1165.  Thank you again for taking the time to complete the survey. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.

Summary: Stayed at this property as it was close to Disneyland was only a  only two blocks. Swimming pools were new 2 pools and 3 hot tubs breakfast was normal fare. Everyone that worked there was very polite and helpful we are planning a return trip
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for staying with us. We are so glad that you had a great experience with the Stovall's Inn. Our staff thanks you for your kind words. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at the BW Stovall‚Äôs Inn for 10 nights whilst visiting Disney and the surrounding area.   Room was clean, tidy and well equipped. Air conditioning was a bit noisy but the room was a perfect base camp for our trip.   Breakfast is free and there is a good choice. It can get busy at times but we always managed to secure a table.   Staff on front desk were friendly and helpful. Car parking can get expensive but we always found a space.   Location is PERFECT for Disney! Only a 20 min walk to the park gates via Downtown Disney.   Pool area was fantastic. Very clean and well cared for.   Overall, a really good hotel and I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please do take care and we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent location, about a 15-20 minute walk to Disney is you have kids, probably 10-15 without. You can see and hear the fireworks from the hotel. The staff were very helpful. Great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Taryn! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We would love to see you again in the future. Take great care.

Summary: The accommodation was clean and efficient. eg. fridge, kettle. The staff were genuinely helpful and friendly. The pool area was lovely. The spa was so appreciated after a big day at Disneyland. The beds were super comfortable and my daughter wanted to take the pillows home!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please do take care and we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Me and my three kids stayed for 5 nights and the room was never cleaned. I understand reducing the frequency but when I have to make a request to have the floor vacuumed on day 4, it just feels wrong.  We ran out of toilet paper on the last day.  Anything you might need refreshed (Kleenex, soap, conditioner) you need to call and request and wait for it. It‚Äôs just undignified.  The room was dark, dingy and damp. And tight. Very little room To move around.  The bathroom door and frame had water damage and warped wood- it badly needed a little basic maintenance. The air conditioning was a loud box above the bathroom counter/coffee microwave station but the room always felt damp. My kids used the breakfast but I didn‚Äôt because the line up for the hot food was literally half way into
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We hope to see you again in the future. We are glad that you enjoyed our location and our amenities. Have a  wonderful rest of the summer.

Summary Heading: Very basic, no frills but near Disney
Summary: Very near Disney, literally a 10 min walk. Rooms were clean on arrival and although front desk was helpful with extra towels, toiletries etc our room wasn‚Äôt cleaned for the entire 3 night stay which was a bit much when you are sharing 1 room with two adults and two teenage boys. The beds were small and uncomfortable - we are not big people and my husband and I could barely fit in our bed together. Breakfast felt a bit ‚Äòprison like‚Äô with hot food options given to you and plastic cutlery and paper plates in a rather depressing room that was always busy - but good food choice options and good coffee. The pool area was great, very clean and towels were provided. If you want a very basic hotel to enjoy Disney from with no frills then this is fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your feedback. We hope that we can make it up to you in the future. We are glad that you enjoyed the location and closeness to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Clean, nice staff and soooo close to disney
Summary: All the employees were so nice. I really enjoyed the free breakfast. But the part I loved the most is you can see California adventure from our room. The only downside is the trolley. The app is very confusing and staff was little to no help.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate the feedback. We will work on more specific information regarding the app for our guest.

Summary Heading: A bit crusty around the edges
Summary: I'm assuming that the decline in service and attention to detail is mostly due to staffing shortages, but maid service is no longer a daily occurrence, some things are dirty or don't work, and they even ran out of coffee during their complementary breakfast. Clunky internet. Sad, because this used to be my "go to" choice for a good place to stay near The Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We would love to make it up to you in the future regarding your most recent stay. We hope that you enjoyed our location and our great city.

Summary: Very disappointed. It‚Äôs my birthday. I‚Äôm wearing a shirt that says it‚Äôs my birthday. I booked a room for 5 people (actually we booked 2 rooms for 8 people). The room we were given in no way sleeps 5 people. When I went to the front desk, Amanda Cruz immediately started speaking over me. She told me the room sleeps 4-5 people‚Ä¶ 2 adults and a small child per double bed. In no way could a double sleep 2 adults and even a baby. Amanda told me I could cancel my reservation. I told her I couldn‚Äôt do that since I am already here, but I will be sure to tell everyone of the horrible service. She laughed and said ‚Äúgood.‚Äù We come to Disney once a year and usually stay at a Hilton property but with a recommendation, we decided to try Best Western. Never again.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are sorry to hear about your most recent experience. We would love to make it up to you in the future. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Take care.

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, great breakfast, 15 minute walk to Disneyland and nightly fireworks can be seen from the hotel. 2 brand new.
Summary: Check in/out was easy. Rooms were nice. Internet was ok. Bit slow but stable. The free breakfasts were always great. Two brand new pools with hot tubs and a beautiful secure courtyard. The hotel is kiddie corner to California Adventure Land and the nightly fireworks can be seen from the hotel. Great location. 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney üòÄüòÄ
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review! It means a lot to our staff! We hope you have a great rest of your summer and thank you again for staying with us here at the Stovall's Inn!

Summary Heading: Nice to come back for the day to a clean room.
Summary: We requested staying next door to family, the staff made that happen. We took advantage of the laundry area that was clean and convenient. The pool area was very nice. We were very satisfied with the house keeping staff. Overall we had a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Your review means a lot to our staff. We are so glad that you enjoyed our pool area and housekeeping staff. Take great care and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great choice for our Disneyland trip
Summary: Love the closeness and easy walk along the beautiful location. The pools and hot tubs very nice. Great choices for the breakfast. Easier access to the parks, mobile order Starbucks on your way in, access entry into Disney via the monorail, shorter lines than Main Gate locations.
Manager Response: Hello there. Thank you for staying with us. Your review means a lot to our staff. We hope to see you again in the future and we are so glad that you enjoyed our amenities! Take great care.

Summary: This hotel was a great choice for the price! We were a 10-15 min walk away from Disney‚Äôs entrance. Downtown Disney takes about 10 mins. The buffet breakfast was great- lots of variety for everyone. Parking is a bit hard to get right in front but it‚Äôs a gated and secure parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! Your review is very special to our staff. We are glad that you enjoyed breakfast and the closeness to the park!

Summary: Location: Close to Disneyland. Just a 10 - 12 minute walk to Downtown Disney Room: we had a 3rd floor room. It was clean, amenities such as Fridge, microwave, iron and board, hairdryer. The room would benefit from a safe but there are safety deposit boxes behind reception. Reception: This was very welcoming and staff were super friendly and helpful, giving us another hour for later checkout without problems. Grounds: Topiaries around the grounds and in the garden at rear. Reasonable sized pool (didn‚Äôt use though). Areas kept clean. Parking seemed a little busy at times Food: We took advantage of the free breakfasts on site. A good, if a little repetitive choice with the hot food. Nice touch with packaged pastries we were able to take to the park with us.  If you want a location
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. We would love to see you again in the future! We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel amenities. Please take great care!

Summary: We like this Best Western location across street from Disneyland, which was very convinient we just walked to Disneyland. Staffs were nice, breakfast was good, and rooms very clean. Thank you very much!
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. We would love to see you again in the future! We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel and our breakfast buffet. Please take great care!

Summary: Friendly, fast check-in. Breakfast options were great, something for everyone & different hot items each day. Pool area is adorable, clean, private, includes cabanas, and an adult pool. Workout room had a nice selection of equipment. Room was clean and in order. We had a room mishap upon check in, our key was for the wrong room, not a big deal. Front desk sent an employee to us to correct the issue. Excellent customer service. We asked for an early check in if possible & we were granted a 2pm check in. We have stayed here before & will stay again. Walking distance to DL - about 1/2 mile.
Manager Response: Hello there, Amy! Thank you for your review. We would love to see you again in the future! Please take great care!

Summary: A clean room (Dated thou) and includes  Breakfast. Only thing missing was daily room service to have fresh bedding and removal of rubbish bins and cleaning while staying. Would be appreciated to have the Inn's daily room service to change clean beds sheets and have fresh towels, and empty the trash/waste bins when returning on 4 to 5 day stays.
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for your review. We would love to see you again in the future! We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel and our breakfast. Please take great care!

Summary: We returned to this hotel, and they keep improving. It‚Äôs close to the the Grand Californian & the Disney parks, & the walk is more scenic than Harbor Blvd. It was clean & everything in the room worked. We‚Äôll be back.
Manager Response: Hello there, Tom! Thank you for your review. We would love to see you again in the future! We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel and our location. Please take great care!

Summary: The hotel is close to Disney and that‚Äôs what we needed it for. The room was pretty old and dark. Lighting over the sink was awful to try to put on makeup or see anything close up. There was a chunk of dried food on our counter when we arrived which made me feel like the whole room may not have been very clean. Beds were ok, not super comfy or anything special, but I did sleep. Shower faucet was a bit loose, but water pressure was good and water stayed hot. Small bathroom. One hook on the bathroom door, otherwise nowhere to hang our towels that we used for 5 nights. Breakfast was very crowded but lots of good food choices. Nice, close walk to Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We would love to make it up to you in the future regarding your most recent stay. We hope that you enjoyed our location and our great city. Have a great rest of the summer!

Summary: Too far to walk to Disneyland/DCA . And for the price they charged we could have stayed closer on Harbor blvd. Unfortunately, it was a last minute trip and had to pay almost the same amount of money for being too far. The restaurants nearby closed too early. Coco's closed at 10 and the Denny's closed @ midnight!! We;ve travelled all over the country and this is the only Denny's we know of that closed! Denny's is usually open 24/7! So it was a bit disappointing as we are used to eating a little something after park closure. It took us about 26 minutes to walk from the front of the motel to the front gates of Disneyland/DCA. But we are old, 69 and 64 respectively. Our grandkids walked faster so it would probably take about 15-20 minutes for young adults to walk it. It might be a
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for staying with us. We are sorry to hear about your experience with walking, most of our guests love our closeness to the park. We hope that you come to see us again in the future.

Summary: If you are visiting Disneyland, this is a great, nearby place to stay. It is also located within an easy walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and several high quality restaurants. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, Cody. We hope to see you again soon and we are glad that you enjoyed the area around our hotel.

Summary: This was in walking distance to the park. The rooms where dark and a little outdated but had fridge, microwave, coffee pot, and comfortable beds. They also have a free breakfast every morning that had a good variety of options.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are so glad that you liked our breakfast and location. We hope to see you again in the near future. Take great care and have a wonderful rest of the summer.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights in May 2022 and loved this hotel.  Wonderful staff.  Seema allowed us to check in early with no additional fees, the breakfast crew was efficient and friendly, and we stopped someone to fix our television and he was fast and helpful.  Easy walk to the Anaheim Convention Center.  Beautiful topiary around the pool.  Pool area was never crowded and fully stocked with towels.  Hot breakfast was tasty and filling.  No complaints about our room or parking.  We left our car after checkout for a fee of $15, very reasonable.  Overall a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for this review. It means a lot! We would love to see you again in the future. I am so glad that you enjoyed our staff and pool area! Take great care.

Summary: Rooms Very Clean and Spacious/Air Coditioned/Comfortable Beds/Exceptional Friendly and Helpful Staff/Superb Location/Great pools and INCREDIBLE Breakfast!  We Love and have stayed in their hotels for years and never have been disappointed.  When we go.... we have always stayed here and same with our extended family we travel with.  We will continue to stay here in the future also!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! It means a lot that you took the time to write this review! We hope to see you again in the future. Take good care.

Summary: We stayed in the Best Western Stovalls Inn in May, The check in was super easy, the room was spacious enough and it was clean.  The breakfast was great, the room was busy but it is really big and we never had an issue at all in our 4 days finding a table and the selection was really varied.   However, the best part about this hotel by far is the location. It is an easy 10 minute walk to the parks, super convenient to get there early in the mornings and a lovely walk home at the end of the day. We would stay here again on our next visit without a doubt.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are so glad that you enjoyed the breakfast and our location! Take great care and stay healthy!

Summary: Very convenient hotel if you‚Äôre going to Disneyland. Since the pandemic, housekeepers don‚Äôt clean the room daily. Excellent and friendly customer service. People at counter were professional. breakfast every morning was good. Enjoyed my stay.

Summary: We have stayed at this location every time we vacation in Anaheim. Very friendly staff and clean rooms. Prices are fair on quality of service and quality of rooms. We will continue to stay at this location any time we stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: It was clean staff was very friendly and it was in a good location

The breakfast was great, I do wish they had pancakes or waffles.  The room is clean and nice.  The pool and hot tub was great.

Summary Heading: Second time at this property- perfect location
Summary: So this is my second time at this location and I am definitely still a huge fan. Now it‚Äôs nothing fancy but for what it is and the price with the location you cannot beat it. Here are my thoughts:  Hotel itself:  The check in staff was absolutely pleasant and helpful.   There is a complimentary breakfast but to be honest we never did it as the breakfast was done early and sooooo busy but we LOVE Cocos right next door. They have excellent food and service.   I am still a bit iffy on the no housekeeping thing. I understand the reasoning but it would be nice if they at least had a station or something where patrons could get towels and cups and such.   The AC fan thing is archaic lol but it works   The beds are actually quite comfortable and we‚Äôre perfectly good for our stay

Summary: Great location to Disneyland (about a 15 minute walk) and rooms were large and clean. Rooms included a microwave and fridge.   Breakfast had a good variety and was perfect for a quick meal before a busy day at the parks.   They are not offering daily room cleaning, but state this when you arrive. $15 a day parking until 3pm each day.   I would recommend it for any future Disneyland trips.

Summary Heading: Bring back room cleaning and waffles!!
Summary: We stayed three nights still no room cleaning when out for the day. I would love to come back to a clean room where beds are made, fresh towels, no trash, etc....Prices haven't gone down even though the service has. Bring back cleaning, I want to get what I pay for. Breakfast was a disappointment for more reasons then just not serving waffles as pictured in hotel site pictures. Please, bring back the waffle!! Oh and there are no restaurants near by except Coco's which is like a really old Shari's/Denny's. We walked in then walked right back out, no thank you. We took an Uber $10 including tip each way to and from the park, not a bad deal. Better than walking after a long day.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are so happy that you stayed with us. Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We hope to get our breakfast back pre COVID procedure soon! We will take great care of you in the future. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: We normally stay on the other side of Disney closer to the main gates but that was not available. This hotel was a pleasant surprise. The facility and rooms were clean and comfortable. Pool area was good. Small beds in room and breakfast wasn‚Äôt great but provided something to get you going in the morning. Reasonable walk to Disney if you enter by the Disneyland Hotel and walk thru Downtown Disney. The monorail is also an option if going to Disneyland Park.

Summary: Hotel is not the same as it was before the pandemic. Mattresses and pillows are uncomfortable. Rooms are very outdated. Carpet is old, stinky and filthy. Guest were smoking right outside their rooms which caused the cigarette smoke to come into our room when we had our window open and when your child has asthma that is something that‚Äôs definitely not okay. We miss the breakfast selections that were available pre pandemic, but what they have now is okay.  I hope they take care of these issues soon because we hope to continue to be able to stay here during our Disney trips. The location, pool, and their coffee are great here.
Manager Response: Hello, Rosa. We are sorry to hear about your experience with our hotel and we would love to make it up to you in the future. Thank you for taking the time to write this review and we thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great family stay for my son's 12th bday!
Summary: Great family stay for my son's 12th bday!  Easy, safe walking to Downtown Disney about 12 min about 20 min to Disneyland front gate.  Very clean hotel.  Hot breakfast was a plus!  Really liked the 2 pools and 2 jacuzzi's very clean and really helped with not being sore from all the walking/ standing at Disneyland.  Loved that CoCo's is right next door.  One night, we were too tired to wait for long dinner waitlist times so we went to CoCo's and it was cozy and nice.  Great view of fireworks from the 3rd floor and pool area.  My son loved the our little weekend trip!  Will definitely stay here again, great value for the price compared to other very pricey hotels.

Summary Heading: Great experience for family visit to Disneyland
Summary: Stovall's Inn is situated approximately 1 mile from the entrance to the Disneyland Resort/California Adventure. It has access via a very convenient shuttle ($6 per day per rider as of this date), which is a great value. The shuttle runs early enough to get to the park at opening time and keeps running every 20-30 minutes until a half hour after the park closes.   On surface streets, Stovall's Inn is also approximately a half our away from Huntington Beach, and Coco's restaurant is right next door.  Rooms are very clean; beds are very comfortable; staff is knowledgeable, efficient, and courteous. Immediate area around Stovall's Inn is very clean and safe for family. Excellent value; highly recommend.

Summary Heading: More of a motel than a hotel
Summary: I chose this place because of the fairly positive reviews. I regretted my decision as soon as I arrived. First of all, let me say this place is more of a motel than a hotel. The room I was in faced the street, and all I heard were horns honking and cars driving by on the busy street all night. The room itself smelled like a musty dog. The carpets did not seem clean, and the beds were horrible! It was almost like sleeping on a table. Then there‚Äôs the walk to Disneyland.  If you walk at a moderate pace it takes about 22 minutes. There‚Äôs also two  busy intersections with cross walks on the way there , so it could take longer. It wasn‚Äôt a horrible stay, but there are definitely ‚Äúmotel‚Äù style places that are closer to the parks. I would say the one positive was the breakfast, which

Summary Heading: Great option for family Disney trip
Summary: We stayed here on a family trip to Disneyland several times and it‚Äôs always been a good experience; feels safe, friendly staff, and nice accommodations. The complimentary breakfast has good options for the family, usually with eggs, some type of breakfast meat, and potatoes (I will say that the potatoes never tasted quite right to us but everything else was good) along with the regular juice, cereal, coffee, and other breads you‚Äôd expect at a typical continental breakfast.  If you‚Äôre taking your time, it could be about a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney and another 10 minutes to the parks, but if we were walking fast, we could probably get to the park in under 10. The walk feels safe and easy for strollers, passing by some of the Disney hotels, and would be fine for kids.  Due
Manager Response: Hello there, Samuel! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our staff loves to hear back from guests and we thank you for taking the time to write this review. It means a lot to us. Let us know when you would like to book again and we will take great care of you! I hope that you have a great rest of your year. We are sorry to hear about your experience with our breakfast room and we work hard to ensure that guests have a good experience! Take good care, Samuel!

Summary Heading: Dirty and loud, do not stay here!
Summary: This was one of the dirtiest and loudest hotels I have ever stayed at. The close location to Disneyland is not worth the cost of this hotel. Room was filthy, ceiling had water damage, walls paper thin. We would have changed hotels but availability was limited due to a dance/cheer competition at the convention center. The only bright spot was the breakfast which had extensive selections and was quite good.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and your feedback will help us to better assist the rest of our guests. Thank you again and we hope that you give us another chance in the future. We do appreciate you taking the time to write this review.

Summary: The room was close to Disneyland and walkable to the attractions and restaurants. Very clean and quiet. Excellent water pressure. The bed was comfortable and there were plenty of pillows. No housekeeping due to Covid precautions but I am clean and prefer no one coming into my room anyway.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our staff loves to hear back from guests and we thank you for taking the time to write this review. It means a lot to us. Let us know when you would like to book again and we will take great care of you! I hope that you have a great rest of your year. You have made our day with this review! :) Take good care!

Summary: We decided to getaway for the three day weekend, we were taking advantage of the dream key appreciation event, the room was perfect. The breakfast service was not so good. The staff looked bored and the eating area was messy, spilled cereal and cold eggs.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our staff loves to hear back from guests and we thank you for taking the time to write this review. Summary: We flew from the UK into LAX and drove straight here and it was exactly what we were looking for. Staff super friendly and helpful, plentiful breakfast to set us up for the day in Disney, easy walk to Downtown/gates of Disney in 10 minutes. Lovely to be able to relax in the hot tubs in the evening ( The pools were too cold for us Brits!) Super gym too. We greatly enjoyed the topiary, thank you to the team who clearly put in so much effort to making it look beautiful. Room very clean and spacious, security boxes in reception, plentiful parking. We had a superb stay and would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our staff loves to hear back from guests and we thank you for taking the time to write this review. It means a lot to us. Let us know when you would like to book again and we will take great care of you! I hope that you have a great rest of your year. You have made our day with this review! :) Take good care! We are so glad you enjoyed the gym and spas!

Summary: This hotel was perfectly fine‚Ä¶ it was comfortable and exactly what it advertised. The pool area was nice my son loved it, only one of the two pools was heated but there were also two hot tubs. The breakfast was good- it was not exactly a grab and go- they had eggs, ham, biscuits, potatoes each morning we were there plus all the other options- fruit, yogurt, cereal, toast, etc. I thought the breakfast was great. I visited with my son (9) to go to Disneyland. It‚Äôs a little bit of a walk- it takes a good 15 minutes to get to the entrance gates. We cut through the Grand California Hotel one morning with no problems (although the security line at the GC was longer than at Downtown Disney so it really didn‚Äôt save us much time in the mornings) and cut through each time we went back to

You have made our day with this review! :) Take good care! We hope to have our daily housekeeping back as soon as restrictions are fully lifted!

Summary: The hotel is located about a half mile from the entrance to Downtown Disney.  It's not a bad walk at all.  They do have a bus line that will pick you up right in front of the hotel and drops you off at the Disney main entrance.  It's $6 per day.  The hotel staff were very friendly.  But we were disappointed in the cleanliness of our room.  The dust was so thick on everything from the desk, nightstand and even the microwave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is very close walking distance to disneyland. Clean room and two pools and hot tubs! .. it was very nice . I would stay here again in the future!! The internet is good and close to a restaurant

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights this past week. I've stayed at this location 3 times now and have always enjoyed the convenience of its location to the Disney parks, the restaurant next door, and the friendly staff, but this visit I was feeling uneasy and disappointed. First, there was a couple sitting outside our room for several hours with what looked like all of their personal belongings. We didn't know if they were guests of the hotel or people who were seeking shelter. We were trying to rest from all the heat but this couple ended up getting into a huge argument and all we could hear was them fighting. This same day, we noticed a pest control truck on site and saw 3 rooms from the second level being fumigated. If this was a bed bug outbreak or any outbreak of any kind, I strongly
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was an AWESOME HOTEL that has an Excellent COVID Protocol!!  BEST LOCATION EVER and EXCEPTIONALLY Clean and LOTS of POOLS and hot tubs.  FULL Hot Breakfast and Friendly Staff!!!  Enjoyed our stay to the Max and this is our FAV Place to STAY!  Recommend HIGHLY as it's the closest to Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Hello there! We are so happy that you had a great stay! We would love to see you again in the future. Next time you come, we would love to make you a special guest with us! :) It means a lot to our staff that you took the time to write this review! You made our day. Please do take care and we hope to see you in the future! Thank you again!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. We really love the proximity to the parks and to Downtown disney. The staff is so welcoming here at the hotel and always make you feel welcomed. I also like the breakfast it's nice if you want to sit down and eat or if you want to just grab and go. I also love coffee and throughout the day you can stop in and get it on go. I would definitely recommend this hotel because the price, location and staff.
Manager Response: Hello there! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our staff loves to hear back from guests and we thank you for taking the time to write this review. You have made our day with this review! :) Take good care!

Summary: The hotel was much farther away from the entrance of Disneyland park than is advertised. When booking the hotel I was told it was directly across the street from Disneyland, but was not told that it was so far away from the entrance and was at least a 30 minute walk, with no shuttle provided. To get to Disney, you have to walk behind the entire Disneyland resort, up through downtown Disney. This is not very convenient for a family to walk back-and-forth and takes a lot of precious time out of your day, and if you have small children this would be nearly impossible. In the future I will only stay here again if shuttle service is offered otherwise I will stay somewhere closer.
Manager Response: Hello there, we are sorry to hear that there were complications with your vacation. The ART shuttle is normally reliable and we will work harder to improve upon this. I thank you for all the time you took to write this review. It means a lot to our staff and helps us to make the guest experience better. I would love to help you book in the future! Take good care and have a great rest of the year!

Summary Heading: Great value, VERY well run, closest non-Disney hotel to Napa Rose@ the Grand CAian
Summary: Everything was perfect. We stayed here because we did the wine pairing at the nearby Napa Rose restaurant in Disney's Grand Californian hotel, and I (of course) didn't want to drink & drive home after the meal. The walk to the restaurant was more scenic and seemed safer than Harbor Blvd. Don confuse this hotel with the other nearby Best W.ern just to the west of it on Katella. I look forward to staying here again and only wouldn't if the Westin across West/Disney Way were about the same price, which is unlikely.
Manager Response: Hello there, Tom! Thank you for your review, it means so much to our staff! We loved having you stay with us. I am so glad that our property was convenient for you on your trip. We look forward to having you stay with us in the future and we will make sure that you are well taken care of on your next stay, Tom! Thank you so much again for the time you took in writing this review. We look forward to seeing you again! Take care, Tom!

Summary: The hotel‚Äôs proximity to Disneyland is a huge bonus‚Äîwe were able to walk straight to either park in a short time with the ability to head back for a break if needed. The breakfast is really great‚Äîwe were able to fill up before heading to the park and not need anything til early afternoon. The rooms are small so you won‚Äôt want to have to hang out there for any length of time, but for the purpose of our trip, that didn‚Äôt matter.
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you so much for your review! It is so special that you took the time to write this review. We thank you for staying with us and we would love to have you back in the future! Let us know if you want to book with us again and we would love to help you! We will make sure to take great care of you on your next stay. Thank you again so much for everything. All of your feedback helps our staff to be their best!   Thanks again!

Summary: We have stayed here a few times over the years. The hotel is within walking distance of the Downtown Disney entrance, which is really nice. They do offer a full breakfast, which is a great option to save on meals when you are taking your family to Disneyland. The view of the nightly fireworks from the pool area is a fun bonus that our kids really enjoy between park days. While the room decor may be a little dark and not particularly trendy, the rooms have always been well cleaned, and the staff at this hotel have always been super friendly & provided exceptional service.
Manager Response: Hello there! We really appreciate you taking the time to write this review. It is always really wonderful for our staff to get feedback from out valued guests. We are glad that our hotel was able to provide you with great service. I want to personally book any reservations for you in the future. We want to make your next experience with us as special as possible. Thank you for everything, it means a lot once again that you say these kind words in your review! Take good care and we look forward to having you stay with us in the future!

Summary: This is our go to place to stay when going to Disneyland, great staff, hot breakfast, comfortable beds, clean room and easy walk to Disneyland.  One of the pools was even heated and the hot tubs are great after a long day in the parks.
Manager Response: Marianne, thank you so much for this review. We really love having you stay with us. It is wonderful that you took the time to write this review. Our staff and myself thanks you for everything. Let me know if you want to stay with us anytime in the future and I will make sure you are well taken care of! I hope you have a great rest of your year and take care, Marianne!   Best Wishes!

Summary: Our stay at the BW Stovall was great! It‚Äôs a was a walk to downtown Disney. The rooms were clean and the service from staff was awesome. Breakfast is provided so that was an added plus! For those on a budget, this is a good choice. We would recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Hello there! We want to say thank you for your review! It means so much and we are so happy that you had a great stay. Customer service is something that we pride ourselves on. I hope you contact us in the future if you would like to stay with us! We will make sure that you are well taken care of on your next stay. Thank you so much again for the great review and for your time. It means a lot. Take care and we will see you next time! :)

Summary Heading: Request room cleanings during extended stays
Summary: Location to Disneyland is spot on 10 minutes to Downtown baggage check. Breakfast had a large variety. Pool area is big w/ 2 hot tubs and pools. Only complaint is we stayed 5 nights and they only cleaned our room 1x. We requested an additional but they would not do it.
Manager Response: Hello Paul! We appreciate the time you took for this review. I am so glad that you enjoyed our breakfast and that the stay was an overall success. We hope to have our housekeeping services back to daily once we get through the rest of the pandemic restrictions. Take care, Paul! We hope to see you again and thank you for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Excellent resort-type customer service on a motel budget
Summary: Everyone at this hotel provided amazing customer service. That‚Äôs why I didn‚Äôt mind so much that the interior of the rooms were a little outdated, including our bath sink and AC that weren‚Äôt fully functional. The service far exceeded our expectations, from the front desk to the breakfast crew to housekeeping to maintenance. Each person was polite and handled our specific situations all with a smile and went above and beyond. Places like the Anaheim Convention and Disney locations were within 15-30 minutes of walking distance to get to.
Manager Response: Hi there! Thank you for staying with us. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. I am so glad that the customer service was great throughout your stay. I love to hear that you had a great stay with us. Take care!

Summary: The staff was excellent in making sure that accommodated all are needs immediately as we checked in early, 7:30am, immediately remedied the lack of towels and blankets in the room, and made sure that the continually stocked breakfast items as they ran out or were close to running out.  The room was nothing very special but the location was just across from Disneyland and hotel parking was only $15 which I believe is one of the lowest in the area.
Manager Response: Hello there! Thank you for staying with us. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. Take care!

Summary: We stayed here for our 3 day Disneyland trip. The walk Is about 10 min to downtown Disney and 15-20 walk to the gates of Disneyland. You have to enter through downtown Disney but if you want a short cut to Disneyland you can take the monorail to Disneyland from downtown. If your going to Disney California you can cut through Grand California Hotel. We will stay there again because the price is right and the walk isn‚Äôt bad. It allows us to use the money we saved on the room to buy fast passes for the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed while visiting Disneyland and California Adventures with friends, no rental car. 15-20 min walk to downtown Disney, another 10 to either park. This was a lot of steps (20-25K per day with park activities.) Excellent price for the convenience! Could have used more coffees and some tea in the room. Breakfast was so-so but good considering COVID. Coco‚Äôs next store is great. Didn‚Äôt use the pool or hot tub. We requested early check in (11am on a holiday week Tuesday) to leave our bags before going to the parks and it was accommodated very well. Decor wasn‚Äôt anything noticeable, some fading/stains on dust ruffle but everything was clean and our trip wasn‚Äôt for spending time in the room anyway. I was pleased with our trip and would recommend to others and stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Incredible affordable hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Comfy beds, breakfast included walking distance to downtown Disney & Disneyland makes this our first choice when visiting Disney Parks! We‚Äôve stayed several times and the experience has been wonderful and staff has been very accommodating! We‚Äôll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I'm really glad you enjoyed your stay! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean and convenient but needs updates
Summary: It was a good stay and we would stay again but it would not be my first choice. We have stayed here before but it has been at least four years since our last stay. The rooms have not been updated since we stayed here last and they are showing their age a little bit. Paint was peeling in places in the bathroom.  Ceiling had numerous repair spots that were visible. The room appeared clean at first glance but I found a pair of someone else‚Äôs  socks at the bottom of the dresser. So housekeeping missed those. Carpet was clean. The toilet paper holders in the bathroom need to be replaced. The toilet paper simply does not stay on the holders. Bedding was clean as was the bathroom. Towels were your basic motel towels. Hair dryer, ironing board and in room coffee were provided. The
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Option for families doing Disney!
Summary: We do Disney at least once a year and usually stay on the other end of the park, on Harbor blvd. However, we were unable to book any of our usual places and I am SO PLEASED to have found The BW Stovall's! What a clean and family friendly place! We were greeted with lovely, maintained grounds and an immaculate (and beautifully decorated for the holidays) front desk. The front desk staff checked us in super quickly and efficiently and were very helpful to find us a room that adjoined for my mother who was flying in later that evening. The rooms were VERY clean and had no odd smells or weird surprises for us. There was plenty of storage for us to actually unpack (family of 4) and the air conditioner worked GREAT. We loved that the bathroom counter was spacious and that the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: The sheets in the room were not clean. We had to remove the top sheet after finding a blood stain on it. When we woke up in the morning we saw more blood stains on the rest of the sheets. We were so tired from Disneyland we didn‚Äôt notice. Upon walking into the room the smell was old and musty. There was absolutely no air flow. We turned the AC unit on but it never got really cold. The only positive was the breakfast. It was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and your feedback will help us to better assist the rest of our guests. Thank you again and we hope that you give us another chance in the future.

Summary Heading: Great for a one night stay
Summary: Came here to stay for one night as we didn‚Äôt want to drive back to Los Angeles after a late night concert and I am also a Best Western member and also had a $50 BW gift card so we used it towards our one night stay.  I picked the plus version because of good service, proximity to the Honda Center, complimentary breakfast.  When we arrived, we got here 2 hours before the 4 pm check-in time and I had messaged them online about possibly checking in earlier but never received a response.  So we got there and asked the front desk and they were friendly and attentive and gave us complimentary bottles of water as well as allowing us to check in  Hubby wanted a top floor room so we wouldn‚Äôt hear noise so we got a room on the 3rd floor.  It was marked on the door as clean and it is a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and your feedback will help us to better assist the rest of our guests. Thank you again and we hope that you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Room needs serious updating.  Flooring and wallpaper specifically.  Air conditioning system was pathetic at best.  Toilet paper and towels left me near bleeding.  Service was great.  Proximity to park is as close as you can get without being in a Disney hotel but still a long walk, about a mile
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for letting us know of your concerns with the AC. Summary: This trip was planned for 6 months for a friends daughter who graduated High school!   It was clean and very friendly hotel.   We knew no shuttle to Disneyland if they did this would be the perfect Hotel!

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland. They have very friendly employees. The room was very clean. We will definitely stay again the next time we go back to Disneyland. The breakfast had a lot of variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The price was great compared to other hotels (discount from AAA). The staff was friendly and professional. The hot breakfast was filling and diverse. The room was great for the price I was paying. The distance to disneyland made this hotel ideal (even on long park days). I greatly appreciated the available food/drinks left in breakfast room. I grab countless amount of hot water for tea-making. My only real complaint was my AC unit was loud and didn't circulate air well (including cold air).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: In need of repairs and ventilation
Summary: Room is stuffy with unpleasant smell of mold and must Tv did not work and heater/ac machine made constant LOUD and vibrating sound all day/night  While location to park is outstanding and the staff was pleasant; the birthday experience was marred by the hotel stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and your feedback will help us to better assist the rest of our guests. Thank you again and we hope that you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Very disappointed in my stay, although stay was great the rooms are just badly kept, smell musty and look dirty. Ac didn‚Äôt work very well & all vending machines that have access to water were broken or sold out (all 4 days of our stay). I‚Äôd like to give them a better rating but I‚Äôve stayed at other hotels in the same area, same/similar price point and are so much cleaner and well kept.
