Although the location is excellent - we were very disappointed when we checked into our room, possibly due to the great reviews on TripAdvisor. The rooms are OK (for a motel), but the included breakfast was very poor (after a few attempts we just gave up). If you keep your expectations in check - this is an decent 2 star motel, close to Disneyland - then hopefully you won't be disappointed. If you like something a little nicer, book elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We are currently implementing new breakfast ideas that will hopefully improve the overall experience of the breakfast room. We appreciate your feedback very much and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This Best Western is located at walking distance from the parks. Count about 15min. They also offer a shuttle service. The hotel as such is of medium quality. Beds are not that comfortable and the room needed a renovation. Breakfast is included, but the choice is very limited. There is a pool, which we have not visited.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. One of the best compliments we get is how comfortable our beds are but we know that every guest has their own preference. We appreciate your feedback very much and look forward to having you stay with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Short walk to Disney and very reasonably priced.
Summary: Great location very close to Disneyland and California Adventures.  The breakfast was pretty good every morning as well.  My only gripe would be the beds.  They are only full size at best.  They are a bit small.  The price of this hotel along with its location make it a no brainer.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and your feedback will help us to better assist the rest of our guests. Thank you again and we hope that you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: This is the best hotel for small children. They have a toddler pool that makes swimming safe and enjoyable for kids. They have added shaded areas and a grass area for guest enjoyment with poolside food delivery. It is close enough to Disneyland to walk. It is my granddaughters favorite hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: So here is some fact to compare with Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn,  In general, no fridge/microwave, no complementary breakfast, limited parking spaces, etc. However, this Best Western has fridge, microwave, hair dryer, breakfast, etc, etc. Just nice!! It is also a walking distance to Disneyland, very clean, and the complementary breakfast service was very decent. Though, one thing I would complain about was the air conditioner, it is the older style, and it was kind of loud. But after all day in Disneyland, I just past out and it wasnt so much a problem anymore :p
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We booked this hotel through a friends recommendation. We were not disappointed. This hotel had everything we needed. Rooms were clean & comfortable. Staff were friendly helpful and very informative. The pool was great and most evenings movies could be watched on a giant screen while floating around the pool or sitting in the spa. We found the laundry facilities an added bonus. This hotel is a couple of minutes walking distance to Disneyland. We were fortunate enough to have a room that faced Disneyland, so we were able to watch the nightly fireworks from our balcony. We highly recommend this hotel and will be staying here again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Among the best free breakfasts I've ever had. Several hot dishes available. Really good variety of items offered. Room was clean and comfortable. Only draw back, we had difficulty finding a parking space.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. Our parking can be pretty difficult at times but we are currently implementing a new policy that will hopefully help the situation. We appreciate your feedback very much and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Room was clean, it was a plus to have in-room refrigerator and coffee machine. Location great as it was in walking distance to Disneyland, which we love. Breakfast was average, not great compare to other continental breakfast. Staff was courteous at checking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. We are currently implementing new breakfast ideas that will hopefully improve the overall experience of the breakfast room. We appreciate your feedback very much and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This was a perfect base for our Disneyland vacation. It was perfectly located a short 10 minute walk from Disneyland, it was straight down the street.   The hotel had a great pool area, kinda cold, but after you are in the water for a bit it's okay. It was nice to hit the pool after a long day on your feet. They had two pools so we basically had a pool to ourselves in the evenings, which was really nice.   The hotel is right next to Coco's Family Restaurant, like literally next to the hotel. Which is convenient for good food and delicious pie.   The hotel has a buffet breakfast included with the rate,  which was always busy, but to be expected as everybody was up early for Disneyland.  The rooms were spacious and clean, and that's the important part!    The front desk staff were
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel and very good Breakfast!
Summary: Great location to Disney Parks. Good breakfast with many options. Hotel does not look attractive from the outside, but rooms are clean and updated. There is a $10 daily parking fee, but almost every hotel in the area charges for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Stayed here for three nights and could fault it.  Extremely clean, very helpful staff . Anaheim transport stops outside the door. The room was a good size and the wifi worked well. Breakfast was included and was all we needed to set us up for the day. We would highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The parking situation is barely tolerable.  The hotel has less parking spots then they have rooms.  Compounding this problem, they share parking with a neighboring restaurant .Room temperature appears to be randomly controlled by housekeeping.  One day freezing, next day off.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. Our parking can be pretty difficult at times but we are currently implementing a new policy that will hopefully help the situation. We appreciate your feedback very much and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We were there for 4 nights- enjoyed our stay.Rooms were good and breakfast was good. . A special thanks to Juan De Jesus - who went out of the way to figure out a rental car arrangements for a complicated request. Thanks again.   Just an important pointer for everyone- book a rental car from back home. I got a deal for US$184 for 7 days from Vancouver Canada. However i had to cancel it. When we were at Anaheim - the cheapest was for $45 US per day. . If you had planned to drop it off at LAX- it was an additional $60.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! And thank you for the nice pointer about the rental car as well. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This hotel is in a convenient location.  The park is across the street.  However, the actual entrance is about a 15 minute walk away.  A shuttle is available for a minimal cost.  Check-in was fine.   However, we were surprised by the $10/night parking fee.  After checking in (and paying for parking), no parking spots were available.  That included the offered employee parking spots.  Eventually we snagged a spot away from our room.  The room was fine and was equipped with a refrigerator and microwave.  Complimentary breakfast was very good, with many choices and large dining area.  The pool area was also nice.  All in all, a good value for the money (only if they had more parking.....)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns. Our parking can be pretty difficult at times but we are currently implementing a new policy that will hopefully help the situation. We appreciate your feedback very much and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent location and is a wonderful value!!  It is only a very short walk from the Disney resorts and the Disney parks!  The breakfast buffet is amazing and really helps a family save both time and money so they can get the most out of their vacation and their money!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: I was very happy with my stay at this wonderful hotel. I was traveling to the Anaheim area to attend Vidicon which was at the convention center and this hotel was only a 10 minute walk away, this was a major plus considering I only had to worry about parking at the hotel, which was only $10 at night, this was a definite plus for me because parking at the convention center is about $15. Free wifi is provided and it was pretty fast, I had no problems with slow connections. Breakfast is served from 6-10, so its a pretty large window of time, this I appreciated. Breakfast was definitely good, I wish there would have been a waffle maker, but honestly it was fine without it. The dining room is also open 24/7 so if you're ever having a late night craving for coffee as i usually do, you
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Rooms are rather roomy. We had a 2 room suite which held 6 people and a infant with a pack and play which they provided for us. It came with 2 separate air conditioners and 2 separate rooms. It was very clean and well kept. It was within walking distance to various restuarants and fast food. It had a heated swimming pool and whirl pool which was very refreshing after a long day at Disneyland. Disneyland was about an 8 long blocks away and I was able to do it considering I'm in my 50's and overweight, but I took my time. They had a nice breakfast room with a lot of choices to choose from but got rather crowded quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review! I believe this review is meant for our sister property, Best Western Plus Park Place Inn and Mini Suites. I will be sure they receive this review as well so they know how much you enjoyed your stay. Thank you again and we hope to have you stay with us in the future!

Summary: Nice view of Disney fireworks from pool area.  Also liked the movie night that you can view from a hot tub.  Breakfast staff worked hard to keep hot items stocked to feed such large numbers of people.  Adequate workout area adjoins pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: we love this hotel accessibility, location, pool area, staff, rooms are all very nice. within walking distnace of Disneyland, Anaheim convention center, Cocos restaurant right next door and another restaurant across the street. check in and out are always flawless and speedy
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This inn is in great proximity to the disney parks and is well maintained. The gardens are kept clean and tidy and the pool area is huge. There are ice machines available and the complimentary breakfast is great. The gift shop offers shuttle ticket to the theme parks for $5. We loved our stay and will recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of visiting the Anaheim area and looking for value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay and we appreciate your feedback very much. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Clean Motel type Rooms.  About a 10-15 min walk from the Grand Californian & Downtown Disney. Nice landscaped recreation area with (2) pools, (2) hot tubs, plenty of seating & snackbar.  Breakfast included scrambled eggs, potatoes, ham or sausage, hard boiled eggs, cereal, bagels, oatmeal.  Pretty much the same Bkfst every morning.  In room Wifi worked well.  Only negative was the additional charge for Parking (about $10 daily)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know of your concerns with our parking. Our $10.00 parking fee is one of the lowest in the area for the larger hotels and we work very hard to keep it that way. Thank you very much for your feedback. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I stayed here with my Family for our family vacation in the deluxe family suite it was very accommodating.  this property is so close to everything if you don't mind walking. There's souvenir shops right down the way on Harbor, an IHOP and DENNYS also in walking distance. The weather was so fresh in the am we walked to the Disneyland park and took the shuttle home that conveniently dropped us off in front across the street from the hotel. Theres also a Target on the same street and many fooderies in the area too! we Loved our stay thanks!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I believe that you stayed at one of our sister hotels. They have suites. They are at a great location about a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland parks.  See you guys again

Summary: We always stay at this hotel when we visit Disneyland. I am also a runner and stay here for the Rundisney events. They cater to the runners by opening breakfast at 4am and keep it running until 10. Rooms are always clean and well maintained. The staff here is exceptional and always willing to do whatever it takes to make your stay satisfactory. Breakfast here is always fresh and good and there is a staff to make sure that food is always stocked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: While this hotel wasn't our first choice, it will be from now on.   The free breakfast was very good, although right after it starts it isn't well stocked. Air Conditioning in our room worked wonders, and it was awesome. The hotel breakfast area is open all of the time if you want some fresh fruit, or a muffin. The coffee machine is always on too.   They offer a shuttle to the parks, operated by Anaheim Resort Transit. It is not included. Ages 3-9 is $2/day and adults are $5/day. It was very good, although it was not always on time. You can purchase the passes in the gift shop in the lobby.  WiFi is free. It's not the fastest, but it's fine to watch a little Netflix while the parents nap.  Our room was clean, had a fresh smell, and the bathroom was very nice. One thing I will
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. The ART Transit is great to take a ride to the parks. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Comfy Rooms, Polite Staff, Close to Disney!
Summary: Great place! Free breakfast with variety, they even let you take food to your room. It's close to Disneyland or you can purchase ART tickets(inexpensive shuttle) at the FD and have them take you to the main gate it picks up right outside the hotel. The pool(2 pools and hot tubs) area is clean and has shade and is large enough so you don't feel crammed. Overall for the value I would pick this place. I did a lot of research and this place really had it all at a great price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are only about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is a shuttle that you may take to get to the parks. The ART Transit Route #9 will pick up in front of the hotel for a minimal fee. We have to beautiful, big pools and we also have poolside movies that your family may enjoy! See you soon!

Summary: This motel is pretty decent and its location is fantastic, being only a true 20 minute walk from the parks (the closest, I think, of any non-Disney hotel). The rooms were reasonable, even though the bed situation (2 * Queens) wasn't fantastic for a family of four. The pools were great and were a handy location to watch fireworks from (when we were too hot and tired to stay at the parks to watch). Even having the fitness centre right next to the pool area made sense. The breakfast is a bit of a farce and likely wouldn't hold up well when the motel was full. Quality and variety not the best. However, buyer beware on that front as the hotel is pretty well priced (we got what we paid for).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We loved our stay at the Best Western Plus Stovall's. They let leave our bags at the front desk before it was time to check in so we could play at Disneyland. It was a quick walk (10 minutes) to Disneyland resort so we didn't have to worry about parking or taking a bus to the resort like we have in the past. We're just sad we were too busy at Disneyland to check out the pool so we could review it. The continental breakfast was overwhelmingly huge with something for everyone, the perfect way to send  you on your way to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland Parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: My wife and I always come to this particular Best Western near Disneyland as it is well located, inexpensive, and comes with a plethora of amenities that rival bigger, more expensive hotels in the area. All of this makes one's stay quite convenient and comfortable. Take, for example, the fact that there is: 1) refrigerator 2) microwave 3) TV 4) FREE BREAKFAST!! 5) FREE WIFI 6) coffee machine in room.  The buffet breakfast is excellent! There are a variety of choices available depending on your pallet. Even the coffee is good!
Manager Response: none

Summary: this room is not very ADA compliant . It looks like the only thing that makes it ADA complying is they added bars in the bathroom. the bathroom needs a movable shower head and a roll in tub/shower. the light switches were on the wall so they are blocked when the bathroom door is open. also the door opens blocking the sink. Its seems as though not much thought went into the ADA room design.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hotel near Disneyland and convention Center. good breakfast and staff. parking good, tight for handicapped, but good. pool & spa areas open and good for use, HOT!! Tub. rooms small but adequate with all necessary amenities. staff friendly but limited on number at peak times of check-I/out but get job done
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, basic accommodations including a fridge and a microwave. The buildings are dated, but my room appeared to be recently renovated. Completely new bathroom. The room's dark brown carpet, curtains, walls, countertop appeared new. Unfortunately the dark brown palette presents a dim, cave-like ambience. Old, clunky, unnecessarily large armoires take up valuable space. The fridge is hard to access, stuck in a dark, tight corner behind an armoire.  Despite the design quibbles, the room was clean and had all the basic necessities. I slept like a rock! The air conditioning unit's hum masked any noise from neighboring rooms and the balcony. This motel's location is ideal for Disney visitors. I viewed Disney fireworks from the balcony outside my room. It is an easy 15-minute stroll
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: This is the best hotel we have ever stayed at.  We considered a lot of hotels for this stay.  We are so happy that we chose this hotel.  Great location and services. Just walk across the street to Disneyland--can see the fireworks from hotel balcony.  We would not want to stay at any other hotel in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my absolute favorite hotel!  I stay here pretty much everytime i go to disneyland.  This hotel is super clean, the staff is very friendly, the continental breakfast is amazing, and is only a 10 minute walk to the parks!! Cant wait to stay here again in august!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. See you guys back in August!

Summary Heading: Disneyland with the kids! Great spot
Summary: We loved our stay here, it was everything we needed.  Close to Disneyland 10 minute walk with kids. Clean, comfortable and reasonable price.  You can also see the fire works from Disneyland at night. ( request a top floor room to see fire works nightly) It is a great place to stay. Pool was a hit with the kids.  Would definitely stay here again.    Places to eat near by & not far from down town Disney where there are many different restaurants.   When walking to Disneyland from here, you cut through Grand California hotel for a short cut which brings you to downtown Disney and the entrance of Disneyland and California adventure park. Just follow other people taking this short cut or ask staff in there for directions.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. Yes, we are only a 10 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that you were able to enjoy poolside movies. See you guys soon!

Summary: Great hotel, very close to Disney (10min walk), best complimentary breakfast I have seen, rooms are clean, love the kiddie pool perfect for my toddler and limited swimmer, will definitely stay again for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We also hope that you enjoyed the poolside movies. See you guys soon!

Summary: After reviewing 15 or so options in a similar price range in the immediate Disney Parks area I selected Best Western PLUS Stovall's Inn. My primary considerations were: Price (good compared to similar options), Location (couldn't have been better relative to parks & Downtown Disney), Overall Customer Satisfaction (was great based on multiple review sites). Other things were weighed into my selection including things like free wifi, cleanliness, mold,, refrigerator & microwave family friendly, pool, etc. Our experience in all areas was good.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great find, great stay, great location
Summary: We traveled as a group of 6 adult family members and really enjoyed our stay here. We visit Disneyland/Disneyworld pretty regularly and usually stay on property as DVC members. However, we were out of points for the year and chose to stay off property. Being a DVC member you become accustom to a certain level of service and this hotel was pretty on par for not being a Disney property. The Best Wester- Stovall‚Äôs Inn is by no means a 5 star DVC/Disney resort but what it lacked in fancy decor it made up for with service and convenience.   The property is a short 15/20 min drive from the SNA airport. The hotel has recently been updated and is very clean. We read reviews and asked for a room towards the back of the property and stayed in Room 321 which had no road noise at night. The
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: My wife and I enjoyed a short trip to Disneyland and stayed at the Best Western Stovall's Inn as we have before.  My wife and daughters stayed here first on a girls weekend several years ago, before the property was remodeled, and we've been staying there since then.  Can't beat the free breakfast.  The property is always in good appearance and the staff is very friendly, especially the front desk folks.  We'll be back again.
Manager Response: Than you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you had a wonderful time here with us. See you soon!

Summary: Really enjoyed our family vacation and stay. Staff were very helpful in assisting with directions and information of area. Breakfast buffet was really good every morning. Plan on staying again when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: This is the 3rd time I've stayed at this Best Western on my trip to Disneyland. First time was in 2008 and was booked via contiki as it was our first hotel. It's super close to Disneyland. The staff are always constantly great, the beds are super comfortable and there's enough space to move around comfortably. During this specific visit; I arrived at 9am. Check it wasn't until 2pm so I asked to leave my bags while I went to Disneyland and would check in when I got back. The concierge checked his computer and saw he had a room available now and allowed me to check in straight away, 5hrs early. They offer free wifi and there is an ART bus service that leaves every 20mins to Disneyland for just $5 return trip. Tickets can be purchased from their shop in the lobby. Or it's about a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your review. We hope that you keep coming back. We have done a lot of remodeling since Contiki was station at the hotel. We hope that you enjoyed everything at the hotel. Thank you Front Desk Mgr.

Summary: The Guest service staff are great, very helpful, and welcoming. The housekeepers, needs to great and smile to the guest, when they see them. They were 4 or 5 outside, just taking, maybe waiting for a room to clean.  I don't mind it but, other guest might. The only comment in the room would be to replace the TV stand/ cabinet. It looks boxy and it makes the room look old. Just my opinion. Overall, we love our stay as always and we will stay here again next time we visit. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thank you for giving us your opinion on what we can do to better out room. Thank you Front Desk Mgr.

Summary: We absolutely loved the pool area as well as the beds. It was a great stay. The hotel is within walking distance from Disneyland and we did not have to take a shuttle or a tram to get back and forth. We definitely plan to stay at the same Hotel the next time we decide to come visit Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you enjoyed the poolside movies that we offer. We hope that you come and visit us again soon! Thank you Front Desk Mgr.

Summary: This is the second  part of our holiday's in the states, we had a great time in Anaheim our hotel was the best, our room had every thing that you could want 2 great beds micro wave, tea making, great shower, the staff on the front desk was exceptional  they confirmed all our reservations for the different attractions that we had planed to go to, Tony & Ted went out of their way for us to make sure every thing was okay we have stayed at this hotel before, after a long day in Disney Land. Knotts Berry Farm Tijuana Universal Studios the staff asked us how our day was and they could see that were bushed from all that walking as we are in our early 70's I would recommend this hotel to every body with families with out any hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the front desk staff know that they are doing a great job! Keep up the GREAT work! We hope to come back to visit soon! Thank you Front Desk Mgr.

Summary: The hotel was great for the price we paid.  It was close to the park.  You just have to walk down the road through the Grand Californian Hotel and your in Downtown Disney.  The staff was exceptional.  Our room exceed our expectations.  My only complaint was that there was a funny smell coming from the AC the first few days we used it, but other than that everything was great.  The free breakfast was also great.  Well worth our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that we were able to take care of the AC issue. We have maintenance staff here late and ready to help if needed. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland park through Downtown Disney. We hope that you come to visit us soon! Thank you Kimberly Eufrasio Mgr.

Summary: Room was ok, bed was uncomfortable.  A/C could not cool down the room, couldn't sleep at night as it was too warm.  Hotel charged me to park my car and then when we got back from Dinner, there were no parking places on the property.  I was told I can park across the street.  I thought that was rude since I paid for a parking place.  Not a user friendly hotel.  My family couldn't even come visit me, we had to leave the property to visit with them.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.   I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: This hotel was great.  Staff was amazing. They went out of their way to make us feel special even though they were very busy. Amenities were wonderful.  Two pools, two hot tubs, kids pool, snack bar, movie screen made for some relaxing evenings.  Breakfast had lots of options and everything was fresh and delicious.  We have stayed at several hotels in the area and this was by far the best and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please be assured I have shared your kind words.  We look forward to welcoming you back to soon!

Summary Heading: Nice touches make it a stand out
Summary: Had a great 4 night stay at Stovalls Inn. Chose it because of walking distance to Disneyland and amenities. Exceeded my expectations. The cute pruned bushes in animal shapes and the step above pool area and garden area set it apart for the money. I didn't really understand until on site there are two pools, two hot tubs, and a kids wading pool. The pool furniture was nice and it was spacious. The room was well equipped and had nice beds and furniture. The room was a little crowded because there is so much in there plus your bags, but it was nice to have a table and chair area even if it was crowded. The breakfast area was a good size so even at peak times you could find a spot or they had a few tables outside. One thing to improve would be more staff at the front desk. We had to
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: We love staying at this property when visiting Disneyland.  It's an easy walk to the parks & Downtown Disney.  The hotel itself is clean, staff are friendly and remember us each time we come.  They have the best breakfast with many choices and recently updated their seating area.  The pool area is big and always clean.  We loved having movie night in the pool area recently with the convenience of calling CoCo's restaurant next door to deliver our dinner to the pool.  We always recommend this property to our friends & family also going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Y our business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: From the beginning of our stay to the end, this hotel was clean, professionally maintained by a staff that is second to none.  I would definitely consider staying at this hotel on my next trip out to Disneyland.  The breakfast was both hot and nutritious with a large selection of meats, pastries, eggs, oatmeal and beverages.  Kudos!!!
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please be assured I have shared your kind words with our department heads and we look forward to welcoming you back to soon!

Summary: Booked the hotel by a third party website for a better price. We got a room very close to W. Katella and the first night we were awakened many times by traffic. Then we discovered that if the A/C is on, it will block out 95% of the traffic noise. Walk to Disneyland was very easy, even coming back after a full day. The free breakfast was nice, eggs, sausage, bacon and potatoes were the hot items.  Overall this a very good hotel for a Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. Summary: Awesome!  Recommend to all for a comfortable room and enjoyable breakfast. This was a great place for location and great for local attractions. My grand kids thought it was the best for our a joining rooms. They also liked that they were able to have a wide variety of breakfast items to choose from. We were all very pleased with the comfort of the beds. Just as good as home. Thank you.

Summary: This hotel was a great choice for our family vacation. The staff is friendly  and it was a great price. They played a Disney movie out by the pool at night and you could see the Disney fireworks from the pool. Quick walk to Disney parks. Great breakfast.

Summary Heading: Great Service, Great People, Great Stay
Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay due to the friendly and professional service that we received.  With children in tow after a long trip the staff made certain that we enjoyed our stay.  This was a very nice place and we will most definitely be using this Best Western again.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney vacation
Summary: I stayed at the BWS Inn with my husband and 2 children for 2 nights in May. It is only about a 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney and the parks. We could see CA Screamin and Mickey's Fun Wheel from our room. The room was very clean and quiet. There are 2 good size pools and 3 large hot tubs! Awesome after a long day at the parks. The staff was wonderful, so nice and accommodating. There are lovely animal topiaries beside the pool too. Very well kept grounds. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor!  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are glad you decided to stay with us.  What is even better that you were very satisfied with our guest services, housekeeping, and our pool area. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Great location, close to Disneyland and very comfortable beds
Summary: Stayed here with friends for 5 nights and it was perfect! To get to Disneyland we walked up the street and through the lobby of Disney's Grand California Hotel so the walk was no more than 10 minutes. Check in process was quick and easy however the key cards for the room kept deactivating so don't keep them near your credit cards or phone.   Parking was $10 per night but we were usually able to park very close to the elevator as we were on the third floor. Also had a pretty good view of the Disneyland fireworks from the balcony outside our room.   Three of us were in the room and there was plenty of bench and mirror space. No exhaust fan in the bathroom so had to leave the door open while showering or it was too steamy.   Housekeeping was great and the beds were extremely
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. Summary: For Disneyland visit there are many hotels, but BW is most affordable choice that offers great place to stay, easy connections to parks, wonderful breakfast, 2 pools and a good view of the fireworks! What else one can ask for? We love it!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback.  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Loved this place! Quick walk to Disney around the corner, great breakfast (donuts and French toast!!!!) rooms were clean and functional with fridge and microwave. Heaps of good restaurants 15 min walk or a quick drive. Great pool and hot tubs which you get a great view of the Disney fireworks from.  Only downside is that it can be noisy - but realistically, kids plus being so close to Disney it was to be expected.   Favourite hotel of my stay :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We hope you will come back and see us again soon

Summary: Since my  family of 5 was planning on staying for 17 days in a hotel for our vacation the choice of where to stay was obviously crucial for the enjoyment of our trip. I am so glad we decided to stay at Best Western Stovall's inn.  We were looking for a place that was of course clean, accessible to public transportation since we were not planning to renting a car and to save money it must have free breakfast.  Stovall's inn was able to meet our requirements and more. Anyway the hotel is located across disneyland..but it may be a long walk for small kids espeically after a busy day in the theme park.  I would suggest that you save your strength and ride the ART  number 9 that picks up right in front of the hotel.  The ART can also bring you to the outlet at orange and various
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting and for sharing the specific details of your stay, which I will share with our team. We hope to welcome you back on a future visit!

Summary: Every time we stay here, they are always doing improvements to make it better.  The expanded breakfast area was great, as was the pool area.  This is the only place we stay when going to Disneyland.  Just a great hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Makes me happy to read that you notice our expansion.  We are always trying to improve for the better.  If you ever visit us in the summer we now play movies at the pool area and offer a snack-bar. My favorite amenity after a long day at the park. We look forwarding to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: It is a good hotel, near Disney with a reasonable price and service
Summary: The hotel is about 15 min walkind distance from Downtown Disney and 5 minutes more from parks entrances.  Rooms include microwave, refrigerator, cable TV, wifi (with suitable speed), docks station to charge mobiles/tablets, desk, free coffe and nice bathroom amenities. However, the official fotos show a more-luxury furniture than the real one (nevertheless, it is nice furniture).  Staff at front desk is very kind and speaks at least English and Spanish, and the complimentary buffet is excellent (eggs, bacon, saugage, juices, bread, cereals, yoghurt, cheese, ham, etc).   An excellent option to visit Disneyland area, and some buses stops just outside the hotel or a few blocks away to visit the mall.

By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Everything from checking in to checking out was a breeze. Room was clean well taken care of. Staff was always friendly. Breakfast does get crowed but worth the wait.  Eggs, French toast, bacon, tons of muffins & bread, coffee & juice.  Clean well stocked even with crowds. Quick walk to Disneyland, walk up Disney Dr turn right at Disney Grand Hotel, follow the signs to Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We arrived early hoping to store bags and go off and do some much needed retail therapy, but a room was ready for us immediately, so we went to our room, on the second floor, along an exterior walkway.  I was hoping it might be as nice as the BW we stayed at in Chicago, as this was the end of our cross country trip, but i was not prepared for how nice the room was, totally unexpected for what is in essence a motel.  A huge room, two king size beds, and really nice decor.    Rather than being located near the main Disney Entrance, it is located nearer the Disney hotels, and is quieter for that.  It's a 15 minute walk from Downtown Disney District and the parks, next door to A coco's bakery restaurant, and plenty of other eateries are in the area.    The staff are brilliant, from
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you to our property on your next trip to Anaheim.. Till Next time.

Summary: I can't say enough about how wonderful EVERYTHING was!! Staff was friendly, room was very clean, location was great, breakfast was WAY beyond my expectations.  They even have a small gift shop where you can purchase bus passes for multiple days.  On our way back home we noticed at the airport that we had left a jacket somewhere.... still not sure where, but we called from the airport and someone went right then to check our room as well as advising us to call back after the room had been cleaned.  Again, Exceptional staff.  Thanks for the wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting and for sharing how EVERYTHING WAS WONDERFUL. I will share this review with my staff.  We appreciate  your business and look forward to serving you soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Stovall's Inn June 2015 for our trip to Disneyland. The room we stayed in was clean, the beds were comfy for a good nights rest after a long day at Disneyland. My family enjoyed the pools and the cute groomed bushes. The breakfast did the trick, it's not over the top fancy was nice not to have  the extra expenditure. Just wished the gift shop was open longer, at the time it was only open until late afternoon.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your experience at our property.   Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: The location is close to Disney's main entrance, about 15 minute walk. There are several restaurants and an ice cream shop nearby. The rooms are relatively clean, beds were comfy, there was a mini fridge in our room, the AC was working fine. The bathrooms were nice and clean. They also have a pool and gym. I personally did not use the pool, but the gym was nice. It had the basic equipment that I needed, even though walking about the park is exercise enough. There is also internet, but it is not really the best.This hotel also offers free breakfast, which is nice. They had the usual breakfast foods such as eggs, toast, fruit, meats, drinks, etc.   Overall, this hotel is not bad for the price. The location is not too far from the main entrance. The restaurants nearby are great as
Manager Response: We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor readers and travelers. Next time you stay with us make sure you soak up in our pool. It's my favorite amenity after having a long day at Disney. We look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: I stayed here while attending a conference at the Anaheim convention centre. The location is great, a 10 minute walk to the convention centre. The price was reasonable and the room was clean and comfortable. The only thing lacking was an in-room safe. Considering the proximity to Disney Land and the large number of families with small children staying here, I found it surprisingly quiet. Breakfast was what you'd expect for a hotel buffet but they were always short of knives.
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel as a chaperone with a school group for Disneyland's grad night events.  The hotel staff were absolutely wonderful.  Extremely friendly and pleasant.  Were very organized and effective. The hotel is about a 1 - 1.5 mile walk from Disney's maingate.  There are many, many businesses and various restaurants within easy walking distance.  A group of us walked over to the Cheesecake Factory from the hotel, as an example.  Around 9:00 pm or so, you have a fairly clear view of Disneyland's firework display from the balcony, which is a spectacular sight.    They did offer a wonderful breakfast in the morning with eggs, toast, french toast, bagels, fresh fruit, orange juice, milk, and many other options that I've since forgotten due to the sheer selection available.

Summary: Excellent value for the money , only a short walk to Disney and the FREE full breakfast was another great bonus . Room was clean  , beds were comfortable , FREE WI-FI , Free coffee in the room . Staff and the manager Justine were very friendly and professional .. We certainly would recommend this motel .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: property is walking distance to dinseyland!! the staff is extremely nice and so helpful!! the pool area is so spacious. our room was really clean, beds were comfortable. the breakfast had a selection, plus cute decor. my favorite part about the stay was being able to see the fireworks from the hotel. thank you Juan De Jesus best check in and check out experience ! Also Ivan you did us a huge favor by keeping our ice pack cold for our disney trip the next day, i am so thankful!!! Itzel thank you for being so sweet!! looking forward to my next stay with you guys again!

Summary: Our stay was very nice. The staff are very friendly and accommodating.  Even when my daughters Teddy bear went missing the cleaning staff scoured thru all the laundry to find it. :)  It is within walking distance to Disneyland and some other good restaurants close by.  The Breakfast that came with your stay that was served from 6am -10am was with lots of choices from Hot to cold items. :)  The rooms are clean and serve there purpose. The gym that they have is nice.  I don't think most people know it exists. :)   This was my second time staying here. I would stay here again. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! It is just such a pleasure to read your review and we would like to thank you on behalf of the whole hotel team for your kindness. We hope to see you soon! Take Care.

Summary: Best Western's all have a standard and this one fulfills them.  Very clean and comfortable rooms and grounds.  The free breakfast is the biggest I've seen.  Seriously the variety is amazing. They have seating inside and outside which is a nice change.  The staff is very polite and helpful.  Martha and Ivan at the front desk ROCK! One side of the hotel has "Disney View" rooms.  You can see the fireworks and the top of Screamin'.  Be award that it is also noisy on that side.  The rooms on the interior side are much quieter.  The pool area is very nice but the topiary gardens need some attention but are fun. Parking is a chore!!  They don't seem to have enough spaces for the hotel size.  The hotel shares the lot with the Coco's next door which doesn't help.  It is walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please be assured I have shared your kind words with our Ladies and Gentlemen and we look forward to welcoming you back to soon!

Summary Heading: Very handy to walk to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great stay, 10 min walk to the Disneyland, happy with room, free breakfast included but note it gets busy so get in early.  $10 for parking each day additional cost.  Few dining options in walking distance. Wd stay again.

Summary: This hotel was great! It is so close to Downtown Disney/Disneyland we walked there everyday. The pool was fantastic and the rooms were so clean and spacious. Also, great breakfasts every day, they even us breakfast for the half marathon runners starting at 4 am! My only complaint is that it was hard to regulate the room temperature, but it wasn't unbearable. We will for sure be staying there the next time we go to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Good value and walking distance to Disney
Summary: This hotel was clean and the rooms were remodeled. The staff was super nice and helpful. There is a free breakfast that gets very crowded if you don't get in early. Mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker in room is super convenient. It's an older hotel that is modernized but the walls are still a bit thin. For the price this was an excellent stay. Walk to downtown Disney!

Summary: Great Best Western which was within walking distance to Disneyland and all the amenities.  Very clean and comfortable hotel.  Only complaint would be the walls are a bit thin and we had a family with small children next to us and they were a bit noisy in morning.  Not a deal breaker as we were in a hotel near Disney.  Breakfast was included in price and was okay.  Very busy in the morning with everyone off to park.  Also a parking fee is charged per night.

Summary: This was a nice motel very close the the Disney parks. We stayed one night before staying over at the Grand Californian. Overall, the property is clean, newly updated and in good shape. The pools are super nice and great on warm days. There are 2 hot tubs and a baby pool. The bigger pools are deeper, so not great for little ones.   The room was standard- 2 doubles and a bathroom. There was a nice long counter for spreading stuff out and it had a mini fridge and microwave.   The downsides are noise. The walkway is not well insulated, so, even with a sound machine going for our kids, we could hear the fireworks from the park and lots of people walking  by late at night. We probably would have gotten more used to it after a  few nights, but it was very noticeable and a problem the

Summary: A very nice and well outfitted hotel for anyone traveling to Disney.  My family loved the pools, the breakfast, and the quick trip to Disney.  It was ideal for families and great for the budget.  We would gladly stay again.
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. Comeback in the summer. We play movies by the pool and it ends with a  final touch FIREWORKS!  We look forward to serving you next time you stay with us. Take Care.

Summary: My family and I traveled and stayed at the best Western Hotel. We stayed 5 nights 6 days and things in the room weren't working, we went to the hotel staff everyday and we were told it would be fixed. Through the whole stay it was never fixed. The customer service and staff at the hotel are horrific. If you want to be treated like garbage and another number to there profit stay here otherwise if you want to be treated like a human and have a nice vacation stay at another hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for a week at Best Western plus stovalls. It was a wonderful clean hotel.  The breakfast each morning was hot, fresh and delicious.. We had a plugged sink one morning and they fixed it right away. I loved the fact the bed was double sheeted and the beds were clean with plenty of pillows. They restocked everything everyday.  The pool and hot tub was a nice place to retreat to after a long day at the parks.  My kids tell me I am very picky and I love this hotel so much I'll be staying again when I go back to visit Anaheim...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent property right next to Disneyland & Convention Center
Summary: The Best Western Stovall's Inn in Anaheim is a great place to stay while you are visiting Disneyland or the Anaheim Convention Center. Very convenient and within short walking distance to both. Nice complimentary daily breakfast saves time going to a sit dow n restaurant.  Comfortable, clean and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. Breakfast is a big bonus it saves you time before heading out to a busy day. We are always looking for ways to improve our breakfast when needed. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again. Thank you for recommending us. Take Care Shane.

Summary: Very nice place to stay if you're after the theme parks. Very basic. Awesome customer service and everyone is friendly. Our TV did not work but staff organised a handy man to fix it asap which was nice.
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. I'm glad we were able to resolve the issue right away.  Thank you for recommending us we hope to see you again.

Summary: The rooms were clean, good sized and hotel staff very friendly.  Close to Disneyland, the shuttle to Disneyland stops right out front every 1/2 hour. Highly recommend this hotel. You can even see the fireworks at night .
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback.  We have the perfect view for fireworks  either in front of the lobby, pool area and our third floor. Next time you stay with us you can request pool side.  We also do movies at the pool during our summer time. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during the Tinkerbell Half Marathon weekend and left very pleased.  The hotel is just a short walk away from the starting line of the half marathon and an easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  The rooms were clean, we were able to purchase tickets to Disney, and there was a large selection at breakfast.  The location was perfect for our needs as was the price.
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. Were glad you enjoying staying at our property. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: There was nothing I asked for that they didn't go out of their way to provide.  What more can you say about an Inn or hotel.  I stayed as a result of winning a bid for the hotel stay and Angel tickets.  If only the Angels had succeeded in their efforts but hey, they tried.  Ask for Venice.  She will make the same effort for you as she did in helping me make the night a great stay for my friends and I.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose Stovall's Inn due to the proximity to DisneyLand. We were able to walk there in 10 minutes. It obviously is half the price of the Disney resorts right next door.  The hotel is older but has been renovated and kept up fairly nice. Rooms had a little musty smell due to age I'm sure. Nothing terrible. They offer a full breakfast of eggs, french toast, bacon, sausage, bagels, muffins, cereals, several juices. Secured parking for guests only. $10 per day. We were there for The Peter Pan & Tinkerbell Disney runs and the hotel opened the breakfasts early for all the runners (4:30am early!) Will definitely stay here again. Good for $$
Manager Response: Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Very nice stay. Convenient location to Disneyland with door to door service with ART bus service at a minimal cost. Great breakfast service.  Would likely recommend this to anyone traveling to Disneyland, and will likely stay here on our next visit as well.  Great location if you are going to be attending an event at the Convention Center also, just a short walk away.  Coco's restaurant right next door had great family friendly menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and recommending our property to other travelers. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We hope you will come back and see us again soon. Take Care.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights during the tinkerbell half marathon weekend. We arrived at 10 am and staff were very friendly and they held our bags for a few hours while we went to the race expo until our room was ready.  Once we were in our room it was spotless and had everything we needed, including a microwave and fridge. The breakfast room opened at 4am on the morning of the race which came in very handy! The breakfast had a great selection; toast, eggs, ham, bacon, bagels, english muffins, muffins, cereals, oatmeal, yogurt, cheese sticks, coffee, tea and juice. The small store in the lobby was well stocked and we also purchased items from the vending machines near our room. We did not use the pool but saw many using it. Check out was a breeze. We'll definitely be back on
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay. I must say the pool is one of my favorite amenity. Definitely check it out next time you visit us. We hope to see you very soon. Take Care.

Summary: Best Western PLUS Stovall's Inn is my choice of hotel everytime I go to Disneyland. Its walking distance from the park. The hotel is great for the price we pay. Breakfast is good and parking is not hard. Location and price is what gets me to stay here all the time and they work with the military for military discounts.
Manager Response: We love our MWR guest! It's the best rate we offer. Thank you for serving our country.  We hope to see you soon. Take care.

Summary: Best Western Stovall is a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland California.  It is right across the street from the park, serves a great breakfast each day, has other restaurants next door, several pools and hot tubs, with very comfortable rooms and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Our location is just perfect and I'm glad you enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you very soon.

Summary: I always choose Best Western if I can. Staff was great, property was clean and well kept.  Pool was nice.   Breakfast bar is what you'd expect for budget hotel - but i'd totally stay there again.  Nice Job!
Manager Response: We value your business and our location is perfect when it comes to any Disney Marathon.  Please let us know how can we improve our breakfast bar?  Hope to see you soon. Take Care!

Summary: The rooms are a bit dated at stuffy and there is a 10.00 per day parking fee, but if you aren't planning on being in rom much and you want a great location for the Disney resorts this just may be your place. Stayed there with friends for the Disney TinkerBell Half Marathon weekend and they did an awesome job handling all the people. The breakfast spread was plentiful for all the athletes and the coffee was plentiful. Really what more could you ask for. I will be staying here again for this event.
Manager Response: YAY! We look forwarding to seeing you in your next marathon. Make sure you call us in advance . Take Care..

Summary: Nice hotel to stay at while visiting Disney.  Close walk to Downtown Disney.  No frills amenities but front lobby service is excellent and room was updated and clean.  Pool was lukewarm at night.  Continental breakfast included hard boiled or scrambled eggs, sausage, ham, cereal, bagels, toast, banana nut or blueberry muffins as well as english muffins.
Manager Response: Thank you for stay at Best Western we value your business.  What amenities would like to see in the future? We are always looking to improve for our guest.

Summary: We stayed at the best western Stovalls inn for s girls weekend at Disneyland. It was amazing! Nice clean rooms, free wifi! Lovely hot breakfast and decent coffee every morning.  I love white clean sheets and their beds did not disappoint.  Only issue we had was the shower handle was very stiff but we called and the front desk had it fixed very quickly and once it was fixed the shower was heaven. Great water pressure and a nice shower head.  It's very convenient to all things Disney too! We walked to the park and back twice each day with no issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Please call us for your future reservations.  I'm proud to know my staff took care of the issue right way. We hope to see you soon. Take care.

Summary: We looked at mid range accommodation - a room to sleep in, clean, tidy and close to the parks. This place ticked all of those boxes and included breakfast. If you can get there early enough, breakfast is adequate. The did run out of plastic cutlery while we were there.  There is no attention to detail re bookings at this property. I emailed the manager prior to our stay (which he replied to) confirming that we had booked the night prior to our arrival so we would have our room ready and not have to wait for check in time in the afternoon. When we arrived we were told our booking was cancelled because we were a 'no show'. Luckily they had availability and could accommodate us. Very nice of them considering we had already paid for the room IN FULL. The manager on duty really
Manager Response: I'm unsure what happen but if I can be of any assistance please don't hesitate on giving me a call 714-778-1880 ext 169.  I will be more than happy to listen to the detail so we may improve our service for future stays.     Liz V.

Summary: 10 minutes waking from Disneyland. The laundry room was very good. 2 pools, nice gym and  a lot of parking space in the hotel area. Sometimes, when the product at the breakfast finished it took a very long time to Refilling them and you just seat and wait.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I will communicate with my breakfast supervisor how we can improve to avoid the wait.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you in the future.

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel the week of April 24th to May 1st. We had 2 rooms on 2nd floor. Staff didn't guarantee but honored my request for a Disney view. We were able to watch the fireworks on nights we weren't out or at the theme parks with also a view of the Farris wheel at Cal Adv.  The location is perfect. Not too far but an enjoyable walk through lit trees into the Grand Californian and to Downtown Disney. Breakfast got crowded a couple days but staff work very hard to keep enough food available. It's a hot breakfast. It's not perfect but pretty good taste for a hotels offerings. Rooms were clean. Housekeeping friendly. Grounds keepers work hard everyday washing and scrubbing walkways. I used the laundry room. Machines were clean and worked well. 2$ wash/2$ dry.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I'm sorry to hear that we  failed on fixing the T.V  right away. I will be addressing this issue with my front desk and maintenance to avoid it from happening in the future. I'm glad you were able to enjoy breakfast in the outside tables it sure is nice and peaceful. Please call us in advance for future reservation so we may provide you the best rate.  Take care.

Summary: Very clean, quiet room reasonably priced very close to Disneyland. Microwave and frig at no extra cost. very good hot breakfast included in price of room. ART shuttle to Disneyland available every half hour right in front of the hotel $5 per person for an all day pass. secure parking lot $10 extra per day. Very friendly staff and just a great hotel if you are visiting Disneyland :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay. See you soon.

Great rooms and amenities, good price and walking distance to the parks.  One can also take a shuttle for a small fee from the Hotel. Will definitely stay there again.

Summary: This hotel was great. Staff was friendly and helpful, breakfast was amazing,  room was clean and updated. Pool area nice and large and clean with lots of shade. It was present every day that we were there but since I wasn't staying in the lobby it was fine.  It is a issue they should try to resolve since it's the first impression of this hotel. Summary: My daughter (aged 19) and I stayed here for 3 nights to be close to Disneyland and we were more than happy with our choice. The room was a good size, and the x2 double beds were very comfy. Breakfast was ok, fitted our needs as we mainly ate toast and bagels, and grabbed some fruit to go. There's a lovely pool area, and it's an easy walk to Disneyland.  The staff were very friendly, especially Martha (not sure of spelling)at reception. I would highly recommend you stay here if you want a great value/budget hotel within walking distance to Disney.

Summary: Nice hotel for the price.  The pool area is fabulous!  You can see the fireworks from the pool at night and it is walking distance to Downtown Disney. Everything was crammed into the room, but since we didn't spend much time in the room it didn't bother us too much.

Summary Heading: Amazing- close to Disneyland, friendly, good value
Summary: Stayed at the motel for 14 nights in April, 3 adults sharing one room. Only have positive things to say. The motel included a disney park view at no extra cost (could see some of the fireworks from the room/corridor). Room was a good size, came with an iron, ironing board, coffee/tea maker, hairdryer, microwave, fridge, free wi-fi, and toiletries (ie. soap, shampoo). There is no in-room safe, but can get a safe at reception (you get a key), felt very secure and you can ask for a smaller or larger sized safe.  Close walk to Disneyland (about 10 minutes), can go through the Disney hotels and then through Downtown Disney. The walk feels very safe, no matter what time of day/night and is well lit. Staff at the motel are really friendly, and there is always someone at reception to
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for staying with us 14 nights. We value your business.  Our location is perfect and I'm glad you were able to enjoy everything from walking to Disney to even going to our near grocery store. My favorite amenity is the pool and I'm glad you were able to soak up while staying with us.  We hope to see you very soon. Take Care!

Summary Heading: Great location - would stay here again :)
Summary: We were located on the second floor.  Our 2 queen bed room was clean and well maintained.  The shower head was a bit broken but the shower still worked so it wasn't a big issue.   Location was EXCELLENT! for Disneyland visitors.  We were able to cut through the California Hotel to make about a 10 minute (brisk) walk to the park entrance.   Were we even able to see most of the Disneyland fireworks show from the hot tub!  Breakfast room had a lot of options but it was a bit crowded around the 8am hour (with everyone getting ready to head to the parks).  I would recommend going earlier if you can get up.

Summary Heading: Clean & Comfy for Disney Stay - but skip the breakfast
Summary: Essentially what you would expect of a Best Western - small but clean and comfortable rooms, slightly dated decor and bathroom.   Beds were very comfortable, but we were woken every day by noise of cleaners and guests outside. Recommend you go for the second level towards the back of the hotel if you want less noise.  Breakfast area didn't have enough seating (but we were there at a busy time), the odor and the food were not pleasant. I doubt anything was fresh and there were very limited options.  Easy 10 - 15 min walk to Disneyland / California Adventure Park / Downtown Disney, and a few great little diners a short walk from the hotel too.

Summary: Plenty of parking  charge of $10 to park, make sure you keep your ticket handy for leaving the lot due to gates.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  Decent breakfast with hot items and yogurt.  Good size room. Would return again. Desk staff very helpful and friendly.

Summary: We just got back from a two night stay here while visiting the Disney parks. The good: Easy walking distance to the parks (maybe 10 - 12 minutes.) Pool area has two swimming pools, two Jacuzzi pools and a wading pool, all very nice. Breakfast had many protein options and good coffee. Our room was clean as was the public areas.  The not good was the old-fashioned box air-conditioner which was too noisy for us to leave on while we slept. We had to open the window and that let in quite a lot of noise until quieting down later. If this property had dual-glazed windows and more modern air conditioning, it would be "Excellent" instead of "Very Good."

Summary: This was our first hotel during a recent trip to the US. We arrived after 16+ hours of traveling from the Philippines to LA. The hotel was clean and close enough to Disney. There is a shuttle that can bring you to Disney for a fee of 3 dollars. This shuttle stops in front of the hotel every 15-20 minutes. We also enjoyed the free breakfast - good selection and the breakfast area was cozy. Overall, Stovall's provided good value for money and I recommend it to families who are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: We recently spent 3 nights at the Stovall Best Western located across from Disneyland.  The location was awesome as it as so close to the Park. As we all know, food is expensive inside Disneyland so having the option for a full breakfast and being so close you can walk back to the room for lunch AND a nap was perfect!! Summary Heading: Exactly what you'd expect - good location, amenities, service

Summary Heading: Clean and close to Downtown Disney
Summary: Stayed here Easter weekend to visit Disneyland.  Room was very nice, clean, and well maintained.  We did not use the pool. After checkout on Monday morning we were allowed to leave all our luggage safely at the hotel so we could visit Disneyland without worries. Downtown Disney was about a 15 minute walk. Breakfast - when stocked - was decent with a nice selection. Tables in the breakfast room were very dirty. Monday morning breakfast ran out of eggs, bagels, and juice early on; they did restock but it was quite busy. We would definitely stay here again.

Summary: The room was updated/modern. The beds were comfortable. The breakfast had cold and hot entrees. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Location was great; right across the street from Disneyland. I would recommend this hotel to friends and family and will stay again on future trips.

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay at this hotel. Everything was as needed. Good breakfast (above the average), clean rooms, great staff and great location. There's also a restaurant Coco's  next door and convenience stores within walking distance too.

When we turned the A/C on, hoping hat it would help get rid of the musty smell, things blew out of it. Gross. Now our not so clean floor had bits of leaves and dirt covering it. The bathroom window had mold growing on the tile. The carpet was badly stained. Our bed coverings were stained. The room was not clean.   The room was of a decent size. There was not a built in closet, rather a wardrobe against the wall was supplied. There were 2 tables in the room, but one was in front of the window, almost pressed against the bed. Space was very tight there. There were ample places to charge our devices and other things. That was very nice. The refrigerator and microwave were nice. We tipped the

Summary Heading: Convenient, clean comfortable hotel for Disney
Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms.  Nice pool area for kids.  Great to have fridge and microwave.  About 15-20 min walk to Disney gates with two kids and a stroller.  Breakfast nice to have but crowded and items not replaced as quickly as was needed.  Coco's was good for kids for dinner outside the park.  Helpful staff.

Summary: We usually stay at another Best Western hotel in the area, but chose this one because of the slightly lower price, to try to stick to a tight budget.  It was a little further of a walk to Disneyland than we're used to, but not unreasonably so - we were still able to return to our room to change or for midday rest as needed.  The breakfast was good, though crowded as the morning went on, but items were kept well stocked.  The room was plenty spacious and the beds were really comfortable, especially after a full day of Disneyland with sore joints.  The staff was very helpful, allowing us to park for the day when we arrived early, and pre-checked us so we could just stop by later to get a room key once check-in time came.  We would definitely stay here again.

Summary: Breakfast was hot and filling.  Beautiful very very short walk to the park.  Housecleaning was great and everyone courteous.  Room fit 5 comfortably, helped make our family vacation even better.  We will stay here again if we get back.

Summary: This was a great place to arrive from 20 hours of flying/connection time.  Room towards the rear of the property away from the road are much quieter, request one of these.  Comfortable, clean and adequate for a stay of a few nights.  The reception area had an awful urine type of smell. However the staff were very friendly and helpful overall and we found the location to be perfect to be in walking distance to Disneyland and main attractions. Very good moderate property. Breakfast is nothing to write home about but adequate for a quick bite, just go down early as everything good goes quickly.  Busy little place.

Summary: We stayed 6 nights at the hotel (2 adults, 3 kids) and really enjoyed it.  The location to Disneyland was great - a 15 minute walk or so to the main entrance.  Check-in was very quick and were able to accommodate 3 separate rooms (there were 11 of us travelling) very close to each other.  Staff are very nice and helpful and the people that work in the breakfast in the morning really work hard to make sure everything is stocked although the amount of people consuming a lot of food is absurd at times.  Having said that, the breakfast buffet was excellent and a nice addition to staying there. Rooms also cleaned so well and had extra towels especially in the girls shared room!  I would recommend highly to all children or none.  It's near Disney after all.

Summary: Firstly I'd like to say that the staff are just amazing. Friendly and go out of their way. Secondly the location is fantastic. A 10 minute walk to Disneyland and we found found walking at night no problems at all. We were there for 11 nights and would recommend it to anyone.

Summary: We had a family new year at Disneyland and stayed at the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn. The location of the accommodation is so convenient for walking to Disneyland and California Park (only 10 minutes easy walk) and the accommodation itself was really good.  They provide a buffet breakfast in the accommodation cost, the rooms were always well cleaned, the gym and pool looked very good but we didn't use them, there were 2 diners right next to it, the reception staff were always friendly and very friendly and accommodating.  Enjoyed our stay and if we were ever to go back would definitely consider there again (there is so much accommodation to choose from in Anaheim).  There is nothing wrong with this place and would definitely recommend it for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing your review. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: My family travels to Disneyland quite often, once a year or so. We have stayed at Stovall's exclusively the last several times we've gone. We have ALWAYS had a pleasant stay. The staff is absolutely wonderful. The rooms are nice, the free breakfast has a good variety (hot items vary each day, eggs, bacon, sausage, hash browns, french toast sticks, waffles and they always have bagels, donuts, cereal, fruit, yogurt, etc) & plenty of tables. Short walk to the parks but the ART also has a stop right in front of the hotel if your feet have had too much. I love the beds & pillows, I sleep SOO well probably partly from exhaustion from being in the parks all day but the beds are wonderfully comfortable to me. This is a great place. I think some people's negativity is cause they want a 5
