Summary Heading: Not a hotel I would choose again!
Summary: Too small for bigger families,  bathrooms are very small and it's really loud. If you are going to relax this is not the place for you. Was woken up daily by either the maids and their loud music they play while cleaning or the people staying next door. The walls are paper thin and was constantly hearing the people next door plus the main street is right out front so cars all night. Breakfast is not good either! Only plus is walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Shelly,  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I will be passing this information on to my housekeeping manger. As far as the breakfast we do use high quality brand for our free breakfast. We do offer several options such as yogurt, string cheese, oatmeal, cereal, eggs with green onion and cheese, sausage, toast, bagels, muffins, coffee, juice ect. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary Heading: Best Location for a Visit to Disney Parks
Summary: I chose this hotel because of the proximity to the Disney Parks and because we are Best Western rewards members. The hotel is a very short walk to Downtown Disney and the park entrances. Our room was nicely decorated and very clean. It was bit on the small side, but we were really only there to sleep. It had a small fridge and a microwave, which came in handy.  The complimentary hotel breakfast was one of the best I've seen in terms or variety. There were eggs, ham or sausage, potatoes, French toast sticks, biscuits and gravy, fruit, yogurt, cheese sticks, breads and muffins, oatmeal and cereal, juice and coffee. The staff seemed a little challenged in keeping it stocked during the breakfast rush, but there were a lot of guests eating at once. The breakfast room is pretty large

Summary Heading: Very handy for Disney but not for a decent sleep!!
Summary: We stayed in Stovalls in over the Christmas period for Disneyland so of course it was very busy ... As expected! The room was nice, beds were comfy and shower was good. The family next door to us to top it all off woke up at half 5 and started putting hair dryers on and shouting and chatting till about 7:30 when they finally left! After a full day at Disneyland and another to come we needed our sleep, but we didn't get it here. Summary: Returned to the Anaheim area after about 6 years and previously stayed at this hotel.  Nicely surprised with the renovation of the hotel. Manager Response: Good Morning Ernesto, On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize. I will talk to my front desk staff in regards to the way  they communicate options for  parking. Booking a couple of months in advance is highly recommended next time you visit the Disneyland resort. Summary Heading: Do not stay here! Book at the BW down the road!
Summary: We booked a non-smoking room and got a smoking room that was nasty. When we requested to switch we got another room but not without attitude. The TV did not work, they had no creamer at their breakfast, charged a $10 parking fee with NO spots (we were made to illegally park along the side of a restaurant in the back not even in an actual spot)  because it was all they had available they said. The room was very dark and gloomy and had fruit fly bugs (they may be small bug ANNOYING) The male manager was extremely rude. The Best Western down the street was a whole lot nicer and cheaper. The other is also next-door to a Denny's which was a huge bonus.

Summary: The Best Western Stovall's Inn is a great place to stay while visiting Disneyland. I accidentally reserved a smoking room. The manager switched it for a non-smoking room with no problems. The walk was fine in the morning but quite tiring at night after walking in the park all day. There is a shuttle bus you can get tickets for that costs $5 a day per person. I recommend it. 4. Don't lose the parking ticket. It costs $24 to replace.

Summary Heading: Great Location Close to Disneyland, Good for Families
Summary: Our family of five stayed here during our Disneyland vacation in October.  The room and the bathroom were clean (a big plus for me!) and the staff were friendly and accommodating. The continental breakfast was a huge money saver for our family and the selection was impressive (fresh fruit, fruit juice, toast, bagels, bacon, sausage, eggs, cereal and more).  The pool area was clean and the pools were a big hit with the kids.  I would recommend a room on the third floor that faces towards the parks for a great view of the fireworks at night. It's incredibly close to Disneyland and has a simple and great breakfast. The staff was kind and accommodating, the pool was perfect, we loved it! I will absolutely stay here again.

Room was spacious and clean. Affordable. Hotel was average but location made it a perfect hotel. did not see the pool...didn't spend timeat the hotel excrpt for sleeping. Public transit to Huntington Beach across the street.

Summary: Excellent hotel for the money 10 minutes walk to Disneyland. Rooms are clean, the free breakfast is very good, including bacon and eggs, lots of choices. The pool and hot tubs were clean and the water was warm enough. Walking distance to disneyland through the lobby of the California hotel. Didn't know we had to pay for parking until we go there but only $10 a day so no big deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Summary: I am 11 and terrified by bugs. I was really pleased at first, but I went into the bathroom to take a shower I saw a giant cockroach. I screamed and then I got my mom and she screamed too. It was late at night so we put a towel over it and slapped it with a shoe. That night while was in bed, I started itching a spot on my leg and soon noticed that their was a spider in my bed and I had gotten bit. My mom asked me if I wanted to stay another night and I said only if it was a nightmare. The rooms were messy too. WAY TO MANY BUGS PARENTS, DON'T BRIG YOU KIDS HERE. I was miserable. The only good thing was the location.

Summary: We were plesantly surprised with the cleanliness of the hotel. We had a long day at Disneyland and it was nice to come to a quite comfortable room to rest. Breakfast was great, staff was friendly and helpful. Best hotel for your money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: AWESOME PLACE! We normally stay at Hotels across the street from Disney or at Disney Hotels; the convenience of walking a few minutes vs. driving and walking has always been a major component of making the decision where we stay. This was a last minute booking and was very nervous since we have never stayed here before. Dealing with two little ones is not an easy task, this hotel made it easier for us with the FULL FREE breakfast they serve (didn't has to get up super early and go out to eat, we ate in the room...Breakfast in bed....can't beat that) and how quiet and clean the place is...it was a very nice surprise; so much so that we are planning on making this "our spot" to stay when visiting Disney (about 5-7 times per year) I recommend it to everyone, specially if you have a
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a great time here at  this hotel, The room was super clean and the Bed was oh so comfortable!!! I could sleep  for days.  It is located near Disneyland and the Art busing service picks up customers right outside of the hotel.  the eggs were kind of cold but everything else was great. The parking was kind of a problem, but the staff directed me at another spot..
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed 3 nights at this hotel. Great location when you are taking a Disney vacation. You can walk to Downtown Disney in 10 minutes and forget about your car. Breakfast was very good. Staff was very professional and courteous.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We got to Anaheim and checked in. The room was ok and clean but a bit small. We left the next day and came back that night and our door was left open. The cleaning crew didn't close our door properly so anyone could have walked in. We talked to the front desk and all they offered was for us to move rooms. With a 3 year old that would have been an added pain so we stayed and wrote notes to the cleaning staff to shut the door. The breakfast was powdered eggs, typical of a best western so nothing special there. The parking situation was poorly handled as well. We were not able to park the 3rd night because of a mysterious outstanding balance. We looked into it and it was a mistake on the hotels part for not putting 4 days of parking. The fourth day we talked to the front desk and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great spot, everything you would ever want near Disneyland.  Coco Restaurant made our trip even more enjoyable, its healthy and real food compare to inside Disneyland, the price was great too.   Too busy to swim, but it looks great.  I only travelled alone with my teenager daughter, and asked for near front, up top floor, and private, and that is exactly what we got.  The front desk were extremely accommodating.  The price was so affordable.  Thank you Best Western.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Best Western was exactly what I expected and exactly what I got. Excellent location to Disneyland, clean room, clean property and friendly staff. Excellent value. I would stay here over and over for the value. Our family of 4 spent 8 nights here while visiting Disneyland and the surrounding area. It's about a 14 minute walk to the park gates and was nice to walk back and forth without dealing with parking. The pool area was nice and never too busy (although 1 is under construction and the fitness center also seems to be out of commission) and the breakfast was more than adequate and we always had a place to sit. The staff were very friendly and pleasant to deal with.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy check in and out. Parking is plentiful and I like that the space in between cars is double spaced. Breakfast is decent, scrambled eggs, bacon or sausge, fruit, cereals, toast, bagels, donuts, etc.... and beverages. The cleaning product smells so we ate outside. Stayed 4 nights. Staff friendly and helpful.  Close to Disneyland and Convention Center (less than 10 minute walk). Note about shower, u pull out and then turn. It looks like just a turn knob! Also, only could hear the people walking outside the room. Very good soundproof within the rooms.

Summary: Broken Shower, Broken A/C, People Yelling in the parking lot and woke up our kid, WiFi went out and wouldn't all me to get work done and beds were not comfy!! To finish it all off the pool was closed at 7pm.  I would avoid this hotel at all costs!!! There are plenty of other hotels in the area for the same price!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that maintenance was able to assist in fixing the AC unit and shower. The pool was closed due to lack of lighting in the pool area. It‚Äôs for the safety of our guests. Our lighting has arrived and now the pool is open until 11pm. We hope that you have another to come and stay with us and enjoy the pool. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Clean, spacious rooms in a typical motel of the area and era. I stayed for one night as I was attending a convention across the street and it was OK for these purposes.  Very noisy air con units which I certainly would not have been able to sleep with switched on if the weather had dictated it. I was on the second floor and, with a large suitcase, was not aware of any elevator - this was awkward and may be an issue for some.   Breakfast included which although served in a charmless room, was actually quite plentiful with more variety than expected including cereals, pastries, yoghurts, juices and hot drinks, as well as a couple of hot items.

Summary: Great economical stay when going to Disneyland. Walking distance to the park and comfortable beds. Breakfast was adequate and convenient. Most of our time was spent at Disneyland, so the room was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Went to Disneyland with my family, to include a 2 year old and 4 year old, with 3-day Park Hopper offered through Military. Stovall's Inn, one of the original hotels near Disneyland, was offered with special pricing. Absolutely wonderful hotel, especially considering the discounted rate.   Stovall's had a hot breakfast with eggs, bagels, cereal, bread, fresh fruit, coffee, milk, orange juice and apple juice. Also offered a rotation of pancakes or waffles and sausage or bacon from day-to-day.   We had fun in the pools - 3ft to 8ft deep, with concrete steps in shallow end, a kid's 1.5ft wading pool, and a hot tub. There is also a sauna room and another pool, but the pool is under construction.  The Hotel is an amazing location. It is within walking distance (15 min walk or about
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed staying at the Stovalls Inn. The breakfast in the morning is delicious and there is plenty for the whole family to choose from. Yes, you can walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: The room was clean.  Check in fast and friendly.  Very helpful on check out when we had trouble with check out.  Conveniently located to Disney Land and Convention center. Would stay here again if necessary to travel to this area
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Annual stay at Best Western Stovall
Summary: I like this hotel----and it was updated, I believe, since my visit last year, which was needed and appreciated. There is a pretty expansive breakfast every day, including eggs and bacon or sausage, and is across from Disneyland---tho a bit too far of a walk for tired kiddos at end of long day, as not across from entrance. I have stayed here for three nights every spring for past few years, and have been happy. Nothing too fancy, but good enough, and enjoyable stay, good service, good location. Kids enjoyed heated pool, and kiddie pool (tho only briefly, as is not heated----GREAT idea to have kiddie pool, but noticed all the kids, not just ours, abandoned quickly, too cold). I always ask for a room on pool side, and can walk out my door and view fireworks! Thank you staff for
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We are fans of staying at BW Plus properties. However, this is definitely not a Plus property in our opinion. It is a Motel not a Hotel. Diamond members are not acknowledged here by the Staff if that is important to you.   The rooms are average in size and need to be updated. The rooms have air conditioning which is nice - but they are old and noisy. The room was very dusty (probably the a/c) as my eyes swelled up and that is what happens with excess dust or mold. Not impressed with having to pay $10pn for parking. No need for this at all. Other Hotels close by do not charge their guests for parking. The free internet is nice to have and was pretty fast. You can definitely hear the people in the next room and everyone going past your room on the walkway.  It is super close to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Hotels here in the Anaheim area have a resort and or parking fee. We only have a parking fee. They can also take you to the Angels Stadium to watch a game. You can buy shuttle passes at the hotel. We hope that when coming to the Anaheim area you come to the BW PLUS Stovall‚Äôs inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: No problems. I was looking for a budget stay near disneyland, but after reading all the scary reviews from the cheap hotels around the area, decided to go with a more trusted brand name. It was a bit more expensive than I wanted to pay for just a night's stay, but it was conveniently located, and very clean. I'd recommend it to anyone with the same concerns about cleanliness that I had.

Summary: Great place to stay if you just want to walk to Disneyland. First night was kind of noisey due to the street traffic.Hotel on the corner of Kearney and West. But so tired from Disneyland slept better next night. Rooms were always very clean and bed was very comfortable(I have a bad back). The breakfast is  just ok. The eggs were scrabbled(not real eggs) Always had sausages sometimes bacon,donuts,bagels, cereal...10$ to park car overnight but cheaper than anywhere else. Walk to Disney or Calif. usually takes about 15 minutes if you don't get lost or told you can't go through unless you stay at Disney Hotel(have to show room key).Will stay again but next time not on West St side.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. A lot of our guests love our beds, they say that it was the best sleep that they have had in a long time. We hope to see you again!

Summary: This was a great spot at one of the best locations possible, across the street from Disneyland and a block or two from the Anaheim Convention Center! Coco's Family Restaurant is next door, as well as a supermarket down a block. Perfect view of the fireworks and truly at the heart of your vacation.

You can have a perfect view of the fireworks from the poolside building. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: It was clean and comfortable.  Across the street from Disneyland.  Good price for the location.  The only thing I didn't like was that you pay for parking but it is cheaper than parking at Disneyland.  It's really nice to be so close after a long day at Disneyland to go back to the room and sleep.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. The location to the parks is only about a 10-15 minute walk. We have the lowest parking fee out there. A lot of the hotels in Anaheim have a resort and or parking fee. We only have a parking fee. We hope you come and visit us again soon!

Summary: I'm sorry but my impression of this property was not up to the standards I have come to expect from the many Best Western we have stayed in !!!! It seemed they were more interested in shaking you down than making you comfortable ???
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We would have loved to hear in what we failed to assist you with. We take pride in keeping our property clean and I know that our room attendants really work very hard to keep each room clean. We hope that when you come to the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs inn for you lodging needs.

Summary: The location is great - easy access to the convention center and to the Disney Parks, with especially quick access to California Adventure. The staff was very nice, the breakfast is great and the rooms are clean - a little small, but adequate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We are a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Very happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I love the exterior as well as the interior appearance of this hoted. I will definitely be staying in this place next time I'm around the area. Super Clean and Comfortable! The staff was very nice and helpful :-)

Summary: Enjoyed my stay. Very close to the Convention Center and even enjoyed being close to Disneyland for a brief visit there. I was thankful for air conditioning in the room worked so well. It was very hot during my stay in Anaheim.

Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure Park through Downtown Disney. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: This is my second time staying at the Best Western Stovall's Inn. The purpose of my travels was taking a school group to a conference. The hotel is perfectly located between the Anaheim Convention Center and Downtown Disney.  The hotel provides breakfast. Breakfast consists of eggs, sausage, bacon, fruit, yogurt, toast, cereal, and pastries.  If you are a coffee drink I do caution you, the coffee is not very good. We had asked for our hotel rooms to be together as we were a large group and the hotel was able to accommodate us.  The front end staff were polite and helpful.  This hotel had many families staying there as well. Very family friendly. There is a pool on the premises, not very big, but big enough for the facility. All in all and good hotel to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy that you come back to stay with us. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. Nice to know that you like the breakfast. We will be changing our coffee. We hope to hear feedback on that. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: If you are attending an event at the Anaheim Convention Center or visiting Disneyland, this is a pretty nice hotel. Good breakfast. Helpful staff. Clean. Prices will vary depending on event, but I thought is was a reasonable price. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. Also we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure Parks. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Apparently, the hotel complex is scheduled to be torn down and rebuilt in the next 5 years.  They need to pay specific attention to sound transmission between rooms and the walkways by the rooms as this is a big problem.  You can hear people TALKING between rooms beside you and below you.  This was the only place on our trip that charged for parking - not impressed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We thank you once more for your input on our future remodel. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come and stay at the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn.

Summary: The motel is a moderate walk to Disneyland Resort. The staff was pleasant  and helpful. They arranged a ride to the airport that was much cheaper than a cab ($22.00 for 2 versus nearly $50.00). They also held out luggage and refused a tip, saying this is what they do, which was nice for a change. It was a little noisy with kids running in the morning, but what is one to expect when one is at one of the biggest amusment parks in the world.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good and Close to Disney/Convention Center
Summary: The hotel has been updated recently.  Breakfast is minimal and the internet can be a bit slow during busy times but the pool area and room was good for a place to stay while in the area.  The rooms were surprisingly quiet.  I slept like a rock every night!
Manager Response: Thank you for your Review. We appreciate your business. You will love the pool after the renovations are done. We will have a fitness room available for our guests to use. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay while visiting Disneyland!
Summary: Nice Rooms! Walking Distance from Disneyland, which was a plus for me, just walk down Disneyland Road and take a short cut through the California Grand Hotel! Friendly Staff! Good Breakfast Selection! Decent Location with good restaurant selection nearby!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I will make sure and mention to the front desk that they are doing a great job and to keep it up. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean hotel with a convenient location.
Summary: My family of four stayed at this motel for three nights while visiting Disneyland.  The rooms are quite small but have been updated and are very clean.  We were expecting to be able to just walk across the street to Disneyland, but it is about a one mile walk to get to the entrance of the park.  They do offer a shuttle for $5 per person, but we decided to walk.  Breakfast wasn't great, but it's not terrible and pretty much what you'd expect for a free breakfast.  You can tell this is an older motel that has been updated.  The pool was under construction while we were there. If you park at the hotel you are given one ticket which is required to get in and out of the  lot. I would have loved to be able to use our room key cards for this instead of having a separate paper  ticket.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are very thankful that our housekeepers work very hard to keep all the rooms clean. We hope that next time you come and visit the Anaheim area you come and stay with us. The pool renovation will be done and it will look amazing!

Summary: Overall a great staff Justin was very friendly and the there was another lady at the front who gave us directions can't remember her name but the beds are way too high for kids my son fell off trying to get down and hit his head on the bed frame
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and show Justin this review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope that your son is alright. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: When we visit Disneyland, this is where we always stay.  It is consitant with its quality.  A 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  This is by far the best "continental breakfast" I have every experienced.  The multiple choices of items make it easy for the entire family to find something they like.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Glad to hear that you enjoyed our full buffet breakfast. There‚Äôs a lot to choose from. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is also a shuttle you can take. The shuttle stops in front of the hotel. It‚Äôs the ART Transit and its route#9. It‚Äôs 5.00 per person for an all day pass. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place, so close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for two weeks in early February, great staff, bit of a stuff up with our reservation - they gave our booked room away, but was sorted after 15 minutes, not what I wanted after a 14 hour flight from Australia.   So close to disneyland - 5 minute stroll away, we could watch the fireworks from the top floor balcony. ART stops right out front. Easy 20 minute walk to Bubba Gump Shrimp and The Cheesecake Factory for meals.   Staff very helpful and informative on the area, there was one staff member who wasn't as pleasant as the others, can't remember her name, we tried to avoid talking to her when we went to the office...other than her, the rest were really nice.

Summary: The hotel was nice, clean, friendly and was within easy walking distance from Disneyland.  There was a hot breakfast served each morning that had enough choices to make everyone happy. We will continue to return when we go to Disneyland.

Summary: Perfect location if you are going to Disneyland. We walked one way and took the shuttle the other.   Very clean, breakfast was good and appreciated! Perfect for families! Coco's restaurant next door was good too.

Summary Heading: Pretty Nice, but a bit overpriced in my opinion
Summary: Great location - can see Disney's CA Adventure from some rooms, but you pay dearly for that convenience. Room was clean and it was very quiet, which was nice. Excellent breakfast in the AM with eggs, sausage, waffles, breads, fruit, yogurt, cereals, etc.

Summary: This hotel is extremely convenient to the Anaheim Convention Center.  You will not need a car, and can find many dining options.  Hotel is clean and renovated, only issue that I had was  a stale/smokey odor in my non-smoking room.  I did not expect my room to open to the outside, but the security seemed good.  Room was quiet, bed was great.  Good business option if you don't want all the bells and whistles.

Summary: This is a good hotel with in walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms are nice and clean and it has free breakfast. Parking is 10 dollars but it is cheaper than parking at Disney.  We only stayed for one day but the staff was nice. The quickest way to Disney is through the Grand California Hotel. It really was a nice and very safe feeling walk. The price is really good for the area.

Summary: This Hotel misrepresented its long standing good name and its quality and overall ambience reduced it to a comparable motel.  I would gladly pay $180/night (including tax & parking fee) to high standard hotel.  But I felt like I paid $180 to a motel.  The cable TV was not working, AC was very noisy and annoyng, and breakfast was like food you would find in jailhouse.  Breakfast should be at least at iHop standards.  That would offset the room quality which I found average or below average.

Summary: If you're not staying inside Disney, there's not a better mix of value, quality, and location than this hotel.  We had our three year old with us so we were concerned about the length of the trip to and from the Disney entrance.  With a cheap umbrella stroller, we could make the walk in 10-15 minutes.

Summary Heading: Great stay in close proximity to Disneyland
Summary: My family and I stayed here for three nights. We arrived late in the evening and had a very good experience checking in. We were pleasantly surprised by the condition of the room. While a little cramped (lots of furniture with two double beds), the room was clean and the decor and fixtures were modern. The beds were extremely comfortable. There was also a microwave and small refrigerator in the room. We didn't take advantage of the free breakfast but it was there if we wanted it. Overall, a great hotel that is close to the park and well-priced.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. It is clean, close to Disney, and good breakfast.  The front desk staff is very pleasant and helpful as well. Our only disappointment was the pool was closed for renovations, but I think it is supposed to be done soon.

Summary: Only 10 minute walking distance to Disneyland, good breakfast with lots of choices, very clean and comfortable room with nice decor, friendly staff checking in and checking out, arranged shuttle service on departure

Summary: Except for breakfast, this was a good place to place  your head at night when visiting Disneyland. It is within walking distance to Disneyland or take the ART bus which stops in front of the hotel and takes you directly to Disneyland.

Summary: Cleanest and most well kept Best Western I have ever stayed at.  On par with Hampton Inn or Courtyard.  At tops a 10 minute walk to convention center. I didn't need my rental car the entire conference and just walked to dinners and to Disney ESPN zone.

Summary Heading: Great stay, excellent service and close proximity to the parks!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here very much. We took the Disneyland Resort Express Bus from LAX to the hotel and they dropped us off right across the street. The hotel smelt a bit misty but we found it to be quite clean. The rooms had a microwave and fridge l, which we found useful, and it was a short can ride away to a grocery store. The included breakfast was excellent, always lots off food and great service. The hotel is a 10-15 minute walk from the park, you could see California Adventure from the hotel lobby. There is elevator access so great for strollers. There is also pool, but we never checked it out as we didn't have enough time. I would definitely recommend this hotel, especially to families with small children who don't want to pay lots of money to stay right on the Disney

Summary: We stayed at stovalls for the first part of our honeymoon of the states. This hotel us absolutely brilliant! Rooms are big, clean and modern!  Staff are friendly and very helpful! Summary: Overall the our stay was great. I would stay here again. The only thing that I could wish for was that the sheets not small like bleach or disinfectant, but I took comfort in knowing everything was clean.

Initially, I had booked a "bargain room" online that seemed perfect for my six year old daughter's very first Disney experience. Summary Heading: Super Family Hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: Excellent hotel which is situated close to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. Great for a family vacation. Summary: We stayed 2 nights at the BW Stovall's Inn.  The picture conveyed the room nicely.  It was quiet at night, although at times we could hear the couple in the next room talking.  The room and bathroom was very clean and the beds comfortable.  It was necessary to run the in-wall air conditioner all night, as we didn't feel that having our windows open was an option. Summary Heading: Great place to stay for NAMM
Summary: Can't say enough how great of a place this was, and excellent value - perfect location for a very very short walk to the convention center. Staff was helpful. Pretty quiet place. Had a room toward the back of the hotel and was very pleased on the 2nd floor. Would stay again for sure!

Summary: We attend the NAMM show at the Convention Center and this is our second year at Best Western Stovall.  It is exactly what we need for this business trip: Very close, clean, and comfortable. Summary: Front desk staff were always helpful.  Breakfast was ample.  Gym room down the street (nearby Best Western) was a nice bonus - nothing fancy, but a nice option after a long day of meeting. The alternative was to walk 4 hotels down to another Best Western.  It was nice there was a back-up, but to walk down by myself wasn't reasonable to me.  Really that was my only problem with the stay.  Anaheim Resort Transit was another story...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location and value near Disneyland
Summary: This was a very nice, affordable hotel at the edge of Disneyland.  The location was great and although it was within walking distance, it also was on the route of the transit system, which took us right up to the gate for $2 per senior per day, thus saving valuable steps.  This perk was greatly appreciated at the end of the day.  The large breakfast facility provided a hot breakfast.  Nothing fancy, but clean and complimentary
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best Disney area hotel we have stayed in.
Summary: I love the location. Free breakfast and clean room to come back to after a day in the parks. Will continue to stay here in the future we have tried both of the stovalls best westerns and had similar experiences.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stayed here twice in one year - great low cost option!
Summary: My mother and I have stayed here twice and plan to stay again next year.  The first time my mom had to go to the hospital and the front desk was so helpful in noting the local hospitals. When I came back late night and had not eaten, they allowed me to get some fruit from the breakfast area.  The rooms are nice, very clean, and comfortable. The only pieces that could be improved is the ventilation (very stuffy in the room), and the water pressure.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location, Location, Location, and Value
Summary: My family stayed over Veteran's Day weekend for our Disney vacation.  The hotel is across the street from the south-west end of California Adventure.  From the balcony in front of our room, we had a wonderful view of California Screamin' and Mickey's Fun Wheel, as well as the nightly fireworks at Disneyland.  The entrance to both parks is an easy and safe 15-20 minute walk along tree-lined and well lit Disneyland Drive.  Parking at the hotel is $10/night.  Our room faced busy South West Avenue and the vehicle noise definitely penetrated the walls/windows, but I did not hear any noise from the adjacent rooms.  I used earplugs and slept well.  The interior facing rooms may be quieter.    The room and bathroom were clean and nicely decorated.  The beds were comfortable and the
Manager Response: none

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel. I'm a Disney runner and we stay either here or at the Disney Grand. This hotel caters to runners and even has breakfast at 4am so that we can get a little something before our runs. The breakfast is nice lots to chose from and is always well stocked. Rooms are neat, clean and very comfortable. I am one picky person. It is within walking distant to Downtown Disney and the parks so you don't have to bother with shuttle services and the staff is always helpful and willing to do whatever it takes to make sure your stay is a great one. Did I mention I really like this hotel?
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is nice, room clean.  Stayed during a RunDisney event so parking was terrible.  Cars making own parking spaces. Breakfast was okay.  Waffles were cold and flimsy but eggs and sausage were good.  The one staffer worked hard to keep food stocked so kudos to her. Check in and out was easy. Location is good and kids watched fireworks from just outside room door.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place is actually better than average but not quite at the "very good" rating.  We were there with 14 people (7 children), so we had 4 rooms that faced the California Adventure park.  It is an easy 10-15 minute walk to downtown Disney from the hotel (the Disney Grand Californian hotel actually encourages people to walk through their lobby to get there) and the staff at Stovall's was very helpful.  Breakfast is included - nothing spectacular but certainly saves you a lot of time and money.  Overall a decent place to stay for your Disney vacation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The plus is really only the great location next to Disney.  It's a short walk right to Paradise Pier Hotel and Downtown Disney.  Otherwise the rooms are basic and average.  The walls are way too paper thin and you can hear everything.  The free breakfast is nice but not very good.  Parking is $10.  Overall it's  okay but we probably won't be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When I go to Disneyland, I usually book my stay with Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn. I choose this place because I already know what it is like and how convenient it really is. Plus, the room is nicely decorated and quite comfortable/clean. I did notice they upgraded the style of the room since I last came (I think it was five years ago).   The room has a microwave, a fridge, coffee/tea maker (single cup), a/c, and HDTV. The bed was also comfortable. The only problem I had was that the a/c was noisy when I left it on while asleep. It woke me up twice when it turned on and that's when I just turned on the fan. Also, when I arrived, the TV was not working. I had to call the front desk who immediately sent someone to fix it.  I property is clean and well kept. The free continental
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a family reunion at Disneyland and all stayed at the Best Western Stovall and it was wonderful. I would stay there again.Great Location.  Great food.  Quit.  Breakfast had a good variety.  they put all our rooms together!  Great and friendly staff  Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have written many reviews on here and this is the first time I am perplexed.  The location of this hotel is perfect.  It is across the street from disneyland...not much better.  The rooms are adequate, but that is all.  They are clean, large enough, and quiet.  The hotel is really a motel, and for 100 that close to disneyland it is a steal!!!  I don't like 10 dollars for parking, that is a ripoff!   The breakfast was greAt, bacon, eggs, bagels, coffee, juice, can't go wrong.  If you are staying one to two nights it is a great find.  If you are staying longer I would look for other options üòÑ
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location and value for money
Summary: My family and I had a great time at Stovell's Inn. It is close to Disneyland- an easy 10 minute walk and close to a couple of eateries. The pool and lawn area is very well maintained. The breakfast is very generous and a great start to the day! You won't regret staying at the Inn, it's great value for money!
Manager Response: none

Summary: People who are looking for hotels in the area are all Disneyland visitors. And BEST WESTERN PLUS Stovall's Inn is a very good choice. Big bath attached room, enough towels, coffee & tea making facilities and a remarkable breakfast.   Taxi would cost 10$ to Disney & 8$ back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: favorite Anaheim hotel; best customer service ever!
Summary: I have stayed at Stovall's (and their sister properties) more times than I can count over the years, and have had another stay for my annual Disneyland birthday/holidays trip planned for December; this short stay (one night only) was born of me ending up hospitalized with a life-threatening illness over the summer. I needed something to look forward to whilst recovering from surgery in the hospital, so I started planning a short trip to Anaheim for Halloween for my mom and I. (This is relevant to reviewing the hotel, I promise :) )  Everything during this stay was excellent as always. Check-in went smoothly even though we checked in relatively late on a day that was certainly very busy due to Mickey's Halloween Party going on at Disneyland that night. We were given a spotlessly
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland and is close to some convenience stores and food places as well. The breakfast had a pretty good variety of food to offer. If you don't keep the thick set of curtains closed people can see right into your room as they walk past. There was a decent kitchenette in the room as well as plenty of storage space for clothes and a large enough space that there is room for kids to play without being super cooped up. The hotel also had a laundry room which was very useful if you need to clean clothes. Only problem we had was our room keys kept deactivating which was a pain having to go back and forth from reception all the time to get new ones.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Located a few blocks away from Downtown Disney, it¬¥s a really good option. If you don¬¥t feel like walking you could take the ART bus that stops just outside the entrance.  Breakfast is good, if you're not picky. If you are, there¬¥s a Coco¬¥s next to the hotel and also a Denny's a block away.  The Staff is really nice, The rooms can be a little noisy, but not to much. Also you can get a decent look at the fireworks from the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was pretty basic, about a 20-30 minute walk from Disneyland entrance.  Could see fireworks everynight from the pool area.  Restaurant on the property was pretty good (Cocos) and  it is a must to try the pie there!!  The included breakfast was ok, all the basics there.  Room pretty small but good enough to crash in!  Definite downfall was pay parking, although from what I understand most of the hotels in the area are like that, and it was cheaper than most (If I remember right, it was $10/day)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice rooms, fast check in. Had a good fee breakfast. Was within Walking distance to Disneyland and downtown Disney shops. Close to good restaurants and other sites in case you forgot anything. Was able to watch the evening fireworks from our room as well. Only down fall was you had to pay extra to park at your hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very comfortable, but noisy and parking can be challenging.  Neighbors were having a love fest and adjoining doors provided no sound barrier.  Very uncomfortable for family situation!  Thankfully, they allowed me to park next to front desk, but parking close to our room would have been better.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good hotel close to Anahem disney
Summary: The check in was easy, staff were very friendly.  The breakfast was OK.  Overall stay for good.  there is a restaurant close by for dinner.  there are some small shopping complex for basic necessities, in case you forget anything.  we stayed two nights.  Very close to Disneyland.  Walking distance less than a mile. We walked to Disney.  We will stay at this place again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great staff, clean comfortable beds and rooms, hot breakfast, I highly recommend Stovall's Inn! The rooms include an iron, blow dryer, micro, fridge, coffee maker, and the parking is safe, I really enjoyed my stay! Best place to stay near Disneyland, absolutely the best!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Non Disney Property, but very good
Summary: Hi,   We just stayed the last 2 nights at this hotel , and yes we'd go back again.  We were 2 signal lights away from the Grand Californian ( which is how you can enter DCA/Downtown Disney or Disneyland).  Myself, husband, and 23 year old son shared the room.  We really did just sleep and shower here ...and the room had everything we needed. Free WiFi, Free in room coffee & tea, microwave & small fridge.  Flat screen TV, toiletries, clean room & bathroom!       Bonus:  We could step out and see the fireworks show from Disneyland ....at no extra charge for "Fireworks View".  We walked each day & night, very doable as well.  We have previously stayed at Grand Californian twice, Paradise Pier once, and quite a few times at the Disneyland Hotel.  I've loved them all too!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good Hotel at a Fair Price
Summary: We stay at this hotel each time we head to Disneyland. We used to stay at a Best Western across from Disneyland entrance but like this one has two beds instead of a sofa bed.   I would recommend staying at this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the price paid, we were very satisfied.  Rooms were well kept, exterior areas and pool areas were clean, the free breakfast was as expected for the price.  Breakfast consisted of eggs, a breakfast meat and either waffles or potatoes, although not the best , it was not bad either, just enough to start the day.  We had no need to contact any staff as all of our needs were met.  All of the staff we did pass by always said hi or good morning.  Area felt safe and well lit and there is a restaurant next door.  The Disneyland bus stops right in front of property and the airport shuttles just across the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We found this place to be a great starting point for our holiday in Anaheim. Each day we could walk to the disney parks and Cocos on the corner provided sone good dinners. Continental breakfast included eggs and sausages. The food wasnt that great but as its part of the hotel costs you just cant complain. Rooms were clean. But the air conditioner was noisy. Overall we were very happy with this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location- 10 minutes walk to Disney Parks. Due to renovations, hotel pool only opened 9-6, and Laundry 9-9, most people at The Parks at this time.  Booked for 5, only had bedding for 4, advised reception, he wanted a argument, I just wanted another bed. We ended up 3 and 2 in the beds, sleeping across as we had slightly more space that way. Musty smell in the room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Family fun at a good price
Summary: If you don't mind being surrounded by a lot of kids, you can't beat a place like this. The rooms and facilities are priced right and ideal for families of groups. The hotel has two nice pools and a big breakfast room. Breakfast is included but don't expect fancy food. The restaurant next door is great! (Coco's). Rooms are very nice and the beds are excellent. It is right across the street from California Adventure and the shuttle bus takes only a few minutes to get you to Disneyland. You can get a shuttle to and from from LAX for $17 p.p. each way. It is easy and no fuss.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are a family oriented hotel and yes you will find a lot of families with small children. The adult and kids love our Topiary garden. Coco‚Äôs restaurant has very delicious pies too!! We can help with any shuttle information that you may have. See you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is a basic hotel very close walking distance to Disneyland. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and efficient - not super large but worked for us as we were barely in the room. The breakfast was ok enough food just not super amazing. I would def come back here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location, but the rate is a little stiff
Summary: Over all, the hotel is clean, safe, and at a good central location.  I only recommend to stay here if you're planning on going to Disneyland since it's within walking distant to it.  If you're not going to Disneyland, then move further away to adjacent cities where the rate is a lot cheaper. They charge $10 for parking which I didn't mind, but the rate was so high already they should've included parking too.  Hot continental breakfast is typical, but they need to move the food cart away from being right next to the Women's restroom door.  I lost my appetite when I was getting scrambled egg, a lady came out of the restroom with her hands wet and she tried to shark them off.  Gross!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations.  It was clean, the staff was friendly and it was very close to the Disneyland Theme Park.  Great value for the price paid especially since it included breakfast. They do charge for parking, but it is reasonable considering the alternative to parking in the Disneyland lot. Very comfortable and the staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient to Disney and Convention Center
Summary: Employees were very nice and check in process was quick. The rooms were super clean. One morning, I put the do not disturb sign on my door and the housekeeper came in evening to check to see if I needed any new towels. The d√©cor in the room was plain. Furniture, carpet, walls and bedding is dark brown so the room tended to be dark. I was inclined to open the window curtains but too many people would walk by and look in. I kept the curtains closed and used the lights.  Residents tended to hang out on the balcony and talk. You could hear their conversations through the walls. One evening I called the front desk and they said they would send security to ask them to quiet down. It seemed to work. This hotel had everything I needed and continental breakfast. Although the pool wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. The south pool and spa are open for our guest to use. Please check the front desk for pool hours. We also keep letters in the rooms to keep you informed IF we have any changes. We do hope that you come and visit us again soon. Once the pool area is finished it will look amazing!

Summary: We booked 2 rooms and with a little help from the Manager was able to have them right next door.  Rooms were large with microwave, lots of tea and coffee, refrigerator.  TV remote did not work but staff arrived in 5 minutes to fix problem!  Pool and spa only open 9 to 6 due to construction.  Don't think this will take long to complete.  They did start at 8am which was ok due to the fact we wanted breakfast..quite adequate..and to get to Park.  Short walk to Grand Californian Hotel and entrance to California Adventure Park.  Gorgeous lights on walkway trees on walk back at night. Tiffy's and CoCO restaurants a short walk away.  Would highly recommend this hotel for families and those with limited budget.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself while staying with us. We hope to see you and your family soon!

Summary: I recommend this hotel as a nice average hotel. I is great if you need to save money also. The rooms are clean and neat and right across from Disneyland. They have a few big rooms, but you need to book them very early and have good parking spaces for your car. The morning meal is free and has basic foods, although you can order different food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that all the accommodations that we offer were adequate for your stay.

Summary Heading: construction on pools and no hot tub
Summary: when booking room not informed that construction was going on the pools with no hot tubs available.then informed we could walk to the sister hotel sign in at the desk to get a card to use their pool turn around and walk back wet.  also pool construction started at 8 in the morning with jackhammers and concrete blocks being thrown into a metal pin right by the hotel rooms. as expected staff could care less will not be staying here again would recommend that if you want a hotel with a hot tub and a quiet surroundings do not stay here until 2015
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have the south pool and spa that is available for our guests to use. We also have our sister property available for our guests to use if they prefer to stay till late. Check with the front desk for pool hours. We start any loud construction after 9am. The finish product will look amazing.

Summary: When we are in the Disneyland area, this is the only place we will stay. Always clean, great staff and the breakfast room always have what we like to eat. The pool area is being remodeled right now, so the pool is only open from 9am to 6pm, due to lighting issues at this time. We are looking forward to seeing the pool are once the remodel is finished and the new exercise room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We really appreciate your understanding. Our pool area will include a gym and lots more. We hope that you do come back and visit us again and you get a chance to see the pool remodeled. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Great location, perfect for a family
Summary: I have used the Stovall Inn for many trips to Anaheim. The hotel is across the street from the Disney California Adventure. There is shuttle service to the entrance of Disneyland/California Adventure ( for a slight fee) that is convenient and picks up and drops off right in front of the hotel. Courteous staff and the free breakfast is sufficient to get you going for the busy day. Rooms are clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very excited to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: Stayed here for the first time for our latest trip to Disneyland.  Nice friendly staff with nice d√©cor.  I was able to do a pre check-in after arriving in Anaheim at 7am to leave our car at the hotel.  We even had a little breakfast before heading to the park.  The hotel was booked solid but I asked for a 1st floor room which to my relief was provided because after a long day at the park, lugging our stuff up the stairs or multiple trips on the elevator would have been an unappealing task.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy you check you in early when available. Sometimes it‚Äôs hard due to sold out situations. See you guys again soon!

Summary: When we first arrived- we were booked into a smoking room by mistake- a trainee at the desk told me she could not change the room because they were full- all while someone next to me was booking a new reservation for the same night!! the main desk attendant did come over and in 1 minute fixed the problem- very awesome! my non smoking room was nice- air conditioner wall unit let down moisture on to the microwave cords and coffee machine -which is why the coffee machine didn't work- kinda worried me about fire danger. We also had a strange dripping noise that occurred when adjacent rooms showered-very annoying. Room also slightly smelt of smoke-ew. Breakfast was good- other guest nice- overall condition was nice enough. If you need a budget friendly hotel this one is good-next
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that we were able to move you to a non smoking room. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here during our first time trip to Disneyland.  The location was great.  It was a short 10 minute walk to the theme parks.  The rooms were clean and beautiful. The breakfast on the other hand was extremely busy.  We stayed here mainly because of the breakfast and we only ate there on the first day. It was much easier to just go out and get breakfast then deal with that madness. I wasn't too impressed with the air conditioning unit in the wall.  It didn't seem like it was cooling our room as well.  When we had it off it seemed like our room was a bit muggy. It was tolerable.  The microwave, coffee maker, and fridge were a plus. We enjoyed the pools and hot tubs, even though they had just started the new construction and had one pool closed my family did get to enjoy
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through downtown Disney. We are very excited to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We do hope that next time you visit you can see our new and improved pool area.

Summary: The stay at the Best Western Stovall's Inn was nice, no complaints with room or morning breakfast. The Best Western was within walking distance of Disneyland main entrance. The Best Western did charge $10.00 per day for parking. Hmmmm.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: If you are looking for a place to stay with your kids going to Disneyland, this place will do.   But for a business traveler, stay away.   The walk to the Convention Center is short, 5-10 minutes, but could be a problem in poor weather.   Rooms can be noisy due to children.   Rooms are dark, windows open to the walkway.   Internet did not work.   I recommend the Hilton, Marriott or Red Lion for conventioneers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: For a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland this is a great price! The hotel is very clean and it includes breakfast!! The bath and toilet is separate from the mirror area so great for families. The rooms also have a little fridge, coffee maker and microwave in them. This is not our first stay in this hotel and it will not be our last!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.  Yes, all of our rooms come with a fridge, microwave, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and board. A lot of our guests love these amenities because they say that a lot of the hotels in the area don‚Äôt offer them at all. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: It's nice to be able to go to hotel in these days and feel safe.  Staff is very friendly and helpful with your needs.  Rooms are beautiful done and meets all your needs for your family and you.  We are looking forward to stay again at this hotel.What a wonderful place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the Front desk know to keep up the great job that they are doing. See you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights. We have stayed here many times over the last couple of years. Room 1 was good until about 1:00a on the 2nd night the toilet started to back up into the tub. They sent maintenance guy up with plunger and snake. He was pleasant but could not unclog. Option was to stay in room with no bathroom or change rooms. As they could not say when plumber would arrive and we planned early day at DL we opted to change rooms. They sent security guy up but he could not give us new keys until we gave back old keys so it was kinda of a rush move. Security guy was nice as well but this is the policy I guess. I went down to the front desk the next morning and they took off the parking for our stay. Room 2 was smaller and more dated. Could barely open fridge. Pillows were
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. It‚Äôs unfortunate that you had toilet issues. I‚Äôm glad that the front desk and security were able to assist you with another room. When visiting the Anaheim area we hope that you come to the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The hotel is your standard 50/60s era property, but thoroughly updated. The rooms are high quality with modern white linens and refurbished bathrooms. The fridge and microwave were handy, and the on-demand video made getting ready with a toddler easy when we could magically produce Mickey Mouse cartoons instantly. Having Coco's as a partner for room service was great (and reasonably priced!) and the collection of pools kept the toddler happy as well. But the best part was the breakfast. Every day had eggs and potatoes and bagels and toast and cereal and so on, and then there was ham or sausage to go with it. It made a full meal to start the day, saving us some welcome cash in the park (easily $20 a day!). It's a bit of a walk to the park, but taking the monorail in was fun and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We did remodel the rooms, breakfast room and the lobby. Our next project is the pool area. Once it‚Äôs done it‚Äôs going to look amazing. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities that we offer here. The ‚Äúsky train‚Äù train ride is amazing and fun. See you guys soon!

Summary: We recently spent 4 nights at the Stovall's Inn - fantastic location, good, clean room, nice pools and breakfast. Our room was on the ground floor, away from the pool area which was perfect.  It's within walking distance from the park (15 mins) or a 6 minute ride on the ART which stops right outside!  Overall a great spot to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for all the nice things you have to say of the Best Western Plus Stovalls Inn. We hope that you have found a place that makes you feel like home.  See you soon!

Summary: I stayed here for a week with my two children. Comfy beds and clean rooms. The staff were helpful. They are close to disneyland and also have an ART bus stop - we used this service and it was great. They have a coffee maker in the room but don't provide milk. I am a tea with milk and sugar girl. The milk they do have is not full cream milk but there is a shop close by. The breakfast is good but not worth having everyday - gets very busy at times and I can only eat scrambled eggs so many times. I also don't eat doughnuts for breakfast.  I would stay there again if we return to the USA
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I hope that you and your kids had a wonderful time while staying with us. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: We got this hotel through costco vacations.  We requested a king and got 2 doubles. They oversold their non smoking rooms. None of the documents reference additional parking charges.    When we got the room,there were stains on the bed.  We will contact costco disneyland tomorrow since it's late Sunday already.    Finally my mom booked a hotel only reservation through costco best western. Best western canceled the reservation.  She lost her non smoking room and had to re book a smoking room at a higher rate.  What great costcobest western customer service
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I hope that we were able to assist in the whole reservation mishap. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the BW Plus Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: We last visited Stovall's Inn about 7 years ago, so we knew it was well located for a few days at Disneyland. The rooms look as though they have been recently renovated, and they are certainly big enough for two people. One part that hasn't been upgraded is the dining room, in fact it looked as though some of the food may have been 7 years old! Staff weren't particularly friendly, and didn't look too happy either. But Stovall's served its purpose, and I'd probably stay there again cause you know what you're gonna get.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We did remodel the rooms and the breakfast room. It was expanded to fit more guests and new items were added to the breakfast. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim are you come to the BW Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for 6 nights to see Disneyland and other attractions. Exceptionally friendly staff, especially Justin, humble helpful nothing too much trouble. Rooms spacious and comfortable. Pool was lovely and very refreshing and clean. Great laundry facilities. rooms Recently upgraded, and perfect for busy families on the go. Very close to Disneyland, buses regularly picking up out front which we opted for as we did enough walking at Disney!!  Breakfast was more than enough to get you started in the morning. Can't wait to come back and stay here again, wouldn't hesitate!! Thank you for the wonderful memories :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you and your daughter had a wonderful time while staying with us. I will make sure and tell Justin and the front desk staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Just stayed for 5 nights with my husband and daughter.  Great location if you are heading to the Disneyland parks - you can walk there.  Overall stay pretty good - pluses were they also have a pool and laundry facilities.  Breakfast room in the morning is a really busy but this is what you expect when breakfast is included for all guests and they were also full when we stayed.  Definitely recommend as it is reasonably priced, location is great and you have lots of dining options close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very glad to hear that you and your family had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Hotel in good walking distance to downtown Disney and disneyland 10 minutes walk cutting thru Disney California.  Rooms noisy from above if you have a ground floor and internet did not work at all.  Reception helpful as shower broken and they got maintenance onto it straight away.  Breakfast was not what we would eat but we did grab fruit on the way to theme parks.  Swimming pool nice.  Washing from room went missing and no one knew what happened to it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovalls Inn for you lodging needs.

Summary: The most important reason to choose this motel was its location so close to Disneyland. It only takes a 10 minutes walk to Disneyland downtown and the main entrance to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure park. Only need to cross two streets and walk among some beautiful palm trees. The motel was easy to reach, lots of parking space and the room was clean and tidy. The (free) wifi was a bit patchy, possibly because we were quite far towards the end of the building. The stay included breakfast. Quality was good, though it looked a bit messy with many people in a small space. However, can recommend this motel for anybody.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast. There‚Äôs plenty for everyone to choose from. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: very nice staff and beds. OK swimming pool. Close to Disney to walk to but it is pretty long if you go back and forth several times a day...Breakfast had a lot of options. It was a good experience compared to other hotels in the area. Not noisy and well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: waling distance to park entrance/clean  and friendly
Summary: Traveling alone;this hotel was safe, clean and in a great location near 2 restaurants .  Side walks  made it easy to get around.  Coffee in the room a big plus when coming from the east coast. Nice clean pool area.  Walkways to Disneyland made it extremely easy to get to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed all of our amenities that we offer. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Great room at a reasonable rate
Summary: We were really impressed with the hotel.  It was clean, recently updated, the pool was great, there was a Coco's on the property that was great.  The rooms were great and comfortable.  The staff was knowledgeable about the area.  The location was awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the whole staff know to keep up the great job that they are doing! The Coco‚Äôs restaurant is very good especially their pies. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: Everyday room service went through our belongings and stole Medications, candy bars, and who knows what else. Management still hasn't gotten back to me and its been 2 weeks, My trip was pretty much ruined because all my stomach and shoulder pain meds were stolen. Bathrooms do not have fans or vents, kind of sucks when you have 4 people in a small room. Air conditioning unit was broken and refrigerator would only cool half the time so was only good for drinks, to risky for food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was good value for the money, limiting that they only offer a double bed option, but the rooms were clean and newly renovated (it seemed), breakfast included was ideal when trying to get off to Disneyland in a timely matter. The front desk staff was very professional, accommodating, and pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up the GREAT job that they are doing. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed breakfast in the morning. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: A good hotel with a great location for Disney land ! Rooms were equipped with everything i may have needed and were modern, clean and comfy !  The only down fall was the air con was slightly noisy but I slept perfectly fine with it on  If I ever went back to Anaheim I would definitely stay again !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Friendly helpful staff, in a good location to walk to Disneyland through Downtown  Disney, shuttle at door if needed but close enough to walk, rooms were very clean and beds extremely comfortable - good pool area - highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and mention to the whole staff to keep the great job that they are doing. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Was given room next to the linen room & maids smoked like trains in there even though it was a non-smoking area. Room smelled like mold & found 2 cockroaches in bathroom. One by toilet & 1 in towel. GROSS! Asked to be moved to another room. The rooms are dark & dingy and the AC system is more like a loud swamp cooler. Even though you ask for a non smoking area guests still smoke all around. You can't get away from it. The area was a short walk from Disneyland and the breakfast was great which was the only positive about this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you letting us know how your stay was with us. The staff has a designated area on where to smoke. All of our rooms are checked by supervisors before they are given to our guests. We hope that the front desk was able to assist you with another room. We hope that when you come and visit the Anaheim area you come the Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights it was so close to disneyland and downtown Disney which was awsome. The staff were very accommodating and help us if we had anything needed or fixed the staff were freindly and helpful. The free breakfast was awsome great restaurants around the accommodation as well I will recommend this Inn to people
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. The whole staff is excited to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We appreciate all the business you send to us. See you guys again soon!

Summary: My husband and I stayed 4 nights at this hotel and were very satisfied with our stay.  We appreciated the plentiful breakfast and having different hot options each day.  We wish we would have had more time to enjoy the pool as that area was really nice.  Beds were super comfy and A/C was effective.  We did have a little inconsistency with our key card which required us to return to front desk for a new one but that only happened one time.  They were painting the sidewalks but it was not inconvenient for our room.  Our room was clean and we loved having a small fridge and microwave.  The shampoo and conditioner seemed to be low quality so I was happy we brought our own.  I would have been just fine if I hadn't though.  The walk wasn't too bad at all to get to the parks and seemed
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your stay with us. Yes, the breakfast has plenty of choices for everyone to pick from. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Stayed here for the Disneyland Half Marathon.
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here very much.  We were on the third floor of the main building.  It was a king room with a microwave and mini fridge.  I thought the room was really nice.  To use the tv remote we had to be right in front of the tv.  That was kind of a pain.  But a very small complaint in the scheme of things.  The breakfast had a nice variety.  It took us 10 to 15 minutes to walk to the parks.  That was at a leisurely pace.  Took about the same amount of time to walk to the starting line for the races.  The staff was friendly.  We lost a couple dollars in the vending machine and they refunded the money.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that Justin was able to assist you with your group. We are also very excited to hear that you enjoyed the hotel amenities.  We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary Heading: BEST HOTEL IF TRAVELING TO DISNEYLAND
Summary: We have loved our stay and experience at the Best Western Stovals in California. We will never stay anywhere else!!! Justin has helped us twice this year in our trips to Disneyland.  We had 33 in our group, everyone loved the location, free breakfast, the swimming pools, and the staff.  They all are so nice, helpful, and really add to your vacation experience
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. It‚Äôs wonderful to know that you have chosen us to stay while on your vacation. We are glad that Justin accommodated you with a group and that everyone was happy. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Location was great. The room was filthy and had a very bad odor (moldy smell)! Bathroom was clean, as for the "recent" renovations...don't believe it. I selected this hotel based on the TripAdvisor reviews and I was disappointed. :(  Also, the room had a very dark feel to it (dark, dirty carpets and dark dusty curtains).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very surprised that your room was not cleaned properly. Please notify us right away and we can switch your room. We just changed our carpet in all the rooms. Every day the Housekeeping Supervisors check all the room and they make sure that they carpets are not dirty. Please make sure that you call us right away when you have any concerns in your room so we can take care of them right away. Don‚Äôt wait till check out. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Staff was responsive to issues and handled all promptly.  If you have a concern, you have to address it. Don't expect the staff to be mindreaders. Kids loved the pool and breakfast was better the continental advertised. Room was quiet and conveniently located for our needs
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, any concerns that you have we can help. We hope that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. Hope to see you again!

Summary: Stayed two nights, found the staff very helpfull, the room was clean, the pool and spa area more than adequate . And Anaheim a clean and very safe place.Stayed in many hotels on our trip and this was the least expensive but the most enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. How about the fireworks were you able to see them? They are amazing! We do hope to see you again!

Summary: I rented two rooms for myself and my family for our Disney vacation at the end of July.  The rooms were very comfortable and the continental breakfast was really nice.  The ease of getting the bus to Disney right in front of the hotel lobby was so convenient.  I would have preferred adjoining rooms, but we were only two doors down from each other. Only noise I heard was from the Disney fireworks. Very helpful staff.  I'd use this hotel again.
