Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel. Yes, we do have the ART Transit which can take you to the parks, shopping and dining. It comes on a scheduled time. It comes around approximately every 20 minutes starting at the hour. It‚Äôs available at a minimal fee. The fireworks show at Disney is fabulous. You can sometimes see them from your room depending on what side you are at. The best place to see them is by the pool. I will make sure and let the staff know to keep up the great work that they are doing. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Clean and within walking distance of Disney
Summary: We stayed two nights. Check-in was easy. Room was clean. Pool was clean. Staff were all friendly. We had no real problems at all, other than the air conditioner condensation leaking onto the microwave...we just put a towel on top of it.  As far as 'hotel' breakfasts go, this was pretty good. At first I wondered why the breakfast eating area was so large, then we went to eat about 9 am and found out why...very busy. So if you eat breakfast there...which I would recommend....go early. It was also an easy walk to Disney...just about 15 mins to Downtown Disney (entry to Disney Land park from there). I would rate this excellent if they didn't charge $10/night for parking.    It seems there is NOWHERE to go in Southern California without paying for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. Most of the properties here in the area are charging and parking fee or resort fee. Some of them charge for both. We have the cheapest parking fee in the area. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Stayed in this hotel with my daughter and granddaughter on a visit to Disney to see the princesses.  Check-in was very quick and organized and when I asked if we could see the fireworks from our balcony, we were quickly moved to the other side so that we could.  We had also requested the 3rd floor and were put there without a problem.  Breakfast every morning was plentiful with hot and cold choices.  When they ran out of fruit it was replenished quickly without a problem.  My grandaughter is 5 and walked to and from Disney every day after spending many hours there.  The walk is pleasant and very 'doable.' There is a small fridge and microwave in the room but not really any grocery stores within walking distance.  However, plenty of restaurants are available in the area.  The ART
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you and your granddaughter had the best time ever here and at the parks. We are glad that you we were able to make your memorable for you guys! See you again!

Summary: I was here for the Disneyland Half Marathon and had heard good things about this hotel. The room was dark and crawling with silverfish bugs. There were cobwebs in the corners. Dirty carpet. Couldn't change rooms because they were booked for the half marathon weekend. As I was leaving one day around noon, I stopped at the front desk and asked if my room could be cleaned while I was out. I was told they would call housekeeping and have it cleaned "right now." I returned two hours later and my room hadn't been touched. I had previously made reservations for next year's Tinker Bell Half Marathon weekend, but I will be canceling and staying somewhere else. The thought of staying here again makes me cringe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on your marathon! Our housekeepers take good care of the rooms. We just put in new carpet in all of our rooms. The rooms get inspected by our housekeeping supervisor to make sure all the room are clean, We do hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location for walking to the races at Disneyland. Nothing special about the room but it was clean and quiet (3rd floor). Water pressure wasn't the greatest and internet could have been quicker but overall was a good experience. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations to you for running the race! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you are going to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed for three nights while visiting Disneyland. Very convenient a ten minute walk (maybe 20mins if you dawdle) Rooms clean and good space for our family of four. They have a fridge and microwave which was helpful. Breakfast is basic -good bagels and well maintained. The kids loved the pool. The adjacent restaurant was convenient and great value.    We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. All of your rooms have microwave, fridge, coffeemaker, hair dryer, iron and board. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. See you again!

Summary: Our room was very comfortable and clean.  Very comfy beds. Staff was not very helpful or friendly.  Very convenient to Disneyland.  This also means you hear the fireworks at night.  I would stay there again, but hope that the staff will be better.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope you give us another opportunity to deliver Legendary Customer Service.

Summary: Quick and friendly service, great hot breakfast daily.  Rooms were a tad dark decor...but we only slept and showered there.  Loved that a daily pass for the ART bus was available at a low rate.  LONG walk back from Disney after a long day walking the parks! The beds were also REALLY comfortable!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that you liked staying at the hotel. See you soon!

Summary: Six months ago, Booked two rooms on same reservation. Requested adjoining rooms, at the very least near each other.  Was given rooms in two different buildings on 1st and 3rd floor! Wanted to be able to help w/3 month old child.   Oversold parking by at least 15 cars, at $10/car.  Asked to speak w/manager, told there wasn't one. Was put in handicap room, quite inconvenient for able bodies. Would not change room.  Asked for extra towel..nope! Asked for foam pillows..nope. Giving two stars, only because of location.. And updated rooms. Terrible customer service...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have the Disneyland Half Marathon in town so that‚Äôs the reason why we are so busy. Parking can get pretty busy but if you need help finding a spot just ask the front desk and we can assist. We have plenty of extra amenities so if you ask for towels or pillows we can get them to you right away. We apologize if we weren‚Äôt able to get you adjoining or together due to being busy. We are very good in accommodating our guests but sometimes it can be difficult. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The service was great.  The location near the Disneyland hotel is the reason why I choose to stay at this precise location.  I will always stay at this location as long as there is availability.  Parking fee I feel should be waived or perhaps a little lower.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Excellent location, service, cleanliness, prompt, immediate and courteous staff!  I really enjoyed staying at this place. It is close to Disneyland and within walking distance to most amenities within the Disney Resort and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the staff know to keep up the great job that they are doing. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. See you soon!

Summary: This hotel was very well maintained. Newly remodeled, well everything i believe. The locations was the best part, this hotel is right behind California adventures. We could see the Ferris  wheel from our hotel room. and it was only 30-40 minutes from all the fun things in L.A. , like universal studios.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you loved the lobby. It does look very nice! It‚Äôs about a 10-15 minute to the parks through Downtown Disney. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Great value, clean, close to Disney
Summary: I thought the Stovall's Inn was an excellent value. Very well-maintained, pleasant staff, lovely pools (one heated, one not), great price. And you can't really get closer to the Disney parks without being on a Disney property. It was a pleasant walk to Downtown Disney and the park entrances (cut through Disney Grand Californian). I'm so glad we found this hotel! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. It‚Äôs great to hear that you had a great time at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: 2 pools, 2 hot tubs, and full breakfast!
Summary: Our family loves this hotel when we go to Disneyland Resort.  They have 2 pools, 2 hot tubs, and a full breakfast to start a long day of walking and fun!  The staff is always friendly and accommodating, the ART bus comes right out front every 15 minutes for a reasonable price, there is poolside service from Coco's, and the air condition works excellent!  We would highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we do have two pools and spas. The hotel does have room and poolside service with Coco‚Äôs restaurant. The Art transit is a shuttle that can take you to the parks, shopping and dining. There is a fee to use the shuttle. We hope that you had a wonderful time and see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here in August - three generations sharing two rooms which had adjoining doors.  We were on the ground floor.  The room, as described on other reviews, was dark as have been refurbished in dark brown colours.  We needed the lights on all the time, but hey, the electricity was free. The air con worked but was a little noisy.  Other than that, the room was clean, with daily housekeeping and had a fridge and microwave and large TV.   The room was a little cramped, but other than that, we were comfortable for the 2 weeks we stayed.  There was a free breakfast every morning from 6am til 10 am which included cereal, muffins/doughnuts/fruit and cooked option which changed daily on a 3 day rota - this was good but got a little boring when staying for 2 weeks.  The front desk
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that we were able to grant your request with your adjoining rooms. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Stop off on route to Hawaii
Summary: We wanted to take the kids ( 13 and 8) to Disney  , so chose this hotel for its location . We made a great choice for our needs .                                           It's a ten minute walk to the parks . Rooms are basic but clean . Breakfast was just something to get you going , plastic cups and plates and a bit of a free for all but , serves a purpose .  We weren't expecting frills , just a clean place to lay our heads after a long day and , that's what we got .!  Staff good , pools ok , coffee in the room . Took about an hour to get in central LA but , we thoroughly enjoyed our tour of the city .  I would describe it as a motel .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are glad to hear that you had a great time here before you headed out to Hawaii. Hope you can come and visit us again!

Summary: I stayed here with my family. We had good surprises and a bad surprise. First, we were very happy with the room. It was clean and very nice. The hotel is just a quick walk to Disneyland. People there were friendly. They have a clean pool with a clean spa. Overall my experience was very positive and the price was reasonable considering the location and what others charge in that area. You definitely feel safe and happy to bring your family including kids. Restaurants are everywhere and you can walk to basically anything. The place was very well maintained. Our room was quite and I had no problem sleeping. Our room had a standard TV, AC and alarm clock.  Good surprises: I thought it would be your standard continental breakfast that includes coffee and a doughnut or coffee and a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It‚Äôs great that you enjoyed staying at the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We do charge 10.00 for parking. We do have the lowest parking charge in the area. Some charge up to 30.00 per night. We don‚Äôt add the parking fee with the rate because we don‚Äôt tax the parking fee. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney.We are a family oriented hotel and we hope that you come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: I was in town for business, and this hotel was very nice.  The room was super clean and nicely decorated, the staff was very friendly and helpful, and the property was just lovely.  It is obvious they take tremendous care in making this place a nice experience.  The nightly fireworks over Disney was a fun, unexpected surprise, and I had a great view from my room.  I felt very safe at this hotel, and would definitely stay again if in town again.  The only bad thing I could say is the waffles at breakfast tasted a bit stale.  The rest of breakfast was very good, and the dining room was clean.  Great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and the whole staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. The fireworks are very nice to see every night especially if you‚Äôre at the pool. You have a wide view. See you again soon!

Summary: This was such a nice little hotel right across from the park. Just a short walk across the street to both parks.  It is obviously a little packed most of the time, but you are going to get that anywhere near the parks.  The continental breakfast is great, and the pools are even nice. Rooms are great too! I definitely recommend staying here for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: I had a wonderful experience staying at the best western. I arrived only booking a 1 bedroom and had changes on my end where I needed 2 bedrooms and the staff was quick to accommodate for the two of us. Great location; about a 20 mins walk to Disneyland park and 5 mins walk to the convention centre. The breakfast was good, oatmeal, bananas, apples, oranges, cereal, muffins, donuts, waffles, bacon, sausage, eggs, bread and drinks. Was a great variety! I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We also have two pools and spas. It‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast. See you soon!

Summary: 10 minute walk to Disneyland. The a/c worked, the room was clean. Some guests were very inconsiderate when returning late at night 12.30am to their rooms talking and shouting loudly very inconsiderate to others with young families. The outside soft drink machines didn‚Äôt work or were empty. The WIFI in the rooms was terrible but good if you walked down to the reception area which was a pain. Two double beds is also weird when you are a couple as it makes the room feel small. The included breakfast was nothing short of chaos. Being a large motel with a lot of families its probably to be expected. The staff did their best to keep the breakfast room clean but it was a stampede. Sometimes I think offering less choices of food is sometimes better and easier to control. Why not just
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We also have two pools and spas. It‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast. See you soon!

Summary: This hotel is just across the street from Disneyland on the southwest corner. It was a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland by taking a shortcut through the Grand California Hotel lobby and then through Downtown Disney. We avoided the parking fee at Disneyland, waiting for shuttles, etc. Also, we took a late afternoon break by walking back to the hotel, swimming and resting before walking back for the evening activities. The room was adequate and reasonable in price for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. It‚Äôs great to hear that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas after a long day at the parks. Hope to see you again!

Summary: After reading the reviews on this site we were actually quite disappointed with our visit. To start with the positives, the room was clean, large and had extremely comfortable beds. It was also only a short walk from Disney which was a major plus. However, that's about it.  When we arrived we were checked in by a receptionist clearly chewing gum, not the best first impression. The breakfast was the biggest disappointment, as my husband said, he's seen Truck stops with better food! It was more like an unruly canteen, where everyone crammed around a few tables with their paper plates. It was so bad we paid to eat out the rest of the week. It was like eating cardboard. When asked on check out if everything was ok with our stay, I complained about the breakfast which made another
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.

Summary: There is a full Hot breakfast in the morning, its a 10 minute walk to Disney Land through Downtown Disney, and there is also a restaurant right next door if you need something to eat during the day! Loved our stay there! Very convenient and would stay there again if we go back to Disney Land!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Our hot breakfast is ready every day for our guests to enjoy. See you soon!

Summary: This hotel was hands down the best hotel ever! It all started at the Check-In which was quick. The staff is also very very friendly.  The Free Breakfast was really good with hot chocolate, cereal and lots of other goods. The bed was awesome, never felt so good after that.  Pros - Close to Disneyland (walking distance) - Great Free Breakfast - Comfortable Bed  Cons - They need wider parking spaces
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Very nice hotel and close to Disney without the outlandish prices of a Disney resort.  Rooms are really clean and updated.  Pools are great for families.  The only complaint from us is the fridge doesn't have freezer section in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We have two pools and spas. We will make sure and keep that in mind about the freezer compartment for the fridges in the rooms. Maybe we can add this in the future. See you soon!

Summary: Rooms are nice and comfortable. We stayed in a double queen room. Plenty of towels for whole family to shower. Walked to a few restaurants down the street to get good food and yogurt.  The breakfast was great and the staff did a great job keeping it stocked, even when dealing with all of the families heading to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the staff know that they are doing and great job and to keep it up. We do hope that you have found a hotel to stay with while visiting the Anaheim area.

Summary: We were looking for somewhere close to Disneyland and was not disappointed by this motel. Clean and tidy with attractive rooms. Walking distance to Disneyland and an array of local eateries. Breakfast was a bit artificial (with powdered eggs!) but there was a diner next door that served decent food. A great location and family friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us.

Summary: This review is a little late, but I stayed here in Feb. 2014 with my 6 yr old daughter to go to Disneyland for the first time. The staff at reception checked us in quickly, my reservation was originally a king sized bed, but since they said I booked it through a third party they couldn't honor it, which kind of upset me, but ok. The room they gave me had 2 double beds which was fine, but it was hidden in a little dark corner with absolutely no natural light which I was not cool with. I went to ask for a different room and they promptly gave me a new one I was happy with. I wanted to mention how great and helpful all the staff is, from the front desk to the cleaning staff, who were always kind and friendly saying hi to me. The free breakfast buffet had lots of choices my daughter
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas. We do hope that on your next vacation you come and stay with us.

Summary Heading: Have no reservations about making reservations.
Summary: I've never stayed at a Best Western - this was the first time for us and the staff at Stovall's Inn made quite the impression. The first thing about the hotel we noticed was that it was very clean and orderly - it really helps the hotel fit in with the "Disney culture" - all the t's have been crossed and all the i's have been dotted.   ~ The Staff ~ The staff was extremely helpful and absolutely willing to attempt to accommodate any requests made by ourselves or other guests (relating to which floor we requested, the type of room we'd like, etc.).   ~ The Room ~  The room we booked, a standard room with a king size bed was well equipped with a decently-sized flat screen television, a mini fridge, microwave, and all the standard amenities (coffee maker, drinkware, ice container,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you stayed with us. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Excellent location for theme parks - 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney then another 10 to either California Adventure or Disneyland. Super quiet except for the Disneyland fireworks banging at 9.30 each night during summer but apparently you can get a good view of them from the pool area. Buffet breakfast wasn't anything to rave about but more than what a lot of places provide. Room was clean and tidy, plenty of parking, lovely helpful staff. We'd be happy to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Yes, every night at about 9:25 the Disneyland fireworks come out and it is fabulous. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Plus - Stovalls Inn in June 2014. Of course our primary reason was Disneyland. The closeness of the hotel to Disneyland was what drew us to this hotel, a five minute walk up the street and a great price. It was a huge plus when we were there as we were able to spend some time at Disneyland, come back for a nap and then return in the afternoon without any hassle.  We we're staying with our 3 year old daughter and had requested a double/double. The room was clean and tidy and didn't look as worn as others we have been in over our 35 days in the US. I requested a room on the top floor so we could see the fireworks and I wasn't disappointed! For four nights we ventured onto the balcony to watch the clearly visible fireworks from Disneyland, what a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that we were able to accommodate you with your request. It‚Äôs nice to hear that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas after a long day at the parks. See you again soon!

Summary: I actually was there only to sleep, shower and have breakfast as we stayed all day in Disney or somewhere else in LA. Breakfast was good, and after having breakfast you could just walk to Disneyland. Staff was very good and helped me with what I needed. Good hotel to sleep in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that we were able to accommodate you with a great room. A lot of our guests love our beds they say that it‚Äôs the best sleep that they have had in a very long time. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: the rooms were good and everything else but my camera got  "lost" in my room and apparently the service had nothing to do with it. If my camera had not disappeared this would have been a very pleasing experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I would have liked to have spoken to you about it. If you have any information call the hotel directly.

Summary Heading: do not go to best western Plus Stovall Inn
Summary: i am warning everybody out there do not go to the Best western hotel Stovall Inn located in Anaheim. It was the worst experience ever and if you and your family go over there , they will make mistakes and then never admit the error and fix the issue. STAY AWAY from this location and go to other hotel s on the strip. I have been to many hotels over the World and this was the worst experience ever.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a great hotel. Staff is wonderful, housekeeping does an amazing job. Pools are great for kids and adults with 2 jacuzzi's. Breakfast is good too! There are several restaurants in area and stores. Transit is right outside that takes you to Disneyland. Overall excellent Hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed you hotel and staff. We have to pools and spas. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Room was modern and a decent size.  Complimentary breakfast was a nice perk, though can be very busy.  The pools were fantastic!  Better than most in the area that we have seen.  The hotel is located about a 20 minute walk from the Disney gates.  You can either walk up Katella to Harbor, or go straight up Disneyland Drive (directly across from hotel) and cut through the Grand Californian to Downtown Disney.  We have stayed at better hotels location-wise, but you pay more for less of a hotel.  Stovall's Inn is a good value for the money spent.  Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk through Downtown Disney. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast in the morning.  Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Nice clean room with complimentary breakfast. Across the street from Disney and not a bad walk so you don't have to park. Great value for the cleanliness, proximity, and free breakfast. Would stay again if going to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We had a really good time at this hotel. It was close and convenient. Everyone was helpful, and the food provided was adequate for us to start our day - coffee, bagels, yogurt, eggs, hash browns, toast, lots of yummy breakfast stuff
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect location, pool, clean, clean, clean
Summary: This hotel is in a absolute perfect location to the park...clean, comfortable, quiet, and staff were amazing!  We were allowed to park our car (as room wasn't ready yet) and get right into the park.  Walk to park was very short 5 min. Quiet night, and breakfast was good for what is there, not full, and grab-n-go.  But overall very impressed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: My 5 grandkids (aged 3-7), and two married sons met for this vacation at Disneyland.  The location was amazing....an easy walk (we did use strollers) to the Parks, and we enjoyed dining in the nearby restaurants and used the pool several times.  The pool facilities are very children friendly, and the hotel even provided towels! The breakfast was wonderful, and there was enough variety for even the pickiest eaters.  We really saved money and got a good start on the day with this amenity! We had a single room with another adjoining set, and it was a great fit for the families.  We used a roll-away as well, and the kids had no problems sleeping on it!  Additionally, we used the Business Center to print up Knott's Berry Farm tickets, etc. and the free Wi-Fi was useful. Overall, a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you and your grandkids enjoyed the fireworks. You can also see them from the pool area just in case you are swimming at that time. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Just got back from a 10 day stay here. There were 3 "adults" me, my son and his friend. It is an ok place to stay. Like others have said it is just a place to sleep. Our room was on the bottom so it was a little Noisy at times but that was more to do with loud people having no consideration for others. They do serve a continental hot and cold breakfast, but to tell you the truth it did get ‚Äúold‚Äù after a while and you had to get there early to get any selection.  They have a great restaurant right next door called Cocos that is very reasonably priced. We ate a few breakfasts there as well as some dinners.  The walk to Down Town Disney is about 10 to 15 minutes from the hotel, which isn‚Äôt bad and it is a nice walk.  The room was comfortable enough for the three of us. It does have
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The breakfast is CRAP. I stayed here with a tour and the rooms were decent. The food was not fresh which included stale bread and bagels, "strange" eggs, barely cold yogurt, thawed out freezer-burned waffles, and unfresh fruit. It's fine if you don't want the continental breakfast though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We would have liked for you to bring it to management‚Äôs attention when you saw that the breakfast was not fine. We want to see what you saw that same day. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Wonderful staff who were very knowledgeable and helpful,great service & just a 15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance, clean room, clean pool area. Hotel charges $10 / day for parking, which is reasonable for that area. Decent restaurants in the area, easy to access off highway 5.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.  We are glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The rooms were nice and comfortable, pretty close to Disneyland and the staff was helpful.  We would definitely return to the hotel for future stays.  Good value for the room and area since the other hotels in the area of Disneyland are quite pricey.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. See you again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed at BW Stovalls.  There were 2 adults and 3 children who could fit in the room. Room was a little cramped after the rollaway bed was put in but since we were only there to sleep, it wasn't a real issue. The room was a tad dark due to the dark colours of the furnishing.  Otherwise, all seemed to be clean. Our room was on the ground floor.  It was generally quiet with the exception of some keen skateboarders who thought whizzing on the 2nd floor corridor was a fun thing. Thankfully, the security guard put the situation right. The swimming pool was a perfect end to the day for the children. They really enjoyed it along with the sauna pool.    Reception was friendly especially Maria who was very helpful and answered all our long questions about transport and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas. I will make sure and tell Maria to keep up the great job that she is doing. We do have a guest laundry if you decide to do your own laundry. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. The ART transit stops in front of the hotel to take you too many locations. The front desk has the map of where it can pick up and drop off. Thank you once again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient place to stay in Anaheim.
Summary: Clean, comfortable place to stay in Anaheim.  Walking distance to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center.  We stayed at this hotel last August and liked it.  It was our first choice of lodging this year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. It‚Äôs about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Waste of money! Overpriced! Stayed here for 1 night and was charged $30 for parking instead of the original $10 I was quoted upon check in which I wasn't originally aware of. Talked to front desk and was given false info so then called another number and was given wrong info again. Finally spoke with hotel management and he was rude and refused to refund me as well. Don't stay here! They use Disney to try and make money. I am military and will be putting this place on blacklist as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We do charge 10.00 a day for parking for our guests. I‚Äôm not sure who you spoke to about the 30.00 that you say that you were charged. You can call the property and ask for the front desk mgr. and we can fix this. We thank you for your service. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: This is one of the nicest hotel anyone could have stayed in. I am glad my family and I were the ones to experience such good service and friendly staff. They were very helpful and several went out of their way to see that we get the help we were looking for. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is the 2nd time I have stayed here. It is a nicer Best Western, 2 wings, 3 floors. Nice pool and grounds. The breakfast was a bit carb-o-centric but they also offer fruit and scrambled eggs. It is a quick walk (15 minutes) to the Mouse, which I enjoy as a way of decompressing after the stimulation of amusement parks. Katella is a noisy and busy street so if possible, ask for a room towards the back of the property (I would suggest rooms ending in the 20s). However, I kept the air conditioner on all night which drowned out the street noise. Comfortable bed, clean room, nice bath tub, great refrig and microwave. Good selection of cable channels.  Nice front office staff and housekeeping. Beware of the promise of wifi however. My room was close to the front but was out of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We have two pools and spas for everyone to enjoy. In 2014 we changed our internet provider and it has changed tremendously. We hope that you can come and stay with us again.

Summary: Booked on-line, they made my particulars on hand for my arrival, it was a quick & friendly check-in. Thety explained the hotel's facilities. There was a lift to my floor, the room was spacious with the washroom basin & mirror separate from the toilet & bath/shower. The room & bathroom were clean. The bed was clean & comfortable. It was necessary to run the air conditioner all the time when the room was occupied, the low level hum drowned out outside noise. Disneyland is a short distance away, and a shuttle services this hotel. There are numerous restaurants within walking distance. This is about the 5th time I have stayed here & will do so again. They have a late check-out of mid day which is handy if flying out late from LAX.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney.

Summary: Well first of all t's in walking distance to Disneyland which is really convenient but they also offer a shuttle for a low price of $5 per person. We got there early before the room was ready and the staff held our bags in the back which was nice. Then we got upgraded to a king size bed which awesome. The rooms are newly renovated and clean. The air conditioner wasn't great and the tub didn't drain properly but that's no big deal. They also offered a continental breakfast, it wasn't anything special but it got the job done! Better than paying for it at the park. I really cant complain because for the price the place is a steal in comparison to other hotels in the area. Overall I had a great experience at this hotel and I'm very glad we picked it!! I'd definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. There is a shuttle that can take you to the parks. The ART Transit comes approximately every 20 minutes starting at the hour. The Art Transit has a minimal fee. We sell Art shuttle passes at the hotel for our guests. We hope to see you again!

Summary: This is the 2nd time for me and my family to stay in this hotel. We arrived on July 2, 2014, late night. We were initially assigned at the 3rd floor (unfortunately I could not remember the room anymore) but turned out to be a dead spot for WIFI. Immediately, I reported at the front desk.  The hotel staff offered us an alternate room at the ground floor which we accepted. The room was much nicer and the smell was more pleasant than the room at the 3rd floor. The following days went fine. The continental breakfast was good -- helpful before hitting Disneyland. Gabriella (housekeeping) was nice to provide us with fresh towels everyday. She maintained our room nice and clean. Front desk staff were courteous and helpful. Shuttle passes to Disney are available at the gift shop. Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. I will make sure and mention this great comment to Gabriella. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and good value for money
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights with the main attraction being Disneyland (and it is about a 5-10 minute walk to the park, which saves getting transport). We also enjoyed the outlet malls which are in the Anaheim area. Breakfast was included in our accommodation, but there were far too many guests crammed into the diner next door for breakfast (the hotel were in the middle of renovations to their restaurant). We would grab a takeaway container and take our breakfast back to our room. Good value for money in the Anaheim area, although plenty of accommodation to choose from.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. The renovation to the breakfast room was in Sept. 2012. We do hope that you are able to come and see your new breakfast room.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay. We were visiting friends in the area and decided to stay here rather than drive home the same day. the room was newly renovated, beds were comfortable, breakfast was more than enough. Overall a very good stay. If I had one complaint it would be that they charge for parking. I don't think that's necessary. Include the fee in the room charge so that guests don't feel nickeled and dimed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you were able to stay with us. All of our guests pay for parking. We have the lowest charge for parking some hotels charge up to 24.00 per night. We hope that when coming to the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: When at Disneyland we stayed here. Considering that most of the day was at the parks, this hotel provided the perfect overnight stay experience with comfortable accommodation and modern amenities. The staff were very knowledgeable and friendly. They provided proper information of the parks. They were also very courteous and kept our bags the day we checked out. A very good family hotel with excellent breakfast as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. I will make sure and let the staff know what a great job they are doing. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Roaches and less than acceptable customer service
Summary: I stayed at this hotel from July 1-8, 2014. Check in was great, the place looks nice. The breakfast was ok. During my stay I returned from Disney to turn on the lights in my room and watch the roaches run behind the desk. I was extremely disturbed. I called the front desk to report this concern and was given an alternate room. I was staying alone with my three year old and this was at approximately 11pm at night. A staff member came to bring me the new room key and left me to transport my own bags to the next room alone. I expressed my displeasure to the front desk today and they asked me three times if I had asked for help. Did I need to ask for help in this situation? I really don't believe so. not sure if there are roaches in other rooms, but keep on the lookout.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I would have liked to have spoken to you about this situation that you have mentioned on your review. And if I‚Äôm not available please leave your contact information so I can reach you and make this better. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Great accommodations and close to Convention center and Disney
Summary: The Best Western Plus Stovalls is a very good hotel with roomey pools and very decent buffet breakfast.  It is clean, the rooms are big and it is walking distance to the Convention Center (8 mins) and California Adventure entrance through the Disney hotel (13 mins).  We will definitely stay here again.  Ask for availability of rooms with view of fireworks which you can enjoy every night at 9:30 from your balcony!   Coco's is also a great restaurant and they will deliver to your room!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have two beautiful pools and spas. Our breakfast has something for everyone. We have hot and cold items. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This is a good hotel for a best western. Nothing I can complain about except the fact the bathroom is tiny and the bath could not fit a regular sized person. There are two pools, close to Disneyland (10 minute walk) and complimentary breakfast. Its next door to two diners which both have good food. The rooms are a bit cramped but they had lots of TV stations to watch if you spent time in the room. I would recommend not staying in the rooms next to the ice and vending machines as people use them at all hours of the night and they are extremely noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have two pools and spas. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that you get to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for five nights while we visited disneyland. We were able to check in a few hours early, staff was polite...we had a problem with the tv and mini fridge (no freezer) upon arrival but they sent someone to fix it ASAP. Breakfast included was decent for being free....so if you're not picky it will do. The rooms are updated but small if you have 2 adults and 3 kids....good place to stay if you're on a budget though. Disneyland was about 10 min walk taking the shortcut through the grand Californian (FYI: only after 11am). Coco's is right next door...they deliver to the room and will charge to your room also.   One more thing, there are no safes in the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you were able to check in early. Sometimes it difficult to do so since the summer is here and it can get pretty busy in Anaheim. We do have room and poolside service with Coco‚Äôs restaurant that is right next door to us. Their pies are YUMMY! We do hope that you guys had a wonderful stay and will see you again soon!

Summary: This is not a fancy hotel, but for what it is, it's very good.  They have 2 pools and 2 hot tubs.  It's about a half mile walk to Downtown Disney.  I used my rewards points so it was free for me.  I stay there every chance I get.  You can see the fireworks pretty good from the 3rd floor.  The parking can be a pain if you are going in and out all the time, but we park our car for 5 days and never leave, so it's no big deal.  I see people complaining about the breakfast, but it's better than most free breakfasts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have two pools and spas. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. See you again soon!

Summary: Nice, clean rooms. The maid tidied up and provided fresh towels daily. Beds were comfortable. It's about a 15 minute walk to the front entrance. The breakfast area is very busy and crowded, but there is plenty of food. Eggs, sausage, waffles, yogurt, fruit, donuts and cereal are provided. We ate it three of the five days we stayed because we got tired of it. The internet was sketchy. We didn't use the pool but saw people out at it all the time. Parking was an issue only Friday night when we got in kind of late - get there early and you shouldn't have any trouble.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel because of its location. It is walking distance to Disneyland Park where we went. We were with a 5 y.o and she didn't complain.  The hotel is near the Grand Californian and there's a shortcut from the Grand Californian Hotel to Downtown Disney and into the Park's entrance. We left our car at the hotel and there's a 10 USD parking fee with in and out privileges.  As usual there's free breakfast of waffle, eggs, cereal. Our room is clean and ready every time we arrived. They have an outside pool but we were not able to use it because we always get back late and too tired.  If we have to go back again, Ill probably stay at this same hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that next time you will be able to use the pools and spas. It‚Äôs always great to soak your feet in a warm pool or spa to relax. See you again!

Summary: Room was very clean, bed was comfy and the dual pools were really nice and not crowded. The breakfast was okay, the eggs were good but the waffles were not. Good enough food to get your day started off. Super nice staff and very helpful. The whole grounds of the hotel are nicely groomed and well taken care of. Parking could be difficult (we did not have a car so it didn't effect us) but there is not a ton so get a spot early.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights. Ate breakfast 3 times due the food was not very good. Internet very slow and did not seem to work with Apple products. Good location to Disney. Clean. Nice staff. Leave you on hold a lot when you call though. Room was updated. Pool small. Parking one night was tight, had to park in the employee parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have two large pools and two spas. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come and stay at the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn.

Summary: This was a great location from Disneyland.  It was only half a mile from Disney California.  The room was nice but pretty small.  We had 4 adults in the room and it was pretty tight.  The breakfast had a good variety but not a lot for people who do not eat meat.  Would have been nice to have plain eggs as a choice each day.  Our room door did not lock after housecleaning came one day so our valuables were not locked.  But everything was there when we came back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: We loved our stay here last summer, so when the opportunity came to visit Disneyland this June we didn't even consider any other hotel.   Stovall's Inn is within walking distance  of Downtown Disney and the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure (12-15 min. if you take the short cut through the Grand Californian). Our two-queen room was spacious and newly decorated, had very comfortable beds and fluffy towels, a large flat screen TV, and a small fridge and microwave. The breakfast was quite good with scrambled eggs every day and bacon or sausage as well as the usual breads, yogurt, fresh fruit, etc. There is also a great pool area. I just wish the Wi-Fi internet had worked for us - there was evidently a change in service provider while we were there.  My husband is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We welcome and Thank all for your service. We hope that by going through the ITT office it will help with the special rate given to them. Hope to see you guys again!

Summary: With the expense of Disneyland, it was so nice to be able to take the whole family to an AFFORDABLE place to stay.  Clean, quiet, comfortable, and wonderful swimming pools/spas.  Free breakfast just topped off the amenities!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Glad to hear that you guys enjoyed the pools and spas. See you soon!

Summary: This is a great place to stay, very good value for the price paid, and they honor military vouchers, thank you!  Its a nice close walk to both parks and Downtown Disney, they serve a big breakfast with lots of choices, nice pools, wonderful and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to honor the Military vouchers. We are happy to hear that you were able to come to Disneyland and have some fun. See you guys soon!

Summary Heading: Location is perfect, that's about all tho
Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights in June, 3 out of 5 days we were there the wiifi played up , one day it was down for 4 hours and we were on the ph to the network provider 4 or 5 times in one day.  our bathroom door didn't close unless u wedged it shut and although there was a microwave there was no bowls plates or cutlery .  Breakfast was very ordinary , and had very limited options. The breakfast room was always crazy busy and we could never get a seat so would have to take our plates back to our rooms  We could see the fireworks from our balcony at nighttime and Disneyland was only about a 8 min walk from the hotel which was excellent  The staff were very friendly and helpful and went out of their way to help us out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. You are able to see the fireworks from the poolside room and in the pool area. We hope that you enjoyed them. They are fantastic. See you soon.

Summary: Service was terrible, when you run to the front desk highly upset about a situation that occured at their hotel they smirk and laugh at you and tell you you are wrong. I dealt with 3 different staff members and they all acted the same way. Not sure if it was becuase of the area I was staying in or if it is because I look young and they think they can be disrespectful to me. However, there is no excuse for the way they all acted towards me on the three seperate occasions I had a dispute with the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize if there was some sort of miscommunication. We always want to deliver Superior customer service. I would have loved to have gotten an opportunity to speak to you and clear up any situation that was occurring. We hope that when coming to the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights early June. We arrived by Amtrak around 11am and our room was ready! Very helpful staff explaining breakfast, transport and any thing else we needed to know. Our room was on the 2nd floor (of three) 1 room away from the road. We could see California Adventure from our front door. The noise of the road didn't bother us at all, we were pretty exhausted from the parks each day. We had 2 double beds which was wonderful, the most comfortable of our whole holiday. Lots of cushions and soft bedding. We did have a complaint, our bathroom door didn't close so it didn't give us much privacy, we had to wedge it with towels to stop it creeping back open. The air con is really good.  The room facilities are great a fridge, microwave, coffee maker,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that we were able to check you in early. All the rooms do come with fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, iron/board and hair dryer. The breakfast is really good and there is something for everyone to have. We are about 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is also a shuttle you can take. It‚Äôs called ART transit and it‚Äôs available at 5.00 for adults and 2.00 for kids ages 3-9. We hope to see you again

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for two nights while we went to Disneyland.  Pros:The staff was extremely helpful and courteous. The breakfast buffet had a lot of options,and the rooms were clean,but had a VERY strong smell of some sort of cleaner when I arrived.  Cons:The rooms were very dark,and you have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the staff know what a great job they are doing. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Great place to stay when attending events at the Honda Center, Anaheim Stadium or Disneyland.  The beds were very comfortable, rooms were clean and they had a microwave and refrigerator.  Complimentary breakfast was a huge convenience as well.  Nice size new TV, wireless access, walking distance to Disneyland and surrounding eateries.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 15 minute drive to the Anaheim Honda Center. The walk to the parks is only a 10-15 minutes. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: We've been coming here for years when we want to go to Disneyland. This time the hotel was just remodeled and it looked great. The place was clean and the employees great and always smiled or tried to help you in every way. The big money saver was with the continental breakfast they offer. The many different foods ,eggs, potatoes, meats,waffles, pancakes, breads, pastries, juices, tea, coffee, milk. The menu changes every day but mainly the same good food. And it's only a short walking distance to the park. I truly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast. We are very proud with all the renovations that we have done. We are always improving our property. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: We stayed at Stovall's for 3 nights and overall it was wonderful.  In my group there was myself and my sister (in our 50's) and my two adult children (20 & 24), so no small children (but we did see a lot of families with small children staying here).  The breakfast was hot and a very good variety; note, they do change it up some every day (i.e. one day eggs and potatoes, one day eggs and bacon, one day eggs and sausage), so if you see it that day you better take some because it may not be served tomorrow, but everyday they served waffles, muffins, donuts, yogurt, fruit and cereal.  There are really only two ways to get to Disneyland from Stovall's; take the ART bus which picks up right outside, every 20 minutes, or walk to Downtown Disney and take the Monorail over.  Walking to
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope that you have found your 2nd home.

Summary: Very good value.  Was quiet at night, beds were very comfortable.  Good room air conditioner.  Only complaint was the coffee at breakfast. Walk to Disneyland was short.  Would stay here again next Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: Standard room, noisy and overflowing car park
Summary: Room was standard, decent size but a bit drab and dark. Very noisy with maid trolleys and suitcases being wheeled past the door all the time and kids screaming but for a Disney location hotel it's to be expected. Car park was $10 per night if I recall correctly and it was very full unless you got there early, over allocated as I had to drive around and there was not a single space with cars filling every bay and any free space to park leaving me having to park against a wall blocking a walkway at the other side of the hotel from our room. Breakfast was cooked, which was a plus over continental but there was only bacon once and it vanished in a few minutes replaced by potatoes, the next day sausage but no bacon. Great location near Disney but wouldn't stay here again. To top it
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very glad to hear that you had a wonderful time here with us. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location for families staying at Disney.  Comfortable, quiet rooms;  updated bathrooms;  very friendly staff; decent breakfast (although the breakfast room is a madhouse in the mornings.  Get there early); nice pool area with 2 pools, 2 hot tubs, and 1 kiddie pool; property is well maintained and it is a 10 minute walk to Disney.  The ART shuttle stops right in front of the hotel, and there is a family dinner right next door with good food that will even deliver to the hotel pool or your room.  Try the pie! YUM!  Overall, a very pleasant stay.  Will absolutely book here again.  Why risk trying another property when this one has everything?  Except decent Wifi.  That is one item that seriously needs upgrading.  Otherwise, no complaints at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We do offer room and poolside service with Coco‚Äôs restaurant that is right next door. I agree their pies are Yummy! See you guys again soon!

Summary: Hotel on the corner of Disneyland Drive across the street from Paradise Pier. It's about a 10 min walk to Disney. Coco Restaurant next to hotel and Tiffy's Restaurant is across the street. They serve a variety of hot breakfest items. Room clean and price was reasonable. Swimming pools in a gated area. ART stop is located in the front of hotel. Staff friendly and helpful. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We do have the Coco‚Äôs restaurant that is located next door. We have room and pool service with them. We have two beautiful pools and spas. It‚Äôs nice to come and enjoy the pools and spas after a long day at the parks. I will make sure and mention to the staff to keep up their great job that they are doing!

Summary: We recently had 7 nights stay at Best Western Stovalls for a family vacation to Disneyland. Perfect location and the pool area was lovely and the room accomodated my family of four fine with the children sharing a bed. Breakfast was a chance to full up before a huge fun day. The walk to DL was awesome with the lights and cutting thru the Californian Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time while staying with us. The breakfast is just right to get you started for the fun day ahead of you. It is a beautiful walk to the parks when all the light are on and it just shows you the way. Hope to see you guys again.

Summary: This was our first time here. We stayed for 6 days and I was very happy.  Even with a 15 minute walking distance to Disneyland we had no problems getting there. Great view from here to watch the fireworks.  The complimentary breakfast was ok but on the same property there is a restaurant that is very good and the price is good too.  I will return here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that you have found a new home to come and stay. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning before your fun day at the parks. Hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: Great location for Disneyland. We stayed here for 7 nights, the room was an adequate size for our family of four. It was clean and kept clean all week. The room was quite dark due to dark decoration and furnishing and the air condition was quite noisy, probably a bit old.  Disneyland was just a 10/15minute walk away even with two smallish children (7&4) or there was a shuttle bus which stopped right outside the hotel which only cost $14 for all of us for unlimited journeys.  The pools were clean and one was warm(ish!) but again adequate for how often we used them.  The breakfast had a great selection of hot and cold food and drinks with fresh fruit, a good choice of cereals and plenty of toasters to make toast or bagels.  The staff were all friendly and helpful with any of our
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed their stay. We have room and pool side service with Coco‚Äôs restaurant. We offer plenty of different items in the breakfast for everyone. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: This was our 3rd time staying at this hotel.  A short 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland after a complimentary breakfast..  Kids loved the pools.  Adults enjoyed the spa after a long day at the park.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We also offer a complete breakfast for everyone to enjoy. We have two pools and spas. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: moved the furniture to make space for a crib.  nephews were playing with my wallet while i was in the shower.  moved furniture back when we left. got 200 miles up the road and noticed $150 missing. called the desk and they were no help. still haven't called back. sure the housekeepers kept it
Manager Response: We have spoken to the housekeepers that cleaned the room and they didn‚Äôt find anything. Maybe it was dropped somewhere else? The housekeepers that cleaned the room have been here for years and very trustworthy. Contact the hotel and speak to the gm if you have any other questions on this.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because of the low price and the online reviews.  During our stay they were renovating rooms, but ours had been finished.  It had brand new carpet in it which was awesome.  The room itself was really small, but we were at Disneyland all day so it really didn't matter.  The room was clean and the pool was nice.  With two small children it took us about 15 minutes to walk to Disneyland, but by the third day we were pretty tired.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that you loved the new carpet. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that you and your family come and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent location to walk to Disney
Summary: I thought about staying at the Disneyland hotels but the price put me off. My main priority was being close enough to walk to the park. This hotel is about 10 mins walk to Downtown Disney and then another few mins to the park gate if you go through the lobby of the Grand Californian Hotel. The rooms are clean and nicely furnished with comfy beds. You do hear noise from the walkway outside your door and the rooms next door but it is mainly families with children so it was quiet when I wanted to sleep. They have the standard BW free breakfast, it was busy around the time people want to go to the park. Also we had a good view of the Disney fireworks from the walkway outside our room on the third floor. Since we were so close we were able to be at the park for opening so still
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. It‚Äôs wonderful that you were able to enjoy the fireworks from your door. It‚Äôs a beautiful site. Hope to see you again.

Summary: Far overpriced, horrible "swamp cooler" for an air conditioner that had a piece of plastic to hold open the air direction fins on the front of the "cooler" which was hidden behind a cabinet. The clothes hanger on the back of the bathroom door was falling off - literally just hanging by the molly bolt. The toilet seat had "caked-on something". The space in the bathroom was only large enough for a child. The curtains were left open to allow the sun to heat the room well over 80 degrees while we were out...even with the "swamp cooler" turned to high. The charges for the room were for two people. Children under 18 stay free. I was there with my daughter - just the 2 of us. My daughter, 11 years old, was charged as an adult.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. If and when you encounter any problems, don‚Äôt hesitate on coming or call the front desk. We are open 24hrs. a day and someone can assist. I‚Äôm not sure what you mean that we charged you for your daughter. If you would like to call the hotel and ask for the front desk manager and she can assist you with any questions that you may have on your bill. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: My husband, myself and my 17 year old daughter stayed here for 10 nights in May and everything about this hotel was perfect ,from the lovely spacious room, which was cleaned and had fresh clean towels left daily, to the fabulous breakfast which was available from 6 am till 10 am and had such a varied choice, to the lovely friendly staff, to the perfect location for Disneyland which was only a 15min leisurely walk from the hotel, to the beautiful pool area, and also the fab and reasonably priced food from Cocos restaurant next door, all these details made this hotel the perfect choice for our holiday to America. We had a fantastic stay and would recommend this hotel to anyone and, if we are ever lucky enough to come back to California and Disneyland we will definitely be staying
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time here with us. I will make sure and share the great comments with the staff. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: This motel is located right across from Disneyland, and 3 blocks from the Arena and Convention Center. There is a family restaurant right next door, and ice cream shop and bus stop across the street and it has parking right in front of the hotel rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. The Anaheim Convention Center is about a 5-10 minute walk. We are surrounded by a lot of eatery that you can walk too.

Summary: The staff at this hotel was great!  We arrived early, room was ready.  We had a problem with our fridge, fixed immediately.  Great location for Disney.  The bed was great!  After a loooong day at Disney and dinner, it hit the spot!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and share this review with the staff. We are happy to hear that we were able to get you in right away. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for five nights with my boyfriend. The room was spacious and very clean. The free breakfast was decent--it wasn't a Village Inn by any means, but for being free, it definitely was great. The walk to Disneyland was 10-15 minutes, with an easy shortcut through the Grand  California Hotel. I was a little disappointed about the hotel store having limited hours and the parking fee of 10 dollars per night; however, it was a still stay nonetheless. The cleanliness of the room and proximity to Disneyland were most important to us, and both were great! Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: Park is a short walk away!
Summary: I took my daughter in July as a grad present. We had a bottom floor room which was close to the lobby as well as the pools. The rooms were in need of a renovation, and it looks like they have been since our visit.this hotel was perfect for our one week stay, enjoyed the simple complimentary breakfast in the morning, best to get there early in the morning to avoid the crowd.The location was excellent as the park is just a short walk away! I would definitely return to the best western plus Stovall's inn, clean friendly staff and very reasonable especially for a single parent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on the graduate! We renovated the lobby in Oct. We have made changes in the rooms. At this moment we are changing the carpet in the rooms. We are always trying to see what we can improve on. We hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: the only few complains I have about this hotel are, the AC in the rooms are noisy, house keeping needs to check under the beds better & the WiFi needs to be upgraded. The breakfast they offer is fine for your basic breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and share this review with the staff. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim are you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Great Room For Out Disneyland Trip!!!
Summary: I stayed here for a whole week at the end of May so my family and I could have a close hotel to Disneyland. We really enjoyed our stay at the Stovall's Inn. We were on the second floor and the room was really nice. We have a one year old so having a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland was a must for us and this hotel worked just fine. It is a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney and a 15 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland itself. The rooms are obviously newly renovated and are really nice. The whole time we were there the first floor was being renovated with new carpet and everything. There was one day in which they were renovating the room below us and it got really loud with hammering and stuff being moved but luckily we weren't in the room much during the day so
Manager Response: Thank you for business. We appreciate your business. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We are changing the carpet on all the rooms. We apologize if it got a little noisy. We are working as fast as we can to finish this project. We hope that you come and visit us again soon!

Summary: We always choose to stay at the Best Western as their price is good, we picked this BW Stovall's Inn because it is close to the Disneyland.  Walking distance and easy access to the park.  We spent a night browsing and shopping at the Disneyland downtown, it was fun.  This hotel is like a motel style, room was clean but it seems a bit outdated.  We requested a high floor and facing to the park, you saw the fireworks at night.   Friendly staff, fast check in & out.  Free breakfast, nothing special but at least all you can eat.  We only stayed there for one night before going to the cruise next day.  I recommend this hotel if you only need a clean place to stay and their price is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disney through Downtown Disney. Every morning we offer a complete breakfast to all of our guests. See you again soon!

Summary Heading: Still our favorite place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Walking distance to all that is Disney.  Close to the Angel's Stadium.  Reasonable price.  Good service.  Clean. No reason to shell out a bunch of money for a room we only sleep and shower in.  This is my 2nd review of this property over a few years and we'll stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. Hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland and closer to Downtown Disney. The staff are both friendly and helpful. Many eating places close by. Highlight was being able to stand on balcony and watch fireworks from Disneyland Sunday night
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. Yes, you can stand outside your room by the pool and see the fireworks. It‚Äôs a beautiful site. Come and visit us again!

Summary: We needed a place to stay in Anaheim for a sports tournament at American Sports Center. Excellent choice. I would definitely stay here again. After a long day this is just what we needed. Comfy beds, little fridge to store all our refreshments. It had everything we needed. Chairs and table so I could do paperwork. Nice size t.v. Perfect all around.  Three things to keep in mind. The shower. Had to call for assistance - pull the knob out first then turn. (It's been a long time since I've had to call about something like that.) Check in. When they say 3:00 p.m., they mean 3:00 p.m. A bit of a bummer, but manageable. Wi-Fi. A bit spotty, but free so I was willing to put up with it.  All in all, I think it's a good choice for anyone coming to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Very happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself while staying with us. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We purchased a 4 day stay with a military voucher. I checked online prior to purchasing and this hotel had good reviews. It was also the only one with a continental breakfast. Upon entering the hotel room I noticed the carpet was full of stains. After removing my shoes and walking barefoot, from the door to the bathroom, I noticed that my feet were filthy from the floor. Not a hotel I want my 1 year old and 3 year old walking on barefoot. I will not be staying at this hotel again. In addition to the disgusting floor the bed was very lumpy and uncomfortable. Save your money and stay elsewhere. I will not be staying at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. At this moment we are changing the carpet in all the rooms. We hope to see you guys again here soon!

Summary: we booked this hotel on the strength of the reviews on tripadvisor and we weren't disappointed. don't let the exterior put you off. when we first pulled up I wondered what we'd let ourselves in for as the outside looks a little drab but the rooms are more than adequate with a fridge and microwave as well as the usual comfy beds etc. we had room 567 which is right over the breakfast room and perfectly placed for a free view of the Disney fireworks. its less than a 15 minute walk to downtown Disney. theres also an IHOP about 20 minutes walk away as well as Outback and Cheesecake factory within 30 mins walk. you cant get closer to Disney without actually staying at a Disney hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. The Garden Walk has a lot of eatery that you can go visit. Poolside rooms are wonderful if you want to see the fireworks. Or you can just hang out at the pool. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: Very nice staff.. Good pool area for adults and families.. You will not go wrong to stay here.. and they feed you breakfast to get you started right for the day.. The close location to Disneyland makes this an excellent choice if you are visiting the park..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The WiFi in our room was intermittent and non-existent most of the time.  It would kick us off while trying to load a webpage or just say there was no WiFi because we were out of range.  Not impressed.  Good thing everything else about the hotel was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have corrected any pending issues with the WIFI.

Summary: I highly recommend the Best Western Stovall's Inn in Anaheim. The rooms are clean, they provide a nice complimentary breakfast and it is close walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention Center. The staff is also very nice and helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. The front desk is always happy and ready to help.
