Summary: We have come to have a great experience at Stovall's every time we stay.  This stay was no exception.  Easy and friendly check in.  Nice room - minor issues with room were corrected quickly.  Ammenities were just what we needed. Comfortable bed.    Access to Disneyland is great.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. Glad to hear that you guys had a great time while staying with us.

Summary Heading: Perfect place for business or pleasure
Summary: Nice, comfortable rooms at terrific prices.  Walking distance to Disneyland or the  Anaheim Convention Center which is very convenient.  The staff is helpful and attentive.  I have stayed here before and will return in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will make sure and mention to the staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. Hope to see you in the future.

Summary: The best thing about Stovall's is its proximity to Disney California Adventure - less that 10 minutes walk.  As others have reported, it is an older property, with some rooms being less comfortable than others.  The $10 parking fee is annoying, but less than the $16 The Mouse charges at the Disneyland lot.  The internet connection definitely needs an upgrade.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We have fixed any pending issues that may have occurred with the wifi. See you again.

Summary: Excellent service; nice room.  Very accommodating staff who was willing to assist with any inquiry.  Rooms had a microwave and refrigerator.  comfortable bed with large flat screen TV.  Vending machines were in working order with plenty of ice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. The front desk is always happy and ready to assist anytime. All the rooms have microwaves and fridges in the rooms. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: This was an ok updated hotel. Parking is $10.00 a day is only good until 3pm the next day. So if you plan on going to Disneyland the day you check up you have to pay another $10 to keep your car there. Air conditioner leaks water over microwave and is on the loud side but at least it works. Beds are a little on the old side.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: The location was very good for getting to Disneyland and Disney's California Adventure. We walked each time we went and it was about 15 -20 minutes. The weather was very hot above 100 degrees for three days and topping out at 104. The breakfast was timely and never had a problem getting a table for our group of four. They never had French Toast, though. Good food and fruit. The HIGH SPEED Internet is not very good. We had a very difficult time getting a good connection in our room. The cable TV was upgraded the day before we left and is now excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We try and switch up the breakfast items so it doesn't get boring for our guests. Any pending issues with Wifi have been fixed. Hope to see you guys again!

Summary: I was in this hotel for a convention and the location of the hotel was perfect, to the convention and to Disney in the afternoon.  The breakfast is awesome, the front desk is very good and Coco Restaurant is very good with good prices.  I recommend this hotel and the next time in the Anahiem area, I will stay in this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We are next to the Coco‚Äôs restaurant. We have room and poolside service with them. Their pies are really good.

Summary: We stayed here on a recent trip to Disneyland and it was an excellent stay. The hotel is a quick and easy 10-15 minute walk to the park, the pool was well kept and great for the kids, and the breakfast was great. The only issue we had (and it was a small one) was that the internet did not work. Considering we were there for Disneyland and with 2 kids that did not matter much to us. We would stay here again in a heartbeat and will recommend it to others as well
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We have fixed any internet issues that we had pending with the previous company. We hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Ridiculous Extra Charge for Parking
Summary: The room was very nice and comfortable. I just find it ridiculous to pay extra for parking. I mean if you already pay a lot for a room it's ridiculous to pile a parking charge on top of that. I should have looked a little more for a hotel that didn't charge parking on top of staying because there are plenty near Disneyland that don't.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We do charge 10.00 per night for parking. We have security in premises that patrols the property every day. Most of the properties in Anaheim have a parking charge. We have the cheapest parking fee. We hope that you come and stay with us again!

Summary: Perfect hotel, I am so glad I picked this place after exhaustive research! Awesome and very walkable location to all Disney attractions. If you don't want to walk, the ART shuttle picks you up at the lobby.  Beds were comfy and felt newish. Room was nothing fancy, but super clean. What else do you need when you are at Disney?? Breakfast was a good start to our day. Coco's restaurant next door was great and very reasonable. Pool area was really cute, we only swam once, but my kids enjoyed it.   Don't look any farther, book this place! I did the research for you and was extremely satisfied:-)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all the great comments. We hope you felt like home and come back to stay with us.

Summary: I have stayed three times in a row at the BW P Stovalls Inn and have loved every stay. The front desk is amazing they gave us a room this time at 10am and we checked right in! The breakfast is great from bacon, sausage, ham, eggs, waffles and pancakes then breads and muffins and bagles and cereals, yogurt and fruits and different drinks makes it easy to spend less at the parks. COCO's restuarant is great and very fast , friendly and price is great. The two pools and two hot tubs are nice, my dughter likes the unheated cold pool and I like the heated pool. You can see the fireworks from pool or rooms from Disney since it's only a block away so very east to get to or use the ART bus. I will stay at this hotel everytime I visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that we were able to assist you with an early check in. The breakfast is very good and filling. Something to get you started for a beautiful day at the parks. You can enjoy the fireworks show while relaxing at the pool area. See you soon!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a Disney weekend. We really only slept there. The room itself looked fine, bed was comfortable. My husband is a light sleeper, he mentioned the next morning the neighbors were up late. Also, the air conditioner unit made a sound like a leaking faucet. Needless to say he didn't sleep so well overall. Complimentary breakfast was all right. Good variety except the hot food was already cold when we served it, but there was microwave to warm it up. When we were exiting the parking lot the ticket machine did not recognize our ticket and was asking for an additional $30 parking fee. We alerted the staff and they let us out short thereafter. Overall, the location was very good, the service was fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stovall's isn't the grandest hotel in Anaheim, but very nice, and very close.  California Adventure and downtown Disney is a 10-15 minute walk through beautiful gardens and palm trees.  Disneyland takes a little longer, maybe 15-20 minutes.  The free buffet breakfast is great, pools are very nice, and the rooms are what you'd expect from a Best Western- not grand, but very nice and just what you need- and the price is so much cheaper than staying at one of the resort-owned hotels, it's such a better deal.
Manager Response: We appreciate all the great comments. We do hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed at Best Western Stovall's Inn for 5 nights.  It is a good place to stay if you want to be close to Disneyland.  The staff were brilliant, the breakfast was good and the rooms were very clean.  I only issues I had were the wifi especially in my room it would stop working constantly.  Other issue was the air conditioner, it was quite noisy but apart from that the rest of the amenities was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that all pending issue were fixed while staying with us.

Summary: I wanted to let you know about my experiences with our spring break vacations this year. Generally we spend a week in California splitting our time between Disneyland and San Diego. On this trip we changed our hotel from The Castle Inn and suites mainly because they raised their rates after their remodel and the property does not justify the increase. Once in the past I had stayed at the Stovall‚Äôs Best Western and was happy with the stay. That was at least 6 years ago. This trip I stayed at the property for three nights. We enjoyed our stay and will defiantly stay in the future. We are annual pass holders for Disneyland. We arrived early 9:00 am. Although there were not any rooms available we were able to check in and pay before heading over to the park. After a full day at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We do hope to see you guys here more often!

Summary: Handicap shower needs improvement.  Floor is slippery.  needs anti-slip surface.  Presently too dangerous to access in and out. Needs a different shower floor surface texture.   Get it done before someone get hurt.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Every room is supplied with a bath mat. If you need another one or for whatever reason you don‚Äôt see one. Please contact the front desk. We are open 24hrs. a day. See you again.

Summary Heading: Decent breakfast, location, decor but lousy internet
Summary: Let's face it, every hotel in the Disneyland area is going to be full of screaming kids!  Ask for a room down at the end so you're not woken at six in the morning.  The breakfast is decent and included eggs and bacon or ham.  The room was clean and the maids friendly (although the front desk people seemed a little harassed and "short".  The big issue was the internet - it was constantly down or slow!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that we fixed any concerns that you had while staying with us.

Summary: Staying at Best Western Plus Stovall was a great time. Our accommodations were just what I had asked for . Getting up every morning and going to breakfast was really good, It was a great way to start our day.   your selection is from eggs , French toast , bacon, yogurt, toast , beagles, muffins, fresh fruit , hot and cold cereal . Juice , coffee. perfect for getting the day started. If you want more variety there are two restaurants right on the corner. You may purchase Disneyland & bus passes for all day or how ever how many days you plan on staying and buses take you to and from Disneyland and anywhere else you choose to go. The drivers are very helpful on what buses to connect too and where and how to return to your hotel. We used the bus service for Disneyland and Medevil
Manager Response: We hope that your grandson‚Äôs birthday was a blast. We appreciate your comments and your business.

Summary: Hotel needs to upgrade electric system. There was NO reason why I had to on 3 x‚Äôs down to the Front Desk to get a new key because the key they gave me didn‚Äôt work. The air in the room was horrible. My kids and I both got sick because we needed to sleep with cool air just to be able to breath in that room. Horrible Horrible!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that we fixed any problems that you encountered while staying with us. We appreciate your business.

Summary: The closest you can stay to Disney without spending a fortune.  It's a low key place that's easy to get in and out of and has all the accommodations to make your stay just as magical but without braking the bank.  We have stayed multiple times and enjoy the friendly, attentive staff.  Always a memorable family trip for us! Thanks Stovall's!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business and all the great comments. Hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Comfortable room, much bigger than we expected. Close to a couple of restuarants providing cheap and cheerful yet nice food, plus other food outlets and convenience stores a short walk away. Some nearby restaurants will deliver to the rooms which is handy. Buffet breakfast is basic but fine. Didn't use the pool but plenty of people were. Reception staff very friendly and very helpful with information. If you are looking for a slightly cheaper option and are happy to walk 10-15 to and from Disneyland then this hotel is ideal. The only thing to be aware of is the staff directed us that the best access to California Adventure Park and Disneyland was through the Grand Californian Hotel which backs onto the adventure park. This worked one day when we arrived mid morning but on the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. The Garden walk and Downtown Disney has plenty of restaurants for you to enjoy. If the Grand California didn‚Äôt let you go through their lobby behind you is the Disneyland hotel which you can cut through their parking lot to get to Downtown Disney. Hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary: Very good room, comfort beds, location is the best. They should offer the shuttle service to Disneyland to make it more convenient. After you spend all day in Disney then you need to walk like 15 mins to come back to the hotel.  If they offer this service every hour I think is going to be very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Disney has a shuttle called ART Transit and they run every 20 minutes starting on the hour. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: Not worth the money for this old outdated hotel Stayed April 21 To 25 2014
Summary: Paid $130 per night  Pros Location and that's it.  Cons Outdated rooms Smelly Pay for parking $10 per night Noise from other guest through walls and walk ways Dark rooms Lights burnt out. Internet wi fi sucks. This hotel is all about the location to Disneyland and that's it. Just interested in making the cash and nothing more.  I have stayed at better motel 6. To bad people have rated this high on tripadvisor, they really have no clue on what real value is.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We hope that we were able to fix all these issues that you have mentioned. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Sadly this is a resort that's busy due to its location. Right by Disneyland. Very little effort in the upkeep of the suites. Cracked/bulging wallpaper. The socalled hi~speed wifi is basically non existent. Don't bother complaining....whatever they try to do won't work. The pool is ice cold and right by a six lane street.  When you are a resort and you advertise the extras at a decent price but don't come through ....then they aren't extras at all. 50.00 hotel at best.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have two pools and one of them is heated. We don‚Äôt have suites in this property.

Summary: good value for the money,only "complaint" would be the distance to the pool from the hotel,off to one end of the property,and of course we were at the opposite end :)  Food was good,not consistant,as meat item changed from day to day,but otherwise pretty good selection,waffles,fruit,yogurt,cereal,eggs,bacon/sausage. Nice that the coffee fruit,yogurt were available during the entire day as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We try to switch the breakfast items around everyday so it doesn‚Äôt get boring to the guests. We hope that you enjoyed the pools!

Summary: We stayed here for 50th birthday (my husband and I) for 5 nights and were were pleased with every aspect of this hotel.  I requested a quiet room and it definitely was.  Clean, comfortable and very well equipped (except for a safe in the room).  We were able to check in at 3pm which I really appreciated, staff were great, no complaints whatsoever.  The continental breakfast was awesome, one of the best continentals I have had anywhere. Only drawback was it was a bit of a walk to disneyland but not too bad and very poor internet connection.   Nice pool, nice grounds.  Great choice for disneyland good neighbor hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed at the Best Western Stovall's Inn in Anaheim for WonderCon 2014, April 18-20. From the moment we checked in, it was a breeze to check in, get our room, and get settled in for the night. The room was in very good condition, as far as cleanliness goes, and the small fridge kept our water bottles cold during our entire stay. There was one night of spotty wi-fi, but probably due to the many other convention goers and spring breakers being on at the same time, because the connection was fine the rest of our stay. The business center located in the main lobby was a plus to have and conveniently open until 10pm. Will definitely stay here again for the next convention or for our next Disneyland trip, as the hotel is located a short walk from the Disneyland Resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. I heard the turn out for this convention this year was bigger than last year. Hope to see you again!

Summary: Great location as it is short walk from Disney.  Supposedly got a Disney view room, but only able to see parking lot.  Room windows are not designed to see Disney.  Good breakfast and clean rooms.  Bad internet connection.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We have corrected any pending issues with the internet. We hope that you come and visit us again soon!

Summary: overall satisfied with the quality of the room and service. the beds are comfortable with good # of pillows. impressed with the cleanliness of the room. breakfast is included with the price of the room and it was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and let the front desk and the cleaning staff know that they are doing a wonderful job.

Summary Heading: Wish I could have stayed anywhere else.
Summary: The staff there weren't very polite and they weren't very helpful either. When we showed up, we weren't aware that you had to pay in pull when you got there. Which I thought was ridiculous because how could they ask me to pay for somewhere I haven't even slept at yet? After that we noticed there where at lot of ants on the nightstand. We weren't sure why until my Step father pulled and old lolly pop out of the remote holder COVERED with ants. We just threw it away and killed what ants were left. No matter who it was put there by before us, I really wish the maid had done something about that a while, because that lolly pop was OLD. Our shower almost didn't work and was very hard to get running. The toilet seat was loose (which is only a minor problem compared to the rest), and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. If the front desk was notified about the lollipop we could have had a housekeeper go into the room and sanitize. We do hope that you would consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: The manager was very polite and went out of his way to accommodate our needs. The continental breakfast was mediocre at best, but it did come with the room price so at least it wasn't an extra cost. The rooms were very roomy, beds comfortable and clean. Pool area was nice. My only complaint about service was when we checked in. But that employee we only worked with once. Great location, within walking distance of Downtown Disney, Disneyland and California Adventure. There is a fee for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the BW Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Disneyland California
Summary: Clean, air conditioned, nice comfortable quiet room, this was my second stay at this hotel for a long period of time and yet again it was great.  Staff was awesome and helpful the continental breakfast was over and above any other I have ever been too.  Nice and close to the park and great restaurant right beside the hotel (coco;s).  The only down side was the internet connection was horrible and if you need internet during your stay this may not be the hotel for you.  Parking lot was over full by the end of the day, was tough to find parking and never could I park near my room it was always on the other side of the hotel so a bit of a walk.   Other than that the pool was great, the hotel grounds and the rooms were exceptionally clean, never saw a bug of any sort in my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all the great comments on the staff and property. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: We had great service from start to finish.  We arrived LATE and they were very accommodating to get us in our room quickly.  Close to grocery store, and within walking distance of convention center and Disneyland.  Breakfast was always hot and plentiful, great restaurant with awesome food and prices right next door.   Had to pay extra for parking though.  :/  Our bed was small and uncomfortable though.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. The Anaheim Convention Center was about a 5-10 minute walk. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland. It is a place to shower and sleep. If you just need a bed it is okay. If you want luxury then this is not the place for you. Make sure that you specify whether you want smoking or non-smoking rooms when you register on-line or over the phone. Let them know how old your children are and ask if they are free to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute to the parks through Downtown Disney. If you have any questions on your reservation don‚Äôt hesitate to ask we are open 24 hrs.

Summary Heading: Next best thing to the Disney hotels
Summary: Excellent location for Disney parks and Downtown Disney and close to shopping. Good sized room and very clean. Surprisingly quiet for the location. Excellent view of the Disney fireworks. There is a great selection of healthy food for breakfast and fresh fruit available as well as a large area to sit. Very family friendly. The pools were a good size and although we did not use them there were plenty of happy kids in them.
Manager Response: We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. You can see the firework from poolside room or just hanging around the pool area. In our full breakfast we have plenty for everyone to have. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Decent price for a place to sleep after Disneyland. Rooms are stuffy,  ok in April but would be hot in summer. Annoying there is no room safe but free safe box at reception. On the plus side comfy beds, excellent front desk staff, rooms serviced well, good basic brekky to start day & nice short walk to Disneyland. Would recommend for budget travelers.
Manager Response: We hope to see you guys soon! We appreciate your business. Thank you very much for your review.

Summary: We booked this for a decent price. This hotel was about a 7-8 min walk to Disneyland. When we got there we were able to check in early which was nice. Our air conditioning wasn't working right so we had to call.  It took them a while to come to fix it and it was nighttime so the kids were asleep then awakened by the man fixing it, only to have it not working right again the next morning. We continued to have issues with it the two days we were there. Then, the day we were leaving they turned the water off because they were working on the place next door, so we couldn't use the toilets, sinks or showers. The room was clean and a decent size for a family. I would probably try something different if we go again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I hope that we were able to fix the pending issue. Hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here while our trip to Disneyland. It is very close to the parks, there is also a shuttle bus every 20 minutes between Hotel and Parks. Room was nice, clean with a big flat Screen TV with many channels. Hotel had also a pool but it is next to a street and only a fence is between street and pool so anyone can look in. Also the Internet was very poor. But the breakfast was very rich and good! You have everything you need, Eggs, Meat, Bread, Cereals, Yoghurt, Waffles or Pancakes and they Change it a Little every day, like one day Ham, next day Bacon and next day sausages. Breakfast was a big plus! I enjoyed the stay. So if you dont plan on streaming movies and have Patience even to wait until normal Websites open, then it is fine. But I have to say this you find Problem
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I hope that we were able to fix the pending issue. Hope to see you again.

Summary: not really worth the price, but given the location, of course they can charge more.  Air conditioner was very loud, parking was hard to find, breakfast was awful. cant reccomend this as a comfortable place to stay, it is close to attractions and thats why they can charge a high rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that when coming to the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Attended a conference in Anaheim, and was very pleased with the room, the amenities and the staff. The room was clean, large, and had plenty of towels and extra pillows and blankets. The onsite breakfast was pretty elaborate for a "continental" breakfast (included eggs and sausage/bacon) and there was plenty of variety so I can't imagine anyone wouldn't be able to find something they could eat.  Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Would not recommend this hotel, Stay at the Best Western Park Place in instead. They will treat you like you should be treated and won't steal from you or accuse you of fraud. They harassed us for 2 days and then made the rest of our trip terrible by reseting our room keys everyday so when we would return to the hotel we had to get new ones each time. Housekeeping rummaged through my mothers luggage and stole jewelry.
Manager Response: This is not a true statement. We have very trustworthy housekeepers and they have worked here for years.

Summary: The Stovall is in a great location with approx a 5 to 10 minute walk to Disneyland. It is a great place to stay if you want to spend all day at Disneyland and come back to a comfortable bed. Unfortunately the internet is basically non exsistant. Also the breakfast can be very busy unless you get there very early, Also there is no safe in your room. The rooms next to Coco restaurant are the best as they are quiet, you can also see the fireworks from your balcony and the swimming pool is right in front of you. Coco's restaurant is excellent and great value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk through Downtown Disney. We have been working with a new provider for our WIFI. It will go live on June 11th. We don‚Äôt have safes in the rooms. They are located at the front desk at no charge. You can see the fireworks from the 3rd floor poolside or at the pool.

Summary: I would NOT recommend this hotel, it was very poorlyl maintained and overall felt dirty.  My biggest annoyance was that the wifi worked for a total of about 45 minutes during my 5-night stay.  I complained frequently to the hotel and worked with the Netlink tech support, but it only worked for about 45 minutes during my last day.  My laptop would connect, but it would time out before I could do anything.   Same with my tablet and my smartphone.  In addition, the shower handle was extremely loose and would not shut off completely, the handle to my door fell off (fortunately I got it back on sufficiently to use it), and the air conditioner was extremely noisy.  Although I asked frequently, a manager was never available to speak to.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have been working with a new provider for our WIFI. It will go live on June 11th. Netlinks is no longer with us.We always have a manager on duty. And if not available please do leave a voice mail and she will return your call as soon as possible. We also have staff members that can assist. We hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: Great experience and professional staff at this hotel. We will be staying here again... Having so many pools was a plus as well. The front desk was happy to give us directions to anywhere we needed to go and the grounds maintence was just as helpful when we were having difficulties with our parking pass.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. It‚Äôs always nice to take a dip in the pool after a long day at the parks. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to assist you with the parking pass. Hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We had email confirmation for our reservations and they tried to up our pricing at check in!!!! Unbelievable customer service!! This is the second problem we have had in five years with this same location!! There will not be a third stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that we were able to help you with this error. I‚Äôm sure that this is not being done intentionally. If the rate was the problem it can be confirmed and corrected. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: We loved staying at Stovall's and we will stay again.
Summary: We have stayed at the Stovalls inn in aniheim twice now and we have been very satisfied both times. The rooms are great the breakfast is great and the distance to Disneyland is perfect. It is our favorite hotel to stay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Very nice to know that you are going to be one of our regulars to come and visit. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: I stayed at Stovall's because it was close to the conference center.  Nice place, no frills, good value.  Had issues with wi-fi availability, but everything else was fine.  I would stay here again for conference attendance in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: It is an excellent place to stay if you are going to stay and visit Disneyland.  They serve a large variety breakfast each morning with different items each morning. The 2 pools and 3 hot tubs are wonderful after a long day of site seeing.  Has transportation for you to use to see the sites that stops right in front of the hotel. The staff there is very friendly and helpful.  Would give a 4 star recommendation to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast. We hope that you come and visit us again!

Summary: We had stayed at the Stovall's Inn 2 years ago at the same time.  They have done some updates to the rooms and the front lobby--looks great!!  The rooms were clean and the front desk staff are very helpful and friendly.  It's a little quieter as it is behind the California Adventure Park.  It is a short walk (10mins) to the Grand Californian Hotel, which you can cut through to get in to Downtown Disney or California Adventure Park. A good, budget-friendly place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you love the renovation that we did to the lobby! We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I will make sure at tell the staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: We had a very comfortable stay at this hotel while visiting Disneyland.  I don't think I'll ever stay anywhere else!  Great quality for the price. Our room was quiet which is unusual for this area.  We loved the decor and it was easy to order food for delivery.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, overall it is very clean and the staff are friendly. They provide breakfast which is nice when you are spending a lot of money at Disney for the day. My only complaint is that the carpet in my room # 212 was very worn and dingy, it should be replaced.  I do think this hotel is a little overpriced, but I understand because of its close proximity to Disney theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. At this very moment we are changing the carpet for the whole property. We hope that you come and visit us again soon!

Summary: My family and I have stayed at this location before and for what you get for the money and proximity you cant beat it for a mid-level Hotel. Remember this is not Hilton. 1 block to Disney Via the beautiful Californian Hotel and the through Downtown Disney-very simple. They provide a wide variety of breakfast foods in a chaotic environment with all the families, but that makes it fun as well. Comfortable beds and shower heads that actually give you a good flow. Every staff member we encountered at this location is more then willing to help you with any and all needs. I highly recommend this place, but remember this is mid-level, If you want a Marble floor entry stay at Double Tree Hilton, but why waste the money on a Hotel when your never in it! Mike-Boise, Id
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We appreciate all your great comments. I will make sure and share with the staff!

Summary: This is a great hotel if you don't expect to have solid Internet access.  During my 5 day stay at this hotel in April the Internet access was extremely spotty.  At times the DHCP server couldn't even give leases to connecting clients.  Something's broken in the network and I hope they fix it as that would have made my stay much more enjoyable.  Other than that I have no complaints!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are currently working with another company with WIFI. We are making the necessary changes to make sure that we correct any problems with WIFI.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. The location was great and it was an easy walk top Disneyland parks. The rooms were a good size and they were updated. The beds were only doubles,  which were a bit small,  but the mattresses and pillows were comfortable. The pools were nice.  There was also a nice breakfast each morning.  There was a convenient laundry room as well.  Overall it was a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. The walk to the parks is beautiful. At night all the trees are lit and the way back to the hotel. We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the pools and the breakfast. We do have a laundry area in the hotel for guest use. Hope to see you guys again.

Summary: I checked in with my family for a three day trip to the Magic Kingdom. The room and staff were great. Hotel was within my budget, accommodations were well above par, and located a quick shuttle ride away from the park. Being on a budget, I really appreciated the breakfast. It was well stocked with a large variety of hot and cold items and was included with the room. This hotel is not a 5 Star Luxury Resort, but it is a great place to stay with a family when in the area. I will definitely return next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you loved our hotel. We hope to see you and your family back again!

Summary: Typical Best Western Standard, but don't know why it's 'BW Plus'. Preferred having breakfast at external locations. Wireless LAN Access was very slow in rooms 537/538. Anyway, it's a good place to stay while you are in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: This hotel has been recently renovated and is within a 10 minute walk to Disneyland main gates.  Good breakfast included for families.  There is typically a large rush about an hour before park opens, so plan your time accordingly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We did renovate the lobby area last October. We hope that you loved the new look. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: charged for parking    $20.00      !!!!   clean  ---   1 cockroach  ----coco;s restaurant was great -tons of food!!!!!prime rib!!! staff was nice  gardens were adorable  pool was nice clean   ,clean ,clean  .comfy bed  close to disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: My stay was nice, but there were a few concerns.  There were a few bugs flying around the room.  The noise level was high, but it was the National Cheerleading Competition being held.  The maintenence/janitorial staff barged in unexpectedly a few times, but overall I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I hope that we were able to find out what bugs were flying in the room. Any concerns with the staff or any other issue, please let us know right away. We hope to see you again.

Summary: The beds are so comfortable!. My daughter and I stayed for 9 nights. Great staff, very friendly and helpful. Close to Disneyland. We walked to the front gate in 10-15 minutes. There is also the ART stop right out front which will take you to the front gate. Coco's is on the property. Well priced and good food. We liked the fridge and microwave. Great location. Very clean. Breakfast included. Huge variety of food. Would recommend and will stay there again. We felt it was great value for the dollar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you had a wonderful time here with us. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. If you don‚Äôt feel like walking there is an ART shuttle that can take you to the parks at a minimal fee. They will pick you up in front of the hotel. See you soon!

Summary: I was extremely pleased with this hotel. The outside of this hotel looks older but the inside is really nice inside with granite counter and beautiful bathroom tiles.  Decor was newly done and very rich looking. Bed and pillows very comfortable. Large breakfast area with eggs and sausage, yogurt, fruit etc.  Within walking distance to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center.  I would definitely stay here again and recommend this hotel.  Has 2 pools and a jacuzzi too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business and all the great things you have mentioned about out property. We hope that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas after a long day at the parks. See you soon!

Summary: Just got back from staying at the Best Western PLUS  Stovall's Inn.  I'd definitely stay here again.  The location to Disney, Shopping and Freeway access is great.  It's about a 15 minute walk to the park.  Cutting through California Adventure Hotel shortened the walk and you end up in the middle of Downtown Disney.  Because breakfast is included, if you have kids, it is a time and money saver.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast before you went to the parks. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is a little shortcut through the Grand Californian hotel that a lot of our guests take to enter the parks.

Summary: Clean and nice. Excellent beds. We didn't get up early enough for breakfast (recovering from Disneyland all day the day before. Two nice restaurants within 1/2  block. Very nice for such a crowded area in a very busy place. We will use it again if we have to return to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. A lot of our guests compliment us on the beds. They claim to have had the best sleep ever ÔÅä you are surround by restaurants that you can walk too.

Summary: After reading some reviews...I was a bit skeptical.  I travel a lot with my daughter so want a safe environment as well as a clean room.  Got that.  Usually I stay at hotels with interior corridors but it was very well lighted around the property and cars cannot go in or out without a pass card.  I had to go out to the car at 4:30 am and go to the car...saw the security guard walking up and down the outside corridors.  My room was clean and beds comfortable...very brown tones so I opened the curtains to always have the bright light.  You can watch and hear the fireworks from Disney from pool area.   Breakfast wasn't five star but not as bad as some reviewed.  Dannon yogurt, apples, bananas, cold cereal, toast, donuts, muffins.  I had breakfast there three days...waffles and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to fix anything that you reported right away. We always have security on premises. We are always ready to help when needed. We hope to see you and your family soon!

Summary Heading: Best Western Stovall Inn in Anaheim
Summary: This is a great hotel.  It's also a great value.  It's close to Disneyland and the convention center.  It's great that it offers a free breakfast as well.  We stay here every time we come to our annual conference.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed at Stovells for the Anaheim leg of our trip. The room was clean and tidy although a little dark. Unfortunately due to a travel agent muck up we got given 2 double beds instead of a queen so was not as comfortable as we would have liked. Laundry facilities downstairs are handy. Nice a close to Disneyland. Coco's next door was great for food. I still dream of that place. Their pies are great too. Stovalls itself supplies a buffet breakfast in the morning and while "ok" I wouldn't rate it any better than that but fine fo families etc. The grounds were nice and the topiaries were neat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I agree Coco‚Äôs always has great pies. See you soon!

Summary: I have not stayed here before but would definitely stay here again. The hotel is close enough to Disneyland to walk, even after a full day and sore feet. The morning breakfast had a wide variety to choose from but don't be to late. There are several restaurants open that are very close if you choose. The beds were comfy and the room was clean. My only complaint is that walls must be thin because the people above us were very noisy. I could hear when they were walking around.  Overall one of the biggest bangs for our dollar.  Thanks Best Western.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure Park through Downtown Disney. There are plenty of restaurants in the area to walk too. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: We are not a picky family however this place is a real disappointment. I choose this place solely on location, the continental breakfast and because its a best western. The location is fine. The breakfast is AWEFUL! Meals were same all 3 days. Hard pancakes, cardboard tasting waffles, beagles were stale, donuts were broken into pieces, juices were diluted, eggs tasted like they weren't even eggs, like powder or something and the only fruit offered were red soft apples.  The room; only thing nice was the beds. The carpet was dirty, the bathroom was tiny! AC unit broken in pieces in our room, so got one night we couldn't even open it window, I called front desk and they didn't know what to do. Not enough power outlets, had to unplug light to charge my phone. The pool area is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 15-20 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure Parks through Downtown Disney. We alternate our breakfast items every day. We hope that when you come and visit the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The employees were very helpful, courteous, and friendly.  One thing that I found to be a slight problem was the door to my room.  It was hard to open and I had to try many times.  I believe there was something wrong with the electronic mechanism of the lock.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We stay in a lot of hotels including 5 star luxury hotels and Honestly this hotel by far was the most comfortable , clean and welcoming we have stayed at ! The price was outstanding , The staff could not have been more helpful and had a lot of knowledge everywhere they recommended was great  ! We felt safe and welcomed for the entire duration of our stay . The breakfast that is included is also good with a wide selection that changes daily. We would recommend this to couples and families and cannot wait to stay here again when we visit the states !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself at our property. I will make sure and let the front desk know to keep up their great work. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: This was a very nice hotel. We had a great view of Disneyland's fireworks. We stayed in room 455 it is a smoking double bed. However it did not smell like old smoke and the room was very clean. They are very close to Disneyland with in walking distance, however we drove to the park. The breakfast that the hotel offers is great and the customer service at the property was awesome. Very happy with our stay and hope to stay at this property again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 15-20 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure parks through Downtown Disney. I will make sure and let the staff know to keep up the great work that they are doing. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Walking distance to Downtown Disney, Disneyland and California Adventures.  You are able to purchase 2-day tickets at the front desk to avoid lines at the park.  Rooms are clean and has a decent breakfast for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We so offered the 2, 3, 4 and 5 day park hopper passes at the hotel. You can avoid the lines at Disneyland by buying your tickets with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Stayed there to be within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: Disclaimer: we stayed at this room "free" on points, so in that respect it was great value! Room probably would have cost us about $145 or so had we needed to pay for it out of pocket.  I will review this making the assumption that we'd had to pay for it.  It is "across the street from Disneyland" as their website and marketing claims, but note it is still a fair walk "across the street"  before you get to the Disneyland gates.   It's easy and pleasant, but it does take some time.  It makes more sense to leave the rental car at the hotel ($10) and walk instead of pay for parking at Disneyland, which is presumably more than the $10 charged by the hotel.  We only arrived in the evening, spent a few hours at Disneyland, and then checked out again the next morning, so didn't spend a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.

Summary: We were very surprised at how close a walk to Disney it was.  There is also a nice dining in restaurant that serves delicious pies etc., you may also do take out orders here. The hotel room was clean and building was very nice.  Breakfast prepared in the mornings were excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will make sure and tell the breakfast staff to keep up the great work that they are doing. We hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary: This Best Western has the best location, a super-friendly staff, clean and comfortable rooms, microwaves & refrigerators in every room.  They have clean and inviting hot tub/pools.  The  breakfast selection and times are perfect.  Having breakfast on site makes this location well worth the money spent on the rooms (which are already a great value).  We have stayed at 5 different hotels (including the Disneyland resorts) and we would recommend the Stovall's Inn location over the rest.  Excellent value and service.  Thank you, Stovall Inn staff for making our vacation so wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all the great comments! We are happy to hear that you loved our breakfast. All of our rooms include microwaves and fridges, hair dryers, coffee makers and iron/boards. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Someone try to break in to our room while we were watching TV. Hotel staff seemed unconcerned and only gave us new keys. We paid for parking and we had to search for hours for a space. They apparently sell more parking than is available.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. If you ever have a problem finding a parking spot, please ask the front desk to assist. We can have someone go help immediately.

Summary: Very convenient location to the convention center. The room rate is very reasonable for what is offered. Excellent Beds, Free Internet Access and complimentary breakfast. The parking rate for overnight guest is also reasonable. Overall it is a very good deal
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: The Stovall's inn , Clean, Nice staff , Great location. Great value. For area and genral rates of other like hotel I would suggest checking this place out.  The 2 pools are also very well kept and cleaned daily.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you were able to enjoy our pools. Our gardeners and maintenance staff take pride in keeping the property looking clean. Hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: I've stayed here each year when I attend an Expo at the Convention Center each March. I love this place as the staff is friendly, helpful and responsive. The rooms are decorated nicely in dark colors which provides a restful environment. It is a step above an average Best Western and designed to serve the needs of the business community. I was upset that I could not access the internet during my two night stay. I was told that they realized they need a stronger feed. This caused me some stress as I only brought my iPhone and could not use it most of the time. Otherwise, the rooms are very clean. I do not ever eat breakfast as I don't care to consume any of the foods provided. I eat super healthy and find the breakfast buffet to be sub-standard in quality although it would
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up their great work. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: We generally stay here with a military voucher and find the hotel clean and well within walking distance of Disney. The lobby has been remodeled with three counters available. I think this enhances the check-in because you don't have everyone hanging on the counter waiting. The breakfast was decent and hot, lots of bacon, donuts, cereal, "eggs", waffles, and yogurt. I recommend bringing the tray from the room and bringing back food for the kids. It's easier.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We are very happy to have Military families stay with us. We do offer a voucher program through their base. If you are not sure you can always call the hotel and we can help with any questions. Our breakfast is large enough and has different options for our guests to choose from. We are about 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel during the Natural Products Expo West. I was so thoroughly impressed by the friendly, helpful and humble staff; the clean hotel grounds and spotless rooms; and efficiency of service. I can't say enough about how clean and comfortable my room was. It was well stocked with everything I needed, and I could tell the hotel recently upgraded fixtures etc because things looked new and shiny. Overall I greatly recommend this hotel if you're looking for something simple and clean with nice people. Plus there's a Denny's right next door for late night grub.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. I heard that this year‚Äôs Natural Products Expo West was larger than last year. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great work that they are doing. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Staying here currently for a dTradeshow. Wireless is spotty at best, phone doesn't work (can use my mobile), an bathroom smells of urine.  Also TV is broken and the workout room is still under repair from a year ago. You can use the gym down near their sister property which is easily found next to the liquor store and head shop.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We have taken care of any internet issues that we had pending. We are about a 5 minute to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: First of all, this hotel offered one of the cleanest rooms I have ever stayed in. I am a stickler for looking to find anything dirt or yuck related in hotels, and I literally found nothing amiss, and everything exceeded my expectations (with the one exception being the air conditioner, with works fine, but was a bit old and grimy). Our room looked to be newly refurbished, and was very clean even on our second and third day after servicing. Hotel staff were generally friendly and helpful. The breakfast isn't fabulous - it's standard "hot continental" with fruit, cereal, milk, yogurt, breads and pastries (though these were usually gone by the time we were downstairs, around 8-9am), orange juice, apple juice, waffles, eggs (powdered/scrambled) and sometimes bacon and/or potatoes.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland and the California Adventure through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that you loved our property. We hope to see you again!

Summary: The hotel had issues with fixing burnt out lightbulbs and not informing guests when making reservations or checking in  that their internet service was down...and stayed down for at least 5 days that I know of. Also the coffee at breakfast was pretty close to sludge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We did have a problem with the internet. It was something out of our control. The fiber was cut at a different location and we were one of the properties that suffered. We tried our best to help this situation but unfortunately it took longer than expected.  We hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: within walking distance to Disneyland, which was great. awesome staff. the restaurant next door was really good and cheap. the included breakfast that the motel gave us was ok for one or two breakfasts, but not enough to keep interested for a week long stay. very basic. the room was plenty big enough and clean. the wifi was poor range, but the one in the restaurant was where we seemed to use it mostly anyway
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great work. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: Hi we stayed here the first night we got all bit up by bed bugs than they moved us and we got bit up in that room to  the bites are vary inchy and all they did for us was gave us half our money back it was the worst place we stayed at don't stay there
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was picked for its closeness to the Convention Center. It is also close to Disney. Pretty good all round but let down by its wifi which was down all week - no good at all for business guests - and yet the staff consistently hid the extent of the failure. I would have moved hotels if I had known how bad it was going to be as I had a lot to do that simply was not done. The breakfast was barely adequate, the worst I have encountered in 20 years of Best Westerns. The bed was good and I guess I could highly recommend it but for that failure of trust between me and the staff over the wifi.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. The wifi being down was unexpected. We were hoping that the company would bring it up as fast as possible. Unfortunately it took longer than we thought. We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you with legendary service.

Summary: Stayed three nights for a convention.  Booked this place because of complimentary wifi which was needed to deal with customers at convention.  Wifi inop throughout stay.  Nothing but excuses from staff.  Unacceptable.  Place is very clean but dated.  Caters to the Disneyland crowd for sure.  Thought parking was complimentary but found out it was not.  Next time I'll stay someplace nicer and away from Disneyland.  I'll drive to convention center if I have to.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We understand that the wifi is very important. The fiber was cut in a different location and unfortunately we were affected by it. We tried for the company to get it up as soon as possible but it took longer than expected. We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you with legendary service.

Summary: Room was dirty, toilet did not flush, internet was down, very expensive for the actual accommodations, and front desk failed to call in my cab as I requested the day before, and nearly missed my flight home. Would not recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you with legendary service.

Summary Heading: My go to hotel in Anaheim
Summary: The staff are great.  The breakfast room is larger but didn't think the items were as good.  The front desk has been remodeled.  It's ok but I think it had a warmer feel prior.  The beds are comfy.  Can't beat the location.  Easy to the freeway.  Short walk to Disney if that's your destination
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you come and visit us again soon.

Summary: stayed here for 2 nights for disneyland. Hotel was in an excellent location with just a 15min walk to Disneyland. Even closer to Downtown Disney where we ate & shopped. The room was clean, beds were comfortable, and the hot breakfast was  very good with many hot & cold foods to choose from. Ate dinner at Coco's Restaurant next door which was very reasonably priced & good instead of those high cost Disney meals. I'll definitely come back here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: My family and I decided to stay here the last night of our Disneyland vacation.  We have always stayed at Best Western as it is a good value for what you get, i.e. breakfast, clean rooms and friendly staff.  Oh but not at this Best Western establishment, they have their own category for hotels now.  This location is so bad I don't even know where to begin........upon check in at 10pm at night the girl behind the desk was busy doing nothing but made me wait until she was done with whatever she was not doing, then she did not explain the parking situation and that the parking ticket she gave me was needed to be able to exit the lot, she told me where my room was at (which was not were she said it was), they have no luggage carts to help you with your bags.  Now on to the room,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We do hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you with legendary service.

Summary Heading: Great Value and Short walk to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I have stayed at Stovall's Best Western Inn many times throughout the years as I attend trade shows at the Anaheim Convention Center.  The rooms are well appointed with a microwave, refrigerator and plenty of room to spread my computer and work materials.  The beds are VERY comfortable and as a rule the rooms are quiet.  As with most Best Western Plus lodgings, there is a generous complementary breakfast buffet in the morning and in room coffee.  If you want a sit down meal, there is a Coco's directly adjacent to the property and many other options within a block. In this particular case, the proximity to the convention center is about a close as the big hotels that cost 2 to 3 times as much a night and if you are like me, It is far enough away to escape the lobby crowds etc...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Very happy to hear that you have been staying at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for many years. We are about a 5 minute to the Anaheim Convention Center. We have room service with Coco‚Äôs restaurant which is located next door. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: No internet was available during our stay.  No explanation made for why it was out or when it would be functioning.  We needed to work for a few hours a day while on vacation, and this was impossible.  Staff was unhelpful and had to explain over and over we couldn't get a strong enough signal to log in to their system, they kept giving us the password and telling us we had to log in to access the WIFI.  That's great, if I have a signal that I can log in to!  Caused work disruptions which dimmed the quality of our vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. We believe that we have fixed out problem. We had to replace some antennas that were somehow damaged. We hope that you come back and visit us again.

Summary Heading: Below average hotel near Disneyland,small but clean rooms and Paper thin walls and bad WiFi.
Summary: I don't want to call this a "bad" hotel, but I did have a number of problems with this place.  The biggest problem this hotel has is that you can hear the adjacent rooms as if there was no wall at all. You will hear every toilet flush, baby crying, kids tantrum, TV and door slam form the room next to you. We stayed in room 335 for a week, and had 3 different families next door and we could hear everything that happened in the room.  Some of the other problems: The WiFi was terrible. It would cut out all the time and when you could stay connected it was dog slow. This is a problem b/c the sprint network around Disneyland is also totally overloaded so half the time my cell phone wouldn't work also. The rooms are very small. They have just enough room to the fit 2 TWIN (not Queen)
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to Best Western‚Äôs for your lodging needs.

Summary: If you're not sleeping in, and not having bfast at the hotel, then this place is prrrrrrrfffffffeeeeeecccccct.  This place is close to a liquor store and an italian restaurant and two bfast places.  we walked to disneyland... the walk is not that long.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are close by restaurant and shopping. We can give more information once you arrive. The front desk is always ready to answer any questions.

Summary: The hotel staff was really great, accommodating and aimed to please. The internet was really poor or not at all.  It's not a 10 min walk to Disneyland but the shuttle is in front of hotel so that's a plus.  The breakfast provided was good and plentiful.  There is no ventilation in the bathrooms so take some spray or use lobby bathroom!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our internet has been fixed and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you with legendary service.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed four nights while visiting Disneyland. The room was great we had two adults one kid, plenty of room for us. The beds were very comfortable! It was nice having a fridge and microwave to keep leftovers from eating out and being able to warm stuff up too. It is about a twenty mintue walk to Downtown Disney from the way we discovered, we weren't 100% where we were going but once we found a way to the park kept the same route entering and leaving few times each day. We didnt use the pool at all while here so cant say much about it and my husband got coffee each morning from the breakfast area but we didnt eat here either though it looked pretty crowded every morning. With in walking distance to a few different places to eat and convenient stores. I would definitely
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that you had a great time. We hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary: This was the 2nd time i stayed at this best western. This hotel has very nice redone rooms that are very clean. Staff was so nice. Has breakfast every morning. High speed internet, air condition, microwave, small fridge, swimming pool, Tv with cable. There is also a restaurant right next door to it. One of the bad things about this place is its a little of a walk to disneyland. Its about a 10minute walk. I would for sure stay at this best western again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California parks through Downtown Disney.  All of our rooms have micro, fridge, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and board. We also have room service with Coco‚Äôs restaurant that is located in our premises. We do hope to see you again.

Summary: this hotel was great, clean, staff were friendly- on in particular went above and beyond to help. free internet any time you need it in the business area. free breakfast daily was yum- but get in first open as it can get busy. only negatives were the lack of info about the great bus service that comes right outside and goes to disney and all and they sell tickets for cheap- no one told me this. some people were complaining of noise but my room was fine- ground floor room. also be aware it is a little more than a 5-10min walk to disney as i was told... otherwise great hotel would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. I apologize if we had a miscommunication mishap. Thank you for letting us know. We always want to give Legendary Service to all of our guests. We do sell shuttle tickets for the ART bus which is the shuttle that can take you to Disneyland and the California Adventure parks. You can also walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We do hope to see you again.

Summary: Hotel was lovely. Great location to Disneyland.  Rooms were clean and fridge to keep snacks in. Wifi dropped out last two days. Was never told prices of overseas calls by front desk, 2 calls home added up to $300.  Breakfast was good for the average pereon who likes cereal.  Eggs and waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: I stay here because it is within walking distance to the Convention Center and I don't want to pay convention rates at he 5 stars. It has mostly Disneyland tourists on budgets - they type who bring in food and eat in their rooms. Loads of little ones running around but the whole place is very quiet after 9:00. The hotel is clean basic shelter and a good place to stay. This is the 3rd year I have stayed here when in Anaheim for a convention. If you are not expecting a 5 star experience, you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Budget property - you get what you pay for (no wifi)
Summary: We booked the Stovall's inn for a few reasons ; recommendation from friends who stayed there, proximity to park and it included the "extras" that we were looking for (pool, hot continental breakfast, wifi as I am self employees and needed to communicated with my customers)  when we checked in on Saturday Feb. 8th, we were told by the front desk staff (who by the way were very friendly, helpful) that the Wifi was down and was not expected up till monday at the earliest. I asked again on Sunday, and was told "well they might be by today to fix it, but we really don't know" .... monday there was still no wifi. As a self employed small business owner, i really needed to be in contact with my customers, so i paid for roaming. Service was finally restored on Wednesday, the last full
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to assist you with your roaming fees. I know that it was frustrating we understand how it can be not to be able to check on emails and things that you have pending. We do hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: Suggestion Southern California is known for its hot weather. Should make sure all units have working air conditioners. I rented two roons can tell differences one rooom from other. Unfortunately we have the room lacks good air conditioning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and check into this. We hope to see you again.

Summary: I made a mistake and forgot to make my reservation at the Hilton, Sheraton or Marriot for a big trade show at the Anaheim Convention Center until it was too late and there was not room in the inn.  I searched for hotels within walking distance and settled on the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn.  I was so pleasantly surprised!  My room was very nice.... comfortable and clean.  I appreciated the free wifi and breakfast (eggs, waffles and bacon).  The walk to the Convention Center was easy and actually pretty nice.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. We are happy to hear that you loved our property. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: It was conveniently located next to Disney theme parks and the Anaheim convention center. Above that, it was a very average experience. The walls are very thin between neighboring rooms, leading to a very noisy morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I took my Granddaughter to Disneyland and we stayed at the BW Stovall.  It's not fancy, but it had everything we needed.  It is within walking distance to Disneyland.  The breakfast buffet was decent and had enough options to please everybody.  There was also a qwik-mart type grocery store only 2 blocks away for food and drinks for the fridge and microwave.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We hope that you and your granddaughter had a wonderful time. We are happy to hear that you have chosen our property to stay again. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I had a brief 3 night stay here in November 2013 and have no complaints.   Pros: I was able to check in early after a 14 hour flight, the room was clean and modern, 5 minute walk to Disneyland, situated amongst affordable diners and restaurants, friendly service, pool area,   Cons: Internet was a bit dodgy- no reception from my room. Tip - I got perfect reception from the pool area
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that we were able to assist you with an early check in. We hope to see you again!

Summary: We make last minute reservations. We didn't know what to expect when we got there. It was better than I could have asked for. The staff went out of their way to help us with an early arrival. The room was.  Nice the breakfast was great. The price was right. Very happy.  Walking distance to everything. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you had a great time at the NAMM show. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Took close to forty minutes to check in.  Not sure why. One clerk shift ended and our check in was taken up by another person.  Had infant with us.  We did not wait in line.  The lengthy check in was due to their system and people.  Next cable was off in room during the Super Bowl.  That was fixed within 3-4 hrs.  However our internet did not work at all during our stay.  Contacted front desk they suggested we contact their internet provider which I did , they basically told me I did not know how to get on the internet , that apple devices are bad and that there was nothing they could do the problem was with the hotel.  I called back to front desk they also said there was little they could do.  We booked thru a travel agent thus paid ahead, otherwise I would have checked out and
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: The hotel was great! The continental breakfast had a decent variety, eggs, bacon, sausage, ham, bagels, etc.  The room was clean and the staff was friendly. The only thing to consider is if you are going to Disneyland with small children, it is a bit of an added walk for little legs. Otherwise, it was a great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We do have a full breakfast that all of our guests can enjoy. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There‚Äôs also a shuttle that can take you to shopping and the parks. It‚Äôs at a minimal fee. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable rooms near Disney parks
Summary: Enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  Rooms are large and reasonably priced and the hotel is one block from Disney parks and Downtown Disney.  The breakfast buffet was surprisingly large and very good.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and the California Adventure parks through Downtown Disney. We are glad that you enjoyed the breakfast. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Hotel was great, rooms were nice. Hotel staff were great our heater didn't work and since we were with family with joint connecting rooms they fixed it right away for us.  Only down fall is all night I could hear people getting ice from machine and buying drinks from vending machine stood at the bottom room 422 ( I think) wish they would find another place to place those machines.  Would stay again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time here with us. Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great property at a bargain price!
Summary: Finally catching up on my reviews!  We stayed here over Labor Day for the Disneyland 1/2 Marathon.  The rooms are fairly small, but the hotel was very nicely renovated with new furnishings, fixtures & carpet.  I typically shy away from exterior corridors but given the area I figured we'd be safe.  The complex was generally quiet & very safe.  The a.m. breakfast was a huge perk & had a great variety.    We chose this hotel for the close proximity to the race start.  If you are not a walker though, this may not be the place for you.  It was a good 1/2 mile + to maingate at Disney, and even CA Adventure that was essentially across the street was a hoof.  We tried the Disney shuttle the first day but felt it was a waste. The shuttle doesn't go right to the gates, so it seemed you
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on the race. We heard the more people signed up then last year. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park and the California Adventure through Downtown Disney.

Summary: Stayed here during the Tinkerbell race weekend. The location is close to the parks, the room was clean and free breakfast every morning.  The front desk staff was courteous and the price was right!  I would stay here again if I didn't stay on Disney property.  It's a great alternative.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on the race. We do hope to see you soon for another race or just for pleasure. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up their great customer service!
