Summary: Nice and quiet. Friendly helpful staff. Booking services for different attractions.  Breakfast provided daily, wide variety of foods. Close walking distance to down town Disney and Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Hope you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland park and California Adventure through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms that open out to car park area, close to Disneyland, Convention Center, Internet service can be slow at peak times. Had some trouble connecting an iPhone. Laptop connector okay but it depends on which room you stay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. If you have any trouble finding connection for any reason we can help. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: The staff/employees of this particular Best Western were tops.  Reliable, knowledgeable, prompt and accommodating.  The hotel itself was clean in and out.  The room was nicely setup and well stocked.  Exactly what was needed for our stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time on letting us know how you rate your stay. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the GREAT customer service. We hope to see you again.

Summary: This hotel is in dire need of a total redo. The beds are absolutely horrendous. Stayed with a group of 40 (each with own room) and 80% complained about the saggy mattresses. I woke every few hours in total misery. The carpets in the rooms is disgusting - stains and odd smells. Avoid this place and opt instead for the newly renovated hotel indigo down the street, or the Annabella next door (a few extra bucks per night is worth the sleep).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. A lot of our guest‚Äôs compliment our beds. They say that ‚ÄúThey had the best sleep ever.‚Äô‚Äô We are in process in changing the carpets on all the rooms. By March or April the whole property will have new carpets and or flooring. We do hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: This was the 2nd time I have had the pleasure of staying at this hotel while participating in the runDisney Race weekend for the Tinkerbell Half Marathon Weekend.  A great off property choice for adults alone or those traveling with children Very clean, within walking distance to the Parks and VERY close to all of the runDisney Race activities.  Free Breakfast was included!  Awesome!  The rooms are spacious, clean and updated.  Loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on the race! We did open the breakfast room early enough for all the runners to eat something before the race started. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Visited Disneyland so stayed at this hotel since it was short walking distance. Professional and helpful staff, room was clean, housekeeping was efficient, and breakfast was good. Would visit again and recommend this hotel to others as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland Park through Downtown Disney. We really appreciate you sharing your great experience with your friends.

Summary: The amenities in the room were amazing! Remote control AC/heater, great mini fridge and powerful microwave. Beautiful decor. A table, desk with extra charging places, including USB charging station, remote control TV with a ton of channels and an armoire. Nice shower/tub unit with shelf for toiletries.  This hotel is very accommodating for RunDisney participants. Opened the full continental breakfast at 4 a.m. on race day so that runners could eat before the race! Eggs, bacon, toast, bagels, donuts, cereal, fruit... you name it, they had it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on the race! We hope that you were able to grab something to eat in the morning before the race started. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary Heading: Best Location, Great Beds, Lousy WiFi!
Summary: Nice rooms, GREAT Beds, best affordable outside-of-Disney location -- but the WiFi is SOOOO bad you shouldn't EVEN think of actually using an IPAD in your room.  VERY sad WiFi.  Housekeeping is probably ok if you leave your room and stay gone the entire day.  I discovered at 0300 race-morning that I had no regular (as opposed to decaf) coffee in the room!  We also lost our room clean-up due to Housekeeping consciously ignoring our specific face-to-face request for cleanup in a two-hour period mid-day (we were recuperating after that time).  the Staff member was between-rooms when I asked, and I know there were no other specific requests yet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on the race. I will look into why you had a WIFI interruption. I will make sure and show the housekeeper mgr. you review. We hope to see you again.

Summary: This hotel is very convenient if you are going to Disneyland.  It is a short walk to the parks.  It has a great heated pool and hot tub.  Very clean.  Although it has complimentary breakfast, it could be improved.  My husband says the coffee wasn't that good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: Great Stay Not So Great Food
Summary: Staff was great! Room was okay, location was great. Breakfast was okay, but the meat selections were poor. Will stay here again. Stovall's Inn is located within walking distance of Disney and the price is way lower than other hotels. There is a Coco's restaurant next door. Food was good. Military discount given. Over all I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed the pools while you were here. We do hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: Being a short walk to Disneyland is a bonus, rooms are okay and bed comfortable, room was clean- only a bit of dust was not wiped while we were there. Would stay again. Breakfast is included and gives you some basic food to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you had a great time while staying with us.

Summary: Family trip to Disney. Hotel staff friendly. Room was clean. They stored our luggage when we arrived before check in time. Just so you're aware, you can hear traffic noise, as all the rooms are to the outside. Breakfast included, made this a great value. Located across the street from the back of Calif Adventure. You can walk to downtown disney, although kids are pretty tired at the end of the day. You can take a City Shuttle  from front of hotel (think it was $5 for adults). Once you have your admission tickets to Disneyland, there is a shorter walk from the hotel to the monorail, which will take you to tomorrow land. Very pleased with the restaurant next door-(coco's)-able to pick up food to go or they also deliver to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Disneyland Park through Downtown. We do have room service that you can order from Coco‚Äôs restaurant. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The pool area is exceptionally cute and clean. Rooms are fairly spacious and also kept clean. The staff was informative and professional. The coco's next to the hotel does room and pool service for a 3.00 fee not too bad. Pretty good size hotel and there are three floors to choose from. All are outside this hotel is not a covered hotel. It has a bit of a bungalow feel, which is good if you are a smoker. Lobby is very warm and welcoming. Parking is ten dollars a night which isn't too bad considering the area, there are a ton of places to walk to from the hotel so there really isn't a need to drive around. 0Overall good experience
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to heat that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We just remodeled our lobby we hope that you loved it. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: I'd like to start by saying we've always stayed at Disney's Paradise Pier when it was just my husband, my two kids, and myself.  Then we had a third child and because we have an extra body to pay for we decided to budget and look into a good neighbor hotel instead of staying at the Paradise Pier.   Because I have three boys that loves to eat, I looked into hotels that provided continental breakfast.  As I was doing my research, I was very skeptical as to what to expect being that we were always staying at the Paradise Pier; however, after reading the reviews on this site, I decided to book Stovalls Inn and our stay at Stovall's Inn turned out to be an EXCELLENT choice!! We were on the first floor so we got to avoid using the stairs/elevator.  Hot Breakfast was winners!!  My boys
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very excited to hear that you have now found a new property to stay at. The Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn is a family owned property and we love to hear that other families feel like home. We hope to see you guys soon!!!!

Summary Heading: Very nice! Good quilts for money!
Summary: Stayed here in August with a friend, our first time ever in America. Very nice hotel, enjoyed the pools, comfy beds, nice enough staff and such a great location for Disneyland! Small shop for food just down the road, restaurants all pretty close, and about a fifteen minute drive to shopping areas. Nice for a short visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you enjoyed your time her in America and that we all treated you like family. We hope that you have found a new home to come and stay with us.

Summary: After reviewing hundreds of motels around the Disney area, I'm glad we chose this one. It is a solid deal. Rate is less than most of the boutique hotels in the area, rooms are clean & comfortable and breakfast has many choices. Pool was fantastic. There are 3 pools & 2 hot tubs. Each pool was a different temperature which was unique. I don't know if that was intentional or not, but it was nice. It was chilly while we were vacationing, (approx. high 60's) but the warmer pool & hot tubs still felt nice. Again, this is a solid, well maintained property. The right or wrong person could pick it apart with petty details, but for a mother/wife vacationing to Disney with kids, this was a solid choice for our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We are glad that you came to the Stovall‚Äôs hotel for you and your family to stay at. We are very excited to hear that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas while staying with us. It‚Äôs perfect to take a dip after a long day at the parks. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: This is where I'll stay everytime!
Summary: I just got back from our first trip to Disneyland. We decided to stay here at Stovall's after much research. The price was one of the lowest around and the hotel was clean, safe and in a great location.   Our experience was really good here! The room was very clean, and the beds were so comfy! I felt very safe even though there was a residential neighborhood just behind the hotel. The grounds were really well kept, and the entire grounds were neat and clean.   The hotel charges a $10 parking fee, but the parking lot is gated, so only hotel guests can stay there, and when you consider Disney charges $16, it's a good deal.  The breakfast was another great part of this hotel. It had the regular pastries, fruit, cereal, and drinks, but it also had hot pancakes, scrambled eggs, and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on letting us know what your experience was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We are very excited to hear that we made your first trip to Disneyland the BEST experience. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure parks through Downtown Disney. We do offer a full breakfast. We have two pools and spas for our guest to enjoy after a long day. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: I've stayed at Stovall's 3 times over the last four years, and I have to say it's been consistently good.  The rooms are nice, and very clean and the free breakfast is really good.  The customer service is always excellent.    With lots of families and not the thickest walls, it isn't the quietest place to stay, however if it's too noisy they are more than happy to move you to another room.  The pools are really nice - very clean and an awesome place to take a break from the busy parks.  Love the animal garden too!  Close walk to Disneyland - around 10 minutes (with a short cut through Grand Californian).
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you come and stay with us. We hope that we make you feel like home. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up their Excellent Customer Service. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We do take pride on keeping the property clean for our guests to enjoy the beautiful garden. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel.  Great military price!  Breakfast had lots of variety.  Ham, bacon, scrambled eggs, potatoes, yogurt, fruit, doughnuts, bagels, milk, coffee, oatmeal, juices.  Our room was comfortable and clean.  We were on the first floor, the bathroom didn't have a vent and window was unsafe as their wasn't a screen if opened it and didn't even know where it lead to... all in all, great place to stay while in Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. On behalf of the Stovall family we like to Thank You for your service! We are happy to hear that you loved the full breakfast that we offer. We don hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel in a great location within walking distance to Disneyland.  Staff is very friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean and comfortable, and breakfast buffet is included. Will stay here again on our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great job that they are doing. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary Heading: OK for sleeping but older & don't count on breakfast or internet
Summary: I would recommend this hotel for families for economy purposes. The internet is VERY slow. The spa/pool closes before the Disney parks do, so don't plan on using them after a long day on your feet. The breakfast is edible but not anything to write home about and if you aren't there early you won't get anything decent to eat. The beds are comfortably firm and rooms are OK in size for sleeping, which if you are coming to do the parks, is all you need. Location is great for Disney and shuttle is the way to go, stops right in front of the hotel for $5/all day pass. Shower/bath combo is nice. Shower flow is good, and tub is deep enough for a nice soak. Overall with kids I would stay here again just for the cost savings, but not someplace I would stay for a romantic get away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the pool after a long day at the parks. We have added more items to the breakfast for our guests to enjoy. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Hi, we are frequent DL visitors and have stayed at many hotels in the area. This hotel is very good value. Rooms have been updated. Wish I could say the same about the pillows. wifi works but you need to log back in frequently. They were updating the lobby when we were here last in October and the finished product looks great. Parking here is very tight so if you arrive late be prepared. We eat almost all our meals as Coco's next door. Brenda and Manuel always take very good care of us. The free breakfast at the hotel all 4 days was a mad house! Ran out of many things and could not keep up. Also hard to find a table. room is well equipped so we grabbed what we needed and supplemented it with our items in the room. We will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you guys come to Disneyland often. During and after any holiday it can be a bit crowded. If there‚Äôs anything that we can help during your stay please let us know. We are always glad to help.

Summary: We decided to go to disneyland at the last minute and we relied on our got to hotel Stovall's greta rates and newly refurbished . Throw in a free brkfst and it is always a winner easy walk to disney and only 10.00 parking fee. Always chk with them when you can
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time on letting us know how you experience was at our property. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: average hotel - a bit of a walk to Disneyland
Summary: It has a very nice appearance and was at a decent price.   You can walk to Disneyland which you can see across the street but to get into the park the walk is a bit longer and would not recommend with small children.  There is a convient shuttle which is reasonable priced.  The breakfast is ok but the pancakes were just aweful.  The coffee makers in the breakfast area where broken half the time.  The area is a bit loud but not to bad.  The main thing was the AC was just atrociously loud and we needed it in January so can only imagine what it would be like in the summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the main gates through Downtown Disney. I would have liked for you to come to the desk and voice your concerns and I would have taken care of it right away. We hope to see you again

Summary: Very nice place to stay within walking distance of Disneyland park.  Even though the walk was longer than the hotels on Harbor Blvd, we enjoyed it more.  Once you cross Katella you're on Disney property and very nice sidewalks.  The hot breakfast was very good with a great variety of food.  Rooms were very nice and included a microwave and fridge.  Will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.  The scenery is beautiful when you are walking to the parks from the hotel. It‚Äôs only a 10-15 minute walk. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: this hotel is in a great location in regards to Disneyland, Downtown Disney and California Adventure.  THe hotel itself is pleasant, clean and very well maintained.  The noise level between the rooms and outside walkway is a bit loud
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us.

Summary: The room price, free breakfast, and proximity to Disneyland were all enticing, but the stay was a letdown!  Breakfast was horrible and way overcrowded! The room had several technical problems and was never cleaned by hotel staff! And paying to park in your own hotel seemed like a bit too much!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your thoughts. I would have liked for you to come and talked to me about your thoughts on the breakfast and what you think would work better. We always welcome the guest‚Äôs opinion. We hope that you will come and visit us again.

Summary Heading: Better than New York, New York in Las Vegas!
Summary: The only thing lacking by comparison was the hottub in the center of the room.  Otherwise, Stovall's Inn was perhaps the best hotel experience we've had in many years.  Our deepest thanks to all the staff for making our son's first trip to Disneyland a truly memorable experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this Best Western primarily because it is the closest you can get to the entrance to Disneyland. The topiary garden and landscaping are beautiful. The rooms have been upgraded and are very nice. The included breakfast is better than many, although the room for sitting is undersized for the rush just before the park opens. Two complaints. First, it is misleading to add a parking fee to the cost when the other Best Western hotels nearby include it; if you are comparing prices you will miss the $10 per day added fee. Second, we were directly across from the pool and discovered that the soundproofing could definitely be improved.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great place to stay.  I was at a conference at the convention center and stayed five days.  The rooms are quite nice and recently upgraded.  The beds are really firm which is so good for me.  The breakfast was good, always something hot, lots of fruit and other choices.  The staff were terrific and very helpful.   It was very convenient.  And the price is right.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We arrived here after 24hours of flying, so we where tired and a little grumpy. The staff could not have been any happier to try and get us into a room earlier than normal check in. We did have a small problem with a leaking tape in the shower, the lumber came straight away and said it would take an 1hour to fix or he could see about another room. He came back within 15minutes and moved us to another room. The staff throughout the hotel where always courteous and helpful. The breakfast is buffet so you are better to arrive early to get a table but people move through quickly so it is not a huge problem. It is so close to Disneyland if you want to come during the day for a rest but best of all Coco's restaurant is next door. Food at Disneyland id expensive and some times you have
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will not returning. We have Disney passes and have stayed at several best westerns in Disney area. This motel is comparable to the others but I was not able to sleep on such hard beds. My 14 year old daughter said the same.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean and updated. The breakfast was decent for serving so many people. I definitely recommend eating before 7:30am as it gets very busy.  The staff was friendly and helpful. They had a room available to us when we arrived at 10:30am.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The stay was good,but after the stay I tried to get an item that my wife left returned but all calls to the hotel were sent to housekeeping with no response from them.It wasn't a big deal but once we were gone no service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the second time staying at the Stovall's Best Western for a visit to Disneyland. The Staff was very courteous. Our first room had the window view blocked by the building partition. They quickly assisted us in finding a better room. The breakfast is plentiful and pretty good for the typical hotel breakfast lobby. We will be back again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Checked in super late Sunday night. For some reason they gave us a handicap room. The room was very nice & furnished well. Bed was hard & uncomfortable but then again I have a king memory foam at home so nothing can really compare. Had a bit of an issue with the toilet, it would run & run & run. Had to jiggle the handle after every flush. BUT the main draw back was since it was a handicap room, the shower was a walkin (with only a curtain) that had a little seat to sit on. Long story short... everytime we took a shower the whole bathroom floor would be soaking wet. It was very hard because of the placement of the shower head. OTHERWISE the hotel was pretty close to Downtown Disney. 10 minute walk. Not bad for the price. $100 a night. Oh & there was FREE breakfast. Not the best
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 5 nights and we will never stay there again. We had ants every morning and even after complaining daily they did nothing and never even came to the room to do anything about them. The front desk people were rude every time we went there whether to tell them about the ants or ask a question. They would go to the back or act busy and would make no attempts to help. We were told numerous lies about when the ART buses would run and we sat out front on one occasion for an hour waiting. They did have breakfast daily that had bad pancakes,rubbery eggs and rotated between sausage links that tasted bad,grease soaked bacon, bland potatoes and diced ham that was fair. We ate the cereal,yogurt,bagels and fruit that they did not prepare and that got old over the course of five
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good location, walking not bad,  room was comfortable, only problem I found is that there's carpet in the vanity area, I don't understand why this is so, it's just doesn't feel like its a sanitary,the room would look soo much cleaner and modern if it wasn't carpet,  the quality of continental breakfast could be better, nothing taste real and horrible coffee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This mote,l right across the street from Disneyland, is a great value.  It is easy walking distance to Downtown Disney and both parks. Clean well kept rooms, reasonable parking rate, and nice breakfast each morning.  Property is kept spotless.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is clean and employees are accommodating. Easy walk to Disneyland. Great coffee shop across the street. Nice breakfast included with the room and free internet. Second time that we have stayed there this year!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is an eyes view of Disneyland. Great Breakfast, and the staff was very nice. First night we asked for extra towels. Within min someone delivered them to us!! :) The room was nice, but the carpet needed upgrading and the A/C unit wasn't installed very nicely. And no one explained how the shuttle works to us. Stood in line not knowing that shuttle tickets have to be purchased in the gift shop. So, we ended up having to miss the shuttle (they wont wait on you lol!!) Other than that they hotel is a nice place to stat
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were at Disneyland and this facility was booked . Then it happned we decided to stay another night and were Happy  Stovall's had rooms for us this time. A Very nice experience. Clean, well appointed  rooms, Comfortable beds,well done breakfast and across the street from Disneyland. Would definitely stay again if in that area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I feel like I was in an alternate universe
Summary: We checked in, and were charged for parking - normal in this area of CA. However, the hotel clearly does not have enough parking. I was told to make my own space in a fire lane, that sounds fun in an over crowded hotel, no chance for problems here. Came out in the morning and was blocked in from someone else who clearly paid to make their own space. The hotel is walking distance of Disneyland, this is a plus, and the rooms have recently been remodeled. It's a wonder that the staff thinks it's a laughing matter that the parking situation is so bad. I was five deep in a line created for people who needed other guests called so they could leave. I was just grateful, unlike the people in front of me - I didn't have to catch a flight. They do offer a breakfast but the room was such a
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the Best Western Stovall's for three nights in December. Upon check in the front desk was very friendly. We were given a room on the 3rd floor facing West Street/Katella. We could hear the road noise in the afternoon after we checked in...assumed it would quiet down in the evening, but it didn't. In my opinion there was A LOT of noise from the cars going by. So the next morning we requested to move. We were moved to another room in the back wing. We could still see Katella, but not West Street and didn't have a road noise problem. After we moved we didm;t have street noise, just noisy neighbors...we could hear them talking and their TV.  The breakfast room is very busy and crowded and just so so.  It's about a 10-15 minute walk down Katella and through the Grand
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here with a group of classmates for a conference on the Anaheim Convention Center for six nights. Rooms were clean and quiet. The breakfast is excellent, we loved it!  The staff were very kind to us, everyone from the fronts desk agents to the room service lady. Specially, Michael the front desk guy, who treated us as friends and made us feel like part of the family. This is my first time in LA area and you guys made it very pleasant. Thanks!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: clean, comfortable, close to Disneyland, and...BACON.
Summary: Best Western Stovall's has been my go-to hotel for Disneyland trips for the past several years; I recommend it to friends, family & Disney messageboard members based on having nothing but good experiences whilst staying there. Unlike some other hotels in the area that *used to* be nice places to stay, Stovall's has gotten better over the years, with a recent remodel of all the rooms & the addition of a full, FREE hot breakfast. All you can eat bacon? For free? Yes, please!! Service was excellent as always. I arrived several hours prior to check-in time, due to traveling in from Los Angeles via an early train...a room was ready for me, and I was allowed to check in early...which was a HUGE help, as it was raining when I got there. All of their staff members I interacted with were
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were there during thanksgiving it was very full, but we got great service and it was a peaceful stay.  It was a great location and it had a solid breakfast.  I would stay again in a heart beat.  They did charge extra for parking but we had no trouble finding parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Every time we go to a concert at the House of Blues in Anaheim we stay at this hotel. As you can guess, there are thousands of hotels surrounding the Disneyland area, some good and some horrible.  This hotel is both convenient and affordable with extremely nice, clean rooms.  It is located about a 5 minute  easy walk from Disneyland and the venue.  The street to the venue is well lit and totally safe. I checked out tons of hotels and prices in the area and this one is definitely on the top of my list.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my hotel of choice when we go to Disneyland.  It's close to downtown disney.  You can see the Mickey wheel from the entrance, as well as the fireworks show.  It's reasonable, and the rooms are decent.  They have a free breakfast, and a fridge/microwave in every room.  The parking is a bit of a pain with the gates/tickets, but I can understand why they have to do that.  I have stayed there probably 10 times and will go back again next summer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is in a great location for Disneyland. Outside looks nice but the room I had was noisy due to being on the street side, Closet was a cabinet stuck in the corner, Found a small roach I smashed in the bathroom, Good sized gap between the AC unit and wall that you can see the outside,  No screen on the bathroom window, Could use a good cleaning and patchwork,Can't beleive they charge for parking, Breakfast was good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stay with my family and they have an excellent service since you get there until you depart the hotel. the hotel and facility are clean good service and the most important the employees make your stay more comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed with Stovall's 3 times now in the past 8 years. This time was different and very disappointing. The microwave had dried food on the inside and we found 2 different bugs. The first bug we found was reported to housekeeping that night. After inspection and comparing photos to internet pictures of bed bugs this was not a bed bug. The next morning we found another bug on the bedside table. We compared this bug to a bed bug photo on the internet, clearly this was a bed bug. We pulled put the beds searching for more bugs and found old food and garbage behind the beds. We placed the bug in a baggie and reported to the manager Kim. We were told that Orkin would come and inspect. After we got back from Disneyland that night Kim was off duty and she left a message with the
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was quite surprised by this Hotel. It was definitely value for money with families on a budget. Close walk to Disneyland. Comfortable beds and the free Wi Fi internet was great. The staff were brilliant. Very helpful and efficient, nothing was a problem. The only downfall would be the Breakfast was very basic, not a lot of healthy choices.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sister and her two grand children went to Disneyland and stayed at the Best Western Stovall.  For the value it was excellent.  I would recommend anyone to stay here.  The breakfast had a variety of choices and the food was good.  This was one of the reason that we chose this location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff, great stay, great environs
Summary: Disneyland trip with adult children and grandchildren. Very nice walk, and lit by the twinkling lights to and from the Parks in about 10 minutes. Breakfast room was spacious and food was hot that needed to be hot. Water was available, but, in the foyer of the hotel.  We shall return!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'll preface this review by saying the 'average' rating is only because the beds were as hard as rocks and I hate a hard bed. The room itself was very nice and very well kept. The staff was courteous, efficient and helpful, and the location was great. If you don't mind mattresses that are way beyond firm, this is a great place to stay. It is within walking distance of Disneyland (a straight shot just down the street) for a healthy person. If you have walking issues, then don't try it. There are a number of small restaurants nearby and there is room service from the coffee shop style restaurant in the property's parking lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 7 nights last month.  Easy 10-15 minute walk depending on your speed.  Cutting through the Grand Californian hotel takes you straight into Downtown Disney.  Got a great rate on Hotwire, asked for a room by the pool & that's what I got.  Free breakfast was excellent, always a good start to the day.  Front desk was always friendly & helpful.  Onsite public laundry room was so handy.  Buy your water from their vending machines & bring them in to Disneyland, they are way cheaper.  Room was large, clean & table & 2 chairs at the window was nice to look out to.  Watch the fireworks from the parking lot.  Ate at Coco's in the same parking lot for many dinners, their pie is to die for.  All in all a super convenient location, it was a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Visit was OK, will stay again - ??
Summary: We checked in on Nomvember 5th. The gentleman that helped us, was very nice and was able to move our room over to the  pool side. The room was clean and stocked. Since we were there for 10 nights, it seems that housekeeping preferred not to wipe items off to much. That was ok, room for the most part was cleaned. The breakfast room was nicely remodeled. There was quite a bit a room and we did not have to sit outside. Over the weekend that we were there, it was extremly busy and they ran out of items like fruit. It was a good breakfast. I was told that the fitness center will be put in hopefully by next summer. I was a bit disappointed that it was no longer there. Going to Garden Walk was a hard thing to do, so we just fore went the exercising while on vacation. The wifi was a bit
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you need a place to crash when going to Disneyland you can't beat the price, distance to Disney (3 min via shuttle), and the fact they remolded the rooms so its modern. Breakfast was wonderful. The restaurant Cocos next door has great salads and pies. Portions were huge. There is a coin laundry on the premises which was very useful. Summary: the rooms are very nice and all have a microwave and fridge. the beds were very comfortable and great after a long day at disney. you can walk to disneyland from the hotel, it is a very nice walk and you can enter through part of the grand californian hotel. the walk lets you out into downtown disney where you can enter both parks. you can see the disneyland fireworks from the hotel balconies. the pools are nice and the hot tubs were awesome after a long day. the breakfast was hit or miss, bagels, toast, cereal, eggs, bacon or sausage or ham bits. on busy days the breakfast room is a madhouse. sometimes would be better to head straight to the parks for starbucks. from the second and third floors you have a great view of california adventure, you can see california screamin' and

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel Very Close To Disneyland
Summary: We loved the location of this property. We didn't have to walk far to Downtown Disney and the hotel parking was $10, so we saved money every day on that part of the Disney experience. Our room overlooked the cute pool with the topiaries. It was a nice view. The room came with helpful amenities like a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The bed was comfortable too. They had a good breakfast buffet with hot food and cold food. We did not go hungry. There's a Coco's next door that was good too. The newly remodeled lobby looked great and the employees were all nice and helpful. We could tell that the owners care. We would definitely recommend this property if you want to walk to Disneyland and if you don't want to pay separately for breakfast.

Summary: We stayed 9 nights in August, occupying 2 adjoining rooms. The rooms are clean enough although they were kind of dark and showing their age.  Our rooms on the 2nd floor provided a decent view of the fireworks.  The rooms are very basic and the breakfast buffet makes it a good value.  A complaint would be the fact that they charge daily for parking but if your return to your room after 9pm the lot is full and it is difficult to find a spot to park.  Also, our key cards kept loosing their magic and we often had to get them re-programed.  However, all in all, this hotel is a good basic value and a short walk to the parks.

I mean, if you're there for fun all day, who cares right? For the travellers like me who don't have a sim card and look to rely on wireless net, it's hell. But if that's the price for a good spot then what the hey? There's a Denny's down the road, there's room service that's delicious. Not sure about groceries but there is a Shell about a good 20 minute walk or so from the hotel.

Also there is Coco's restaurant onsite and Denny's, Tiffy's and a convenience store all a couple of minutes walk away. Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. Glad to hear that you guys had a great at our pools. Hope to see you guys soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed 3 nights at this hotel. Summary Heading: Nice place - good location - good value!

The hotel was nice looking and our room was very clean and modern. The front desk workers were not overly friendly, but they were prompt and efficient. The hotel is fairly big and offers a nice pool area with well-kept greens. Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A good hotel for a Disney vacation.

First impression of outside of hotel at night is lovely.  Rooms are just as they look in pictures - older but redone.  Clean, quiet - even with the outside walkway we didn't have much for noise at all. Manager Response: We are very happy to read your review. We do hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: Stayed 6 nights and 5 days l√°st day went to Disneyland like everyday on the bus and leave my family van parked on their lot and last day the alarm when off and they said that they try to call me but I never receive that phone call and when I come back they already had charged 100 dlls to my debt card for tow truck company for open my van and disconnect my vans battery. I don't think is fare, how do i know wy did my alarm when off what if someone try to breake into it. They said that it is wrote down on the papers the you sign on, but they should explained you better if this happened you have to pay for it. This place is not safe and it is unsecured. Am a very onest person and it is not fare. Come on! 100 dlls. Money doesn't grow on the trees!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. The car alarm was going off for about 2 hours and we had guests that were complaining. We did call your number that you provided and no answer. The only option was to have a tow company come and disconnect. We did give you the paper work from the tow company that showed the amount he was charging.

Summary: The main reason I am not giving this hotel a 5 star rating is because it charges for parking. I believe that parking should always be free especially when most of the other "neighborhood" Disneyland hotels offer free parking. Last year I decided to stay at The Howard Johnson because a friend of mine was staying there, they did not charge for parking plus I was allowed to leave me car at the hotel during my last day at the park even though I had checked out. Best Western should do the same. I really like Best Western and try to stay at them when I can. There is a shuttle that stops in front of the hotel, but there is fee. If I remember correctly its $4 for adults and $3 for children, something like that.   The hotel itself was very clean, with good size rooms. I also liked that
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great work that they are doing.

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. We didn't have a car but the hotel was within walking distance to the Disneyland parks. Also, many shuttles to other attractions stop right in the front of this hotel so that made things very easy for us. The hotels continental breakfast was pretty good. the only downfall was that is was very busy some days and took a while to get seated. The hotel staff were very friendly! We had a room near the back of the hotel so the internet connection was quite slow and took a few tries to get connected the whole stay. The rooms are very spacious and comfy. Only thing was I wish they had a safe in the room. Loved the hotel itself, the pool an hot tub area looked nice. My rooms decor was lovely. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We have safes at the front desk for guests to use at no charge. We hope that we get to see you soon.

Summary: Clean and updated rooms, good pool area & shuttle bus to Disneyland out the front.  Lobby/ breakfast area was out of service therefor breakfast was served in the cafe next door, cafe was struggling with the volume of people and there was a long wait for a table/ breakfast,  it would have been nice if Stovall had advised us of this.   Could not get Wifi, which was very frustrating, and what's with the $10 parking fee?? We only had a car for one of the 4 nights we stayed.  We also payed an extra $70 to have our room until 5pm.  We were given conflicting story's from staff regarding availability etc. We would stay at Stovall las again, but would probably choose somewhere closer to shops and other restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: My family gives Best Western - Stovall's Inn a 10 in service, quality, atmosphere and convenience.  The hotel staff was very professional and courteous.  The room was clean and always cleaned upon return from our outing.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. Thank you for your kind words. I will make and tell the front desk staff to keep up their great work. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: They were spraying for bugs and room smelled and breakfast should had had more options. The rooms were clean and the value was good since it is the closest hotel next to Disneyland. Aircontioners were really loud and looked old but better than none at all. The lobby was getting remodeled and the staff was good at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that you had a great time while staying with us. Hope to see you again.

Summary: My family of four and two other families came down for Disneyland and stayed at Stovalls Inn in Anaheim CA. We were pleased with the updated rooms and the cleanliness of the rooms. The stay was quiet and the beds were comfortable. Stovalls has free hot breakfast at Coco's right next door but get there before 0930 or  you will be waiting in a line. The pool was clean and even had a mini pool for my little girls. I have never writtin a review for any hotel but thought Best Western Stovalls Inn deserved it. For the price and the cleanliness I know where I will be staying next time we visit Disneyland.   Thank You Best Western Stovall Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy that you and your family had a great time. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We are happy to hear that your little girls enjoyed the pool. Once again, thank you very much and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Very good value for a family or couple visiting Disneyland. Withing walking distance.  Nice breakfast.  Pool area was clean and well maintained.  Rooms were clean and you can watch the Disney fireworks from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. I will make sure and tell the housekeeping staff what a great job that they are doing. The best view to see the fireworks at night is by the pool. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: This is our 2nd stay at this property and we will continue to return.  We found this hotel within reasonable walking distance, the price was excellent and the rooms clean.  We did have one glitch and that was after a long day at Disneyland we came back to pick up our grocery delivery only to find out that since the lobby was being remodeled they couldn't refrigerate the babies milk that we had ordered.  The milk had set out all day in a hot office and we were afraid it wasn't any good :(  When we explained to the night clerk the milk was for babies she immediately said not to worry about it she would go to the store and get fresh milk for us.  This meant a trip to the supermarket and not the mini mart down the street as one of the babies has an allergy to regular milk and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for forgetting to put the milk away. Liz the front desk supervisor is the person that helped with getting a new gallon for the baby. I will make sure and share this review with her. We do hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Excellent accommodation in lovely surrounds. The pools and garden areas were fantastic and with most people at Disney they were quite. Our room was on the ground floor overlooking the pool which was a real bonus. It's true what they say. " You get what you pay for ". I do not think the price is because of it's proximaty to Disney but because of it's quality, The room and bathroom were in excellent order and after three weeks stopping off in different hotels from Chicago to LA , I can honestly say that this was the best. We walked to i-hop ( 10 mins ), and Downntown Disney was just a 10 minute walk away. Would absolutely reccomend stopping here either as a treat or because you wanted to be close to Disney. Breakfast was a full buffet served in the restaurant next to reception,
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Our maintenance, housekeeping and grounds keepers try their very best to keep the property clean so our guests may enjoy a clean hotel. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We are very glad that you and your family had a great time while stating with us. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Great location, walking distance to Disney. Large and clean rooms. I've been there on 2010 and they didn't charge the parking. Now, they charge 12 dollars per night... The breakfast is good. I'll definitely come back next time we visit Disney at Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We booked this hotel based on location, amenities and d√©cor.  It is a short walk to the entrance of Downtown Disney, but just far enough that we were out of the congested area.  The hotel lobby is currently under renovation so we didn't have the benefit of the in-house breakfast (had to cross the parking lot daily to eat at Coco's), nor the convenience of the store/gift shop (as advertised).  No doubt it'll be improved in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are doing all these renovations to make it better for our guests. We value your opinion and it was time to update out lobby. We hope that you enjoy the outcome. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Stayed at this property for three nights while exploring Disneyland.  The hotel is in great shape for its age, as it is clean, attractive inside and out and offers a great pool area.  The lobby was undergoing renovation and was provided breakfast at the adjoining Coco's restaurant.  The breakfast was good and staff very attentive.  There was a shuttle bus that collected guests outside the hotel for delivery to Disneyland and the staff were very friendly when asked for assistance.  I would recommend this hotel to others coming to Disneyland, although it is not a high-end property it offers a great location and very comfortable rooms, that do include a fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your review. All of our rooms have micros, fridges, coffee makers, hair dryers, irons and boards. We are always ready to help. We hope to see you again.

Summary: I stayed there on my first night visiting California. I have to admit the room was clean, however, for the rate that they charged me I could have stayed in one of those upscale hotel. In addition, they charged $10/night for parking!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our company is on a budget kick and booked me at this property for a recent convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. I wasn't sure what to expect, but for a motor inn, this place is fantastic!  This is a family-owned motel dating back to the 60's, but they have just done a major renovation of rooms. The rooms are immaculately clean, with brand new bathrooms, bedding, the whole works. They are currently operating out of a temporary lobby while the main lobby is being renovated, so the complimentary breakfast is served next door at Coco's restaurant. It is a full hot/cold breakfast buffet with great service.  If you are conscientious of noise, you might want to request a room that does not face the pool, as I can imagine at the height of "Disney" season, it can get quite
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thank you once again for giving us a try. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come and stay with us.

Summary: We stayed in a room on the top floor and found it to be clean and fairly new in d√©cor.  Nothing special but it was roomy and comfortable.  The air conditioner was on full blast the entire time we were there as there was a bit of heat wave going on.  The air conditioner was in the wall at the back of the room by the sink that is outside of the bath & toilet room.  I like that it was noisy as would count as ‚Äúwhite noise‚Äù and drown out any outside noise that may disturb your sleep.    Breakfast is very busy and sufficient to get you on with your day.  Not the best of foods but not the worst.  I liked that there was light yogurt.  Kudos to the hotel that opened up very, very early on the day of the half marathon so that us runners could get our fuel prior to the race.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Congratulations to you for running the marathon. I‚Äôm glad that you guys had a great time here with us. We hope to see you next year for the marathon.

Summary: Hotel Lobby undergoing renovation. Interim front desk now located where breakfast area normally is located. Front Desk staff was friendly. Check-in was efficient despite being a temporary set-up. Since breakfast area was not available, complimentary coupons were provided for the breakfast buffet next door at Coco's restaurant - food selection was similar to what the hotel normally offered. Room was clean, all room amentities were functional and in good repair.  Easy walking distance to Downtown Disney, Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I hope that you get a chance to come and stay with us and see our new lobby. It‚Äôs going to look fabulous. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We had a really great stay at this Hotel.  The room was comfortable and clean and very close to Disneyland.  The breakfast was sufficient for what we wanted.  We were however unimpressed when reception gave our room to someone else (10.30pm), whilst we were sleeping, lucky we double locked the door and they couldn't get in.  On checkout the following morning, we spoke to them about it, a very unapologetic apology was given, not good enough Best Western, safety for your guest should be paramount :(
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn.

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights from Labor day weekend until the following Saturday. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived since our flight was an early flight, so they stored our bags while we went out to eat, picked up a few drinks and snacks at a nearby grocery store and when we returned (which was still 1-1/2 hrs before check in time) the room was ready.  The front desk staff was always very friendly throughout our stay.  Our room was a 2 double bed room and was quite large. There was plenty of storage space and we quickly "moved in" for the week.  We were on the 2nd floor.  Each building has one elevator to access it but several sets of stairs, which was not a problem. The room had a mini-fridge, coffee maker and microwave. We had a view overlooking the pools and topiary gardens and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thank you once again for all your kind words. We hope that you have found the hotel that makes you feel like your home. We hope to see you guys again very soon.

Summary: A great place to stay while visiting Disneyland. It is close by, very clean and has a restaurant very close. Our second stay and it was even cleaner this time.  They were in the process of redoing the lobby but not a problem.  Very nice people too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that on your next visit you will get to see our brand new lobby. It will look fabulous. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Worst Best Western on the planet
Summary: Worst Best Western I have ever stayed in. If I had wanted a cheap motel, I would have saved the money and gone there. Dated property, the paint job, and remodel does not get it done. Bed was as hard as a rock.  We walked into a room that was very hot, and uncomfortable. It took the ac most of the night to cool the room down. Non smoling room smelled of smoke and ?? The lobby was under construction so the buffet breakfast was at the restraunt accross the parking lot. Breakfast at the Coco's restraunt was garbage, literally. Every guest was complaining while we were in there. They charge for parking in their outside lot, no garage or secure facility. What did I pay for besides extra gouging? Entire experience was a wreck. I would recommend this property as a candidate for the TV
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your business. We have a lot of our guests compliment our beds. They say that it was the best sleep that they have ever had. If the ac was the problem in your room we could have helped with that if we were told that it was an issue. We are remodeling our lobby. We do apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. September is our only time that we had this year to do a big project like this. We hope you understand. We do charge for parking. We also have security in our premises that walks our property. We take great pride in keeping this property clean and welcoming.

Summary: In general I was satisfied with the hotel.  The cost was a bit higher than the Best Western a block away with only the addition of a breakfast and restricted access parking.  Speaking of parking, there is an additional cost of $10.00 per night and you need to get in early to get a spot.  You are paying a premium, but spots are limited.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. All Best Western‚Äôs are independently owned and we all have different prices. We also offer different amenities. We do charge for parking. If at any time you have any issues finding a parking spot please let the front desk know and we will gladly help with this issue. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed for 2 weeks late August. Good  hotel. Nice pool area, easy  to park (except Labor day weekend) but you expect that. Room nice and clean. Free wi fi.. bit sketchy coverage but there when I needed to check in for return flights back to the UK. Good location for Disney as well as good general location as you do not have to contend with Harbor Bvd traffic every time you drive to and from the hotel. Would recommend as good budget hotel that will not disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We do have a business center by the lobby if you need a computer to use or print anything. If you encounter any issues with the internet please let the front desk know we are always happy to help. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while participating in the Disneyland Half Marathon.  It was within walking distance of the expo, the starting line and the finish.  Also is was on both the race routes.  It was also within walking distance of Disneyland.  It was very easy to get to.  The price was fair and the rooms were very roomy and nice.  I would stay here again if my travels ever take me back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on your run! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This lower cost motel is farther from the Disney maingate than many others.  We were there during very hot weather and were glad we did not have children or elderly with us.  The lobby is being renovated so breakfast included was next door at Coco's and was a hot variety and very good. Our room needs an update, uneven carpet, shabby trim work etc. but the beds were comfortable , the room clean and the tea/coffee choices generous. Very loud airconditioner.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are currently redoing our lobby. We do apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. We have arranged the breakfast to me served at the Coco‚Äôs restaurant next door. We do have plans to recarpet the 2nd and 3rd floors. The first floors will be getting tile. That is another project that we need to do. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Great Experience. Doing a conference on a budget, found least expensive room near Convention Center. From the outside, your standard travel motel, although some interesting design elements. Rooms accessed from outside.  Got worried when the main lobby smelled funny and clearly had not been updated in a long time. Since all the rooms look out over parking lots, I was joking when i asked the friendly clerk for a room with a view.  I thought the clerk was joking as well when he told me he could do that.  Then we got to the room.  Very clean, fresh and nicely appointed.  Not huge, but plenty roomy.  Very comfortable beds.  Good air conditioning.  Small table in front of window with room to eat comfortably, complete with menus for nearby restaurants that deliver. And the view - we
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center.  At this moment we are remodeling our lobby. You will love the new look. That was great that we were able to get you a room with a view to the parks. If you step outside you can see the fireworks. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It was a great Hotel and we will stay there again.  we enjoyed the pool with family and the beds we very comfortable.  It was great to have a good eating place right next door.  Thank you  for a good time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm glad that you had a wonderful time at the pool. I‚Äôm pleased to hear that you loved our beds. We hope that you come to visit us again soon!

Summary: The room was updated very nicely, the bathroom lagged behind but really how much time do you spend in there (don't answer please).  Check in was very fast as was checkout.  I didn't really understand why I had to pay $10 a day for parking, but oh well.  The walk to Disneyland was about 15 minutes and quite an easy one at that.  The breakfast buffet leaves something to be desired as the hot items (eggs, meat, pancakes/waffles) were below average.  Cereal, bagels, donuts, yogurt were good enough but the hot items should be a tad better.  Overall I loved my experience and will gladly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We will see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here during the Disneyland Half Marathon Weekend and loved it.  This is a very nice hotel with and even better location!  Staff was friendly and the room super nice. Only complaint would be they need to upgrade the A/C units in each room.. We could never really get the room totally cooled dow.  The hotel was  very accommodation the all the runners and even started the free breakfast 3 hours early so we had a chance to eat before running 13.1 .  I would stay here again, it's very family friendly and easy walking distance to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your review. We are in the process in changing the ac units. We were glad to open the breakfast room very early so the runners can get breakfast before they ran. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel each time we have gone out to Disneyland for their Labor Day and Tinkerbell half marathons. It convenient to get to the events surrounding the marathon as well as to Downtown Disney and the parks themselves.  The rooms are clean, nicely decorated and free wi fi.  We have enjoyed the free breakfast.  Parking is not free, so be ready for that if you drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations to the runners. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: I just returned from the Disneyland half marathon weekend and was very happy with the location and reseaonable price and great location. Literally, Disneyland was right across the street and down the block. The staff was very accommodating even when computers were not working well, they used their business computer to print off my airline tickets. They gave good advice for a car rental, taxi service, a market and good restaurant. I had a minor problem with the room and they took care of it. The air conditioner is a bit noisy but the room was quite nice. Would definitely stay there again. Very good breakfast and they opened it early for us runners and kept it open late for us too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations for running the marathon. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My sister and nephews went to Anaheim for a skating competition and wanted to stay central to Disneyland and also the arena where the competition would be.  It's all so close.  The lobby of this hotel is not really up to date but that is not where you sleep, so who really cares.  I am happy to say our room was clean, the towels were fluffy and we had enough for all four of us.  The room was big enough for us to have the two queen beds plus a queen size air mattress.  The pool was easy to get to because they have walkways that take you from your side of the hotel on a short cut through to the pool.  They have pop machines handy outside all the way along the side of the hotel.  Parking is a nightmare.  We had to park in staff parking many nights as the spots were oversold. the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know on the experience that you had at the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn. Our lobby remodel is to start in September. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us.

Summary Heading: Hotel clean and close to disneyland park
Summary: Hotel is very close to disneyland parks, just across the street you can see the panoramic wheel of Disney California adventure park. There is a shuttle bus service to the main entrance of Disneyland, the stop is in front of the hotel and you can buy tickets at the reception. The hotel has a parking, if you are a guest it is $ 15,00 per day and it is valid until 3 pm of the day you check out, if you pick up your car later you will pay $ 10,00 (don't forget as we did...). Rooms: the room is clean and it's ok but just a little small, it can be an issue if you have many luggage. The bathroom small and  the sink is outside the bathroom. Breakfast is included in the rate, there is plenty of food and  the quality  is very good. I would recommend this hotel to visit disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. There is a shuttle that can take you to the Disneyland parks. The ART shuttle can take you there at a fee. We do charge for parking. We serve a free extended continental breakfast every morning. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: This is the second time we have chosen Stovalls, the last time was over 5 years ago and it still is a great place to stay! We are Canadians with Disney AP's so travel to DL twice a year. We stayed here for 2 nights and the only negative was the parking charge of $10. We knew of this charge prior to visiting so hey: how can I complain? Our room faced the park so we had a view of the fireworks which was great, the pool are was awesome!! Best we have encountered for our boys as there is 2 pools 2 hottubs and a toddler pool, all the trees are shaped cute!  I used the laundry room which was clean and in great shape didnt wreck anything. Breakfast had anything you could want for breakfast (including hoards of people) For it being so packed the staff was constantly refilling so we
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. You were able to enjoy the fireworks from the pool and your room. We do have a guest laundry is guests need to use. We are happy to hear the great things of your trip. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Best of Best Westerns near Disneyland Anaheim. Clean, close, comfortable, updated and quite.  Perfect for us we will return, as we visit Disney regularly.  Large breakfast room with many choices.  Easy walk and if you prefer Shuttle service right out the front door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We do offer a free extended continental breakfast. There is the ART shuttle bus that takes you to the parks at a small fee. We do hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Exceptionally Friend Staff and Close to Disneyland
Summary: Staff was great.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Breakfast is OK.  Not as classy as expected from the Best Western brand but clean and neat.  Pool has cute topiaries.  Family friendly.  Quite enough for a business stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will let the staff know to keep up the great customer service. I‚Äôm glad that you enjoyed the hotel while staying here.

Summary: We arrived a little before 3, which is check-in time. Our room wasn't ready yet even at 3:15 which is my one and only complaint.  We stayed there for 7 nights and had a lovely time. We had a room with 2 king size beds and they were super comfy. Disneyland is about a 10 minute walk so it was perfect! They also have tickets for Disney available at the front desk.The pool and hot tub stays open until 11 pm and you can see the fireworks from Disney from the pool area.  Breakfast was good, they had a variety of items and switched them menu every second day. The staff were all very pleasant and helpful and I would definitely stay again! On a side note- the CoCo restaurant right next door serves some of the best pie I have ever tasted.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. We try to switch up the breakfast items so it doesn‚Äôt get boring for our guests. Thank you once again for letting us help enjoy your first trip to Disneyland. I agree Coco‚Äôs pies are the best. Yum!

Summary: This hotel is across the street to Disneyland and just 1/2 block from the Anaheim Convention center. The Hotel has two pools and two hot tubs. The breakfast they serve is tasty and a lot to choose from.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again

Summary: We spent two nights at Stovall's Inn.  I'd booked through a travel agent and got a very good price.  Overall the experience was positive though I would say that is relative to the price paid.  In NZ this kind of property would be classified as a motel.  Every unit is accessed from the outside.  The check-in was quick and friendly.  There is a $10 per day charge for self-parking but given the price of the hotel, this wasn't a problem to us.  The card keys we were given didn't work initially and I had to go back to the front desk to get new ones.  Even though I had just checked in I had to go through an 'identification' process.  I chose to see this as a good sign, that they were security conscious.  However, the second and third time my key failed, I was less happy about it.  My
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the great things that you have mentioned about the hotel. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to fix the key problem. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel! Great stay! Will be back again.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for three nights while visiting Disneyland/California Adventure. Just wish we had more to time to just enjoy the lovely setting.  Very comfortable pillow-top beds, tasteful new furnishings, good size fridge with a freezer section, microwave, huge room with two queen sized beds, desk and sitting area with table. Everything was very clean and well-kept.  The parks are definitely within walking distance (think 2-3 big blocks) and we cut through the Grand Californian resort hotel to enter either California Adventure or Downtown Disney/Disneyland each day. It's a very safe area even for walking back at night and the trees trunks lining Disneyland Dr. are lit up with white lights!   The pool area is very fun with cute topiary trees that rival the ones at It's a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thank you once more for all the great things that you have mentioned on your review. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: We're a family of 4‚Ä¶stayed from August 19-August 22‚Ä¶.it's a great way to save money. We booked online (21 days advance booking) and paid $10 per day for parking. We used the ART bus to travel to the theme park entrances‚Ä¶the bus stop is conveniently located outside the front-office..  Breakfast area is always busy, but staff are always replenishing‚Ä¶. Beware, house-cleaning usually starts around 2pm - in case you wanna get back to the hotel for a break..lol‚Ä¶but they do a great job. Two large pools and two spas help you relax after a long day at the Park. Laundry is only $1.25 a load with detergent available for $1.00 a packet - very helpful. The gift shop in the lobby opens from 7am-1pm and has a good variety of souvenirs at an affordable price compared to those sold at the theme
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. That is great that you were able to use the ART shuttle to get back and forth from the parks. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: When first having a 11 hour flight and trouble with the taxi that we had booked... 4 hours later then we expected we finally got to the hotel, at first it looks great and its idle with the restaurant coco's right next to it. come 11 o'clock at night all we wanted was a bed to go sleep and after booking in with lovely staff we went our room for the price we paid we were only expecting some standard basic rubbish room, but no you get 2 double beds which are heaven to sleep on a nice sized bathroom with bath/shower, tea/coffee maker, air con and a large tv. to be honest what more do you need, its not liking you are staying in the room all day but if you are then you are sorted! with 2 food stores both about a 2-3 minute walk either side of the hotel and dennys restaurant just down
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and all your kind words. We are very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time and that you will come and visit us again. We appreciate that. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We are a family of 4 that stayed for 4 nights.  The rooms were adequate, spacious enough and clean.  The WIFI was not very good and periodically did not work.  I found that annoying!  The breakfast was good but became real busy.  They had the usual hot and cold items.  My kids used the pool once and enjoyed it.  We brought our car and parking was $10/day but we were able to park right beside our room.  The walk to Disney is quick.  Walk to the Grand Californian and go through the hotel to either enter via Downtown Disney or after 10am you can enter directly into California Adventure Theme Park. Paid around $85/night.  I felt that was a good deal.  I would stay there again....
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you were able to use the pool. In August it can get pretty hot. The walk to Disneyland parks is amazing. The scenery is beautiful on your way there. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: It works for a stay in Anaheim
Summary: I stayed here during a conference in May. The location was good as for us it was a mere 5 minutes' walk to the convention center nearby.  I can be quick about the review: it's OK. The rooms were of decent family size, and was comfortable enough, including a little kitchenette which I found a plus. The free wifi worked OK for simple things, so for the hotels' main target group - families with kids visiting Disneyland - it'd be fine. For work, it's less suitable.  I further enjoyed the pretty good service from staff when needed, and an OK breakfast restaurant was nearby.  In terms of location vs Disney, it was a half hour walk for me. Make it 45 minutes for families. Although I'd presume you'd take your car, a cab or shuttle to the park anyway.  The minus - my aircon was leaking,
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. Yes, all of our rooms come with a microwave, fridge, coffee maker, iron and board. We do have 3 elevators in the property. If at any time you need help with luggage please call the desk. We will send someone to help right away.

Summary: Our stay was short but comfortable.  Room was clean, we were inside the complex so it was quiet.  The pool looked nice but we didn't have time to use it.  It was a quick ten minute stroll to Disneyland.  Breakfast was plentiful, eggs (albeit liquid eggs, which are not our preference), sausage, pancakes, fresh fruit, cereals, yogurt.  Good value for the price we paid.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Yes, we are about a 10-15 walk to the Disneyland parks. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up the great work. There is a general store that is about a 5 minute walk and you can find everything there.

Summary: Great location, 15 min easy walk to Disney parks, rooms clean and large. Large car park. Reception staff were helpful, re allocating our 3 rooms so they could be adjoining. Breakfast is included but not great. There is plenty but it's basic and not fantastic. I hate using disposable plates and cutlery and the dining room is cramped.  Don't choose a room on the ground floor, you hear noise of people walking and talking while in the car park and people walking above you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for you lodging needs.

Summary: We booked this hotel months before our vacation time and glad we did! This hotel is very close to Disneylad and California Adventure. You have the option of buying a ART pass for the shuttle but we chose to walk back and forth. It took us 15 minutes from the hotel to the entrances of the parks.   Parking: park and don't move your vehicle because if you arrive later in the evening parking is non existence. You pay for parking so they shouldn't be charging for more spots then they have. On a sold out night you will see cars park where ever they can fit.  Pool area: this is a beautiful area with washrooms and showers to rinse right there.  Breakfast: wonderful full breakfast. The week we were there they rotated daily and had eggs, bacon and pancakes or eggs, sausage and waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do try and switch the breakfast items around every other day. If at any moment you have difficulty finding a parking spot please contact the front desk we are always ready to help. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Located a short bus ride to Disneyland with a bus stop right out the front & a 15 minute walk to the entrance this hotel offered a comfortable room with everything as expected. The pool was OK albeit right on the road & across the car park. Staff were friendly. There's a restaurant right next door & another across the street.
