A small general store/liquor shop is about 400 meters away. There's a small gift shop on site.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you telling us on how your stay was at the Stovalls Inn.

Summary: Yes this motel is very close to Disneyland and DCA and for that alone I have awarded 3 stars. But that is all I can realistically enthuse about this establishment. Check in and customer service was regulatory but not welcoming. A small gift shop and complimentary coffee urn flanked reception where we were handed our room card and rudimentary directions.   This is a big motel and parking [charged and USD$10 per night] is rather tight especially considering every second person in the US drives an excessively large pick up truck.  The rooms were basic and dark enough to hide its age and upkeep. The bathroom was very squeezy with so little room that from the toilet position I could outstretch my arms and touch both the immediate wall next to me and the shower/bath tiled wall as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Value right across the street from Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for our last vacation in California and we were really happy with the quality of what you got for your money, the hotel is literally right across the street from Disneyland and the A.R.T. (Anaheim Resort Transit) shuttle (route #9) takes you into Disneyland from right outside the hotel every 20 minutes, you could buy your tickets at the hotel lobby area/gift shop. Really nice rooms and as mentioned great value for a hotel this close to Disneyland. Also nice comp. breakfast with some hot food (eggs,bacon or sasuage, pancaces or waffles). And also really great to have both a mini fridge and a microwave in our room as well as guest laundary. The only couple of issues I could point out is that the Wifi is horrible (however we didn't really need internet on
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you letting us know on how your stay was.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel for a Disneyland Vacation
Summary: My husband and I spent a little over a week at the Best Western Stovall Inn. Our trip was planned around D23 (a Disney convention that happens every two years) and taking a trip to Disneyland. The employees at this location were extremely helpful, were very approachable, and accommodating.  The room was beautiful and the bed was extremely comfy. The walking distance from the hotel to Grand Californian (which was the only way we could get into the Disneyland Resort from our location) was close (I would say it was two to three blocks away). We could even see the fireworks each night from the hotel. Coco's (the restaurant next door) is fabulous and has great prices compared to some of the other restaurants around the area. My only negative note is that although you get continental
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I hope you guys had a lot of fun at D23. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up the great job. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to see the fireworks from the hotel. The pool area has the best view. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Good motel right next to Disneyland
Summary: This is a very good motel right next to Disneyland. The breakfast was very good. The room was comfortable. They charge for parking. But probably not worth parking your car here if you are going to Disneyland only for a day. The parking charge is not much different between here and Disneyland. This motel is very centrally located and I felt it was good value for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: Convenient to Disneyland/California Adventure and the Anaheim Convention Center.  For our family its easier than staying at a hotel on Harbor Avenue.  Good breakfast nice in-room amenities like a their coffee maker, microwave and refrigerator.  Good space for a family of 3 and the queen beds were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Yes, all of our rooms have coffee makers, hair dryers, micros, iron, boards and fridges. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We also have two pools that our guests can enjoy. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We went to the D23 expo and then Disneyland.  This hotel is within walking distance to both the convention center and the parks.  Our room was on the ground floor close to the lobby --- not the most peaceful place to sleep.  Overall, it suited our needs.  It was clean and comfortable.  The presence of a mini-frige was appreciated.  The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. I heard the Convention was very busy. We were sold our due to the D23 Expo. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: The hotel is in a great location, especially if you are going to visit DisneyLand and the Convention Center. We really liked the fact the breakfast room was open from 6 to 10 am and was large enough to accommodate people dining there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. The Anaheim Convention Center in about a 5 minute walk. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel charged us $40 at the end of our stay for PARKING on their premises!!! I have NEVER paid extra at any hotel that I have stayed in just for parking but since it was California, I shouldn't be surprised. The hotel room was good but this rip off ruined the whole experience and we will never book another room with Best Western, ever!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do charge for parking and it‚Äôs 10.00 a day. When you check in you sign your parking pass and we assign you a parking tag that it also states parking fee per night. A manager is always available if you wanted to voice your opinion. A lot of the properties of Anaheim have a parking fee. Some are about 30.00 per night. We hope that you change your mind on Best Western‚Äôs.

Summary Heading: Pretty good except for Internet access
Summary: Great location.  Within walking distance of Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Clean, large rooms.  Helpful staff.  About 5 blocks to Foods 4 Less grocery store.  Our only complaint was the flaky internet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney and a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will make sure and check on the Internet and find out why it was flaky. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn  for your lodging needs.

Summary: My husband and I checked in to this hotel while in town for a conference. The hotel lobby smelled of urine. Our room was not ready (we came before check-in so this was understandable). We went for lunch and came back to check into our room. The carpet was dirty and I was not going to take my shoes off. The room smelled of urine. While my husband took a nap from our travels, I began searching for another available hotel in the area. We were on the second floor, and we could feel the vibrations of people walking past our room from the outside. Needless to say, I was thoroughly turned off. We only stayed long enough for me to find another hotel to stay in. When we went to check out and the clerk asked us what the issue was, all we could say was low quality. What can you do about
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm not sure what you mean that the lobby smelled like urine. The lobby gets clean and mopped several times during the day. All of our staff members work very hard to have this property presentable and welcoming. We have a lot of great qualities at the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We offer an extended breakfast, two pools, spas, free WIFI, room service ECT...It would have been a pleasure to assist you in this matter. Maybe relocate you to another room that you would have liked. A manager and or a supervisor are always on duty to assist. I wish that you could have spoken to one. We hope you change your mind on Best Western‚Äôs.

Summary: My family and I recently stayed at Stovall's Inn and here are my quick thoughts... Pro's:  Great hotel Excellent Staff Superb location Decent Breakfast  Con's  Limited Parking No safe in rooms  Fantastic view of the nighty fireworks - ask for a room on the side of the pool. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you liked our hotel. We don‚Äôt have safes in the room but we have them at the front desk. They are available at no extra charge. The pool area has the best view of the fireworks. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: This was a great place to stay!  Breakfast was included everyday and we had very comfortable accommodations.  The staff was amazingly friendly, especially the person we talked with at the front desk.  We definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the front desk staff to keep up the great customer service. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We had a nice one day stay here  while visiting Disneyland.  The room was immaculate, well furnished and the bed was so comfortable.  There pool area has a grassey area next to it with the hedges/plants cut into the shapes of animals - nice for the kids.  The staff was very friendly and helpful with guidance on the best ways to get to the Park entrance.  Breakfast was included - not terrific, but the scrambled eggs were fresh and fluffy, and it was a nice start to the day.  I would definately  stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations that we offer. We always like to read on what our guests like and what we can improve on. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Great place to stay, the staff is helpful, close to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disney.  Clean rooms with good beds, good value for your money, would stay again.  Staff went out of their way to make sure you had everything you needed.  The continental breakfast had a variety of choices for breakfast.  The room looked like it had recently been redone with nice neutral d√©cor and good beds for sleeping.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center and a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. I will make sure a compliment the front desk for their great customer service. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Stayed at the Best Western Stovall for one night after Disneyland.  It was a bit further than I anticipated or wanted after a full day at Disneyland but the kids were troopers.  It's not on the main street of hotels.  I also anticipated the continental breakfast being just bagels, donuts, fruit and beverage.  We were pleasantly surprised to have more (eggs, sausage, cereals, yogurts) which saved us a lot of time and money to hurry and get to Disneyland.  Donuts were really bad.  Muffins good.  Be prepared to have noise from the A/C (Cooler) on all night.  It didn't bother us a bit as we were all exhausted but if noise bothers you, be prepared.  The bathroom sink is separate from the shower/toilet which is nice but it's also outside near the beds (no privacy) which I did not
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that you had a great time here with us. I‚Äôm glad that you liked the breakfast in the morning. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: These accomodations were superior in room provisions and quality of staff interaction.  Location of ART shuttle directly out front of hotel is highly valued, especially after a day of  sore feet from extensive walking at Disneyland or conferences.  The included breakfast is of value only if can benefit from packaged offerings (chilled yogurt), fruit or juices.  All else is substandard in quality including eggs, bacon and doughnuts (which could be seen in trash cans all over hotel premises). Coco's right next store was a definite save in lieu of the hotel's breakfast! Exceptional service there along with good food and prices for all meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the business. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up the Superior customer service. Yes, the ART shuttle bus to take guests to the parks does stop in front of our property. I hope that you were able to enjoy the pools after a long day at the parks. That is great that you were able to enjoy the breakfast. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We stayed in Stovalls Inn for the first time and contrary to the 2 and 1/2 star rating, personally I feel this hotel deserves a higher rating based on the vast things they have to offer. We arrived with very friendly service whom were happy to talk and help us out, the rooms were very clean and quite with in reason and somewhat spacious. The swimming pools and out door Jacuzzis were never too busy, and the location was perfect for a family whom avidly visited Disney and other places nearby. The little shop located near the main desk had a nice array of snacks and Disney style gifts at affordable prices. I could name no fault with the Hotel at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. We are glad that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning and the pools in the evening. You can also see the fireworks from the pool. It‚Äôs a great view. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: They really are on the ball here. Everybody is professional and efficient and make your stay easy and enjoyable. Being right down from Disneyland they are competing with the big-wigs and certainly want to keep everyone happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you had a great time. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great customer service. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Great hotel. Great view. Clean. Crappy wifi. Extremely loud AC units. Beds kind of sucked, but if you're tired, it may not matter. Large breakfast selection, but not all that healthy. I had a discounted room because of the conference I went to ($112/night). Very close (walking distance) to convention center and Disneyland. The staff was great in helping us with taxi/shuttles not going to LAX, storing our luggage after checkout due to a very late flight home and helping us attempt to get Disney tickets.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback on how we are doing. I will check on the WIFI to see what would be causing the interruption. A lot of our guests love our beds. They always say that they had the best sleep ever. We are about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center. We are always ready to help. We do hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: We stayed at the BW Plus Stovall's Inn for the second time in two years. My 10 year old and myself enjoy this hotel. You can see the park and fireworks very well. When walking to Downtown Disney and the parks entrance it is a short easy stroll. The breakfast is great from waffles and bacon to pancakes and sausage plus cereal, yogurt and bagles, toast mufins and donuts... plus was a great breakfast. The rooms were comfortable and clean. The pool's and hottubs were great. it is a great place to stay for the $$!!! Coco's resturant was good food fast service and great price
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you and your 10 yr. old had a blast! Wonderful breakfast in the morning and then hit the parks for a fantastic day. After a long day at the parks it‚Äôs great to come to the hotel and take a dip in the pools. We hope to see you guys soon.

Summary: This hotel was very nice and the staff was very professional.  We came into town without a reservation and their reservation staff was very kind in finding us a room as all the hotels were booked this weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy that you came to stay with us and we hope that we are your choice when you come to visit Anaheim. Come visit us again soon!

Summary: My family and I have visited on multiple occasions, and have yet to be let down by this hotel. We are a military family, and the hotel and staff do their best to offer their very best to their servicemembers.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. We support our troops. We offer a special rate for all service members. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland parks through Downtown Disney. All of our rooms have micro, fridge, coffee makers, hair dryer, iron and board and extended continental breakfast. We have two pools and spas. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Good Experience for a first-time visitor...would highly recommend for location, condition, value.  The staff was helpful, the pools and hot tubs excellent, and the breakfast was a tasty surprise each morning.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. I hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here last June. had a great time and decided to return to see CARS this year and didn't hesitate to rebook here.Great breakfast(EGGS) bacon sauage ,waffle ,pancakes, and more, especially if you have a family. 2 pools, clean rooms and very friendly and helpful staff. we would have no problem staying at the STOVALL again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We are always happy to hear that you keep coming to visit us. I hope you had a blast at the parks. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: As this was our third stop on our USA holiday it was a pleasant surprise to have such a nice big clean room. The hotel staff were very helpful and provided us with lots of travel information, maps and tours. The hotel is very close to Disney we walked all three days and also walked to the local restaurants called garden walk which includes cheesecake factory and PF changs. The hotel has a nice spa and pool area that is very relaxing after a long day at Disney you can even watch the fireworks from the spa! The breakfast was very busy but had lots of variety and was always being replenished. You could tell this was a popular family hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. We are always ready and happy to help with anything that you may need. The restaurants that are located at the Anaheim Gardenwalk are very yummy! After a long day at the parks it‚Äôs always good to come and relax at the pool and enjoy the fireworks in the evening. We also have poolside service from Coco‚Äôs restaurant. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Stayed at the Stovalls for 7 nights during our stopover in LA.  Great location and the plentiful staff at Reception and the additional staff around the hotel grounds were so friendly, helpful and very welcoming.  The breakfasts were hot and had different options each day.  well kept amenities.  And you can see the fireworks from the balcony or from the pool!  Kids enjoyed TV channels and free wifi.  Fridge and coffee/tea maker in the room.  Room big enough with 2 queens.    3 family restaurants (not fast food) and convenience store close by.  Would happily recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I bet you guys had a lot to do on those 7 days that you stayed. In the evenings the best thing to do is to relax by the pool and see the fireworks in the evening. All of our rooms have micro, fridge, coffee maker, iron and board free WIFI. The breakfast in the morning is delicious. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary Heading: Great start to our Disneyland holiday
Summary: This hotel was the first stop on our family holiday to Disneyland.  It's in a great location, and we were able to check in a few hours early after the hotel staff prioritised our room which was nice after a 14hr flight from Australia.  The room was basic but clean and we made good use of the hotel pool and spa which cured our jet-lag.  It's on a busy road, but we didn't notice any noise while trying to sleep at night.  (except for the air-conditioning which is very noisy)  The inclusion of breakfast is a nice touch, although I've had better breakfasts at other Best Western hotels.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful and I would definitely use this hotel if travelling to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that we were able to assist you on checking into the room early. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here two nights while we went to Disney. It has an excellent location for Disney you can walk there. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The Continental breakfast was above average. The only problem was a wall air conditioner that was very noisy.  I would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and the California Adventure parks through Downtown Disney. We will make sure we check on the AC units. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: we had a wonderful stay with 3 rooms for 6 in a family. Loved the pools..hot tub..... eating breakfast before heading out each day..... watching the fireworks from the balcony by our rooms..... the staff was so helpful! Our rooms were cleaned each day and restocked as needed. Loved the wonderful cool air conditioning in each room. Our over all experience was really good!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. I bet it was great to enjoy the pools and spas after a long day at the parks. Rooms that are facing poolside can view the fireworks. Another view for the fireworks is in the pool area. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Came here via a Costco Travel Package (better deal than AAA).  It has a pool. The breakfast was good with hot scrambled eggs, bacon, pastries, bananas/apples/oranges, cereal/milk, apple/orange juice, coffee/tea, low fat yogurt, bagels/toast, etc. (6 am - 10 am). No problems finding a table although you can take things back to the room (I was my own room service for the others) or sit outside.   Maid service was early as most people are out into the park standing in lines.  Microwave/fridge in the room. Mostly quiet. Stayed on the 3rd Floor "inward".  Can stand outside and watch the fireworks. Parking was $10 a day with in and out privileges runs to 3 pm then you pay for the next day).   If you want to pay for a meal, 24 hour Coco's next door or Tiff's Restaurant.   Short walk up
Manager Response: We appreciate your business and review. It‚Äôs great that you are able to inform other guests of other short cuts that they can take for the parks. We always love to hear other information that we can give our guests. I‚Äôm glad that you had a wonderful time and we hope to see you again!

Summary: The hotel is by no means flash or upmarket.  However, if you want a hotel that has just what you need, and where you can lay your head between doing theme parks and shopping in Anaheim, this is a great place. Positives: * One of the most comfortable beds I have EVER slept in. * Walking distance to Disneyland.  Means you can get in and out of the park during the day easily.  Comes with a free breakfast which is pretty average, but more than enough to get you going.  Seemed to be lots of kiwi's staying at the hotel :-)  The staff were really, really helpful, often going out of their way.  One of them stayed on the phone on hold for about 15mins to get the rental car company sorted and organise a pick up for us.  Awesome!  Saved us the cost of a taxi fare.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and business. I‚Äôm happy to hear that we were able to help you with the car rental. A lot of our guests do say that they love our beds. Best sleep ever they say! We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights at the beginning of our USA vacation. The staff were friendly and accommodating. Our room was clean, roomy and beds comfortable. We were only a 10 minute stroll to Downtown Disney and the gates of Disneyland. The breakfast was excellent and included. My children enjoyed a swim in the clean, large pools. I used the laundry facilities and they were good too. We would be very happy to stay here again and tell all our Aussie mates to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure parks through Downtown Disney. It‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast. It is very nice that the kids were able to enjoy the pools and spas. We do have a laundry room that our guests may use if they like too. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: We stayed at the Stovall's Inn for a family reunion.  Having 3 rooms with children, grandparents and adults sisters.  It was a 15 minute walk to theme parks or the ART bus picks up right outside hotel every 30 minutes.  A 3-day ART pass was a bargain at $12.00 adults and $3.00 children.  Buss also takes you to Universal and Knott's.  Hotel breakfast was great but very crowded.  Not hotel's fault, but there was seating outside breakfast room, which was good.    Rooms were clean and well equipped.  Topiary plantings at pool were awesome.  2 pools and 2 hottubs gave everyone room.  Will defiinitely stay here again on all Anaheim trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you stayed here with us and that you had a great time with your family. I hope that every time that you have a family reunion you come and stay at the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn. That‚Äôs awesome that you were able to use the pools and spas to relax after a long day at the parks. We welcome you and your family with open arms. Come see us soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights at the end of march. We took the shuttle from LAX ($16 each) which did various drop offs including this hotel. The room was basic but clean and had everything we needed for our stay. We could see the Disney wheel from the front of our room :) We used the safe behind reception to store our money/passports etc. The continental breakfast (including some hot items like scrambled egg and sausages) was tasty and had something for everybody. We took the Disney shuttle from right outside the hotel to take us to the parks. This cost $5 each and could be used as many times throughout the day. (You can purchase these tickets from the gift shop in reception.) The pool area was lovely and just what we needed to cool down from the hot californian sun! We ate
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time on giving us your feedback. I think it‚Äôs very cool to look outside your door and see the California Adventure‚Äôs Ferris wheel. In the evening it displays different colors on it. Very nice! I‚Äôm glad to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. That‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed your meal at the pool. PS I agree with you their pies are always delicious ÔÅä

Summary Heading: They have a remote control for the air conditioners!!
Summary: We arrived late Friday night and were able to book a room for the weekend after the Fourth of July. Great rates, the towels aren't scratchy at all! The room was very clean, with very comfortable beds and four pillows per bed. The parking lot was tight but we found a nice spot. Continental bfast was fantastic and a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney. Just perfect! Definately would stay here again & I give it my highest recommendation! The pool closes at 11.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed yourselves. That‚Äôs great that you enjoyed your breakfast in the morning and all of the amenities that we offer here. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here in May 2013 for 3 nights. We were hesitant in the beginning, but were happy with our stay. The value is very good for what you pay. Location is perfect, a short distance to Disneyland and California park on one side, and convenience shops and small restaurants on the other. Staff were very friendly and helpful, the breakfast included with our stay was good. But most of all, the rooms were spacious and CLEAN which was most important to us!! Would recommend this hotel to anyone looking at staying in Anaheim for a few days.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us the opportunity to show and provide legendary service. We hope that you have found a property that you and your family can relax and enjoy. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: We chose this hotel while visiting Disneyland.  The rooms were clean, a little small and cramped but you're not in your room much anyway.  Nice pools and hot tubs.  Huge eating area with plenty of room and a good selection for breakfast.  About a 15 minute walk to the gates at Disneyland or there is shuttle that will pick you up out front for a small fee.  Not a lot of parking, you may not be able to park near your room, $10.00 parking fee per day.  Wi-if is horrible, tried using it with several devises over a course of three days and managed to get on once late at night.  Would not eat at the restaurant there that also offers room service, very bad service.  Walk across the street, the service there was great and they have wonderful homemade ice cream and you can watch the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you had a great time here with us. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pools and hot tub. In the evening you can watch the fireworks from the pool. If you have any problems finding a parking spot, we are always ready to help. Please ask any of our staff and we can help. We do hope that we see you soon!

Summary Heading: Near enough to Disney but far enough from all the crowd
Summary: Stay at this property for 4 nights during our visit to Disneyland Anaheim. Is walking distance to downtown disney and Disneyland. If you are too lazy to walk there's always a shuttle bus that you can take in front of the hotel. Room size was ok with 2 double bed in it. There's also fridge & microwave in the room. The hotel do provide complimentary breakfast but we didn't get to try cause of our busy schedule. The Coco's family restaurant beside the hotel served really nice food and the staff are extremely friendly. They even let us in and enjoy our so call "dinner" 20mins before their closing time. Overall this hotel is a good choice if you want to have some peace out of the crowd.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you stayed with us. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure through Downtown Disney. I hoped that it helped to have a micro and fridge in the room. It‚Äôs always great to heat up leftovers. We hope that you can come and visit us again.

Summary: I stayed on Memorial Day Weekend 2013 at the Best Western Stovall's Inn. My room was normal-sized and clean with a newer television. Location was a good proximity to Disneyland. They offer shuttle service (Anaheim Resort Transit), being useful for avoiding Disneyland's parking fees, so I used it. Shuttles came every thirty minutes. I felt like the service in this hotel was very friendly. There was a free continental breakfast, with the scrambled eggs tasting average. The pancakes, orange juice, bagels and bacon tasted good for me. The internet was fast but occasionally would have connection problems. Overall, the Best Western Stovall's Inn is a good choice for a Disneyland trip, so I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know on how you enjoyed your stay at the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We are glad that you were able to take the ART shuttle bus back and forth to the park. It can help after a very long day at the parks. At this moment the ART charges $5.00 per adult and child $2.00 ages 3-9 for a 1 day pass. It‚Äôs an all day pass. It‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast. We hope that we see you soon!

Summary: We had a room on the 3rd floor and could not hear any noise from outside. However the air conditioning is a bit antiquated and was quite noisy, but did the job. We were staying here to visit Disneyland and the location was great a 10 minute walk through the Grand California Hotel bringing you out in Downtown Disney, good if you wanted to go back to the hotel for a short break. The room was well serviced and facilities were good, lovely pools and garden, but had trouble connecting to the wifi. Breakfast was very average and a bit of a bun fight with the amount of people all trying to get breakfast at the same time, however there is a good restaurant next door. Staff were friendly and helpful. Good value for money.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We are glad that you stayed with us while going to Disneyland. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland through Downtown Disney. We are surrounded by great restaurants and shopping places. You can get more information at the front desk if you wanted different options. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: We had a pleasant week here although found parking and breakfast room space very cramped over the public holiday weekend. The pools were very good for this type of property and a lot of care is taken with the gardens and overall property maintenance. Staff were pleasant and helpful. If in the area again would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here with 2 other families for 2 nights for the purpose of visiting Disneyland. The rooms served their purpose of needing a clean, close place to eat, shower and sleep while in Anaheim.  Was only a 10 minute walk to the parks if you cut through downtown disney to entrance. The hotel put the rooms as close as possible but one did end up having a unique smell and the front desk immediately moved our room without question. The breakfast was good and nice that you could get your food and take it back to your room if it was too busy. Would recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that we were able to assist you on moving room. We are always ready to help when needed. We hope to see you guys soon

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel June 14 through June 19 for five nights. We stayed in two rooms that were next to each other. The office accommodated my request to be close together. The staff were very friendly. The rooms were thoroughly cleaned each day. Every thing was as advertised, the breakfast was good, lots of variety and always refilled. Very busy, with everyone eating breakfast trying to get to Disneyland every morning. We often took the food and ate in our rooms. We bought five day shuttle passes in the little store.  Saving five dollars over buying single day passes. The shuttle picks up right out front of the hotel. We came back every afternoon to rest or swim, then back to the parks every evening.  Disneyland and California Adventure very crowded in the afternoon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that we were able to accommodate you with adjoining rooms. We are happy to hear that you did use the shuttle to come back and forth. It‚Äôs good that you did get a chance to enjoy the breakfast in the morning. That‚Äôs nice to come to the hotel and be able to use the pools and hot tub to enjoy the rest of the evening. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Just returned from Disneyland and have to say I wish I had known more about this hotel before I booked it. We selected this hotel because of the short distance to Disneyland, but I wish I had done more research as family who stayed at the Anaheim Hilton had a much better experience at a much lower price. The staff were friendly, the rooms decent but it was impossible to get WIFI and the breakfast was terrible. The Hilton was $15 less per night, gourmet breakfast, deluxe pool and optional shuttle and the walk was only an extra 5 minutes. The only extras we got was heartburn from the breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure Park through Downtown Disney. There is a shuttle that can take you to the parks. The ART shuttle runs approximately every 20 minutes depending on traffic. The cost at this moment for this shuttle is $5.00 per adult and children ages 3-9 is $2.00. All of our rooms look the same online. We don‚Äôt alter our pictures. We do offer an extended continental breakfast. We have two pools and hot tubs. If there‚Äôs any questions on the property please call the hotel directly and we can help. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland and want great accommodation without paying exorbitant prices, then this is the answer to your wishes.  Rooms are very comfortable, well appointed and clean.  The location is ideal, breakfasts are good (and included) and the staff are very helpful and friendly ....  And the cost is reasonable!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Glad that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: The location is great - a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and out of the way of all the crowds. It has a great diner next door which is handy for all meals. Outdoor car parking available on site for a charge of $10 per night.  The room was not very well lit, but clean and comfortable with enough space for 4 people.  Coffee machine was basic - only making one cup at a time.  Bathroom was okay, but small. There was a kitchenette with fridge and microwave.  Breakfast room was always busy.  The food was alright (some hot and the bagels were nice) to get you started for the day.  Good value.  And would stay here again.
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for the review. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure Parks through Downtown Disney. In the breakfast room we offer toast, muffins, pastries, fruit, cereals, coffee, juice and we have our hot items like bacon, sausage, pancakes, waffles and eggs. We hope that you enjoyed the selection. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for a four day Disney vacation.  Location is fantastic, short walk to Downtown Disney (10 minutes,) we considered taking the ART but so glad we didn't.  The area is very well kept and lit well for walking at night.  The rooms were very clean, beds were comfy, staff was friendly and helpful and the breakfast had something for everyone.  We will definately stay here again next time we visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed at Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn in May, 2013 with my grandson and daughter-in-law.  We made a quick last minute trip to take my 5 year old grandson to Cars Land Adventure in California.  During a very hectic April, I needed to find a hotel close to Disneyland so we wouldn't have to rent a car or fool with buses or shuttles.  Ran across this Best Western and after comparing it with several other nearby hotels, decided to take a chance on this one.  Was absolutely a great choice.  Hotel rooms had recently been redone and the whole hotel property was fantastic.  Short walk to Downtown Disney and then right on to the main entrance to both Disneyland and California Adventure (where Cars Land is).  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.  Reasonable rates and great rooms all
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know on how your stay was at the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you and your grandson had a wonderful stay. Cars land is so much fun. I bet he had a blast. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here to attend a Rolling Stones concert, not to visit Disneyland so we only stayed one night. We did walk to Downtown Disney and The Grand Californian and it was a short 10 minute walk. The rooms were very nice and super clean. We had everything we could need: Fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The beds were great with lots of pillows. The pool are is very spacious and spotless and super clean.  Coming back late from the concert there was no parking, but the front desk person let us park next to the pool so everything worked out. The next morning I thought I lost my cell phone and the staff helped us look for it and was very helpful. It ended up being under the passenger seat in the car! The staff was great all around. They seemed generally interested
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. YAY! I bet you guys had a blast at the Rolling Stones concert. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great job at the desk. We are always ready to help when needed. We hope that next time when coming to the Anaheim area you get a chance to go and enjoy the parks.

Summary: This hotel was great for what we used it for. Whenever I visit disneyland the hotel is only used for sleeping as I spend all the time I can in the park. Stovalls Inn served that purpose perfectly.it was clean and the staff were friendly. The walk to Disneyland is easy and takes about 10-15 mins. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will make sure and tell housekeeping to keep up the great job they do in the rooms. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We appreciate the loyalty to Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay at Disneyland
Summary: I travel with work, and quite often stay at Best Western Hotels.  With out a doubt, this was the nicest staff and cleanest one I have ever stayed at.  I would definately stay again!  The staff, exceeded all my expectations.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business. We appreciate your loyalty to Best Western‚Äôs. We always welcome you with open arms. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: I stayed in this hotel last August for a small trip. It was overall very good. The beds are not the most comfortable I have to be honest I had a bit if a hard time sleeping on the beds because they were slightly hard. The shower was very good and efficient. My favorite two things of this hotel was the pool which was a plus because it made down time fun. The thing that I loved about this hotel was the location because it's at walking distance from the Anaheim convention center which was the place I was attending for a retreat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. I hope the retreat was everything that you expected to be. It‚Äôs great that you were able to use the pools and spas. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Hubby and I stayed here with our friends (in 2 separate rooms) for 10 nights. We were so impressed by the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn! My previous trip to Anaheim saw us stay at the Anabella Hotel, very close to the Stovall's. I did not enjoy that stay and wanted to try somewhere in a similar area to Disneyland this time. We loved how clean and tidy the room was, great spa pool and tidy hotel grounds. We were so pleased with the breakfast and couldn't believe it was part of the room deal! Yummy fresh fruit, cereals, yogurt and apple juice were our favorites. The breakfast room staff were so lovely and very efficient and keeping the food stocked up when it was running low. Beds were very comfy and room was very modern. Our travel agent kept recommending the Anabella to us,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm pleased to hear that you gave us an opportunity to serve you with Legendary Customer Service. I will make sure and tell all the staff to keep up the great work that they are all doing. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: clean and comfort without the price tag
Summary: my friend and I (from NZ) did a big American trip any this was the last leg of the journey. the hotel was booked via our travel agent so we weren't quite sure what to expect but after a lovely reception with super friendly staff we went up to our room which was so clean and comfy and i thought it was quite flash myself! The hotel is walking distance to Denny's and a dairy and alcohol store and literally 10mins from downtown Disney and slow pace. On our check out day we were able to leave our suitcases to do some last min shopping at the OC Outlets (a must do if you are a keen shopper its about a 15min taxi ride). Breakfast was really yummy and the best out of the 10 or so hotels i had stayed in during the trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have a lot of places that you can go eat and shop within walking distance. The Anaheim Garden Walk and Downtown Disney are just a 10-15 minute walk. I will make sure and tell housekeeping about the great job they are doing in the rooms. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: We make two to three trips to Disneyland a year and this is hands down our favorite place to stay! You will love this hotel from check in to check out & everything in between. The staff is always very friendly & welcoming. The rooms are super clean & comfortable. They have a great breakfast each morning and if you want to get away from the parks for lunch or dinner they have delivery (even pool side). If you want to dine out there are several places all within walking distance. The location is ideal- a very short but magical walk to the parks (especially at night). The hotel itself is secure & we always feel safe staying here with our family. Our kids love the pools and the grounds are very well kept. We look forward to our next stay in September!
Manager Response: Thank you for much for your kind words. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell all the staff what a Great job they are doing. I‚Äôm glad that you guys enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. I‚Äôm pleased to hear that your kids loved the pools. We hope to see you guys in September!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for three nights for a quick pre-Christmas getaway. We had stayed at the hotel when we had come a couple years ago and it was a great value so we stayed again. It's within walking distance from the park but we used the Art since we were walking around the park all day. Hotel staff is very friendly. They allowed us to check in early when we arrived. The rooms are clean. And my daughter loves the pancakes in the morning. Very good hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope you guys had a great time with us on your getaway trip. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: My wife, 5 year old son and I stayed here for our three day visit to Disneyland.  The location is great, with only a 10 to 15 minute walk to the park entrance.  We were happy with our stay.  The staff were helpful, the room was nice and the breakfast was tasty and prepped us for our jam-packed days.  I only had issues with the coffee.  I‚Äôm not a fancy coffee drinker at all but I just couldn‚Äôt drink it!  The pool area looked nice as well but in the end, we did not use it as we spent our entire days at the parks.  Other families did use it to break up their day a bit but the weather wasn‚Äôt too hot during our visit so we didn‚Äôt feel the need to do so.    We also found that having three full days at the park was our sweet spot, ie 1 day at Disneyland, 1 day at California Adventure
Manager Response: Thank you for your business. We appreciate you letting us know on your stay. I will make and let my manager know about your thoughts on having safes in the rooms. We do have safes at the front desk for your convenience. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Last week I stayed at the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn for 4 nights while visiting Disneyland. I found the location to be perfect as I walked to the park everyday (approx 0.8 mile walk). I found the room to be spacious and comfortable. The only issue I found was upon entering the room had a funny smell, which went away after turning the air conditioner on. I would stay again if visiting the area because the AAA rate was pretty good for the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn - Is in a great location it's opposite Disneyland,a bus pulls up right in front of the hotel that takes you straight in to the park or it will take you 10 to 15 minutes to walk.We stayed there for 7 days and had a blast the staff there were so nice and very helpful,our room was a great size plenty of room,there is a laundry which is handy for long stays.The pool area was awesome to spend the day to just sit back and relax,what we loved the most was the restaurant in the corner of the complex it is called COCO's and man the food was to die for we so can't wait to go back there next year. Also were had  breakfast each morning and it was good to plus there have wifi and a little shop as well you have everything you need right at your feet.We will
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very happy to hear that you guys had a GREAT time. We always love to hear about your experience at our property. The walk is only about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Of‚Äô course there‚Äôs the shuttle option. It picks you up in front of the property for a fee. It‚Äôs 5.00 per adult and 2.00 for kids ages 3-9. Coco‚Äôs food is Yummy! I agree. I have never had a bad meal there. We welcome you with open arms anytime that you are ready to visit us. See you next year!

Summary: Couple of things I had a lost case  on Friday which I had told reception staff when I had problem with room phone. Next day Saturday still awaiting case getting dropped(between 4-10pm)8pm at at reception explaining problem with case told not here fine I'll call airline on Sunday   told has been dropped off previous day ,girl at reception said she seen it at start of 7am shift on Sunday, No one from reception contacted me!! Swimming pool no privacy to road or people walking past. Room was clean ,bed comfortable. Coco's next door great food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We apologize for the miscommunication on our behalf. That should have happened. The package was held in our storage room. We apologize once more for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. I will make sure and tell housekeeping that they are doing a great job in the rooms.  We hope to see you again!

Summary: Small, Dingy Rooms That Smell With No Fitness Center (They Say They Have One That Has Been In Repair For Three Years.  hHotels In The Area Are Expensive, So This Is A Nice Change.  Because If Price, Dues Bring In The RIff Read.  Good Location For Disney Or Convention.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We just expanded and remodeled our breakfast room. When we did the expansion we had to remove the fitness room. We do offer an alternative fitness area. We can inform you at the front desk. The fitness room will be relocated in the pool area. This will take place in winter/spring of 2014. Thank you again for using Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for you lodging needs.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay, only downside was the really spotty wifi. Staff friendly & helpful, pools nice. Easy walking distance, cut thru Grand Californian. Coco's next door-AMAZING. Best pie ever, great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We will check into the Internet and find out what can be causing the interruption on the signal. We do hope that you come and stay with us again.

Summary: The rooms are done in the current modern style (darker tones, minimalist) with very nicely done bedding and reasonable space. The bathtub was large and all the plumbing work well. The wall-mounted A/C unit had a remote control. I always tip housekeeping daily or so, and the room was perfectly made-up each day. As I took Amtrak to Anaheim, I did not have to pay to park ($10.00/day). The "continental breakfast" had the usual items and rotated between bacon and sausage, mini pancakes and mini waffles and so on. There is a Coco' restaurant next door, they have much better coffee. Overall, a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We always love to hear that you had a wonderful time with us. That‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the breakfast in the morning in our newly remodeled room. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary Heading: Okay, but probably won't stay there again
Summary: Took our kids to Disneyland and chose to stay at Stovall's inn for several reasons...it was within walking distance to the park, the pictures looked like it was a nice place to stay, they were having a deal that if you stay in a Best Western 3 times in a certain amount of time you get $50 back.  First off, when my husband inquired about them taking our rewards number so we could get the $50 reward, they wouldn't take it because we booked online.  They also charged us $20 for parking our car there for two days, when our car was parked there for less than 12 hours because we had car trouble and had to leave it in the shop for most of the time we were in Anaheim.  The room smelled damp and musty when we walked in, but once the air was on for awhile it wasn't quite as noticeable
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs. The promotion for Best Western is valid when you pay directly to the hotel. Unfortunately it‚Äôs not available when the reservation is prepaid. I hope that we fixed the parking charge for you. We do hope that you give us another opportunity to deliver legendary service. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: It was hard to find the bell cart and when It was found it was pretty old. When we asked about shuttles to Disneyland it was unfortunate that the desk clerk did not tell us that we needed to buy a day pass from the gift shop. The clerk could also have mentioned that the bus would actually stop in front of the property. The room door required extra effort to close securely. A $10.00 DAILY! parking fee - really?  A hidden room charge if I have ever seen one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I apologize if you couldn‚Äôt find a luggage cart in a timely manner. If the front desk would have been contacted we could have sent one to your room. The ART shuttle information is also located at the front desk. Yes, the Art shuttle does pick up in front of our property. It is route #9 and it comes approximately every 20 minutes depending on traffic. The parking charge is not a hidden fee. Every guest that makes a reservation would have been advised that we have a 10.00 parking fee for each car per night. If you book online it will state that we have a parking charge of 10.00 per car each night. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Very Accomodating,Reasonable price, Clean, Comfortable Stay!!
Summary: We needed a place to just sleep off a long day with coming in at 4am, get sleep and then leave around 2pm.  There response, no problem!!  So nice about it when I explained our circumstances!!  That is hard to find.  Comfy bed and pillows, good amenities, nice TV and CLEAN!! So, keep in mind it is a family hotel and families with small children are not quiet by nature. Having said this, after the morning leave rush time (lasted about 40 min), all quiet again.  It was not excessive either, no crying, shouting, just suit cases rolling by with some conversation.  Reminded me of when I was a kid and families understood & respected each other. We were by the elevator, I expected much more noise in the morning. Really cool, couldn't use as just need sleep, pool side room service by
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to rest after having a long day. I can relate to you when you say that you just want a good affordable property that is clean, has amenities, great beds, great pillows and GREAT SERVICE. Welcome to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We are always ready to help and make you feel like home. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: I was very happy with our stay here.  We didn't want to spend too much money on a hotel since most of our time would be spent at Disneyland.  This hotel was very nice!  The walk to Disneyland is about 15 minutes and it takes you right into Downtown Disney.  There is also a shuttle for a small price that will pick you up right in front of the hotel as well.  The room was nice and modern and the beds were comfortable.  They offer a full buffet style breakfast every morning with a huge eating area.  The breakfast was very good.  Pancakes, waffles, sausage, eggs, cereal, bagels, and lots more!  And free :)  My kids' favorite part was the pool!!!  There are 2 huge pools, one of them is heated.  There are also 2 spas.  Towels are available at the pool which was nice that way you don't
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very pleased to hear that you guys had a wonderful time here with us. Yes, there is a shuttle that can take you to the parks. It‚Äôs the ART shuttle and it‚Äôs 5.00 per adult and children ages 3-9 is 2.00 for an all day pass. The shuttle will pick you up in front of our property and it runs approximately every 20 minutes starting on the hour. That‚Äôs great that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. Again, I‚Äôm glad that you guys had a wonderful stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed for 4 days while visiting Disneyland . The location was great walking distance to Disneyland from our room we were above the pool also we could watch the light show from California aventure ,The rooms were nice and clean, staff was great , my kids enjoyed the pool breakfast was good. We would defiantly stay again :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. It is a beautiful walk down to the parks through Downtown Disney. It only takes about 15-20 minutes to get there. That‚Äôs great the kids enjoyed the pools. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: Just left after a 2 night stay here  Staff were friendly and seemed eager to help, they were always very quick to help when you were waiting at the reception desk  When we checked in we weren't given any instructions on how to get to disney, nor given maps and I ended up walking for about 20 mins as I didn't know about the short cut through the Grand Californian Hotel which took about 10 mins off the time on the way back to the hotel. Later when I was waiting at reception I heard one of the Front Desk staff explaining the 'short cut' (this was a different staff member to the person that checked me in) to another guest that was checking in.  Breakfast was good. Pancakes/Waffles, Bacon/Sausages, eggs, fruit, yogurts, mini muffins, bagels, bread.  We had no issues with noise and we
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I apologized if the front desk didn‚Äôt mention to you the short cut to Disneyland and California Adventure through Downtown Disney. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to enjoy the breakfast in the morning.  We hope that you visit us again!

Summary: Have stayed here a couple of times before (on a contiki tour) and have returned. Still very satisfied...the hotel is in a great location and is great for the budget conscious. Although it isnt a Disney hotel it is within the Disney resort area and one of the disney shuttles stops right outside the door, with passes able to be brought from the hotel.  It is also walking distance to downtown disney which is great for restaurants and shopping, both disney shopping and retail.  Close to restaurants and has a coco's right outside the door.  Rooms are great, beds are amazingly comfortable...especially for the jetlagged!! rooms can get quite hot under the californian sun and only downside is the air conditioner can be quite deafening....ask for a shade facing room if this is an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: The "Best" Best Western a short walk from Disneyland!
Summary: We have stayed in many Best Western hotels around the world and this one is of the same quality as those abroad.  The room we stayed in was very clean, quiet and comfortable.  The a/c was so wonderful at the end of a busy day at the parks.  We walked everyday to "play" in the park.  It takes approx. 15 minutes at a quick pace but refreshing.  The hotel has two pools and two Jacuzzis.  The front office staff are very friendly and answer any questions regarding local dining and attractions.  They offer free safe deposit boxes, so we were confident to lock our things up each morning.  The check in and out was fast and prompt.  We will stay here in the future.  Thanks Best Western.........
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are always happy to hear that you had a fabulous stay! It is great that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas after a long day at the parks. The front desk and concierge are always happy to help when you have any questions. We do have safety deposit boxes located at the front desk that guests can use. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We recently stayed here for our 2 week vacation. As a family of 4 we found the rooms to be quite spacious and very clean. The hotel staff were all very helpful and friendly, this always makes a stay anywhere way more pleasant. We were very impressed with the breakfast that was provided every morning, there was something for everyone. Our kids loved having the swimming pools, they spent many hours of our trip splashing around. We were very pleased with how close we were to Disney, we loved that we could see the park from our room. Overall we felt very comfortable at this hotel, we will stay here again the next time we are in the area. I would recommend this hotel to anyone I know who is travelling that way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you guys had a great time while staying with us. I will make sure that I tell the front desk to keep up the great work! I bet that it was nice and relaxing at the pool area. That‚Äôs wonderful to hear that you were able to enjoy it. Thank you for recommending our property! We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: This hotel was just what we needed while visiting Disneyland.  We stayed here 3 nights. Friendly helpful staff, awesome breakfast (buffet (hot and cold) and lots of it), nice swimming pool and spa to relax aching feet and muscles after long days walking around disneyland!  Close to nearby restaurants if not eating in Disneyland.  Wifi wasn't really reliable and room was dark - but for what we wanted it was fine and good value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pools and spa to relax after a long day at the parks. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for a couple nights! I liked it! I was impressed with it!  Close to Disney & convenient location for many things as shopping and food! It's clean too! The breakfast is a nice touch too, to start off your morning! Thanks for a nice stay & nice people!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you had a great time at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: So close to Disneyland (15 minute walk). Continental breakfast was great. Rooms were clean and quiet. The front desk staff were very helpful. My only complaint was the wi-fi connection in the rooms was really hit and miss.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. I know that for a couple of days we had issues with our internet due to a Time Warner issue. While they were fixing something they cut a main fiber line that fed Internet to several companies in the area. We do hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary Heading: Nicely renovated and a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney
Summary: We stayed a week during Easter break at best western stovalls.  We were very impressed with this hotel.  For the price and the distance to Disneyland I would recommend it.  My husband and children(4 and 13) enjoyed the hot FREE breakfast!!  I was a little bummed that the fitness centre was under construction but happy they gave me FREE passes to a 24/7 fitness gym just 5 short minutes from hotel.  THANKS, awesome facility!!  The rooms are spacious with a fridge, microwave so that you can pack snacks and cool bevvies to the park!!  Parking was sometimes hard to get in front of your room but no biggie....It was a busy time.  FREE wireless internet was sketchy but who is there to surf the internet???  not me.  There is a business center in the lobby which you could use.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. During our breakfast room remodel we did remove the fitness room to make the room larger. The plans are to build the fitness room in the pool area. Yes, all of our rooms have microwaves, fridges, coffee makers, iron and boards. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Let me start by saying that I am way overdue in writing this review.  We traveled to Disneyland for a week prior to Thanksgiving and stayed here for 3 nights of our visit.  B/c we are a family of 5, we  booked  2 adjoining rooms.  They were located on the first floor several doors down from the laundry area.  When we arrived, the rooms looked nice (as they do on the internet), but were much smaller than expected.  We had to rearrange the chairs in the rooms so we could even open the door b/w the adjoining rooms, and even then, we were were still tripping over furniture to get b/w rooms.  Not the nest set-up with 3 kids 7 and under.  I have been in numerous other hotels where one room was a better set-up than this!  Further, the noise from the garbage truck very early in the AM,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you telling us on your stay. I understand that you didn‚Äôt want to move that night that you found the spider. We are always ready to assist if you had chosen to move. I do show that we had housekeeping go into the room and make sure that they rewashed the brown blankets and white duvets. They changed the beds and they said they didn‚Äôt find anything else. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Close to Disney!
Summary: We stayed here for four nights for a quick Disney trip. The room was very clean, the front desk very helpful. It is a quick walk to Disneyland, and there is also a little market store about 1/2 block away. We would most definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are happy that you had a great time. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed in 613 and found it to be up to the standards I would expect for the price of this hotel. Why pay more to stay at a Disney Hotel when this hotel is less than a five minute extra walk to the gate. The bed were comfortable and the room was quite. I could have had a bit better house keeping but was generally good. The free breakfast was convenient but basic. All I need was a bagel and coffee and I was good anyways. Staff was nice. When we come back to Disney I would definitely be willing to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great time here at the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn. A lot of our guests compliment us on our beds. They say that it was the best sleep that they have ever had. We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed the extended continental breakfast. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great location next to Disneyland. Recently updated
Summary: Stayed for three days with two teens. It is just across from the back side of California Adventure and you can see the Ferris Wheel as you exit the parking lot. Has a "motel" appearance but our room was better than expected and looked recently updated.  We were on the first floor, which creates some privacy issues when the door was open, but otherwise we enjoyed the room. It is only a 12 minute walk to the park entrance which isn't that easy to find, but it felt much longer. So we bought shuttle tickets to go back and forth. The shuttle (run by the city) to the park is $3 each way but you can buy a pass good for the entire day for $5 and it's very fast.  There is a microwave, mini fridge and a lot of tea selections in the room. Granite counters and a good sized bathroom.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time here with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Everything about the hotel worked well. It is close enough to walk to Disneyland and the price was a good value for the dates we stayed. The breakfast was good, not great, but good and saved you the cost of a morning meal. The only issue was the street noise. We were on the pool side of the hotel, and at night there was a bit of street noise that may be an issue with some visitors. It was not an issue for us, but from some of the comments seen on this site, it coud be an issue for some. We would stay again.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the scenery while walking to the parks. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: For the price and convenience Best Western  can't be beat.  It is a 12-15 minute walk to Downtown Disney.  The entire facility is clean and appears to be updated.  The showers are great and the beds are comfortable.  The staff is friendly and helpful and there is a free breakfast included. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are a short 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. I‚Äôm very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful stay. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here in Nov 12. We are a family of 5 traveling with 3 boys aged 7,6 & months from Australia. The room was modern & clean. The complimentary breakfast was great and helped us save the extra money. There are 2 restaurants near by to eat. We didn't use the pool because we spent our time in Disneyland. It was only a ten minute walk through the grand Californian hotel. All in all it was a great stay and affordable. My only negative point would be that the free wi fi was so slow you couldn't really use it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to hear that you guys had a great time while staying with us. Maybe next time you will be able to enjoy our pools and spa. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Stayed 7 nights room was clean beds are comfy. The only time we could get the internet to work was around 1am. The fridge doesn't have a freezer to freeze waters to take into the parks. Not a issue this time a year but would be in the middle of the summer. Was quiet until the cheerleaders moved in on Friday. That of course isn't the hotel's fault more the parents fault for letting kids run up and down the halls screaming and cheering. Would stay again for the right price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. The fridges in the rooms do have freezers but that is something that we can look into in the future. We appreciate your business and we hope to see you again!

Summary: Very close, walking distance to the parks.. Our room wreaked. It was incredibly noisy, screaming at midnight, car alarm going off at 3 am.  Just felt dirty. Breakfast was ok, but free... Staff was great tho. Nice, accommodating.. I would pay extra and stay at the Annabella ..,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that when you are visiting the Anaheim area you use Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: We stayed here because of the location to Disneyland-walking distance to downtown Disney and Disneyland (not right across the street) but totally doable.  I too was there while the cheerleaders were there, but did not here them at all.  We had a nice comfortable room on the ground floor. It was clean, quiet and always made up when we returned.  The buffet is great, they have a big selection-but do make sure you get there early for best selection as they only put out certain amounts of things like yogurt/fruit. The pool area is beautiful, there are two pools and two hot tubs with a nice manicured grass area-always had fresh towels on hand.  There is a liquor/convenience store just down the street. I would also recommend Coco's restaurant and also Howards for great family value
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. It‚Äôs great to hear that you had a wonderful stay while staying with us. We are a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We do have a lot of selection in our breakfast room for everyone to enjoy. Yes, our pools are always ready for guest use and we always have fresh towels. We hope to see you again.

Summary: For The Price this Motel can not be beat!!  It's just a walk away from Disneyland!  The rooms are very well appointed, and the bed is confortable! The breakfast served everyday has something for every body! No dissapointment here!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your business. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: A follow-up to my earlier review
Summary: Stayed here for the third time in about 5 years or so.  Each time the complimentary breakfast has improved.  When we stayed there around Easter this year, we were pleasantly surprised to see that the breakfast room has been significantly enlarged.  It was much easier to get a table, now.    Wi-fi is still somewhat spotty, though.  Not too big of a deal for me, since I am now using a Roam Mobility SIM which provides very reasonable voice/data plans for when I'm travelling in the USA.    We also spent more time using the pool this time, and it was very nice: two pools and two hot tubs.  One of the pools was cool/cold, the other was warm, so you've got options depending on how you feel, and the weather.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your business. We have remodeled the breakfast room and added more items to choose from. That‚Äôs great that you were able to use the pools and hot tubs. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Stayed here because we love best  western however surprised by property looked as if best western renovated an old hotel wifi would not work even with the help of a very nice technical support worker asked about it at front desk in am and they said when hotel was full there was always problems with wifi which surprised me because the evening shift person michael tried toblame our devices iphone 5 samsung 3s and brand new hp laptop  buffet was excellent be up by 630 might stay here again conveniently beside disneyland but i would request room away from highway so noisy beds comfy rooms clean nice cofee and tea selection in room
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are currently working on the WIFI. It looks like we had a bad device and we are currently taking care of it. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to come and enjoy our breakfast. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: When I arrived at 4 pm with a sleeping gild in my arms, our room was not ready and they had no others available. The place with crawling with teenage cheerleaders in for a competition. They cheered during the day and were so loud well into the night, shouting to each other room to room, even building to building. Add the horribly loud noise from Katella Ave, and I really don't want to stay two more nights of my reservation. Our room has no shower curtain but also no drain on the floor. I guess they like standing water on the floor? The keys were coded wrong. The beds are very small for two people. And the phone does not seem to be able to call the front desk to talk to them about any of this. Hate this place, hate that my AAA person recommended it. It's across the street from
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. There is a very large convention in town. It‚Äôs a cheerleading competition. A lot of the hotels in Anaheim will be sold out due to the convention being so large. We could have relocated you to another area in the hotel if that would have helped. We hope that you can come and visit and see that we are a very great hotel.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights in the second half of March. Booked here based on location and price plus Tripadvisor reviews.  Check in was quick and painless, staff were courteous. When I asked about the Fitness center that was adverised as an amenity on their website, I was told that it no longer existed due to expansion of Breakfast room. Disappointing for me as I rely on fitness to keep me healthy and stress free.  The rooms were pretty standard size with relatively new decor. Compact but functional bathroom with Tub/shower combo. NO exhaust fan in bathroom, just a small window to attempt ventilation.
