You can tell that the property probably dates to the 50's or 60's as it is essentially a true motel.Light sleepers will NEED earplugs here.I could hear the neighbour snoring through the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I can understand your frustration when you‚Äôre trying to sleep and people are trying to get settled in. Maybe it was a bit noisy because we have a large cheerleading convention in Anaheim. A lot of the properties in the area are sold out due to this large convention. We will keep inconsideration about needing an exhaust fan in the bathroom. We hope that you do come and visit us again.

Summary: Just got back from a great Disney vacation. The location of this hotel is great. You can see the ferris wheel from the hotel. Definitely within walking distance, although there is a shuttle at a cost ( 5 per adult, 2 per child, per day)  Regarding the internet, WiFi. This was the only negative issue related to our stay. I phoned several times and was always referred to their provider netlinks? I didn't appreciate the head in the sand mgt approach. Not the front desk's fault at all, but really, fix you're internet issues. When on vacation, it would be nice to post pics on facebook and such, but to no avail. In addition the business center has 3 computers, but two are heavily crimped with parental controls, .. no facebook, twitter, or social networking of any sort. When ask if I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are currently working on the Internet issues. We found a bad device that kept interrupting the internet signal. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to enjoy the breakfast. Our maintenance and grounds keeper try their very best to keep our property clean. We hope that you come and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: OK but don't count on internet service.
Summary: Yes the rooms are comfortable, quiet, well appointed. Nice pools, yes two pools, two spa tub's. Very nice topiary garden. Great hot breakfast. Laundry room on first floor. Friendly staff. OK, the downside(s). Internet service in our room was dismal, down most of the time. TV is only local antenna service. No cable or premium channels. Parking is maxed out at busy times and a $10/day fee for it. It's three floors but there are elevators. The mini-fridges do not have freezers. Coffee makers are the one-cup type.  All-in-all not a bad choice for this busy area. If you plan on spending most of your time at Disney parks drive there and park unless you are really into hiking. Kids will love it, and there are, of course many. Thankfully rooms are well insulated. Oh, one last thing, the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I can understand your frustration with the internet. I will make sure and look into it. I will make sure and check what was causing the interruption of the service. We are replacing the ac units. I hope you come and visit us when you come to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We made an impromptu trip to Disneyland after my daughter had to say goodbye to her husband who was leaving for a deployment in Afghanistan.  What a better way to get our mind off things than a trip to the "Happiest Place on Earth!"  We were not planning on staying over night but decided at the last minute to find a close hotel.  This was a perfect place for that.  It was clean, spacious, and within walking distance to the Park.  The breakfast was just what we needed.  It was much better than most.  The staff was very accommodating and worked to get us a great military rate.  Was it the best hotel we have ever stayed in, No.  But, it was perfect for what we needed and a great rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Glad to hear that you guys had a wonderful time here with us. We always support our troops that are away. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary Heading: Ok to stay. Too many children!!
Summary: We stayed here as part of our honeymoon to go to Disneyland and the fender factory.  Needless to say it wasn't romantic (lol, we were expecting it) and had WAY too many children for us.  The motel is perfectly located a 15-20 min walk to the Disneyland entrance. The rooms are well appointed (fridge, microwave and kettle) decent linens and modern decor and good tv reception. Has a very useful charging hub in the rooms.   Rooms were relatively quiet, noise coming from those walking outside in the mornings was bad so no opportunity for sleeping in. The air con is very very noisy. Our door handle wouldn't open unless it was smashed down (took frustration to work that out).  Wifi is terrible. Only one tiny spot right near the door gets signal, that is very weak and drops in and out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thank you for staying with us. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovalls Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The entire staff is commendable esp. Matt from front desk who has assisted us from check in. Overall, your employees have went above and beyond  their dutiesto make everyone's stay comfortable. A 5 star experience in a very reasonable price, thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell the staff to keep up the great customer service especially Mat. Thanks again for the 5 star rating. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We just got back from a 2 days at Disneyland at stayed here at Stovalls Inn for 2 nights. Let me 1st say that the rooms are a great size with 2 queen beds, refrigerator,microwave,desk area and a table and 2 chairs! There is room for kids to just be kids considering it was my husband,my 2 kids and I. The cleanliness to a room for me is so important and the bathroom and they do such an exceptional job at meeting those expectations! They offer continental breakfast which is delicious and its fee! They also have room service with coco's bakery! Which was also delicious! Downtown disney is just a short 5-7 min walk from hotel! Hop on the monorail and you'll be at disneyland within minutes! Remember when staying at hotels near Disneyland there are families with children if being able
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and we appreciate your business. I will make sure and tell all the staff that they are doing a great job! We are very pleased to hear that you feel like home when you come and visit us. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: Did a test for the grounds staff,(I always do some lttle test to see how the staff are running when I stay at a property). Went to the elevator, dropped some wrappers on the floor. Went to my car and returned to elevator in less than 10 min. paper wrappers were gone. Good job. Rooms were sparkling clean , nice granite for the vanity, breakfast was hot and tasty as well. Keep up the fab work staff.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and your business. It‚Äôs funny that you did that test. We have had guests do that in the past and they were very pleased to see that it was taken care of right away. We hope that when you come to the Anaheim area you come to the Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: great location. clean roomy rooms.. great amenities in rooms. I thoroughly enjoy having coffee, fridge and microwave in room. flat screen tv. blow dryer. Not to mention the expanded FREE breakfast! Large assortment of breakfast foods.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with is. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I travel frequently for business and am a diamond member for Best Western Hotels. I frequent the Groves nor Best Western in San Francisco and assumed that as I was attending a convention in Anaheim standards would be similar. Needless to say it was more like a motel 6 or worst. Spiders in the suite and bathroom . the bathroom was filthy shower curaint was too small, no room service for 3 day stay. Continental breakfast consisted of old fruit dried scrambled eggs etc, There was no follow through with the staff regarding the room, wakeup calls, or even calling for a taxi. Absolutely the worst stay in twenty years of travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that your findings were mentioned to the front desk. We would have moved you to another room. We strive to keep all of our rooms clean and ready for our guests. I‚Äôm surprised that you disliked our property.

Summary: This older hotel did a nice job on their remodel. The room was clean and did have a mini-fridge. The breakfast included yoghurt and fresh fruit, eggs and sausage (good for the grown-up taste) as well as the unavoidable fruit loops (my kids don't get them at home, so they love it on vacation). It gave us a good start before going into the park. One morning we had breakfast with Mickey at the Paradise Pier, which is only a short walk up the street.  The service was a bit poor as we had asked for early check in, they put us on a wait list and said we have to call them every 20 minutes otherwise the room will go to the next person who walks in that day. Really??? We want to be in the park and not call the hotel every 20 minutes! We could see the roller coasters and Ferris wheel from
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. I apologize for the poor customer service. We don‚Äôt give rooms away. We would have hoped to get you in right away but no rooms were available at that time. We hope you come again and stay with us.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for Disneyland visit
Summary: We recently stayed at Stovall's for the second time for a Disneyland visit.  It is basically clean and well kept.  The rooms are dark and a little small, but that really isn't a problem for us.  We like the fact that they have a fridge and microwave.  I especially like the sink and mirror being outside of the toilet and tub/shower room.  They really need to add a vent to the bathroom.  This last time we opened the small window above the tub while we showered (which they need to put a screen on) and that helped some, but the humidity can get really high without a vent.  There is nice tile in the bathroom and a granite countertop around the sink.  The ceiling in the toilet room was only half-painted, which was strange, but didn't bother us.  The toilet paper holders don't rotate
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. The walk going to Disney through Downtown Disney is great.

Summary: Overall a great value!  We booked thru Costco Travel and I loved that it was all taken care of when we got there.  I purchased the ART shuttle passes thru the hotel when we arrived and that was convenient.  Close to Disneyland/California Adventure if you don't mind a walk, but we used the ART shuttle because we knew we'd be walking all day in the parks.  Excellent breakfast! Comfy beds and we appreciated having a fridge in the room.  The pool area was nice and usually we had the area to ourselves.  Before we left each morning, we'd buy bottled water from the vending machine for $1.50 (or such) and it saved us from buying in the parks.  I would recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you guys come back and stay with us again!

Summary: We enjoyed our four nights at the Stovall Inn.  The grounds and rooms are kept very clean, and the breakfast if perfectly adequate, with standard scrambled eggs, sausage, and the other usual fare.  This place is in a great location for visiting the park -- it's a little bit of a walk, but not bad at all.  You can easily walk to Downtown Disney for a meal or to shop, and you enter the parks through Downtown Disney, so it's very convenient.  We were on the third floor facing the swimming pool and intersection.  So it was a bit noisy at times, but we liked being able to see over to the park -- there's a great view of the ferris wheel and California Screamin' roller coaster.  We'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. It is very close to walk back and forth to the parks. The scenery is beautiful! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I was attending an event at the Anaheim Convention Center so this motel was convenient. Thought they were remodeling their breakfast room we were given vouchers for the restaurant next door. Our room was standard. I missed a refrigerator and a safe. Everything was clean when we arrived. One night the Santa Ana winds blew pretty hard and the old aluminum windows rattled loudly. I could not hear people in the rooms surrounding me but I could hear people talking as they walked by (as if they were in my room). Over all it was good for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are currently remodeling our breakfast room. We didn‚Äôt want to inconvenience you so we went ahead and set the breakfast up at Coco‚Äôs restaurant. We do have a small fridge and microwave in the room. The safes are not available in the rooms for guest protection. We have safes at the desk that you may use. We hope that you had a great time. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Clean place to stay the night. No frills though
Summary: Overall stay was good.  Did not partake in the free breakfast.  Coco's restaurant next to motel, very convenient.  Proximity was very close to Disneyland and my family and I were able to walk to the theme parks. Beds were hard for my liking.  Rooms are not very sound proof.  Parking is extremely limited and can be hard to find by the evening.  If you're just looking for a clean place to lay your head at night this place is good for that. Grounds are nicely landscaped and kept up.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very close to the park that you are able to walk back and forth to the parks. We hope that you come back and visit us again.

Summary: This was my second stay at the Best Western PLUS Stovall inn and it was as nice as my first. My friend and I only stayed for one night but it was a clean room with nice furnishings and had nice customer service. I only wished their wireless was stronger.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are installing fiber optic for our internet. We hope to have this resolve pretty soon. I‚Äôm glad that you liked our hotel. We hope to see you again!

Summary: We had a last minute change of plans during our Disneyland trip last week 2/25-3/1/13 & needed 1 more night at a hotel close to DL. Unfortunately we chose this hotel. It was small, smelled horrendously of a cat litter box, parking was tight & cost $10 extra. Shuttle to DL was $5/person. No fan in the bathroom. The breakfast was better than average I will admit:) The majority of our DL stay was at the Desert Palm which was cheaper & WAY nicer, so it's hard not to compare the two. We will not be staying here again when there is such a better option in terms of comfort & price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I would have hoped that you could have brought your concerns to our attention. We could have checked on the room. We do have the shuttle and it does have a fee. It‚Äôs an all day pass. We hope that when coming to the Anaheim area you give the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs another opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Cant' get closer to the front gate of Disneyland on S. Harbor Blvd.
Summary: Fast check in, clean rooms, free breakfast that is better than the standard contential breakfast, and the best part is that this hotel is the closest to the front entrance to Disney.  Room prices are on par with the other hotels on the three block strech of S Harbor Blvd and again this is the closest to the crosswalk on S Harbor and esp handy with younger children.  Only down side to the hotel is the charge for daily parking inaddition to the nightly rate and CA tourist taxes, on day of check out you must be out of the parking lot by 3pm.  Handy tip for parking on day of check out, go down Katella and park in the downtown Disney parking and walk back into the park from that direction (close to Rain Forest Cafe).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that you come and visit soon!

Summary: Great value for money, excellant location for disneyland, shuttle to disney every 15 mins at the door. Also you can book trips to san diego zoo, los angelas tours, sea world etc within the reception shop. Plenty of eating places nearby
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We can also help you with any tours you want to book. Yes, we do have plenty of eatery in the area that you can walk to and enjoy. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Stovall's Inn - Great place to stay when in Anaheim
Summary: Attended a conference in Anaheim - Stovall's was a great choice for my stay.  Liked room decor / pleasant walk to Convention Center. Front desk staff very pleasant and great at multi-tasking. Only negative - finding parking space a challenge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We can also help you with any tours you want to book. Yes, we do have plenty of eatery in the area that you can walk to and enjoy. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a great place to stay, the rooms were exactly like the pictures and were very clean. It was nicely set up and quite convenient to Disneyland. About a 6 block walk in total. Make sure when you walk over you take the shortcut through the Grand Californian Hotel or you'll add about 15 minutes to the journey. This Motel was what I've come to expect from Best Western PLUS . It was very nice and I have no complaints about the place at all. It has a laundry room , they provide a free nice breakfast with a great assortment of food and the boys that work the desk try to be as helpful as they can. If I had any suggestions it would be that they add a pay per view movie channel, that would be great , but all in all a great value, a nice room and a perfect place to stay for a week
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very pleased to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. It is a nice brief walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We do have a guest laundry room available to use. Our Front Desk and Concierge are always ready and happy to assist you for bookings of shuttle or information that you would like to know. We hope to see you again!

Summary: We stayed here in May 2012 for 8 nights, 4 people, for $900. Room was great and cleaned every day. Breakfast was all you needed. Our kids loved the pools. Washing facilities clean and very reasonable. Coco's was awesome, our favourite eating place, they even do room delivery and charge to your room, great if you have had a big day out and just want to stay in your room. 15min walk to Downtown Disney, ART was fantastic, pickup and drop-off from your door to Disneyland, we got a 5 day pass, great value. All tours pick up direct from the hotel. Staff were very helpful. We can't wait to go back in 2014.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Great! You guys had a wonderful time while staying here. You were able to try and enjoy the breakfast. Your feed back is always important to us. That‚Äôs great that the kids loved the pools. We are always here to make every vacation memorable! Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: One of the Better Disneyland Motel Stays
Summary: Stovalls Best Western Anaheim was a pretty good motel.  Clean and comfortable rooms and nice buffet type breakfast bar.  I would rate this motel higher but for two reasons:  even though it advertises free WiFi, the connection is terrible and hard to connect to.  And it is a pretty long walk to the park, a good fifteen minutes.  You can buy ART passes, though, and that makes it better if you have small children or senior citizens in your group.  The only other complaint is the pool stays open too late and consequently hard to go to sleep with all the noise down there in late hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to have our breakfast. We appreciate your feedback on everything. We will keep in consideration about the pool hours. Sometimes it‚Äôs great to have the pool opened later so guest can come and use it after a long day at the parks. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Our family stayed here during our trip to California Adventure. The room was comfortable and clean. We have a family of five and it worked well for us. The free breakfast was adequate, everyone found something they liked. We would stay here again, it was a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great stay. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable beds but you won't get any sleep due to thin walls and lots of noise
Summary: If you are looking for rest in between visits to the Disney Parks this is NOT the place for you. I learned this the hard way. During our three night stay, I got maybe 4-5 hours sleep per night and not on purpose. The noise level was outrageous. I could hear the people next door, above me and everything that went on outside. I understand this is a family hotel, some noise is to be expected, but the thin walls which I believe was the problem, leave you sleepless. Maybe if we would have a room at the top of the hotel in far corner it would have been better. The beds were comfortable, but good luck sleeping in them due to all of the noise.  My last comment has to do with the walk to the park. Overall not bad, but the hotel told us we could walk through the Grand Californian into the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We have guests that cut through the Grand Californian Hotel and exit to Downtown Disney and the park will be on your right. We have never had any guests get turned away. We still hope that you had a great time here with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary: the best western stovall in anaheim ca. was fine the room  and the staff.  the breakfast was in my opinion very bad.first the dining room was dirty , the trash cans were over flowing with plates cups and half eaten food.etc.   they say they are renovating it? i was there 4 days i didnt see any work being done. there was gaping hole in the walls were light fixures should be. the tables and charir were were pretty old and rocked as i tried to eat.. the food (eggs , sausages  waffel) were cold   the yogurt bananas and apples were gone usuall before 9am..the three toasters i used only toasted one side of the bread..  the coffe was good, but it want very hot. .they only had two young people working the dining room though they worked very very hard it was just too much for them to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are remodeling our breakfast room. Please pardon our mess. We are trying to have more seating for everyone. We will make sure that we have plenty of staff to work properly. Your feed back is greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was one of the many hotels located around disneyland. we flew in and did not plan to stay here, but our hotel we booked for a 2 week vacation lost our reservation when we arrived. Could not rebook so we found this nice hotel close to park. We checked in late (family of 5) and planned to rest up and go to Disneyland in the morning. We left at 9 am and headed for complimentry breakfast (ok) then headed to the park. Once at the park we relized it was still spring break so we returned to our hotel about 10 am, to find to men in our room??? Since we complained the TV needed fixing the night before we thought they were fixing the TV. Silly us.  We checked out thinking nothing of the incedent and headed to San Diego for 2 weeks only to return to Stavall's to stay for 3 dys near
Manager Response: This review has been reported to Trip Advisor Headquarters. This review is all a lie. This incident never happened at the Best Western Stovalls Inn. Trip Advisor will be taking care of this review.

Summary: I made the reservations through an internet travel site 3 months prior to trip. The confirmation email said to contact the hotel to choose double or king bed(s). I immediately called and requested a king size bedroom. When we arrived was told that since the reservations were made through a third party we had no chose of room/bed size. I showed the confirmation email and my notes of when and who I talked to, but to no avail. We didn't get the king bed, instead two doubles right by the only working elevator. Oh and the noise! Not just because the walls, ceiling, and floors are paper thin, the  various people getting on/off the elevator, and being beside a busy road, I'm referring to the hotel's renovation/re-construction noise, which started very early in the morning- one day the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I apologize to you if we weren‚Äôt able to accommodate you with the room that you have requested. Sometimes it‚Äôs very difficult to accommodate guests when we don‚Äôt have that room type available. I hope you understand. The noise could be coming from the cars or guests coming back and forth. Yes, we are remodeling our breakfast room and I can assure you that we didn‚Äôt start any noise till after 9am. We do charge for parking and it‚Äôs 10.00 a day for registered guests. We do hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you use Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: My family and I have stayed here for our family vacation.  A teenager and a ten year old.    The room was a little run down for our tastes.  The pools were great, the kids loved it.  We watched the fireworks from the pool at night.  It is on the ART transfer route.  The breakfast was weak and did not have enough to fill my family and we had to purchase breakfast every day.  This place would be ok for a short stay, 1-2 days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to take a dip in the pool. We are always adding new items to the breakfast room. We are always interested on what you think of it and what other items you would like to see there. We hope see you soon!

Summary: I was greeted with a nice smile and friendly simile.  The paper work was very easy to get the hotel situated and the rooms were nice and clean. There was no funky odor in the room and the beds were very comfortable.  I was able to get a good night's rest after a long day of driving. I did not know how to get hot water from the shower at first, but eventually I figured it out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. And Happy Disney Chinese New Year to you too!! I‚Äôm glad that you had a great stay with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Very clean room with comfy beds, very close from Disneyland, the breakfast is way better than the continental one, with waffles, eggs, sausage and pancakes. We stayed two days and I forgot my toothbrush and toothpaste, i called the front desk and they gave them to me for free. Excellent service
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful stay! We are always here to greet you with a smile and make you feel welcome. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Our only choice now for Disneyland vacations!
Summary: We have always stayed along South Harbour, across from the main enterance from Disneyland, so when my daughters dance studio decided to take a trip in May 2012, I was skeptical about changing locations. They had chosen Stovall's for our hotel and I wasn't sure I would like being on the other side. But that all changed the first day we arrived. We loved it so much, that we came back in October . We will now never stay anywhere else when we go to Disneyland. The rooms are a nice size, we had connecting rooms as there are 6 in my family, plus we travelled with other family members, so there were 12 of us all together and 4 rooms. All of our rooms were spotless. My kids loved the pool area..2 pools, 2 hot tubs and a kids wading pool.  You can also order pool side service from Coco's
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We always love to hear about your stay. Thanks again for giving us a try and that you love staying with us. We appreciate you telling your friends and family about us. That‚Äôs great that the kids were able to use the pools. We do have the ART transit route #9 that will pick you up in front of our property. This shuttle will take you to the Disneyland Entrance. The fee is 5.00 per adult and child ages 3-9 is 2.00. This is an all day pass. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to try our extended breakfast. The hot chocolate is yummy :) we hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland without the price tag
Summary: We stayed her for 5 day in January. Although their breakfast room was being renovated we still got breakfast on the corner restaurant. Then when the new breakfast bar was opened it was amazing... Very please with the rooms and the hotels facilities...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We tried our best for the remodel not to interrupt your vacation. That‚Äôs great that it didn‚Äôt and you still enjoyed your breakfast at Coco‚Äôs. Once we are completely done with the breakfast room it will look fabulous. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I would love it if the beds were a firmer.  I feel like I am on a floating mattress.    I asked a housekeeper for more pillow case covers and she gave me a set with her cleaning gloves on that she had just used for cleaning the bathroom.  I did not want to embarrass her so I did not mention anything to her.  I have seen walking by the rooms during my stay that some of the cleaning ladies place the pillows on the floor while making the beds and that is why I ask for a new set of pillow cases when I stay.  I do not want to get anyone into trouble but work in the medical field and believe this to be a risk of transferring bacteria.    I have been happy with everyone else at this location.  Michael, Justin, Jonathan, Mark and Liz are great and seem to make everything effortless.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know on how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. Thanks for sharing on the whole pillow thing. I will speak to housekeeping about that. I will make sure I mention to the employees you named on the review to keep up the great work. We hope to see you again.

Summary: I have stayed here twice in 2 years (both times to visit Disneyland) and will definitely stay again! My first stay was in mid 2012 (for two nights) and stayed with friends. Perfect location for Disneyland visit. All other accommodation near Disneyland seemed to want to cash in on Disneyland stayers as they were very pricey, however Stovalls Inn was very cheap in comparison & still within walking distance to Disneyland. My first stay consisted of connecting rooms, which were nice & very clean. Staff were lovely & very helpful. Enjoyed my stay so much that I decided to stay here again in November 2012 (for one night) when visiting Disneyland with my niece & sister. Again Stovalls Inn didn't disappoint!! Room was again nice & very clean, breakfast was buffet style and lots to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to accommodate you with adjoining rooms. I will make sure and tell the front desk to keep up the great Customer Service! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed here over the Remembrance Day weekend in order to visit Disney.  We enjoyed the location as when you walked to Disney you arrive at Downtown Disney and walked along that street on your way to the gates.  Last year we stayed at the Quality Inn on the other side and we liked this angle. The room had a slight smell, but the bedding and decor was more up to date that the Quality last year.  It was large and had a nice long counter with the sink outside the bathroom to make getting ready easier. We ate at both Tiffany's and Cocos that are in the parking lot and enjoyed both, Would definitely stay there again.  We got a great deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you had a wonderful time with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, GREAT price, even greater location!
Summary: This hotel could not have been closer to the entrance to the parks. It was a very nice and clean room, decent breakfast, and steps away from Disneyland. The price was amazing as well. There were hot tubs and a pool that we did not have time to use, but they looked very nice. I will only stay here from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. Maybe next time that you come you get to enjoy our beautiful pools. See you soon!

Summary: It's clean and the bed is good. For me, thats the most important. I was there for the convention center and its a short ten minutes walk. But whats with the doors?! Had to slide the card in many times to get the it open and my collegue in the room next door had the same problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, we are about a 5-10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. I hope you guys had a great show. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: This hotel is perfect for families wanting to be close to Disney with a cooked breakfast to get you going and great staff. The only drawback was the size of the so called double beds that are more like single beds and not suited to more than one person sleeping in it. After a discussion with Justin at the front desk we were quickly moved to queen beds so we were able to enjoy the rest of our vocation. Thanks again to Justin and all the staff who could not be more helpful from Disney tickets to storing our bags for us. I will be highly recommending this hotel to all my family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad that Justin was able to accommodate you with another room. I‚Äôm glad that you guys had a great time here with us. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: The Staff was professional and friendly, The room was up to date and well serviced, The breakfast was fresh, hot and well stocked. The location couldn't get any better for the convention center and the parks. parking was included and there were plenty of spaces.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope that you come back to visit us again so you can see our remodeled breakfast room. Come back soon!

Summary: Decided to stay here for the convenience of the close walking proximity to Disneyland and California Adventure. Our rooms were nice and clean, and liked that we had a coffeemaker, fridge and microwave. Coco's restaurant is right next door to the hotel and recommend their wonderful salads! The hotels Continental breakfast had a nice selection of items to choose from. Staff was friendly and attentive to our needs. Was very surprised to know that they had an exercise room and took advantage of using their Elliptical Trainer. We enjoyed our stay so much that we already made reservations to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Yes, all of our rooms come with fridge, microwave, single cup coffeemaker, iron and board. We are glad that we were able to help you with any questions that you had. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We quite enjoyed our stay.  The grounds were beautiful, the trees were in shapes of animals which were awesome!!  The pool are was amazing, they had a little pool for little ones, two hot tubs and two pools.  One pool was heated and very comfortable to swim in, the other pool was not heated and very cold.  The distance to Disneyland was a short walk, the breakfast was ok, they started to remodel the food area so I'm sure the breakfast will improve once they are done.  The on-site laundry room was extremely helpful, and housekeeping let us in half an hour early one day to do our laundry which was appreciated as we wanted to get to the parks.  There are the standard vending machines, soda machines, and they also have a little store inside the office that is open some of the day if
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pool. We do have two pools and one of them is heated. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to accommodate you on opening the laundry room an hour earlier. We do have a storage place to hold your bags before and after check out if needed. In the near future we will be remodeling the rooms completely and we are definitely looking into energy efficient windows. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: Stayed here with friends for a fun, couples weekend.  Easy access to anything in Anaheim; drive to Disney; walk to convention center; short drive to Knott's and Universal tho GPS is a Must Have on the crazy Cali roads! Free buffet at Coco's was interesting but good (get there EARLY or wait in line)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We are about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland and the California adventure through Downtown Disney. We have directions and maps to any attractions that you would like to visit. The reason that we had the Continental breakfast at Coco‚Äôs was because we are remodeling our breakfast room. The continental breakfast will be served there till we are done. The remodel should be done by mid February. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We checked in on New Years eve & the front staff were friendly & helpful. The rooms were clean & comfortable. The continental breakfast was good. Its location was really good if wanting to visit Disneyland as it was a 15 min walk. My e-mails were responded to promptly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you guys had a great time in Disneyland. I heard the New Year‚Äôs celebration is really nice at Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I stayed here for five nights and loved everything the hotel room was clean, comfortable and modern the staff were friendly it had a nice swimming pool and spa and in a really good location being straight across the road from Disneyland. Cocos on site is also a really good option for dining/room service. I look forward to staying here again next time I travel to L.A
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. We are about a 10-15 minute to the main gate of Disneyland through Downtown Disney.  We hope to see soon!

Summary Heading: Some good things, but I just couldn't get past the..................................
Summary: For the most part, I like to stay at Best Western's when a casual, clean motel will do.  We went to Disneyland with members of our family over the New Years holiday.  PROS:  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  The housekeeping staff did a really good job cleaning the room.  The pool area was nice.  Even though it was cold outside, we used the hot tub, which was nice.  The motel is an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland/ California Adventure.  The area is very safe to walk at night.  Breakfast is provided, it is the typical food that you would expect (ok, not great).  THE CON:  And this is the part that I could not get past.  The carpets in our room were....disgusting!  They were worn so bad that there were holes in some areas.  It looked like somebody dumped used motor
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Your feedback is very important to us. We are currently taking care on carpets. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Across the street from Disney, which was great! Although a decent walk to the entrance to the parks and Downtown Disney - it was C O L D while we were here, so I am sure much nicer when it is warmer. Rooms AWESOME, clean, fridge, microwave, wifi, all was great!! Staff were amazing - very very nice, and always there to help, made our stay that much better!!   If you are looking for great Disney stay for a great price - here you GO!! Thanks guys, we had a BLAST!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great comments. We appreciate your business. We hope that next time you come it will be warmer and you get to use the pool.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Nice clean room at a good value.  Across the street from Downtown Disney (you enter near ESPN Zone). Breakfast was decent.  Would definitely stay again. The parking is a little odd but keeps others out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We spent several nights here over New Year's 2013.  While not unpleasant, we've definitely stayed at nicer places.  I'm not sure we'd stay here again.  Pros: Location -- easy walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure Price -- reasonable for the cleanliness and amenities Pool -- very nice with lots of room  Cons: Parking -- an additional charge and also limited.  Returning late in the evening can be a problem. Wi-fi -- worked 2 out of 6 days Breakfast -- the same thing every day:  sausage links, powdered eggs, toast, yogurt  Prospective guests also need to realize that this place is meant for visitors to the Disney parks and noise levels and traffic reflect the parks' schedules.  Expect to here people moving around at night after the parks close.  Expect to hear
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. While Disneyland has their Holiday decorations we are very busy. All of our guests want to come and see the theme parks while they are decorated for Christmas. Since the parks close late you will hear guests coming and going. Some do get up very early to line up to get into the parks. I hope that this doesn‚Äôt stop you from staying here with us. We are currently working on our internet. We are hoping to be done with this by the middle of January.  We hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here for 10 night's mid December, and had two connecting rooms.  They were clean and had everything we needed, a little on the small side when sitting in the chairs.  We were on the 1st floor and never had a problem getting a carpark near the stairs. Breakfast was good each morning, although it never changed.  Each morning we took pastries for lunch. Location was good for Disneyland and downtown Disney. A 10 minute walk.  We regularly used the dca entrance through the grand californian hotel, was quick and easy. Location was not so good for walking to other restaurants on harbour blvd. Cocos restaurant next door where we ate 3 times was nice and reasonably priced with a large selection. Very good pool area where my children spent a lot of time each afternoon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time at the park while staying with us. That‚Äôs great that your children were able to enjoy the pool after a long day at the parks. We are currently working on expanding the breakfast room. Hopefully when we are done we can add different items to our breakfast so we can alternate. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: We stayed here for ten nights late Nov/early Dec.  Check in was a breeze and we had the same high level of service each time we went to the front desk.  Justin always had a smile on and was full of great tips and area information......I'm sure I was an absolute nuisance with my 101 questions each day but he never made me feel like it.  Location was very good - basically you cross the traffic lights diagonally and you are at the Disney "Resort" and then you just stroll through the Grand Californian, through Downtown Disney and you are at the parks.  About a ten minute walk at leisure - I had to do it in a hurry one day when I forgot my ID and I managed a round trip in just over 12 minutes so really close.  Our room overlooked the Fun Wheel and Roller Coaster which I loved looking
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure I tell Justin what a great job he is doing. We are always ready and happy to help you at any time. I hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs. We hope to see you again!

Summary: We stayed at Best Western Stovall's in July 2010. The pools were wonderful (seeing the Disney fireworks was an added bonus!). Staff was wonderful. Beds were wonderful. Extra parking fee wasn't wonderful but eh. We'd stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. It‚Äôs great that you had a great time here with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: The walls were paper thin.  I can usually sleep through anything.  However, the coughing from the room on one side sounded like it was coming from our room.  In the room on the other side, they were either watching, or making, an adult movie.  Needless to say,  hitting Disney the next day was rough.  To top it off, when our car battery died, the hotel would not help us, even though they had a vehicle available.  Do not stay here!  Poor quality and poor customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Please understand that due to liability purposes we can‚Äôt jump start your vehicle. We are more than happy to get triple A to help with this situation. We hope that when in the Anaheim are you come to Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Noisy and humid rooms, not enough parking
Summary: We stayed at this hotel during the week of X-mas 2012.  We had a room on the ground floor and found it extremely noisy. The only quiet time was between the hours of 1am and 4am. Starting around 4am you can hear everyone walking past the room, kids running and yelling, people loading their cars etc.  The room itself was very nice and spacious. I liked the fact that it had a large sink area with microwave and fridge right outside the bathroom.  The bathroom however had no fan or exhaust so when you're showering you almost can't breathe because there's no ventilation. We had to leave the door of the bathroom open while showering and turn on the air conditioner in the room to remove the humidity.  It never really removed the humidity though and whenever we'd return to our room after
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that you let the front desk know that your room was not getting the proper service. We could have corrected that the first day. There is no reason why the room was left that way. I believe that in the near future all rooms will be redone with vents in the bathrooms. We hope that when you come to the Anaheim area you come to Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The room was very nice. Good location. Only thing a disappointment was having to pay for additional parking fee on-top of room rate. First experience of staying at a hotel and having to pay parking fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. A lot of the properties here in Anaheim are charging for parking, resort fee or valet. We don‚Äôt have a resort or valet fee.  We started to charge for parking due to having other people parking here and not having enough parking for our guests. Other properties parking fee is from 16, 20 to 30.00 per day. Our parking fee is 10.00 per day for our guests and non guests pay the meter rate. We hope that you come and stay with us again.

Summary: I just wanted to say that I just stayed at Stovall's Inn for the second time this year and I couldn't be happier with their customer service.  We spent the weekend before Christmas there and it was very convenient for us to walk to the parks.  We were even given the room we requested upon check-in.  I told my DH if I could, I would give them 5+ stars just for accommodating that request if it was ready when we arrived early on a Saturday morning!  As I've mentioned in previous review, the room was clean and spacious, the rates are more than reasonable, convenient to the parks (about 10 minute walk), and free continental breakfast.  Again, my compliments to Stovall's Inn and their staff for a very comfortable and memorable weekend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you had a great time here with us. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: Check in was very nice the people were freindly and helpfull. the provided all the info for the area (DisneyLand) the room was top notch clean not out dated. the distance from the park was very walkable. Check out staff were also great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your business. I appreciate the fact that you took the time to let us know how the staff is doing. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary Heading: Good hotel for a Disneyland trip
Summary: We stayed there for 4 days/3 nights, it was a 10 min walk from Downtown Disney, safe area, hotel was cleaned pretty often, room service was good, nice amenities on the room though the bathroom didn't have a sink but it was rather on the bedroom bar...weird. Wifi wasn't too good however the staff was very helpful too, and they have breakfast included on your hotel rate, they also have a pool, a small gym and other nice amenities many other Best Westerns may not have.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are very close to walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We are working on the WIFI. We hope to have the upgrade done by the 2nd week of Jan. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Fantastic time. Very comfy beds, unusual in a hotel. Great location to Disney, easy walk. Breakfast was great, staff terrific, they made it easy. Stayed at park vue last time, didn't this time because they no longer have the free dinner, and I'm glad. This hotel has much better rooms, cleaner, newer, especially the bathrooms, no yukky dirty grout, not triple painted, great beds and Telly! Free wifi, great price booked on line.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you loved our beds. A lot of our guests say that they had the best sleep ever in our beds. Thank you for giving us a try and we hope to see you guys again!

Summary: We stayed at Stovall's for 4 nights and stayed at another hotel near the main entrance on South Harbour for another 5 nights. May I say Stovall's Inn was fantasitc compared to the other hotel (which I paid alot more for and would expect a higher standard....closer is not always better). Very friendly and helpful staff at Stovall's. Very close location to Disneyland, easy 5 min walk to Downtown Disney which leads into Disneyland. You can cut through the Disney Grand Hotel making the walk very safe and easy. The hotel room was good and the beds very comfortable and the room very clean. Extra pillows was great to have. Could not fault the room or the hotel. The breakfast range was great, could not complain. Bagels, toast, scambled eggs, sausages, pancakes, fruit, danishes, yogurt.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thanks again for giving the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn a try for your lodging needs. Yes, we are a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. That‚Äôs great to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. We are expanding our breakfast area. We hope that you get a chance to come and stay with us again.

Summary Heading: No sleep - forget service, quality, and the price
Summary: We asked the front clerk to fix the air conditioning unit as it made a horrible screeching noise that kept me and my family awake. They forgot to fix our air conditioner and the noi  se ruined our two night stay. We were unable to sleep because of the outdoor noise as well well as the air conditioner. The manger refused to work with us and did not address our concerns. This is the second best western that ruined our vacation, we will never stay at one ever again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is in a great location.... We stayed from 12/1 - 126 for a trip to Disney and it was within walking distance, without wearing you out for the park. Check in was speedy even with a crowd, the room was cleaned really well everyday and the staff was prompt and courteous.... The beds were VERY comfortable. The breakfast was just eh....... it was hot and filling. The room is WAY TOO SMALL for the amount of people it feeds and they would do well to increase the space for more comfort. Oh and the coffee ??!?!?! Pretty bad. The little in room coffee was better than what was in the breakfast area. Will we stay here again??? Yes. It was clean, safe, the price was great and soooooo close to Disney. The minor issues wont keep us from going back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location! Good value, but you get what you pay for
Summary: The hotel is an easy 15 minute walk to the main gate which is the main reason we chose te hotel. After checking in we were pleased at how helpful the staff were, and how clean and comfortable the room was. There were a few downsides though. 1) the noise from the main road is really bad. our room was at the end closest to the main street. We both ended up sleeping with ear plugs. 2) the breakfast was terrible. The hot food wasn't hot at all, just sitting in some warming trays that were obviously not working. We did try the breakfast again on our second day and the same thing. 3) Wi-Fi only works if you're close to the lobby. From our room we couldn't even pick up the signal.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beds weren't to our liking. Couldn't rollover without waking my wife. Room has way too much furniture for the square footage. One bed was too close to the bathroom wall and the other bed was too close to 2 large chairs and a round table. Breakfast was good every morning but never changed. After five days, breakfast wasn't something you looked forward to morning after morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We get a lot of compliments on our beds. They say that it‚Äôs the best sleep that they ever had. We will make sure we alternate different foods in the breakfast room. We hope to see you again.

Summary: This was our second stay at Stovall's Inn.  Kudos to the staff.  We had great service.   1:30 a.m. we were awaken to an extremely loud dripping sound.  I could even hear it in the bathroom with the door closed.  Upon investigation, it was coming from the air conditioner.  Only problem was our air conditioner was not on!  My daughter goes to the front desk to complain and finds out it must to the upstairs air conditioner defrosting from being left on all day and the melted ice is dripping onto the top of our AC.  To make a long story short, we were moved to another room in the middle of the night.  Kudos to the front desk clerk and security.  Our second room also had its own problem.  Security had opened up the room for us to move into during the night.  After coming back from
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.  We have taken care of the dripping problem from the AC unit. It has been positioned differently so when it does defrost it doesn‚Äôt drip on the other AC‚Äôs. We hope that when you visit the Anaheim area you use Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: Great hotel.  Clean, well kept, close to Disney Land (10 min walk) and Anaheim Convention Center (5 min walk).  However, their advertised "free wifi" was non existent.  I could never stay connected for more than five minutes and during peak hours there was no service at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are installing fiber optic for our internet. We hope that this will resolve any pending issues. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Not what I expected (and not in a good way)
Summary: Only good thing about this hotel is the location. The breakfast is less than average with no decent food choices. The wifi Internet does not work in the rooms despite their advertisement. The toilet didnt work properly. Beds were comfy
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. We do have plenty food to choose from. We have fruit: Bananas, apples and oranges. We have wheat and white bread, bagels, yogurt, eggs, sausage, pancakes, different kinds of cereal, coffee, orange and apple juice.  We are currently working on our internet. We are installing fiber optic. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: my daughter and I stayed here for the first time in October of 2012. Very nice hotel, well kept grounds. the room was very clean, missing a blanket on the bed at check in but no problem. Had a room with a connecting door never a problem never heard anything and hotel was booked. The only time we heard noise was our second night (stayed for 4) family walking by door talking loud but didn't last long.Had trouble trying to figure out how to turn on shower, you have to pull out then up not very easy. Breakfast room large ,2 t.v. which was a great idea, 1 t.v. had cartoons for kids the other had news. The eggs, sausage and pancakes were cold, no microwave in breakfast room to heat up and we were the first ones in there as they were bringing out the food so no excuse for them being
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We work very hard on keeping our grounds clean. I will make sure and speak to the breakfast staff about the food being cold. We do have a microwave in the middle of the room for guests to use. We are working on our Internet. We are installing fiber optic. We hope to see you again!

Summary: The location was wonderful.  The breakfast choices and tables were great.  The room was spacious, the bed comfortable.  When we got back from Disneyland at 1AM in the rain, we were cold.  We turned the heat on and the smell was awful.  A call to the front desk for room deodorizer was answered & we did receive an apology.  However, nothing was done except for an apology.  We really liked the hotel, but wished we hadn't used the heater!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I apologize if the heater made your room smell. I will speak to the maintenance team to check on all of the heaters in the property so this doesn‚Äôt happen to another guest. We hope that you come and visit us again!

Summary: More like a motel than a hotel. We stayed at this "hotel" because of it's proximity to disney, however, it really wasn't THAT close. There are hotels that are closer and about the same price, that include breakfast as well (quality inn, stayed there before as well). At the end of a LONG walking day, the last thing you want to do is walk a mile back to your hotel room.   We left the ipad in the room, taking a BIG risk, I know. When we got back the ipad had been USED by someone who came in our room (assuming it was one of the cleaning ladies). The "free wifi" NEVER worked. The room was nice looking, but the floor had quite a few stains, our last day there I noticed blood in the SHOWER (GROSS!). Bed was SUPER uncomfortable and loud (sounded like we were sleeping on plastic). The AC
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is a shuttle you can take to the parks if you don‚Äôt want to walk. The shuttle is $5 per adult and $2 per kids ages 3-9. The housekeepers that work here are people that have been here for years. They all respect the items that guests leave in their rooms. I don‚Äôt see a housekeeper using your Ipad. I will make sure and speak to the Executive housekeeper about this review. I hope that during your stay you mentioned to us what issues you were having in your room.

Summary Heading: Great Choice for our Disneyland trip
Summary: This hotel turned out to be a better choice than I expected.  I originally wanted to stay directly across from the Disney Resort shuttle drive, but ended making reservations at the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn.  It turned out to be great.  There is a A.R.T. shuttle stop right in front of the hotel that will take you to the Resort.  They leave about every 20 minutes. There is a Coco's Restaurant next door that also provides room service and a Tiffy's across the street.  You can walk to Downtown Disney in about 15 minutes.  There is a heated pool available.  We didn't swim, but there were guests swimming even though it was sprinkling outside. The hotel is close enough to the resort to take the kids to the room for a nap then back to the park in the evening for the lights and
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Lovely Place to Stay Near the Park!
Summary: This was our first time staying at Stovall's, and we were very impressed! The staff was super friendly, including the maintenence people we passed every day, and the maids. The front desk staff were all friendly. When I locked my key in my room, they were quick to get me a replacement. The room we were in looked freshly remodeled. The granite countertops were gorgeous, and we loved the earthtone decor. The beds were super comfortable and the shower was nice. The tub wasn't the most comfortable. :) The lamps had outlet plugs on the bases for easy charging of my phone and e-reader. There is no in room safe, but we don't ever use it anyway. There was a good sized mini fridge and a microwave, as well as a coffee maker.  The grounds were immaculate. The ART pickup is right in front
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a wonderful time while staying with us. I will pass on the great compliment that you mentioned on this review to the housekeeping and maintenance department. That‚Äôs good that you took the ART shuttle while it rained. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope that you come and visit us soon!

Summary: This is not your average hotel it is more like a motel but the staff were extremely friendly and Justin who welcomed us could not do enough for us. The hotel itself is spot less and the room are clean. It is an easy walk through to Disneyland and California adventure park. Their facilities are good with a great pool and spa and also a place to do some laundry. The resturant Coco's out the front is extremely handy as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure I tell Justin to keep up the Great customer service. I‚Äôm glad that you guys had a great time while staying with. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Always a solid place to stay!
Summary: This is the fourth time we've stayed at Stovall's Inn and as always, the service is top notch. Very friendly staff, a better breakfast, and very comfortable beds. The beds seem new and we all slept pretty soundly! The eggs, sausage, and pancakes were a welcome change to the old breakfast menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you had a wonderful time her with us. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: The WiFi was unusable.  After much trouble I was able to connect, but I could not access any websites at all.  This was extremely inconvenient as I needed to log into my job site and work. I had to pay to use my cell phone to connect and stream data.    The front desk staff did say that the WiFi was going to be upgraded in December.    The coffee at the breakfast was not brewed coffee but coffee concentrate syrup mixed with hot water.  That is just unacceptable.  I went to Coco's for breakfast instead of the free breakfast at BW.    On a positive note, I was impressed that the cleaning crew was wiping down the exterior door frames and the tops of vending machines.  I do plan to return to this hotel.  I hope the WiFi is fixed and that the coffee will be upgraded to real brewed
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are getting fiber optic in December. That will take care of any interruptions with the internet. I will mention to management about changing our coffee. I will make sure to mention the great compliment to the cleaning staff. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Great location, within walking distance to Disneyland parks. Our room was very clean and front line staff was very helpful and friendly! Nice variety of foods at breakfast and the free WIFI was also very nice. I would definitely stay here if I visited again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There are plenty of restaurants in the area that you can walk too. The Anaheim Convention is only about a 5 minute walk across the street. We hope that you come and visit us again.

Summary: This hotel is very nice , clean and close to Disneyland!  :). Definitely within walking distance to the park, downtown disney and several restaurants in the area.  We also used this hotel when there was an event at the Anaheim Convention Center, it is a half a block away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. The Anaheim Convention Center is only a 5-10 minute walk depending on what part of the convention center you are headed too. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: very clean, big room for 3 people, had microwave and refridgrator & just close enough to walk to california adventure or disneyland. pool was far from our room, if you want to use pool/spa make sure to be on that side of hotel. Parking was the only problem, just not nearly enough
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. All of our rooms have microwaves, fridges, single cup coffee makers, Iron and board and hair dryers. We hope to you soon!

Summary: Out room was somewhat out of order when we checked in. We had a non smoking room that smelled bad. We aired it out and it was smelly on our return. Also the carpets were dirty, crumbs along the edges and although the bathroom was clean the door was covered with fingerprints. With the sink on the outsde of the toilet toom, that ment the inside was very germ covered. Our room was back from the road yet we could hear traffic ALL night along with ticking sounds in the ceiling above the sink area. The positive... Parking was good and it was walking distance to downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that you would have brought all these issues to our attention so we could have looked at the room. I hope when you come to the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Good hotel, distance to DLand questionable
Summary: Breakfast of sausage, scrambled eggs plus coffee, juices, milk plus cereals, fresh fruits, factored in with clean rooms, mini fridge, microwave and decent comfortable beds, LESS the noise level at all times of the time(people and cars), thin walls,  balanced with great front desk.  Also, the walkable distance is very debatable.  It is located approx 2 big blocks from the Disney Californian Hotel, go thru there, end up at Downtown Disney, then to DLand and CA. When you leave at the end of the night, the walk seems forever since you are exhausted.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm happy to hear that you had a great time here with us. Glad that you enjoyed the breakfast and the other amenities that we offer at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is a shuttle that you can take if you decide not to walk. It‚Äôs called the ART shuttle #9 and it comes approximately every 20 minutes. You can buy tickets for the shuttle here at the front desk. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Doing the Disney thing we stayed here for a few nights. Our room was clean and well maintained. The grounds were very clean and the view from our room let us see Mickey's Ferris wheel and part of the rollercoaster lit up at night. The breakfast bar room in the morning was very chaotic with no direction leaving you feeling like it was every man for himself. Seating was limited and you didn't know where to start so people were going in all directions like seagulls all flocking for the same slice of bread!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you and your family enjoyed the Mickey‚Äôs Ferris wheel view. We are expanding the breakfast room that should take care of the crowding and pushing in the breakfast time. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Our room not throughly cleaned other clothing left in bathroom. My daughter prescription was taken. Not enough parking to accomodate each room and paid parking is required daily even the day of check out. Karen in Sacramento!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that it was brought to our attention regarding the room not being clean thoroughly and your daughter‚Äôs medicine. Maybe the medicine was missed placed. I hope that you found her medicine. If you read this and haven‚Äôt found her medicine please give us a call. I hope that when coming to the Anaheim area you use Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: We were playing around in San Diego for a few days and decided on a last minute day at Disneyland. Reserved a room online at 8 AM, and arrived at about 10 AM and figured we would at least see if they would let us in a room this early.  They were very helpful to make this happen for us. This alone is rare in customer service anymore...most let ya rot until their 3 or 4PM check-in times. We were off to Disney by 11.  Room was nice, on third floor, two queens that were super comfortable.  A/C worked fine, flat screen TV, mini fridge and microwave. Breakfast is a nice bonus.  Hot sausage, pancakes, scrambled eggs with bagels, toast, cereal, fruit, etc.  Juice, milk and of course coffee. Never used pool facilities so I can't comment on that area. Location is the closest you can get
Manager Response: Let me starting by thanking you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. It‚Äôs our pleasure to accommodate you with an early check in if possible. Sometimes it‚Äôs hard to do so but we have a place to store luggage if you would like to do so. That‚Äôs great that you enjoyed part of the amenities that we offer her at the hotel. I will make sure I tell all the staff what a great job they are doing. KEEP UP THE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a decent hotel, not much more, not much less. On the positive side, the rooms have obviously been renovated, with newer paint/decor, flat screen tvs, nice furniture, etc. The bed was fairly comfortable, as were the assortment of pillows they provided. The bathroom area is a bit small but does a serviceable job, and the fridge in the room was appreciated.   On the downside, the rooms have exterior hallways, which means a bit of increased noise and increased exposure to the elements. It was somewhat cold when we were there, and our room got rather cold at night. There's a wall-unit A/C/heater with a remote control, but it didn't seem to work especially well. The breakfast each morning was good enough, with a nice variety - sausage/eggs/pancakes as the hot options,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you enjoyed your time while staying with us. It is a short 10-15 minute walk through Downtown Disney. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you use Best Western Stovall Inn for your lodging needs. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect for Disneyland but too noisey at night.
Summary: This place was affordable and nice.  Only bad thing was that at night when ur trying to sleep you can hear cars or people walk by talking/loud. Other than that I liked how it was a motel set up with our own entrances n outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that you were able to enjoy the extended Continental Breakfast. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: The hotel is in a great location for visiting the Disneyland parks, they're around a 10-15 minute walk away and so easy to get too!  We had one room with two queen beds, it's was spotlessly clean and well equipped with an iron, hair dryer, microwave and fridge! It was a good size considering 3 people were all in the same room.  The continental breakfast was pretty awful  this was the only thing that I found was not up to other Best westerns I have been to. Checking in and out was a breeze! Staff were very helpful and extremely friendly. There are some great restaraunts near by, we recommend Denny's and Cocos they were amazing and well priced! Overall a really great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking you time on your review. We appreciate your business.  We are about a 10-15 minute walk over to the park through Downtown Disney. I will definitely let housekeeping know what a great job they are doing.  All of our rooms have micro, fridge, iron, board, hair dryer and a single cup coffee maker. We are always switching items in the breakfast room to see what guest like and dislike. We hope to see you again!

Summary: We stayed here for several nights while visiting Disneyland. Not a luxurious place, but reasonably nice. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms had an appealing modern look even though it was evident that the motel was built in the 1960's and has been recently renovated.   Things we liked; the nice staff, comfortable beds, clean apperance, the modern room decor, the convenience of the bus stop, and the proximity to Downtown Disney and Disneyland. The hotel staffers seemed friendly and happy to work there.  The dislikes; our bathroom (which had no fan), and the stale musty smelling air in our room, this is a motel/inn with open air hallways and as far as I could tell, all rooms face a parking lot, because of this even if you're in a non-smoking room you may have to walk
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you enjoyed our comfy beds and that your room was clean and ready for you come and relax after a long day at the parks. We are about a 10-15 minute walk over to the parks through Downtown Disney. All of our staff members are always ready and happy to help. I hope that all the good things bring you back to us. We would be happy to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great location, awesome pools!
Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn for one night before our departure flight after staying at the Grand Californian for a week.  The hotel room itself was nice, it was a large room with a fridge and microwave, kind of funky smelling and very dark, but the good definitely outweighed the very few negatives.  The pool area was AMAZING!  Two very nice sized pools, two hot tubs, and the best part a restroom in the fenced in area at the pool which is a huge perk when you have young children and don't want to run back to your room frequently.  The location is great, we did not visit the parks while we stayed at this hotel but we did walk to downtown disney for dinner and it was probably a 10 minute walk.  My daughter enjoyed watching the Mickey Mouse Ferris Wheel and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I hope that when you were enjoying our beautiful pools you got a chance to see the fireworks. That is the spot to be to enjoy the show. We are only a 10-15 minute walk Downtown Disney. Also the Anaheim Garden Walk has Dinning and shopping. I will definitely let all of our staff know what a great job they are doing. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We were very pleasantly surprised at how nice and clean the rooms were ... if you cant afford to stay on the Disney resort well this hotel is only a 10 min walk to disneyland. It is perfect location and priced well... front desk was very helpful as well.. the breakfast in the morning is fine but not worth it as its a zoo with dozens of kids and their parents.. If you are looking for a reasonably priced hotel, close to Disneyland, I would most certainly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we appreciate your business. We are about a 10-15 minute walk to Disney through Downtown Disney. We are working on expanding the breakfast room to accommodate our guests more comfortably. Our lay out will be different and our breakfast hours will be 6am-10am that will give guests more time to come and enjoy breakfast. We hope to see soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable and clean.. But not exciting
Summary: We stayed at this hotel on the recommendation of a friend who had previously stayed here as she mentioned the beds were comfortable, rooms were clean, and it has easy access to Disney.  All true.. But it was just a very basic hotel room.  As a couple, we had hoped for a room with at least a queen bed, but all rooms are two double beds.  So for the two of us, it was a little uncomfortable in a double bed, and the other bed never got used.  The breakfast is awful.. And there really isn't much else to choose from in the area.  If you just have toast, it's okay.  It's a little bit far to walk to Downtown Disney, and you most certainly need to take the shuttle bus to get to Disneyland which didn't seem to run very often to that part of Anaheim.  But the shuttle bus stop is right out
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on your review. We appreciate your business. I apologize if we weren‚Äôt able to accommodate you with a king size bed. We have plenty of items in the breakfast room that you can choose from. We have pancakes, sausage, eggs, Danish, doughnuts, toast, coffee, juice, cereals much more.
