We are about a 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland park through Downtown Disney. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you use Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The beds are so comfy, rooms clean and the staff were so helpful in booking us shuttles from the hotel to san pedro pier then from after our cruise to Longbeach airport, we were very impressed at how helpful they were and how they took the time to answer any question and make suggestion of tours and place to shop while in anahiem. The breakfast was really nice even though i heard people complaining, there were plenty of choices and enough food for everyone.Even the rude one that pushed and shoved and thought they were going to miss out. So close to walk to Disneyland and Down town disney. We were reccomended this by fellow Australians who stayed here and we certainly wasnt dissapointed ..There was only my husband and i but it it great for famlies as well.
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. A lot of our guest‚Äôs love our beds. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to enjoy our breakfast. We are planning to expand the breakfast room so there will be no move shoving. We hope that everyone enjoys the new layout. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: I don't care how cheap it is, I won't stay there again!
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice now and this time it was just terrible.  We got a really good deal on this hotel, so I shouldn't complain, but everything about it was just bad.  First of all, if you are staying here to go to Disneyland I recommend staying at a closer hotel on Harbor Blvd because it will take you a good 20 minutes to walk to Disneyland from this hotel and trust me the money you will save by staying at Stovalls isn't worth it!  The only reason we stayed at Stovalls aside from cost was we were doing a Mouseadventure scavenger hunt and needed to start our day at Paradise Pier, otherwise I would have stayed somewhere else.  They do have a free breakfast, but it was a nut house in there because it was small and very crowded.  The rooms are very basic, which is to be
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are expanding the breakfast to eliminate the crowding problem. Guest‚Äôs always compliment our beds. They say that they had the best sleep ever. I don‚Äôt understand what was wrong with your bed. I apologize if the crib was not in your room before you arrived. The confusion in the rooms shouldn‚Äôt have happened. I will make sure that they are careful when checking in guests in rooms that are being worked on by maintenance. We hope you give us another chance to serve you.

Summary Heading: Great location at non Disney prices
Summary: Great spt just outside Disneyland five min walk each day. Ten minutes to restaurants like Cheesecake Factory. Basic rooms but clean, had fridge, coffee maker, cupboards, big enough. Lovely staff and free business centre for Internet. Fitness centre very small not that great. Small pool area but spent most of time at Sisneyland so it was just a place to sleep! Would stay again for location, staff and fridge very rare to get a fridge in the US!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are a 10-15 walk to the Anaheim Garden Walk that has other restaurants like the Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps, shopping, movie theater and bowling. We hope that you come and visit us again!

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a conference so this hotel was in a great location to both the Convention Center as well as Disneyland. The beds and pillows were the best ever. I slept like a log every night. The AC unit was average and a bit noisy. The landscaping was perfect and very well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know on your stay. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a wonderful rest in our beds. We are upgrading our AS unites. I will let the gardeners know what a great job they are doing in our gardens. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I would just like to say thank you to the staff at the hotel and especially ceara the young lady who looks after the gift shop. Everybody was so nice and helpful, and never once spoke to me in an angry manner, (because I was asking too many questions and wanted to know this and that) Your hospitality and kind consideration has been very much appreciated. You made our stay a very pleasurable experience.  Ceara I can,t thank you enough for trying to organise our day trips and calling places to accommodate my and my family's needs. You are a real gem..We would definitely stay with you guys again sometime in the future. Our room and the beds were very comfortable and cosy and clean.  Best location near Disney just 10 minute walk..   Thank you once again from Angela, mum and the kids
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure I tell Sierra to keep up the great job! We are glad that we were able to answer all your questions. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: We stayed here Oct. 10 -13th 2012. We chose this hotel for the location and price. Beds were comfortable, rooms were quiet - we were on the 3rd floor, the air conditioner worked fine, and they provide free breakfast. We did not eat the breakfast - due to the fact that we ate in the park or at Cocoa's and or Tiffy's next door. The walk to Disney is 10 minutes tops - be sure and cut through the Grand Californian for the short cut. It is as close as to the parks as the Disneyland Hotel is. Great location! They staff was helpful and friendly. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. I hope next time you can come and enjoy our breakfast. That‚Äôs great that you did get a chance to look at the beautiful scenery while walking over to the parks. We appreciate your business. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We recently stayed at Stovall's Inn and were generally pleased with our stay.  The room was a good size with comfortable beds.  We stayed on the top floor and didn't experience any noise from cars in the parking area.  Breakfast was good and had a wide selection of items.  By far, however, the hotel's best asset is its proximity to the parks.  It was just a short 10-minute walk to Downtown Disney and the Esplanade (passing through the Grand California Hotel).  Very convenient and enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great night‚Äôs sleep with our comfortable beds. That‚Äôs great that you enjoyed your breakfast. We are only a 10-15 minute walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: Very close to Disney. Easy walk through the Disney Hotel. However, we were there for a week and they tried to tell us that housekeeping would be every second day. They did come in daily without hassle when I explained I wanted DAILY housekeeping. The air conditioner was VERY loud but became back ground noise after a bit. The hotel is an old one that it has been cleaned up well but the old problems remain. The bathroom door didn't shut properly without taking off batches of paint. The tub/toilet leaked the entire time. We told them, they did nothing, so we had soggy towels on the floor the whole time. For the money it was worth it. We would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. There must have been a misunderstanding on the whole cleaning procedure. They will clean every day unless you request no service. If you have a no service sign they will come the next day.  I hope that when you checked out we wrote down what issues you had and took care of them. I hope that when you are visiting the Anaheim area you use Best Western Plus Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary Heading: You can never go wrong staying at the Best Western Stovall's Inn!!!!
Summary: We arrived noon time on 6 October for two nights and check in was quick and easy. Also let me say that after contacting several other area hotels, none of them would honor their own military priced room rates on this particular weekend EXCEPT the Stovall's Inn. If you have never seen Disneyland during halloween, I highly recommend it. This was our first visit during halloween and what a neat thing to see Disneyland all decorated up for halloween. The rooms are well appointed with everything new inside and a refrigerator and microwave. Everything was in working order and a nice bg LED TV also. Recently they expanded their breakfast which is included in your room rate and it is an excellent breakfast, scrambled eggs, sausage, pancakes, pastries, fruit, toast, instant oatmeal, cold
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to accommodate you with a room. Disneyland and California Adventure are beautifully decorated for Halloween. It‚Äôs great that you did get a chance to enjoy the breakfast in the morning and the pool in the evening. While enjoying the pool you can see the fireworks. I hope you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: We used to stay on Disney property, but the maintenance of the rooms vs the price we paid didn't make sense (toilet seats loose, mirrors falling off of doors, cold water showers at the Grand). Then we went to the Anabella and they just kept raising their prices, so this past year we decided to try other hotels.  Last week we stayed at Stovall's and were pleasantly surprised. The rooms were big, not crowded, they were clean, we liked the free internet and the free breakfast was pretty good, at least as good as anything we could pay for over at the parks.   We'll stay there again, that's for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Thank you for giving us a try. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. I hope that you were able to use the pools after having a long day at the park. Thank you once again for giving us a chance to serve you with Legendary Service. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We arrived at 11:00 am on Sunday, Sept. 16th. We were told to checkin and then come back at 3:00 as that is check in time. We left and went and got our tickets for Disneyland and went to Knotts Berry to get our tickets there. We came back to the hotel at 12:30 and the gentleman that had helped us originally was not there, another gentleman helped us and put us in a room right away. Thank you for that. The drive in was lomg and tiring. The hotel room was very nice. For the most part it was kept clean. But no through cleaning was done. There was a dust bunny haning from the ceiling everyday that wer were there, 12 nights total. There were also black hand prints on the bath room door they never were wiped off either. They forgot to put coffee in our room 5 times, but that was easly
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will definitely speak to the executive housekeeper and let her know about the room not getting cleaned properly and making sure we restock completely.  As you may have noticed we did change some items in the breakfast room. We want to see what guest like and dislike. See you in Dec. 13.

Summary: My family just stayed here for a week and loved it!!  Clean roms, friendly and helpful staff, free decent breakfast which included pancakes, eggs, sausage, bagels, cereal, orange and apple juice, and dannon fit n lite yogurt which was yummy!!  Would definitely stay here again!!  Coco's family restaurant a minute away was soooo good too !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us. I will definitely let the staff know what a great job they are doing. Glad to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and that there was variety to choose from. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Clean but not accommodating if booked with getaway today or hotels
Summary: This is a good hotel for price and location. Very Very Clean however, we have stayed her twice and had the same problem twice. The first time we booked with hotels.com and requested a KIng bed but when we got to the hotel (at 2pm) they told us that they were sold out therefore we would be put in a double room. After some back and forth we magically were given the room we had requested 5 months prior when booking. This past weekend we went again and book with getawaytoday.com. upon check in I was told that they were sold out again and that it was first come gets the king beds. After looking around the parking lot and only seeing 20 cars and the fact that it was 2 pm again I found that hard to believe. When I questioned them I was then told that the DON'T honor room requests if
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were very reasonable. The check-in & out times are not rushed.  Full breakfast. Clean rooms. Helpful & very nice staff.  No additional "Resort Fee", like other Best Westerns. It was even quiet.  I absolutely dislike paying for parking at any hotel I stay at...especially when the Hotel Owns the Parking lot.  It was explained that people who go to Disneyland park there because it is so much cheaper than parking @ Disney.  Well, then charge them more and allow paying guests to park for free!  Besides, if you take a shuttle ($4 each) or a taxi to Disney (taxis are less expensive) and pay for parking at the hotel you're not saving yourself any money!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know on how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. Three years ago the owners decided to install parking arms due to having Disneyland and Convention People Park at the hotel and leaving us without any parking for our guests. We do have the lowest parking fee in the area. Most of the hotels charge from 10.00-30.00 a day for guest parking. We only charge 8.00 and non guests pay the meter rate. We don‚Äôt charge a resort fee like some of the hotels in the area. Some hotels have parking and resort fees. The shuttle that takes you to Disneyland is run by the city and yes it does have a fee. For a one day pass it‚Äôs 5.00 per adult and kids ages 3-9 is 2.00.  We hope that when you visit the Anaheim area you use Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Don't be put off by the exterior of the hotel.  Stovall's looks like a motel because of the style of building, but that's where the motel thing stops.  In side the rooms have a modern look, ample space and are spotlessly clean. The rooms are tidied everyday and the cleaners very friendly and trustworthy.  Loads of free cable channels on the flat screen TV's and the perfect view for the Disney fireworks, if you're on the front block anyway.  There are 2 pools, 2 hot tubs and a paddling pool for kids. The pool area is never mobbed like you would see in Spain or Greece but it can get busy as there are limited beds, go German and get the towels down early. Great fitness room and free breakfast. The breakfast room can get overcrowded so grab and go. You have a table and chairs in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. Yes, all of our rooms have been remodeled. I will make sure I let the Housekeeping department know on what a great job they are doing. We do have beautiful pools and spas. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We stayed here early September for 3 nights and were very pleased with our stay.The rooms are lovely and clean and the beds very comfortable.The pool area is kept immaculate as are the gardens.As other reviews have mentioned the breakfast room does get very crowded and seems a little unorganised but in the grand scheme of things it's not a big deal.Plenty of car parking space and within walking distance of restaurants.Have stayed in the area several times and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the pool. We are close to a lot of shopping, restaurants and the Disneyland Parks. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: The only thing this hotel really has going for it is the location.  It is a 10 min walk to the gates, not bad at all.    As for the hotel itself, it needs a little work.  Let me say, I am not really picky about hotel rooms.  Give me a clean room with what you promise and were good.  The first problem was the size of the bed, it was advertised queen, I called and asked the hotel confirmed this.  They were double beds.    Next, the fridge didn't work.  We asked for replacement three times before getting one.    The room was dirty.  Not huge disgusting noticeable dirty but little things dirty.  Thinks like the ice bucket had brown spots on the lid, the corners of the shower had mold and hair on the bathroom floor.    The air conditioner leaked every where.  When we told the front
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the pool. We are close to a lot of shopping, restaurants and the Disneyland Parks. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come to the Best Western Stovall‚Äôs Inn for your lodging needs.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here while visiting Disneyland for his birthday, we had a great stay.  Pros -  1. Very friendly, quick and knowledgeable reception desk.  2. Surprisingly quiet rooms! We had a room right over the pools and didnt hear the kids! 3. Very budget friendly prices! 4. Our room - clean, didn't stink, everything worked, comfortable bed, plenty of room. 5. There is a Coco's (family diner) in the same parking lot, a 3 second walk. 6. PLENTY of parking, as you need parking pass. 7. Close walk to Disneyland, if you walk into downtown disney. 8. Free breakfast, gets very BUSY, but free. Cereal, yogurt, fruit, eggs, sausage, toast, pastries, oatmeal...cant complain. 9. 2 pools and 2 jacuzzi's with outside towels- come in handy after a long day walking at disney!! 10.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on letting us know on how your stay was with us. I‚Äôm glad that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas. We do have the Coco‚Äôs restaurant next door to us. We also have the Anaheim Garden Walk and the Downtown Disney area for shopping and dining. The Disneyland fireworks can be seen from the 3rd floor and the pool area. I hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is literally on the doorstep of Disneyland (it took us fifteen minutes to walk to the main entrance to the theme parks - Downtown Disney is even closer).  It's a nice, clean hotel with standard chain-hotel rooms.  It's obviously less convenient for other LA-based attractions (visitors often don't realise how vast the city is - in bad traffic it can easily take 90+ minutes to get to Hollywood from here) but counterbalance that against the price differential from more central locations - you won't stay anywhere which is remotely as good as this for the same price in Hollywood or the more popular beaches.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are only a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland through Downtown Disney. We are also very close to other attractions in the area. We are a 20 minute walk to the Anaheim Garden Walk which has shopping and dining. We are only a 20-25 minute drive to Knotts Berry Farm. To go to Hollywood we are about a 45-1hr. drive. All this depends on traffic. For Newport Beach it‚Äôs about 30minutes by street. We are always glad to help you with any directions that you might need.

Summary: Amazing, service was great, our room was so great, it was quiet, comfy and clean, nice linens and lots of pillows!! And so quiet, we never heard any noise from the other rooms. We were there for a week so it was nice to have the microwave and fridge. Pool area was nice was not very busy, so it was pretty relaxing and a great view to Disneyland you could watch the fireworks every night if you wished. Its about a 10 minute walk to DIsneyland or you could take the shuttle which runs every 20 minutes for 3 dollars for adults or 1 dollar for kids and you can use it all day, which is nice if you need to go back and fourth from your hotel. Breakfast was good, lots of variety, we would take ours back to our room, if it was to busy. Overall a wonderful stay and I cant wait to go back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. I will make sure I let housekeeping know what a great job they are doing. It‚Äôs great that you were able to view the fireworks from the pool area. We are a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I recently stayed here because I was running in the Disneyland half marathon.  I usually stayed at hotels on Harbor Blvd. but decided to try Stovall's.  I was pleasantly surprised with how much closer to the half marathon venues it was than I thought.  It was just across the street and it seemed faster since I didn't have to go through the security check at the entrances of the parks.  A huge plus!  I asked for a quiet room since I needed to try and get some sleep the night before the run.  They were very accommodating and I got the last room on the west side of the property.  There were no adjacent buildings, away from the elevator and a wall blocked the closest stairway.  Needless to say, it was quiet!  The room was very spacious with large counter space and clean!  Check in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. Congratulations on your marathon. This year the Disney Marathon was right in front of us. Which a lot of guests were excited to know that they just had to walk across the street to check in. I glad that we were able to accommodate you with a quite room. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Definitely very close to Disney - can watch your fireworks EVERY night from hotel if you wish if you are staying in a room POOL Side or just walk round to pool side or main road or the many restaurants on the main road & fireworks will go off at 9:20 very night!!!!   15/20 min walk to Disney - but if u have small kids & they will be tired at end of day you can drive to the park. You Park in the Disney Car park on Magic Way ( you drive down it from our hotel way then have to do a u turn at some lights then pull into it on left) - about $15 a day, then u get Disney tram from there to & from park entrance- very easy..!!! Hotel pool is near road opposite rooms & car parking facilities but ITS NOT A PROBLEM LIKE YOU MAY THINK!! dont let it put u off !!  If your just putting head
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. Yes, you can view the fireworks while enjoying the pool. If you don‚Äôt want to drive over to the Disneyland parking lot you can take the ART shuttle for a fee. Part of our renovations is to expand the breakfast room so we can offer more sitting spaces for our guests. We hope to see you again!

Summary: What a great hotel and value for the Anaheim area. We sayed for two nights in August. Great comfortable beds, great choices for breakfast. Great pool area. Nicely landscaped. Walking distance to Disneyland. Many resturants nearby. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: A bit of pixie dust spilled over onto this hotel.
Summary: A truly fantastic location and service befitting it. As the management seem to like to say... Legendary (well not quite but almost).  The Excellent: - 5 to 10 min walk to Disneyland / Disney California Adventure (It's only a 2 to 3 minute walk to Disney's Paradise Pier Hotel!) - Room was spotless, large, attractive. There was a microwave and fridge. Air Conditioning worked excellently.  - For a complimentary breakfast, the offerings were varied and tasty.  - The bed and pillows were fantastic.  - Pool area was spotless large and filled with topiaries.   The Bad: - Internet was almost unusable. Even opening google took about 5 minutes to load   Look at a map before you go. It doesn't get much closer. There are many many Disney hotels in Orlando that have a FAR longer walk to a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on your review. We appreciate your business. Indeed we are a 5-10 in. walk to the main gate of Disneyland through Downtown Disney. I will let housekeeping know what a great job they are doing in the rooms. I‚Äôm glad that you did get a chance to enjoy the extended continental breakfast. I will definitely check on the internet and see what could be the problem. I hope that this doesn‚Äôt stop you from staying with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: When we checked in, they had honored our room requests so we were very relieved to get a non-smoking room away from the smoking section.  Beds were decent but we're pretty picky on comfort with two of us having bad backs.  Lots of pillows which is nice.  Our room was very quiet - we didn't hear a thing so we slept great!  Usually we stay in the hotels along Harbor so we were concerned the walk to/from this hotel may be a little far but it wasn't bad at all...just about 10 minutes and a much more enjoyable walk that the one to and from our past Harbor hotels.  We were usually the only family walking along the quiet tree-lined path.  The room was updated, we liked that the bathroom had the shower/toilet area separated from the counter/sink, the little fridge and microwave were a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking you time on letting us know how you stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in early July, we booked three rooms and all were quite comfortable. It is in easy walking distance to Disneyland/California Park and Downtown Disney. Also the shuttle is straight out front for weary legs. There are heaps of restaurants within easy walking distance. I would recommend this for a family wanting value for money and really really comfortable beds and a decent shower. The breakfast buffet was Ok, its not 5 star but for $80/night for 3people certainly what I expected...you could get fresh fruit and yoghurt, probably just a wide range of hot food.
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for taking your time on letting us know about your stay. I‚Äôm glad that you had a great time at the parks. We are a 10-15 min. walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: This was my first Air Miles booking and although the proximity to Disneyland makes this property a good choice, there are far better options close by. The service was non-existant. When we were offered a room change due to the non-functioning a/c unit, TV and internet, the luggage cart was pushed up to the front door and we had to repack our belongings and haul them outside and down the driveway, at midnight, with no assistance. The luggage cart stayed outside the room for two days. An article of clothing left in the "old" room took a full day to chase down and the lack of internet was left up to us to solve via cell phone calls to the hotel's provider. (we never did receive a call back with a solution) The air conditioning unit was too noisy to use, the room was dark and dingy,
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay. We appreciate your business. I don‚Äôt understand why you would have all those issues in your room but I‚Äôm glad that we were able to move you to another room. I hope you give us another opportunity to serve you with legendary service.

Summary: To begin with, I arrived after midnight, the check in was speedy, which is what you want after a long day of travel. The room was of an adequate size, clean, smelled good, carpet felt clean, my socks did not get dirty, nor did my bare feet. The breakfast was more than adequate, Ive read lot of complaints about the powdered eggs, for me it tasted as it was supposed to taste, like eggs. Most mornings I would enjoy a bagel with cream cheese and Jam, some sausage and a banana, which is great because my experience is that complimentary breakfast, only include sugary pastries and doughnuts most of the time. It was nice to have a nice variety of items, cereals, bagels, etc. If the eggs or the pancakes were cold, there was a microwave right there, if someone complains about that,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to know that you enjoyed your room and breakfast. Thank you once again for all the great things you mentioned. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: The hotel is in a great location for visiting the Disneyland parks, they're around a 10-15 minute walk away and so easy to get too!  We had one room with two queen beds, it's was spotlessly clean and well equipped with an iron, hair dryer, microwave and fridge! It was a good size considering four people were all in the same room.  The continental breakfast was more than the standard European continental. There were pancakes, eggs and sausage too! Plenty of choice the bagels were lovely!  Checking in and out was a breeze!  There are some great restaraunts near by, we recommend Denny's and Cocos they were amazing and well priced! Overall a really great place to stay!
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for taking your time on letting us know about your stay. I‚Äôm happy to hear that you had a great time while staying us. It‚Äôs great that you had time to enjoy the breakfast in the morning. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I don't know what motel all the glowing reviewers before me have stayed  at but it couldn't possibly have been the same DUMP we just checked out of (after planning on staying there all week)!!!  When we arrived we were given a room that was as close to the busy noisy street as they could put us... I had requested a room at the other end away from Katella Ave as to avoid the extreme noise...no way they would even consider accommodating that request... The walkway reaked of mold and dirt... When we opened the room door it was disgusting! The carpet was FILTHY and our feet were black after walking on it for just a short time! the room had a HORRIBLE smell...like mold. We had to get out the febreeze and spray around the room in order to stand the smell... The beds were advertised as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I apologize if we didn‚Äôt deliver legendary service. I would have liked to have spoken to you of the things you listed. If you are reading this please call the property and speak to the front desk manager. I‚Äôm surprised that you had this issue here. We hope you give us another opportunity.

Summary: Recently stayed at the Stovall for 6 nights to go to Disneyland and California Adventure parks. The room was great, breakfast was okay bit crowded at times. Best to go early. Easy access to parks and shopping using the ART bus system with stop right out front of hotel. Will stay here on our next Ahaheim visit!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we appreciate your business and comments. I‚Äôm happy to hear that you had a wonderful time at the parks. We are only a short 10-15 min. walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: Across the street from Disneyland but still a half mile walk to the entrance.
Summary: The room was great. The AC was much appreciated and the hotel staff was very accommodating. The pool was very nice and the continental breakfast had quite a variety.  The biggest attraction of the hotel is its location "right across the street from Disneyland." However, it is across the street behind California Adventure meaning it is still a ten or fifteen minute walk to the park entrances. This wasn't good for the elderly chemo patient in our party. The shuttle does stop right outside the hotel and you can buy shuttle passes at the front desk, which is worth it after you've walking between both parks for three days.
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for taking your time on letting us know how your stay was. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. Indeed, we are about a 10-15 min. walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. There is a shuttle you can take it is run by ART Transit and it will pick you up in front of our property. You can buy the shuttle tickets at the front desk. We hope that when you guys come back to the Anaheim area you will stay with us!

Summary: Me and my boyfriend stayed here in June 2012. Found it to be great accommodation considering its not overly expensive. It's nice and close to Disneyland only a 10 minute walk to the entrance gates. Got a great view of the fireworks at night time. Bedroom was great nice and big and the beds were comfy. The pool area was great, 2 big pools and 2 spas, so plenty of space for all the guests. Breakfast was good, plenty to choose from, not always much room inside the breakfast hall but were seats outside and quite often we just took our breakfast back to our room as there was a nice little table in there. Would definetly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great time at Disneyland and the California Adventure. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pools and spas. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I stayed at the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn for two nights in early April 2012 during my first visit to Disneyland.   The location is great - it took us about 5 minutes to walk from our room to Downtown Disney, and about ten total to get from our room to the entrance of the actual parks.  The walk back seemed longer, but that was just due to tired feet.  The room I stayed in was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable but the motel has a run down feel to it. But it served its purpose well.  We just needed a place to sleep and shower. And it fit the bill just fine.  The staff was friendly and my overall experience was nice.  However, I am someone who is used to hotels and resorts so this place felt a little off to me overall. Because it is just a very basic motel. But for
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great time at Disney. We are a short 10-15 min walk to the California Adventure and Disneyland Park through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys again.

Summary: On our recent California vacation we spent a few days at this hotel. We were returning guests.  The room was clean and spacious however, there was a strong odor when we opened our door that smelled like cat urine.  Once inside our room the odor was no longer present and our room smelled fine.  It must have been outside of our room which was on the second floor, end unit closest to the lobby.  The rooms had a nice neutral decor and was decorated tastefully. The lighting in the vanity area was a bit lacking but with the bathroom door open in the daytime, quite a bit of natural light did shine in. The bathroom was tiny but it served it purpose.  I liked that the sink and vanity was outside of the bathroom so that it could be used even when someone else was in the bathroom.   Some
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on letting us know on how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm happy to hear that you had a great time at the parks. I will make sure I speak to housekeeping to make sure that all rooms are completely stocked. We have changed items in the breakfast area I hope that on your next visit you get to enjoy them. That‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pools and relax with the beautiful view of the topiary garden. We are a short walk to the parks through Downtown Disney. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: My mom was staying their for a recent convention for 3 days and brought me and my two sisters for a little family outing.. the hotel was great! The staff were very nice and helpful, and it was affordable and the rooms were very clean...we enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi.. the pool area was very nice and had lots of space which I liked! The breakfast was better than I had expected and had lots of things to choose from which was nice! My family and I have stayed here in the past when we went to Disneyland..The location was also great because its nearby the amusement parks, shopping centers, convention center, and there's lots of places to eat nearby which made it easy for us... Definitely will visit again! :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know on how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very glad to hear that you guys had a great time while being here on a mini vacation. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the pool, spas, and breakfast. I hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Very close to Disneyland and very pleasant
Summary: Had a lovely stay at Stovall's Inn. Everything was very clean and well presented at the hotel. Complimentary breakfast was a good touch. Staff were very kind and helpful, but the major selling point for this place is easily the location. About a 10 minute stroll down to Disneyland through Downtown Disney. Would certainly come back again.  Only real issue I can think of was that it got a bit noisy from time to time, but that was more our neighboring guest's fault rather than the hotel's.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you had a great time here with us. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy the breakfast. Indeed, we are only about a 10-15 min. walk to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: My son and I are on a father-son road trip to see some more baseball games. We include Disneyland as part of the package. This Best Western is nicely located, just a quick walk to Disneyland, close to freeway routes but to do anything in California, you have to drive! I was surprised they had to charge for parking which was $8 USD per day!  The room they gave was quiet, clean and has a microwave plus bar fridge. There is a nice simple fitness room plus a nice pool with 2 hot tubs. It was always busy with kids, as expected. We got a simple basic breakfast that included breads, bagels, yogarts, fresh fruit, sausage, powdered eggs, pancakes. Simple enough. I think I would come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business. I hope you guys had a wonderful time at the baseball games. It‚Äôs great to hear that you were able to enjoy the pools and fitness room. We hope you are able to come and see us soon!

Summary: I stayed here for a recent convention from July 23-27th.  I liked my room, everything was clean, but I had continual problems with the door my entire stay, which wouldn't open with my key -- it seemed like it would "catch" and it had to be just perfect for it to actually open.  I complained and the maintenance guy said that I was too "nervous" and opening it too fast that's why it wasn't working for me.  I was really annoyed by that, like I didn't know how to open a door!!  I was on the 4th floor, and luckily it wasn't noisy at all.  I was startled by the fireworks at nearby Disneyland on my first night, some lucky folks had a nice view and can enjoy it from afar.  I liked the Coco's restaurant nearby, perfect for a quick meal and yummy take-out pie.  Overall a positive
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on telling us on how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. I appreciate you telling me about your lock. I will make sure I speak to my maintenance team and have them check door locks. I apologize if he made that comment to you. I hope that when you come for business or pleasure you will come to us for your lodging needs. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Very close and easy walking to Disneyland.
Summary: We found the accomadation exceded our expertations and would recommend. Great staff and rooms large and clean. Good location and close to shopping etc.Bus service outside the front entrance and resturants next door( Grerat Food). Would suggest at lest 3 days for Disneyland, you must do the Cars ride at California world which is next to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was at the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you had a fabulous time. Yes, you are surrounded with a lot of shopping and eatery places. Everything is within walking distance. We hope to see you guys back soon!

Summary: Great location and great price.  Wifi worked great.  Shuttle bus at front door.  Short walk to downtown Disney.  Rooms were comfortable although a little small if you have lots of luggage.  The breakfast area is very busy and of average quality but it was easy enough to take it  back to your room.  The option of hot items like eggs and sausages is great, also yoghurts, juices, pastries, toast, bagels, cereal and fruits.  Desk staff were friendly and helpful.  Would happily stay again - Perfect for our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business.  I‚Äôm glad to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. I hope you enjoyed the beautiful scenery walking back and forth from the parks. That‚Äôs good that you did get a chance to enjoy the breakfast. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Good hotel across the road from Disneyland
Summary: We chose this hotel for its proximity to Disneyland, and we were not disappointed about the choice as it is really close.  The hotel rooms are a bit dated, and if you are on the ground floor you should be aware that your room is right in the car park which made us feel uneasy at first since anyone could access the car park! However it safety was not a concern.  THe staff were quite helpful even when one of our group was ill (even though the Doctor's bill was extremely hefty - but thats another story).  The only bad point of this hotel was the breakfast room...we are aware that we visited at peak time, but the atmosphere was crazy...not enough room, and very basic food, but at least it was included in the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on letting us know how your stay was. We appreciate your business. I hope that the person that was ill is feeling much better. I hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come and stay with us. See you soon!

Summary: We had spent ages reviewing hotels in this area before we booked and I think we made a great choice!  The front desk staff were very pleasant and helpful - they were even able to help out with recommending a mobility company to hire a wheelchair from!   Our room was on the top floor - good place to be as we didn't have to hear other people above us.  The room was kept very clean, beds were comfortable, linen clean and the fridge and microwave came in very handy.   The kids enjoyed the pool a couple of times - we found ourselves too busy to spend a lot of time here.   Some of the other reviews have complained about the wi-fi - we found it adequate, but then again we only needed to send e-mails and check up on the news back home - just needed to have a little patience..and sit
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your business. I will let the staff know what a great job they are doing. We are happy to hear that we were able to help you research on renting a wheelchair. That‚Äôs great that the kids were able to enjoy the pools! Glad to hear that you guys enjoyed breakfast in the morning before heading over to the parks. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while visiting the Anaheim area to go to Disney. We parked our car while there and were able to walk everywhere (parks,restaurants, shopping, etc). The desk clerk Justin, was amazingly helpful and friendly. We felt like we were in small town USA not a suburb of LA.This is a great option for anyone going to the Disneyland/California Adventure Parks. Friendly staff, comfy beds, great pools, and more!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are within walking distance to a lot of shopping and eatery. Only about 10-15 min. walk to Downtown Disney and the Anaheim Garden Walk. I will definitely let Justin know what a great he is doing. We hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: We loved this hotel! The rooms were comfy and spacious with a fridge to keep our drinks. The TV had lots of channels which was good and the room was always very clean! The hotel was only a short walk away from the hotel, which was really nice, as the area around this hotel and disney is lovely. Everywhere is clean and well lit, which some fairy lights on the trees on the walk down to the parks.  The breakfast was good. I don't know why everyone complains! There was enough food there for everyone: cereal, toast, pancakes, fruit, eggs and even donuts! Breakfast was a bit chaotic and there was not much seating so we brought it back up into our room which was fine. Parking your car is okay, but as the car park is shared with the coco's restaurant (next door) guests, its very busy
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very happy to hear that you had a great time here with us and that you were able to enjoy the breakfast. Thank you for coming to the front desk to assist you with a room key. It‚Äôs great to be able to enjoy the beautiful pools after a long day at the theme parks. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I spent 6 nights here with my fianc√©. Checking in was very fast and efficient. The customer service was pretty good. Beds were comfortable. The microwave and fridge was awesome as my fianc√© and I just went to the grocery store and stored our own food. The showers always had hot water. It was a quick 15 min walk to Disneyland main gates and a 15 min walk to Anaheim garden walk. The continental breakfast was efficient enough. My only issue was the wifi connection was crappy at best. If you actually got connected to the internet it was slow and kicked you off within a few minutes. I think I had better wifi in small remote towns in Asia. However, I didn't come to Southern California to surf the net. So overall, this was very good and met the expectations and then some of a budget
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will let the staff know what a great job they are doing. It is a short walk to the main entrance of the parks and to the Anaheim Garden Walk. I hope that we had been notified if there was an issue with the WIFI. We could have looked at it and see if there was something going on. We are glad to assist when help is needed. We hope to see you guys soon!

Summary Heading: Great motel, great staff, great pool, and bad Wifi.
Summary: Thank you for making our trip to Disneyland comfortable and relaxing. We loved the pool area, the breakfast met our needs, with cereal, fresh fruit, toast and bagels. We enjoyed the pies at Coco's next door. I gave up on the wifi at night, but it did work alright during the day. Justin is a great asset to your business we enjoyed dealing with him.
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will let Justin know what a great job he is doing. I will definitely have the tech check on the WIFI. If we had known about the issue we could have taken care of it. Thank you once again. Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and very close to theme parks!!!!:)
Summary: I stayed at this hotel July 2012. Our stay was fantastic and the staff was very helpful especially BROOKLYN. The breakfast was good and rooms are very clean.although my favorite was the pools!!! The jacuzzi was amazing:) my other favorite part was the short walk to the theme park cuz its really close by. There is also a shuttle to take you and it's a very ok price as well:) awesome hotel will stay again and again!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will let Brooklyn know what a great job he is doing. That‚Äôs great that you did get to enjoy the pools and spa. It sounds you had a fabulous time here. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed five nights in a clean room with comfy beds. Sadly Maids did not speak or understand English so any communications were impossible. Even simple requests like "Please vacuum the room today" were not understood but she did vacuum. Internet worked intermittently. There are over 200 rooms so demand in the evening was hign and it slowed to a crawl or dropped you. Better than some Best Western's.         Front desk was always helpful and attentive. Office had two or three computers for guests to use and that helped to stay up with internet business that could not be carried on from the third floor (rm 310) due to dropped connections.     About a 20 minute walk to the theme park gates or a 12 minute bus ride on the public bus. $1.00 seniors/kids and $3 all others. Bus stops in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will make sure I speak to our WIFI tech to find out what is going on with the connections. I will let the front desk to keep up the great job. I‚Äôm sorry that you weren‚Äôt able to communicate with the housekeeper regarding your room. I hope the housekeeper would have called us at the desk to find out what was being requested. I‚Äôm glad that she did do what was requested. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary Heading: Been staying at that hotel since the year 2000 and it has never let me down
Summary: I was going on line to reserve a room for the night of august 2 some how there's something wrong with the Internet so I decided to there to see if I can reserve a room since its always busy for the summer time when I got there Justin was really really really friendly, nice, and profession eventhough he was by himself and there were 4 people ahead of me I never seen someone like Justin so calm and telling the customer thanks for being patient waiting in line I'll be with you as soon as possible. Best western never disappoint me the hotel is always clean and that's the only hotel I would stay at Anaheim I wouldn't stay any where else
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business.  Thank you once again for being patient while waiting in line. We will make sure we always have staff members to help the front desk so this doesn‚Äôt happen again. We are glad that we are the hotel of your choice. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This was a prime location to Disney. If your planning a trip to Disney, this is where you want to stay (if, of course, you don't want to stay @ Disney hotels). It is within walking distance from Disney, there is no need to pay $15 @ Disney for parking. The rooms were clean and a decent size (we are a family of 3). The picture listed for this hotel is exactly what we got. The carpets were worn, but if you keep your shoes on, than it shouldn't be a problem. The free continental breakfast is not worth it. I only picked up some coffee b/c it was a mad house! I would recommend going to Coco's next door. Housekeeping did a great job maintaing our room. It felt much cleaner than The Palazzo in Vegas! My only problem was the $8 a day for parking, and late @ night, there is no parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. During our summer months and having the hotel sold out everyday can make the carpets get a little dirty. The breakfast room can get a little crowded and we are trying to figure out what we can do about that. If you ever have trouble parking please ask any of the staff members and we would be glad to help you. We hope that you come and visit the Anaheim area you come to us for your lodging needs. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed at Stovall's for one Saturday night during our weekend at Disneyland/California Adventure. The hotel is perfectly located just .3 miles from the entrance to both parks and Downtown Disney. Our room was very nice -- it didn't feel crowded even with two queen beds and a table, dresser, vanity, etc. The shower/tub was great, nice big rain showerhead. The room had a refrigerator and coffee maker. The rooms were clean and quiet even though we were on the ground floor and cars are parked right in front of the rooms, motel style. (We were only in the rooms between midnight and 7 am so I can't vouch for other times) The bed was comfy. The continental breakfast is now more in line with other Best Western's, with sausage, scrambled eggs and pancakes added to the array of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on letting us know about your stay. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great that you had a great time here with us. We will let the general manager know about the eggs in the breakfast room. I hope you were able to enjoy the rest of the breakfast. We hope to see you guys again!

Summary: Our stay was terrible.  Here were the reasons: 1) We were given a room that was already occupied, 2) After fixing their mistake, they gave us a key that did not work to the new room, 3) The carpet was filthy!  The soles of our feet would be black just walking around the room! 4) The "free" wifi did not even work!  The front desk said that it was probably because too many people were logged on.  What the heck?  Then buy a better router! 5) I turned on the heater in the morning.  It smelled so bad that the fire alarm came on, 6) Breakfast was not that great, and 7) It was a far walk to the theme parks, especially when we were returning from an exhausted day at the park.  The hotel offered shuttles with a fee but it was too expensive considering we had to pay for parking ($8) each
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. We apologize for not providing you with legendary service. I will make sure I get housekeeping to check all the rooms for dirty carpets. I know that during our summer months it‚Äôs difficult to make sure that all carpets are in great condition. I will make sure I get in contact with our Wifi tech and find out what‚Äôs going on with the connection. I do apologize for the heater smelling bad and causing your alarm to go on. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you did enjoy the pools. I hope you give us another chance to provide you with legendary service.

Summary Heading: Everything you need for one great price
Summary: So far our stay is off to a god start.  We were greeted promptly by Jonathan.  He is very professional and courteous and had me checked in less than 5 minutes.  So, the reason I didnt rate this a five is because of the lack of parking.  Having to pay for parking ($8/day) , we had to circle around several times until someone left.  If you plan to stay here, don't leave your parking spot if you are lucky enough to get a spot.  I don't mind paying for parking, I just want a spot without circling around especially with a toddler who is anxious to get out of the car.   So upon arrival to our room, we found a nice clean room with updated furnishings, a very comfy bed, flat screen TV, microwave and mini refrigerator.  note, there is no freezer in the mini refrigerator.   Our room has 2
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. I will let Jonathan know what a great job he is doing. I apologize if you didn‚Äôt find parking. I hope that we would have known this so we could have assisted you with parking. I will immediately address the issue with the crib. I will make sure those cribs are clean and ready to deliver when needed. We are surrounded with restaurants that you can walk too. Thank you once again for your feedback. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Our recent stay was fine the room was clean with all basic necessities, nice pools and is close to walk to Disney or short drive to nice eateries. On the downside the Wi-Fi in our room was terrible( lost signal every time we used our tablets) eventually we just gave up and I just used my phone to search for places to eat etc. Also the breakfast, while it was justifiably chaos for shear number of people that they put thru every morning, the food was bad ( powdered eggs and cold pancakes) is it too much to ask for real scrambled eggs? These were hard to choke down.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I do apologize if the WIFI was not working while you were staying here. I hope we were notified so we could have help with this issue. I will let the breakfast staff know that the food is getting cold. We will keep inconsideration what you are saying about the eggs. We hope that you will come and visit us again.

Summary Heading: location within walkin diatance. Ok to stay...Even for kids
Summary: It was hard choosing where to stay as there are many to choose from. We chose this at random and cause of other reviews...we paid $120 off of a popular website last minute about 1 week before our vacay...we arrived at 1pm to clean parking lot and clean lobby but couldnt check in til 4 cuz rms werent ready...so we parked and ate at Marri's italian restaurant-Excellent food-FYI...w/in walking distance to the right of hotel...:0)...anywho rooms were decent and clean...wall paper was torn but who cares its a place to sleep cause disneyland opens at 8 for earlybirds and closes at midnight for kids and 2am for the adults..:0)...by that time u don't care cuz ur body is tired...fyi bootleg tickets are a joke cuz u can still buy tickets for basically the same price w/out having the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great that you got a chance to enjoy the Italian place down from us. We will have housekeeping keep a close eye on any wallpaper issues. I hope you had a great time at the parks. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: My husband and I were able to spend a long weekend here this past week.  We have stayed several times before so were aware of the quality and the convenience to the parks.  One late night we needed an extra blanket and were provided one by the security person.  Another day we realized that our window lock was missing and the maintenance man showed up immediately and remedied the issue.  We did not attempt the breakfast because there was a large group during our stay and the room was much too crowded, but Coco's next door is always good so we opted for that option.  Kudos to the entire staff as they were easy going and friendly!  Thank you!  I always recommend BW Plus Stovall's Inn to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Let me starting by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm very pleased to hear that you had a great time while staying with us. I will let the staff know that they are doing a great job! We are very grateful that you are recommending friends and family to our property. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 10 days in early July and found it to be a great place for our family base for our visit to Southern Calf.   Rooms are clean with all the basic amenities expected. The buildings and grounds are kept very tidy and the pools were the place to be after a long day.   We renamed the breakfast room to "mayhem". Nuff said!   Short walk to Disney was awesome and there is no need to use the resort bus. I will stay here again and would recommend this hotel to others with families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We are glad to hear that you had a great time here while staying for 10 days. I hope you were able to enjoy the pools and the spa after a long day at the park. During the summer the breakfast room does get a little busy. We hope that we were able to accommodate you and your family. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: The hotel was clean and convenient for attending the convention center. The staff was great and it was very handy to have a microwave and fridge in the room.  However, I think I just had the one room that posed several problems for me personally.  The room had 2 beds but little walking space.  Also, I asked for a room near the front of the hotel to save some walking distance in the mornings, but the room was on the second floor with a "bonus" set of stairs not accessible by elevator.  Later in my stay that would be a problem as I could not bring my scooter into the room at night and had to leave it charging in the office overnight.  For anyone else it might not have been a problem, so if you have special needs, beware of the rooms on the "second and a half" floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We appreciate your business. We do apologize if we didn‚Äôt meet you your expectations. I hope that we could have moved you to a wheel chair accessible room. We are not sure if the request was missed or because of being in a sold out situation it was hard to accommodate. Please accept our apologizes and we hope to see you again.

Summary: This place has all that you need for your stay in Disneyland. It's well within walking distance and the beds and room are clean and nice. You wont be staying in the hotel room much but its nice to return to a room where everything is comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us. It is a short walk to the parks from the Stovall‚Äôs Inn. On your way back in the evening the view is beautiful. You can see the beautiful lights that the trees have. After a long day it‚Äôs great to go and soak your tired feet at the pool or spa. I will let housekeeping know that they are doing a great job keeping the rooms beautiful. We hope you come back soon!

Summary Heading: Great Location and Value for Money
Summary: I spent four nights at the Best Western Stovalls in June. It was great value for the price I got and its location meant I only had a very short walk each morning to get to Disneyland.  The room was clean, the bed very comfortable and I also had a microwave and mini fridge, There is also a Coco's restaurant next door which is a great option for dinner. I would recommend the Stovalls Inn for anyone looking for a great value for money option in the Disneyland area
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us. That‚Äôs great that you enjoyed the scenery while walking back and forth from the parks. All of our rooms have microwaves, fridges, coffee makers, hair dryers.  Yes, there is Coco‚Äôs restaurant next door that you can order room service or just dine in. Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again!

Summary: We have just returned from our visit to Anaheim. The Hotel was excellent. Most of the reception staff were extremely helpful. Rooms great. Location awesome. Walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure. Easy public transport to shopping malls. View of Disneyland fireworks each night from our 2nd floor balcony. Breakfast was okay but they ran out of things if you didn't get there early enough and it was very crowded. Suggestion: there should be some plates and cutlery in rooms. There is a microwave and fridge but nothing to prepare food on. Excellent restaurants very close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your comments and business. We are glad that you had a great stay with us. Yes, you can view the view works from our hotel. You can also enjoy them if you are in the pool area. During the summer the breakfast room may get a little busy. We have tables and chairs outside of the breakfast area so you can sit and enjoy your breakfast in the warm sun. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel and terrific location! Disneyland Fun!
Summary: The Best Western Stovall's Inn is a great hotel! We just returned from a 4th of July trip. Our stay was very comfortable! The hotel staff are helpful, the rooms are kept very clean and the property is well taken care of. There are two pools which are a wonderful place to hang out mid day when the sun it hot and lines are long at Disney. You can even see some fireworks from the pool area at night.  If you are looking for a comfortable hotel then I would strongly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a great value and close (easy 10 minute walk) to front gates of Disney through Disney California Hotel. It is also walking distance to 3 restaurants and the hotel provides a breakfast that isn't bad at all!
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great that you did get to enjoy our pools after a long day at the parks. Yes, you can see the fireworks from the pool area. We are a short 10-15 minute walk to Downtown Disney. The Garden Walk and Downtown Disney are within walking distance and you can find lots of dinning. We hope you visit us again!

Summary: We just returned home from our So Cal vacation, the first place we stayed at was this Best Western.  We stayed here for 3 nights while enjoying Disneyland. Our stay got off to a rocky start when our room reeked of what we suspect was cat urine, after dealing with a housekeeper and her supervisor we had to ask for the manager and switch rooms, we ended up in a smaller room but at least we could stand to be in it.  Our stay last year was very pleasant but this time the staff seemed much less friendly, we had our issue with the room, and the included breakfast which we usually enjoy was almost in edible and over crowded.  On the plus side the pools and hot tubs are great, the location works well; just down the street from the Paradise Pier Hotel, and there are several dining
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on your review. We appreciate your business. We did have to send the Executive housekeeper to check on the room and assist on moving if requested. We immediately put the room out of order to do deep cleaning. It‚Äôs hard to accommodate when being on a sold out situation. We tried our best and we apologize for any inconveniences that this may have caused you. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim Resort area you would come and stay with us!

Summary Heading: Unbelievably noisy and a terrible breakfast
Summary: I am usually very tolerant. However, they put us in the section with an entire marching band that was on tour. To wake the group, they pounded on windows and doors, making the entire building shake. This went on for 15 minutes this morning, even after I told them to stop. What the heck was the staff thinking putting us amongst the group.  The breakfast is terrible. The powdered eggs are almost still like dry powder. Yogurt containers are rationed out. Plan on going elsewhere for breakfast.   As I said, the staff is friendly, the rooms are clean and beds are comfortable. But I'm never staying at a Best Western again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. We do apologize for any inconveniences that this may have caused you. Our groups don‚Äôt normally wake their group up that way. They are very quiet and keep in consideration that they have surrounding guests. We will keep in mind your thoughts on the breakfast. We will let the front desk staff and housekeeping know what a great job they are doing. We hope that you give us another chance to give you legendary service.

Summary: I was surprised to see a wall-mounted air-conditioner but I don't think it was any louder in operation than others that are in-room units.  The room itself was very clean and the bed was very comfortable.  Running on east coast time I was always up and ready for the 6:30 start to breakfast, but it was on time and convenient.  The coffee was good, the hot food average, and the selection of breakfast types (cereal, danish, yogurt, fruit, eggs) was generous at this price point.  I used the microwave and refrigerator every day, especially since the burritos I picked up for dinner nearby were so large, I had one dinner and two lunches from them.  Free wifi was great, and even during busy hours I never had a problem getting on the network, it was just slower than it was in the early
Manager Response: Let me start by thanking you for your review. We appreciate your business. That‚Äôs great that you were able to walk back and forth without getting stuck in traffic. It is a beautiful walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. It‚Äôs great that you were able to enjoy our breakfast. I hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you will come back and stay with us for your lodging needs. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for five nights during a conference I recently attended and as the title of this review suggests, it was a fair price for the content of the package.   The hotel itself is a lodge-style layout and it's located directly across from Disneyland so, if you don't mind hearing fireworks every night at 9:30PM then, you'll be fine, possibly even delighted. That wasn't a selling point for me, however it is within a 20 minute walk of the convention center so, that was a plus.   There are several restaurants within walking distance - be sure to check their Trip Advisor reviews because they're mostly hit or miss. Given the location and limited dining/entertainment options, I'd recommend getting a rental car unless you don't mind paying through the nose ($20 for a 2
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on your review. We appreciate your business. Indeed, the Anaheim Convention Center is only a short walk across the street. We hope that you enjoyed the beautiful scenery walking back and forth from the Convention Center. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you come and stay with us.

Summary Heading: close to the happiest place on earth
Summary: you cant get any closer for the price. the hotel was clean and comfortable and you cant beat a free breakfast. the eggs are not great but there is plenty of other things that are good and will fill you up. The hotel is so close the park it was an easy 10 min walk over.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business. I glad that you had a great time while staying with us. That‚Äôs great that you had a wonderful time at the parks. We hope that you come and stay with us again.

Summary: The property was nice and landscaped.  It was just remodeled however, the carpet was worn and looked like they forgot to change it.  Also the air conditioner was a little old school.  We asked for a king bed and ended up with 2 queens.  Overall, I would stay there again, it was walking distance to Disneyland and other restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are still replacing all of our old AC‚Äôs. We are hoping that by the end of the year we will be done with this project. I apologize if we weren‚Äôt able to accommodate you with your bedding request. We try to fulfill everyone‚Äôs requests but sometimes it‚Äôs hard to do so. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect, convenient family property close to Disney magic!
Summary: Stovall's property more than met our needs for a recent four night Disney trip, for a group of five (two adults and three children). We truly enjoyed our stay, and I'm almost certain we'll be staying here again. It's a simple hotel that has been around for decades, yet - you'd never guess it with the excellent shape of the property. Rooms, decor and the entire property are all modern.   Our room with two double beds had ample space, tons of storage (a chest of drawers and an armoire), plus a microwave and fridge. The only minor complaint I had was the humidity level in the room - it was hard to keep it from bring 'sticky', especially after showers.   The pools are impressive, especially compared to other nearby properties (and the sad pool across the street). There are two
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm thrilled to hear that you had a great time here with us. It‚Äôs fabulous that you were able to enjoy our gorgeous pools. The breakfast is great and we have tables on the outside of the breakfast room to sit and enjoy your meal in the morning. Yes, in the evening Disneyland and Downtown Disney illuminates their walkways with beautiful lights. Thank you once again and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: stayed 4 nights, close enough to walk and don't worry about driving. Rooms are small, full size beds. Asked for more towels and they were provided quickly. Can watch nightly fireworks from top floor. Breakfast standard, a little congested, trying to stock food frequently.Pool good, lots of towels... Lousy cable,  unfortunately no WIFI reception in our room (bottom) and no internet cable connection except for lobby. Overall we came to go to Disney., you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I do apologize if the cable and internet were not working. I hope that we were able to help with this issue. I will make sure that we are on top of this. We hope that when you are visiting the Anaheim area you come and stay with us.

Summary: We stayed for three nights while visiting the Disney parks. Rooms and property were spic and span.  Pool area is very nice with two separate pools and hot tubs, plenty of pool towels on hand.  Maid did a beautiful job tiding our room around all of our stuff, even making the kids bed up and placing their stuffed animals against the pillows, a cute and homey touch that we appreciated.  Breakfast was adequate, plenty of choices including cereal, bagels, donuts, and a hot buffet. Although the industrial egg product they use is terrible. I do wish they had offered more fresh fruit. They only had oranges.  Breakfast area was kept well stocked and tidy.  My only real complaint was the noise. The windows are very old and do not provide much sound insulation. People walking and talking
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked a few rooms there as a group through our travel agent. We were very surprised with the rooms. Very nice, updated and modern, comfy beds. A little small but comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was great! Laundry facilities on sure are a lifesaver and it was pretty close to everything. Every night at 9pm you can watch the fireworks from Disneyland from the hotel. The park is close by but I suggest you get shuttle passes and use the shuttles to get to the park rather than drive cause parking is expensive. Staff are very friendly and helpful. It's close to everything. There's a microwave and mini fridge so we warmed up hot dogs and packed that for he kids along w drinks and chips for Disney. Too expensive to eat there every day. We were there with several families and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that you like our modern rooms, breakfast and our laundry room. That‚Äôs great that you were able to take the shuttle bus back and forth from the parks. Yes, all of the rooms have microwaves, fridges, coffeemakers and hairdryers. All of our guest‚Äôs are happy that we have these amenities in our rooms. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: Tis was our first stop on our recent trip to the US.  The staff were very accommodating and helpful.  The room was adequate for our needs, which was basically sleeping after Disneying all day.  The breakfast was all we needed and you had lots of choices to pick from.  The only issue we had was a particularly noisy family who were somewhere near us that made a lot of noise entering or exiting their unit, but this was outside of anyone's control really.  Overall a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I‚Äôm glad that we were able to help you with everything you needed. We hope that when you visit the Anaheim Resort area you come to stay with us.

Summary: stayed for 4 night at the end of may after a tour.arrived at 10 oclock in morning rooms werent ready but we expected that because check in is 3 clock the staff couldnot have been more helpful got us a drink put the cases in storage gave us keys to the pool so we could sit and relax and they got our rooms ready early.the rooms are beautiful everything you need.plus the bonus of free breakfast great location great place great staff would recomend to anybody who wants to use disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on your review. We appreciate your business. I'm glad to hear that you had a great time here with us. We are glad to store your luggage if your room is not ready when you arrive. That's great that you were able to enjoy our pool while you were waiting for your room. I hope that when you visit the Anaheim area you come and stay with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: The included breakfast is terrible and eating area was not clean
Summary: Room were OK but the eating area was terrible. We had to make two trips to the reception to get the electronic keys working after a tiring trip to Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on letting us know how your stay was. Let me apologize for your keys not working properly and for the breakfast room not being clean. I will let the breakfast attendants know so they can pay close attention. We hope to are you again!

Summary: this is a pretty nice hotel. clean room. the breakfast was really really busy, well stocked, nice selection, but AVOID the eggs at all cost. they taste like chalk! I will say though that i was much more impressed with the staff in the breakfast room over the front desk staff. When i went to check in they were still cleaning rooms, i checked in at 4pm posted check-in is 3pm. No one told me that they were still cleaning rooms so i stood there as they tried to pretend the were doing something usefull, but then i over heard one of the staff members say something about the rooms aren't ready. well maybe you should change check in time then?! when they finally found a room all the kid said was, "sorry we were just making sure you were getting a king room". i know i look young and all
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time on your review. We appreciate your business. I do apologize for any inconveniences that this may have caused you. Being on a sold out situation the day before it makes it hard to have all the rooms ready by 3pm which is our check in time. Maybe if they would have explained that we are still waiting for rooms it would have been understandable. I totally understand that communication was the key in this matter. We hope that when visiting the Anaheim area you will come and stay with us.

Summary Heading: Very Happy w/Our Stay at BW
